atk-abh01a0:5: Karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino;
atk-abh01a0:13: Mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā, tassā paññāya tejasā;
atk-abh01a0:21: Yaṃ devadevo devānaṃ, desetvā nayato puna;
atk-abh01a0:24: Yañca sutvāna so thero, āharitvā mahītalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:30: Saṅgītā anusaṅgītā, pacchāpi ca isīhi yā.
atk-abh01a0:44: Avikkhittā nisāmetha, dullabhā hi ayaṃ kathāti.
atk-abh01a0:46_1: hettha ‘abhi’-saddo. “Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti” “abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu
atk-abh01a0:46_2: viya. Tasmā yathā samussitesu bahūsu chattesu ceva dhajesu ca yaṃ atirekappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:46_3: visesavaṇṇasaṇṭhānañca chattaṃ, taṃ ‘aticchatta’nti vuccati, yo atirekappamāṇo nānāvirāgavaṇṇavisesasampanno
atk-abh01a0:46_4: ca dhajo so ‘atidhajo’ti vuccati, yathā ca ekato sannipatitesu bahūsu rājakumāresu
atk-abh01a0:46_5: ceva devesu ca yo jātibhogayasaissariyādisampattīhi atirekataro ceva visesavantataro
atk-abh01a0:46_6: ca rājakumāro so ‘atirājakumāro’ti vuccati, yo āyuvaṇṇaissariyayasasampattiādīhi
atk-abh01a0:46_7: atirekataro ceva visesavantataro ca devo so ‘atidevo’ti vuccati, tathārūpo brahmāpi
atk-abh01a0:46_8: ‘atibrahmā’ti vuccati, evameva ayampi dhammo dhammātirekadhammavisesaṭṭhena ‘abhidhammo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:47_0: Suttantañhi patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā, na nippadesena; abhidhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:47_2: vibhattā. Tathā dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni,
atk-abh01a0:47_3: dvādasapadiko paccayākāro. Kevalañhi indriyavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ natthi, paccayākāre
atk-abh01a0:47_4: ca pañhapucchakaṃ natthi. Suttantañca patvā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ekadeseneva vibhattā,
atk-abh01a0:47_5: na nippadesena; abhidhammaṃ patvā pana tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena nippadesatova vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:47_6: Tathā cattāri sammappadhānāni, cattāro iddhipādā, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-abh01a0:47_7: maggo, cattāri jhānāni, catasso appamaññāyo, pañca sikkhāpadāni, catasso paṭisambhidā.
atk-abh01a0:47_8: Kevalañhettha sikkhāpadavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ natthi. Suttantaṃ patvā ca ñāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:47_9: ekadeseneva vibhattaṃ na nippadesena; tathā kilesā. Abhidhammaṃ patvā pana “ekavidhena
atk-abh01a0:47_10: ñāṇavatthū”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā nippadesatova vibhattaṃ. Tathā ekakato
atk-abh01a0:47_11: paṭṭhāya anekehi nayehi kilesā. Suttantaṃ patvā ca bhūmantaraparicchedo ekadeseneva
atk-abh01a0:47_12: vibhatto, na nippadesena; abhidhammaṃ pana patvā tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena bhūmantaraparicchedo
atk-abh01a0:47_13: nippadesatova vibhatto. Evaṃ dhammātirekadhammavisesaṭṭhena abhidhammoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:48_1: sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ vasena ṭhito. Ayamettha ācariyānaṃ samānakathā. Vitaṇḍavādī
atk-abh01a0:48_2: panāha – ‘kathāvatthu kasmā gahitaṃ? Nanu sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni
atk-abh01a0:48_3: dve vassasatāni atikkamitvā moggaliputtatissattherenetaṃ ṭhapitaṃ? Tasmā sāvakabhāsitattā
atk-abh01a0:48_4: chaḍḍetha na’nti. ‘Kiṃ pana chappakaraṇāni abhidhammo’ti? ‘Evaṃ na vadāmī’ti. ‘Atha
atk-abh01a0:48_6: nāma atthi, etena saha sattā’ti. ‘Mahādhammahadaye apubbaṃ natthi, katipayāva pañhāvārā
atk-abh01a0:48_7: avasesā, kathāvatthunāva saddhiṃ sattā’ti. ‘No kathāvatthunā, mahādhātukathā nāma
atk-abh01a0:48_8: atthi, tāya saddhiṃ sattā’ti. ‘Mahādhātukathāyaṃ apubbaṃ natthi, appamattikāva tanti
atk-abh01a0:49_0: Sammāsambuddho hi sattappakaraṇāni desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā yā esā puggalavāre
atk-abh01a0:49_1: tāva catūsu pañhesu dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti taṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:49_2: sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya pāḷiyā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Sā panesā “puggalo
atk-abh01a0:49_3: upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti. Āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho tato so
atk-abh01a0:49_4: puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti. Nahevaṃ vattabbe. Ājānāhi niggahaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:49_5: puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti. Āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho
atk-abh01a0:49_6: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti. Nahevaṃ vattabbe. Ājānāhi
atk-abh01a0:49_7: niggahaṃ…pe…. Sabbattha puggalo upalabbhati sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhati, sabbadā
atk-abh01a0:49_8: puggalo upalabbhati sabbadā puggalo nupalabbhati, sabbesu puggalo upalabbhati sabbesu
atk-abh01a0:49_9: puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:49_10: niggahaṃ, dutiyaṃ nissāya dutiyaṃ …pe… aṭṭhamaṃ nissāya aṭṭhamaṃ niggahaṃ dassentena
atk-abh01a0:49_11: satthārā ṭhapitā. Iminā nayena sabbattha mātikāṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ mātikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:49_12: ṭhapento imaṃ disvā ṭhapesi – mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:49_13: matthake moggaliputtatissatthero nāma bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde
atk-abh01a0:49_14: pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā dīghanikāyappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:50_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi, satthārā
atk-abh01a0:50_1: pana dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desesi. Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya
atk-abh01a0:50_2: desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva nāma jātaṃ. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā madhupiṇḍikasuttantādīni.
atk-abh01a0:50_4: samudācaranti, ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbaṃ, esevanto
atk-abh01a0:50_5: rāgānusayāna”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh01a0:51_0: Dhammappaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū mahākaccānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasabalena ṭhapitamātikāya
atk-abh01a0:51_1: atthaṃ pucchiṃsu. Thero pucchitamattakeneva akathetvā dasabalassa apacitidassanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:51_2: “seyyathāpi āvuso puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī”ti sāropamaṃ āharitvā sārarukkho viya
atk-abh01a0:51_3: bhagavā sākhāpalāsasadisā sāvakā, “so hāvuso bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati
atk-abh01a0:51_4: cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa
atk-abh01a0:51_5: dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti satthāraṃ thometvā punappunaṃ therehi yācito satthārā
atk-abh01a0:51_6: ṭhapitamātikāya atthaṃ vibhajitvā “ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:51_7: upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha sace sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsandiyamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:51_8: sameti gaṇheyyātha, no ce mā gaṇhitthā”ti iminā adhippāyena “yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti
atk-abh01a0:52_0: Te satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu. Satthā dukkathitaṃ kaccānenāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgaṃ
atk-abh01a0:52_1: ussāpento viya gīvaṃ unnāmetvā supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ mahāmukhaṃ pūrento brahmassaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:52_2: nicchāretvā sādhu sādhūti therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “paṇḍito, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno,
atk-abh01a0:52_3: mahāpañño bhikkhave mahākaccāno, maṃ cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha,
atk-abh01a0:52_4: ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākata”nti āha.
atk-abh01a0:53_0: Evaṃ satthārā anumoditakālato paṭṭhāya ca pana sakalaṃ suttaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:53_1: jātaṃ. Ānandattherādīhi vitthāritasuttesupi eseva nayo. Evameva sammāsambuddho sattappakaraṇāni
atk-abh01a0:53_2: desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā vuttanayena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Ṭhapento ca pana imaṃ addasa –
atk-abh01a0:54_0: Mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake moggaliputtatissatthero
atk-abh01a0:54_1: nāma bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti
atk-abh01a0:55_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi, satthārā
atk-abh01a0:55_1: pana dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desesi. Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya
atk-abh01a0:55_2: desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva jātaṃ. Evaṃ kathāvatthunāva saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:56_0: Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇe catasso vibhattiyo – cittavibhatti rūpavibhatti nikkheparāsi
atk-abh01a0:56_1: atthuddhāroti. Tattha kāmāvacarakusalato aṭṭha, akusalato dvādasa, kusalavipākato
atk-abh01a0:56_2: soḷasa, akusalavipākato satta, kiriyato ekādasa; rūpāvacarakusalato pañca, vipākato
atk-abh01a0:56_3: pañca, kiriyato pañca; arūpāvacarakusalato cattāri, vipākato cattāri, kiriyato cattāri;
atk-abh01a0:56_4: lokuttarakusalato cattāri, vipākato cattārīti ekūnanavuti cittāni cittavibhatti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:56_5: Cittuppādakaṇḍantipi etasseva nāmaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato atirekachabhāṇavāraṃ, vitthāriyamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:57_0: Tadanantaraṃ ekavidhena duvidhenātiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena vibhajitvā
atk-abh01a0:57_1: dassitā rūpavibhatti nāma. Rūpakaṇḍantipi etasseva nāmaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato atirekadvibhāṇavāraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:58: Tadanantaraṃ mūlato khandhato dvārato bhūmito atthato dhammato nāmato liṅgatoti evaṃ mūlādīhi nikkhipitvā desito nikkheparāsi nāma. So –
atk-abh01a0:59: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a0:60: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a0:62: Nikkhepakaṇḍantipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato timattabhāṇavāraṃ. Vitthāriyamānaṃ pana anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:63_0: Tadanantaraṃ pana tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa atthuddhārabhūtaṃ yāva saraṇadukā nikkhittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:63_1: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ nāma. Yato mahāpakaraṇiyā bhikkhū mahāpakaraṇe gaṇanacāraṃ asallakkhentā
atk-abh01a0:63_2: gaṇanacāraṃ samānenti. Taṃ vācanāmaggato dvimattabhāṇavāraṃ. Vitthāriyamānaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:64: Iti sakalampi dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇaṃ vācanāmaggato atirekaterasamattabhāṇavāraṃ. Vitthāriyamānaṃ pana anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti. Evametaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:66: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tampi buddhena desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:67_0: Tadanantaraṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ nāma. Taṃ khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a0:68_1: tidhā vibhatto. So vācanāmaggato pañcamattabhāṇavāro, vitthāriyamāno pana ananto
atk-abh01a0:68_2: aparimāṇo hoti. Tato paraṃ āyatanavibhaṅgādayopi eteheva tīhi nayehi vibhattā. Tesu
atk-abh01a0:68_4: Tathā saccavibhaṅgo. Indriyavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ natthi; vācanāmaggato panesa
atk-abh01a0:68_6: natthi. Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo atirekabhāṇavāramatto; tathā sammappadhāna iddhipādabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgavibhaṅgā.
atk-abh01a0:68_8: suttantabhājanīyaṃ natthi; vācanāmaggato panesa atirekabhāṇavāramatto; tathā paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a0:68_9: Ñāṇavibhaṅgo dasavidhena vibhatto; vācanāmaggato panesa timattabhāṇavāro. Khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgopi
atk-abh01a0:68_10: dasavidhena vibhatto; vācanāmaggato panesa timattabhāṇavāro. Dhammahadayavibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a0:68_11: tividhena vibhatto; vācanāmaggato panesa atirekadvibhāṇavāramatto. Sabbepi vitthāriyamānā
atk-abh01a0:68_12: anantā aparimāṇā honti. Evametaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ vācanāmaggato pañcatiṃsamattabhāṇavāraṃ;
atk-abh01a0:69_0: Tadanantaraṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ nāma. Taṃ saṅgaho asaṅgaho, saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:69_1: asaṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ, saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ, asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ; sampayogo
atk-abh01a0:69_2: vippayogo, sampayuttena vippayuttaṃ, vippayuttena sampayuttaṃ, sampayuttena sampayuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:69_3: vippayuttena vippayuttaṃ; saṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttaṃ; sampayuttena saṅgahitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:69_4: asaṅgahitaṃ, asaṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttaṃ, vippayuttena saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahitanti
atk-abh01a0:69_5: cuddasavidhena vibhattaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato atirekachabhāṇavāramattaṃ, vitthāriyamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:70_0: Tadanantaraṃ puggalapaññatti nāma. Sā “khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti
atk-abh01a0:70_1: saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattī”ti chabbidhena vibhattā. Sā vācanāmaggato
atk-abh01a0:70_2: atirekapañcabhāṇavārā; vitthāriyamānā pana anantā aparimāṇāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:71_0: Tadanantaraṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ nāma. Taṃ sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde
atk-abh01a0:71_1: pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā vibhattaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato idāni potthake likhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:71_2: aggahetvā saṅgītiāropitanayena dīghanikāyappamāṇaṃ, vitthāriyamānaṃ pana anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:72_0: Tadanantaraṃ yamakaṃ nāma. Taṃ mūlayamakaṃ khandhayamakaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:72_1: saccayamakaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ anusayayamakaṃ cittayamakaṃ dhammayamakaṃ indriyayamakanti
atk-abh01a0:72_2: dasavidhena vibhattaṃ. Taṃ vācanāmaggato vīsabhāṇavārasataṃ, vitthārato pana anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:73_0: Tadanantaraṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ nāma. Paṭṭhānantipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Taṃ hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo
atk-abh01a0:73_3: kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo
atk-abh01a0:73_4: sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo natthipaccayo vigatapaccayo avigatapaccayoti.
atk-abh01a0:74_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne paṭṭhānaṃ samānetabbaṃ. Kusalattikādayo hi dvāvīsati tikā, nāma
atk-abh01a0:74_1: hetū dhammā nahetū dhammā…pe… saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammāti ime sataṃ dukā. Aparepi
atk-abh01a0:74_2: vijjābhāgino dhammā avijjābhāgino dhammā…pe… khaye ñāṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇanti dvācattālīsa
atk-abh01a0:74_3: suttantikadukā nāma. Tesu dvāvīsati tikā sataṃ dukāti ayaṃ āhaccabhāsitā jinavacanabhūtā
atk-abh01a0:74_4: sabbaññubuddhena desitā sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ mātikā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:75_0: Athāpare dvācattālīsa suttantikadukā kutopabhavā kena ṭhapitā kena desitāti? Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherappabhavā,
atk-abh01a0:75_1: tena ṭhapitā, tena desitāti. Ime ṭhapento pana thero na sāmukkaṃsikena attano ñāṇena
atk-abh01a0:75_2: ṭhapesi. Ekuttariyaṃ pana ekanipātadukanipātasaṅgīti dasuttarasuttantehi samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a0:75_3: ābhidhammikattherānaṃ suttantaṃ patvā akilamatthaṃ ṭhapitā. Te panete ekasmiṃ nikkhepakaṇḍeyeva
atk-abh01a0:75_4: matthakaṃ pāpetvā vibhattā. Sesaṭṭhānesu yāva saraṇadukā abhidhammo vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:76_0: Sammāsambuddhena hi anulomapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsati tike nissāya tikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_1: Sataṃ duke nissāya dukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tato paraṃ dvāvīsati tike gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:76_2: dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Tato paraṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:76_3: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Tike pana tikesuyeva
atk-abh01a0:76_4: pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Duke ca dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:81_0: Paccanīyapaṭṭhānepi dvāvīsatitike nissāya tikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Dukasataṃ nissāya dukapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:81_1: nāma. Dvāvīsatitike dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Dukasataṃ dvāvīsatiyā
atk-abh01a0:81_2: tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tike tikesuyeva pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:81_3: nāma. Duke dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti paccanīyepi chahi nayehi
atk-abh01a0:86: Tato paraṃ anulomapaccanīyepi eteneva upāyena cha nayā dassitā. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a0:91: Tadanantaraṃ paccanīyānulomepi eteheva chahi nayehi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a0:96: Evaṃ anulome cha paṭṭhānāni, paṭilome cha, anulomapaccanīye cha, paccanīyānulome cha paṭṭhānānīti idaṃ catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānasamodhānaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:97: Idāni imassa abhidhammassa gambhīrabhāvavijānanatthaṃ cattāro sāgarā veditabbā – saṃsārasāgaro, jalasāgaro, nayasāgaro, ñāṇasāgaroti. Tattha saṃsārasāgaro nāma –
atk-abh01a0:100_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ. Svāyaṃ yasmā imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppattiyā purimā koṭi na
atk-abh01a0:100_1: paññāyati ettakānañhi vassasatānaṃ vā vassasahassānaṃ vā vassasatasahassānaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a0:100_2: kappasatānaṃ vā kappasahassānaṃ vā kappasatasahassānaṃ vā matthake sattā uppannā,
atk-abh01a0:100_3: tato pubbe nāhesunti vā, asukassa nāma rañño kāle uppannā, asukassa buddhassa kāle
atk-abh01a0:100_4: uppannā tato pubbe nāhesunti vā, ayaṃ paricchedo natthi; “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi
atk-abh01a0:100_5: na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi atha pacchā samabhavī”ti iminā pana
atk-abh01a0:101_0: Mahāsamuddo pana jalasāgaro nāmāti veditabbo. So caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro.
atk-abh01a0:101_1: Tattha udakassa āḷhakasatehi vā āḷhakasahassehi vā āḷhakasatasahassehi vā pamāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:101_2: nāma natthi. Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:102_0: Katamo nayasāgaro? Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Dvepi hi tantiyo paccavekkhantānaṃ saddhāsampannānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_1: pasādabahulānaṃ ñāṇuttarānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati. Katamā
atk-abh01a0:102_2: dve? Vinayañca abhidhammañca. Vinayadharabhikkhūnañhi vinayatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_3: dosānurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma – imasmiṃ dose imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:102_4: hotīti sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ – aññesaṃ avisayo, buddhānameva visayoti. Uttarimanussadhammapeyyālaṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_6: anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati. Ābhidhammikabhikkhūnampi khandhantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_8: gaganatale tārakarūpāni gaṇhanto viya rūpārūpadhamme pabbaṃ pabbaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_9: katvā vibhajanto dassesi vata no satthāti abhidhammatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ anantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:103_0: Evaṃ uppattiyā panassa idaṃ vatthupi veditabbaṃ – mahāgatigamiyatissadattatthero
atk-abh01a0:103_1: kira nāma mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti paratīraṃ gacchanto nāvāya uparitale nisinno mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-abh01a0:103_2: olokesi. Athassa tasmiṃ samaye neva paratīraṃ paññāyittha, na orimatīraṃ, ūmivegappabhedasamuggatajalacuṇṇaparikiṇṇo
atk-abh01a0:103_4: kiṃ nu kho mahāsamuddassa ūmivego balavā udāhu catuvīsatippabhede samantapaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:103_5: nayamukhaṃ balavanti cintesi. Athassa mahāsamudde paricchedo paññāyati – ayañhi heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:103_6: mahāpathaviyā paricchinno, upari ākāsena, ekato cakkavāḷapabbatena, ekato velantena
atk-abh01a0:103_7: paricchinno; samantapaṭṭhānassa pana paricchedo na paññāyatīti saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:103_8: paccavekkhantassa balavapīti uppannā. So pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-abh01a0:103_9: yathānisinnova sabbakilese khepetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāya udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-abh01a0:109_0: Katamo ñāṇasāgaro? Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ñāṇasāgaro nāma. Ayaṃ saṃsārasāgaro nāma, ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:109_1: jalasāgaro nāma, ayaṃ nayasāgaro nāmāti hi aññena na sakkā jānituṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇeneva
atk-abh01a0:109_2: sakkā jānitunti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ñāṇasāgaro nāma. Imesu catūsu sāgaresu imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:110_0: Ayampi bhagavā bodhimūle nisinno ‘imaṃ paṭivijjhitvā imaṃ vata me dhammaṃ esantassa
atk-abh01a0:110_1: gavesantassa kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni, atha me imasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:110_2: pallaṅke nisinnena diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepetvā ayaṃ dhammo paṭividdho’ti paṭividdhadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:110_3: paccavekkhanto sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi. Tato tamhā pallaṅkā vuṭṭhāya ‘imasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:110_4: vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha’nti animisehi cakkhūhi sattāhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:110_5: olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tato devatānaṃ ‘ajjāpi nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a0:110_6: pallaṅkasmiñhi ālayaṃ na vijahatī’ti parivitakko udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:111_0: Satthā devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva tāsaṃ vitakkavūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-abh01a0:111_3: katayamakapāṭihāriyasadisameva ahosi. Evaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā pallaṅkassa ṭhitaṭṭhānassa
atk-abh01a0:111_4: ca antare ākāsato oruyha sattāhaṃ caṅkami. Imesu ca ekavīsatiyā divasesu ekadivasepi
atk-abh01a0:112_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi – ratanagharaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:112_1: neva sattaratanamayaṃ gehaṃ. Sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharanti
atk-abh01a0:112_2: veditabbaṃ – tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a0:112_4: sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā. Yadā pana mahāpakaraṇaṃ oruyha “hetupaccayo
atk-abh01a0:112_5: ārammaṇapaccayo…pe… avigatapaccayo”ti sammasanaṃ ārabhi, athassa catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:112_6: sammasantassa ekantato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi. Yathā hi timirapiṅgalamahāmaccho
atk-abh01a0:112_7: caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre mahāsamuddeyeva okāsaṃ labhati, evameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:113_0: Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa
atk-abh01a0:113_2: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu, yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:114_0: Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu; yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā
atk-abh01a0:114_1: suvaṇṇarasadhārābhisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:115_0: Maṃsalohitehi ceva akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu yāsaṃ vasena
atk-abh01a0:115_1: disābhāgā cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitā viya supakkalākhārasasiñcamānā viya rattakambalaparikkhittā
atk-abh01a0:116_0: Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu; yāsaṃ vasena
atk-abh01a0:116_2: viya, vītipatantarajatatālavaṇṭā viya, kundakumudasinduvārasumanamallikādikusumasañchannā viya ca virociṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:117: Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu. Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:118_1: ahosi. Atha mahāpathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Pathavisandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:118_2: udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi. Udakaṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-abh01a0:118_4: viya ahosi. Vātaṃ vinivijjhitvā heṭṭhā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:119_0: Uparibhāgena uggantvāpi cātumahārājike gaṇhiṃsu. Te vinivijjhitvā tāvatiṃse tato
atk-abh01a0:119_1: yāme tato tusite tato nimmānaratī tato paranimmitavasavattī tato nava brahmaloke
atk-abh01a0:119_2: tato vehapphale tato pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe gaṇhiṃsu. Cattāro
atk-abh01a0:120_0: Tiriyabhāgehi anantā lokadhātuyo pakkhandiṃsu. Ettakesu ṭhānesu candamhi candappabhā
atk-abh01a0:120_1: natthi, sūriye sūriyappabhā natthi, tārakarūpesu tārakarūpappabhā natthi, devatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:120_2: uyyānavimānakapparukkhesu ceva sarīresu ca ābharaṇesu cāti sabbattha pabhā natthi.
atk-abh01a0:120_5: paññāyittha. Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ buddharasmīhiyeva ajjhotthaṭaṃ ahosi. Ayañca neva buddhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:120_6: adhiṭṭhāniddhi, na bhāvanāmayiddhi. Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ pana sammasato lokanāthassa
atk-abh01a0:120_7: lohitaṃ pasīdi, vatthurūpaṃ pasīdi, chavivaṇṇo pasīdi. Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:120_8: samantā asītihatthamatte padese niccalāva aṭṭhāsi. Iminā nīhārena sattāhaṃ sammasi.
atk-abh01a0:121_0: Satta rattindivāni sammasitadhammo kittako ahosīti? Ananto aparimāṇo ahosi. Ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:121_1: tāva manasādesanā nāma. Satthā pana evaṃ sattāhaṃ manasā cintitadhammaṃ vacībhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:121_2: katvā desento vassasatenapi vassasahassenapi vassasatasahassenapi matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:121_3: desetuṃ na sakkotīti na vattabbaṃ. Aparabhāgepi hi tathāgato tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle
atk-abh01a0:121_4: paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ majjhe nisinno mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:121_5: katvā kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammāti dhammaṃ desento satabhāgena
atk-abh01a0:121_6: sahassabhāgena satasahassabhāgena dhammantarā dhammantaraṃ saṅkamitvā saṅkamitvāva
atk-abh01a0:121_7: desesi. Tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattitadesanā vegena pavattā ākāsagaṅgā viya adhomukhaṭhapitaudakaghaṭā
atk-abh01a0:121_8: nikkhantaudakadhārā viya ca hutvā anantā aparimāṇā ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:122_0: Buddhānañhi bhattānumodanakālepi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anumodentānaṃ desanā dīghamajjhimanikāyappamāṇā
atk-abh01a0:122_1: hoti. Pacchābhattaṃ pana sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desentānaṃ desanā saṃyuttaaṅguttarikadvemahānikāyappamāṇāva
atk-abh01a0:122_2: hoti. Kasmā? Buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ mukhādānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:122_3: siliṭṭhaṃ jivhā mudukā saro madhuro vacanaṃ lahuparivattaṃ. Tasmā taṃ muhuttaṃ desitadhammopi
atk-abh01a0:122_4: ettako hoti. Temāsaṃ desitadhammo pana ananto aparimāṇoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:123_0: Ānandatthero hi bahussuto tipiṭakadharo pañcadasa gāthāsahassāni saṭṭhi padasahassāni
atk-abh01a0:123_1: latāpupphāni ākaḍḍhanto viya ṭhitapadeneva ṭhatvā gaṇhāti vā vāceti vā deseti vā.
atk-abh01a0:123_2: Ettako therassa eko uddesamaggo nāma hoti. Therassa hi anupadaṃ uddesaṃ dadamāno
atk-abh01a0:123_3: añño dātuṃ na sakkoti, na sampāpuṇāti. Sammāsambuddhova sampāpuṇeyya. Evaṃ adhimattasatimā
atk-abh01a0:123_4: adhimattagatimā adhimattadhitimā sāvako satthārā temāsaṃ iminā nīhārena desitadesanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:123_5: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ uggaṇhantopi matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:124_0: Evaṃ temāsaṃ nirantaraṃ desentassa pana tathāgatassa kabaḷīkārāhārappaṭibaddhaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ
atk-abh01a0:124_1: kathaṃ yāpesīti? Paṭijagganeneva. Buddhānañhi so so kālo suvavatthito suparicchinno
atk-abh01a0:124_2: supaccakkho. Tasmā bhagavā dhammaṃ desentova manussaloke kālaṃ oloketi. So bhikkhācāravelaṃ
atk-abh01a0:124_3: sallakkhetvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā ‘imassa cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sarakutti
atk-abh01a0:124_4: ākappo ca evarūpo nāma hotu, ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū’ti adhiṭṭhāya pattacīvaramādāya
atk-abh01a0:124_5: anotattadahaṃ gacchati. Devatā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ denti. Taṃ khāditvā anotattadahe
atk-abh01a0:124_6: sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā manosilātale ṭhito surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-abh01a0:124_7: cātumahārājadattiyaṃ selamayaṃ pattaṃ ādāya uttarakuruṃ gacchati. Tato piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:124_8: āharitvā anotattadahatīre nisinno taṃ paribhuñjitvā divāvihārāya candanavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:125_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi tattha gantvā sammāsambuddhassa vattaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:125_1: nisīdati. Athassa satthā nayaṃ deti. ‘Sāriputta, ettako dhammo mayā desito’ti ācikkhati.
atk-abh01a0:125_2: Evaṃ sammāsambuddhe nayaṃ dente paṭisambhidāppattassa aggasāvakassa velante ṭhatvā
atk-abh01a0:125_3: hatthaṃ pasāretvā dassitasamuddasadisaṃ nayadānaṃ hoti. Therassāpi nayasatena nayasahassena
atk-abh01a0:126_0: Satthā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ kāya velāya gacchatīti? Sāvatthivāsīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:126_1: kulaputtānaṃ sampattānaṃ dhammadesanavelā nāma atthi, tāya velāya gacchati. Dhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:126_2: desetvā gacchantaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ vā ke jānanti ke na jānantīti? Mahesakkhā devatā
atk-abh01a0:126_3: jānanti, appesakkhā devatā na jānanti. Kasmā na jānantīti? Sammāsambuddhassa vā nimmitabuddhassa
atk-abh01a0:126_4: vā rasmiādīsu nānattābhāvā. Ubhinnampi hi tesaṃ rasmīsu vā saresu vā vacanesu vā nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:127_0: Sāriputtattheropi satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā attano saddhivihārikānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:127_1: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ desesi. Tesaṃ ayaṃ pubbayogo – te kira kassapadasabalassa
atk-abh01a0:127_2: kāle khuddakavagguliyoniyaṃ nibbattā pabbhāre olambantā dvinnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:127_3: abhidhammaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ sare nimittaṃ gahetvā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhe ajānitvāpi
atk-abh01a0:127_4: sare nimittaggāhamattakeneva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:127_5: devaloke vasitvā tasmiṃ kāle manussaloke nibbattā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā therassa
atk-abh01a0:127_6: santike pabbajiṃsu. Thero satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a0:128_0: Abhidhamme vācanāmaggo nāma sāriputtattherappabhavo. Mahāpakaraṇe gaṇanacāropi thereneva
atk-abh01a0:128_1: ṭhapito. Thero hi iminā nīhārena dhammantaraṃ amakkhetvāva sukhaṃ gahetuṃ dhāretuṃ
atk-abh01a0:128_2: pariyāpuṇituṃ vācetuñca pahotīti gaṇanacāraṃ ṭhapesi. Evaṃ sante therova paṭhamataraṃ
atk-abh01a0:128_3: ābhidhammiko hotīti? Na hoti. Sammāsambuddhova paṭhamataraṃ ābhidhammiko. So hi naṃ
atk-abh01a0:128_4: mahābodhipallaṅke nisīditvā paṭivijjhi. Buddho hutvā ca pana sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena
atk-abh01a0:145: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-abh01a0:148: Yamakasālānamantare nipannena parinibbānasamaye “handa dāni, bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo, vayadhammā saṅkhārā, appamādena sampādethā”ti vuttavacanaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:149: Ubhinnamantare pañcacattālīsa vassāni pupphadāmaṃ ganthentena viya, ratanāvaliṃ āvunantena viya, ca kathito amatappakāsano saddhammo majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:150_0: Taṃ sabbampi saṅgayhamānaṃ piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni honti, nikāyato pañca nikāyā, aṅgato
atk-abh01a0:150_1: navaṅgāni, dhammakkhandhato caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni. Kathaṃ? Sabbampi hetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:150_2: piṭakato vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tippabhedameva hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:150_3: ubhayāni pātimokkhāni dve vibhaṅgā dvāvīsati khandhakā soḷasa parivārāti idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:150_8: pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikāyoti idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ nāma. Dhammasaṅgaṇīādīni
atk-abh01a0:153_1: nayā visesabhūtā ca daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanā anupaññattinayā. Kāyikavācasikaajjhācāranisedhanato
atk-abh01a0:153_2: cesa kāyaṃ vācañca vineti. Tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānañca vinayanato
atk-abh01a0:153_3: ayaṃ vinayo vinayoti akkhāto. Tenetametassa vacanatthakosallatthaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:159_0: Tañhi attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūceti. Suvuttā cettha atthā veneyyajjhāsayānulomena
atk-abh01a0:159_1: vuttattā. Savati cetaṃ atthe, sassamiva phalaṃ, pasavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sūdati cetaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:159_2: dhenu viya khīraṃ, paggharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati rakkhatīti vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:159_3: hoti. Suttasabhāgañcetaṃ. Yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti evametampi viññūnaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:159_4: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsiyanti evametena
atk-abh01a0:163: Yaṃ ettha vuḍḍhimanto, salakkhaṇā pūjitā paricchinnā;
atk-abh01a0:164: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto.
atk-abh01a0:165_0: Ayañhi abhisaddo vuḍḍhilakkhaṇapūjitaparicchinnādhikesu dissati. Tathā hesa “bāḷhā
atk-abh01a0:165_1: me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamantī”tiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato. “Yā tā rattiyo
atk-abh01a0:165_3: vinetuṃ abhidhamme abhivinaye”tiādīsu paricchinne; aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme
atk-abh01a0:165_4: ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Abhikkantena vaṇṇenā”tiādīsu adhike.
atk-abh01a0:166_0: Ettha ca “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
atk-abh01a0:166_1: viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā. “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:166_2: vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi. “Sekkhā dhammā, asekkhā
atk-abh01a0:166_3: dhammā, lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitāpi; pūjārahāti adhippāyo. “Phasso hoti,
atk-abh01a0:166_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi. “Mahaggatā dhammā,
atk-abh01a0:166_5: appamāṇā dhammā, anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā. Tenetametassa
atk-abh01a0:168: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-abh01a0:172_0: Pariyattipi hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu piṭakanti vuccati. “Atha puriso āgaccheyya
atk-abh01a0:172_1: kudālapiṭakaṃādāyā”tiādīsu yaṃkiñci bhājanampi. Tasmā piṭakaṃ piṭakatthavidū pariyattibhājanatthato āhu.
atk-abh01a0:173_0: Idāni tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyāti. Tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena
atk-abh01a0:173_1: saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato, tassa tassa atthassa
atk-abh01a0:173_2: bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ. Yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:173_3: Abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:174: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesveva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:178: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye.
atk-abh01a0:179_0: Tatrāyaṃ paridīpanā vibhāvanā ca – etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇāvohāraparamatthadesanā,
atk-abh01a0:180_0: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā; suttantapiṭakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:180_1: vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā; abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:180_2: paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:181_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ye te pacurāparādhā sattā te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:181_1: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:181_2: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti
atk-abh01a0:182_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā;
atk-abh01a0:182_1: saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvarāsaṃvaro, kammākammaṃ viya ca phalāphalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:182_2: viya ca; dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti
atk-abh01a0:182_3: diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā; tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti
atk-abh01a0:183_0: Tīsupi cetesu tisso sikkhā tīṇi pahānāni catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:183_1: hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā, suttantapiṭake adhicittasikkhā, abhidhammapiṭake adhipaññāsikkhā.
atk-abh01a0:184_0: Vinayapiṭake ca vītikkamappahānaṃ, kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa; suttantapiṭake
atk-abh01a0:185: Paṭhame ca tadaṅgappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ, itaresu vikkhambhanasamucchedappahānāni. Paṭhame ca duccaritasaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ, itaresu taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:186_1: tattha dhammoti tanti. Atthoti tassāyevattho. Desanāti tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya
atk-abh01a0:186_2: tantiyā desanā. Paṭivedhoti tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Tīsupi cetesu
atk-abh01a0:186_3: ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā. Yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā
atk-abh01a0:186_4: alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca tasmā gambhīrā. Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:187_0: Aparo nayo – dhammoti hetu. Vuttañhetaṃ – “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti. Atthoti
atk-abh01a0:187_1: hetuphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti. Desanāti paññatti,
atk-abh01a0:187_3: kathanaṃ. Paṭivedhoti abhisamayo. So ca lokiyalokuttaro. Visayato ca asammohato ca;
atk-abh01a0:187_4: atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodho.
atk-abh01a0:187_5: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:188_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā
atk-abh01a0:188_1: ñāpetabbo attho sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti tathā tathā tadatthajotikā desanā,
atk-abh01a0:188_2: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo
atk-abh01a0:188_4: sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo, dukkhogāhaṃ alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhañca, tasmā gambhīraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:188_5: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo. Ettāvatā ca –
atk-abh01a0:193: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a0:194: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo. Tisso hi pariyattiyo – alagaddūpamā nissaraṇatthā bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-abh01a0:195_0: Tattha yā duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā ayaṃ alagaddūpamā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:195_2: caramāno, so passeyya mahantaṃ alagaddaṃ, tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya,
atk-abh01a0:195_3: tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge
atk-abh01a0:195_4: ḍaṃseyya, so tato nidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. Taṃ kissa
atk-abh01a0:195_5: hetu? Duggahitattā, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisā
atk-abh01a0:195_6: dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:195_7: paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti, tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ
atk-abh01a0:195_8: na nijjhānaṃ khamanti, te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā
atk-abh01a0:195_9: ca. Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhonti. Tesaṃ te dhammā
atk-abh01a0:195_10: duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Duggahitattā,
atk-abh01a0:196_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā na upārambhādihetu,
atk-abh01a0:196_1: ayaṃ nissaraṇatthā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:196_2: hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Suggahitattā, bhikkhave, dhammāna”nti.
atk-abh01a0:197_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho
atk-abh01a0:197_1: khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ paveṇipālanatthāya vaṃsānurakkhaṇatthāya pariyāpuṇāti, ayaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-abh01a0:198_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:198_1: ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya chaḷabhiññā
atk-abh01a0:198_2: pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:198_3: nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti tāsañca tattheva pabhedavacanato. Evametesu
atk-abh01a0:199_1: paṭikkhittesu upādinnakaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā
atk-abh01a0:199_2: dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato
atk-abh01a0:199_3: nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti. Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sutte duppaṭipanno “cattārome,
atk-abh01a0:199_4: bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”ntiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:199_5: gaṇhāti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati attānañca
atk-abh01a0:199_6: khanati bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti. Tato micchādiṭṭhitaṃ pāpuṇāti. Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno
atk-abh01a0:199_7: dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti, tato cittakkhepaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:199_8: – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, acinteyyāni, na cintetabbāni, yāni cintento ummādassa
atk-abh01a0:199_9: vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitācittakkhepappabhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:201: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a0:202: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti. Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasena sabbampetaṃ saṅgayhamānaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:203_0: Kathaṃ nikāyato pañca nikāyāti? Sabbameva hetaṃ dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo
atk-abh01a0:203_1: aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha katamo dīghanikāyo?
atk-abh01a0:206_0: Kasmā panesa dīghanikāyoti vuccati? Dīghappamāṇānaṃ suttānaṃ samūhato nivāsato ca.
atk-abh01a0:206_1: Samūhanivāsā hi nikāyoti vuccanti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi
atk-abh01a0:206_2: evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā, poṇikanikāyo, cikkhallikanikāyo”ti.
atk-abh01a0:206_3: Evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca. Evaṃ sesānampi nikāyabhāve vacanattho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:207: Katamo majjhimanikāyo? Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:208: Diyaḍḍhasatasuttantā, dve ca suttāni yattha so;
atk-abh01a0:210: Katamo saṃyuttanikāyo? Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ṭhitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta suttasatāni ca dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:213: Katamo aṅguttaranikāyo? Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena ṭhitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:216: Katamo khuddakanikāyo? Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, khuddakapāṭha, dhammapadādayo ca pubbe dassitā pañcadasappabhedā; ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacananti.
atk-abh01a0:220_0: Kathaṃ aṅgavasena navaṅgānīti? Sabbameva hidaṃ ‘suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā
atk-abh01a0:220_1: udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedalla’nti navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:220_3: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbampi sagāthakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:220_4: suttaṃ geyyanti veditabbaṃ. Visesena saṃyuttanikāye sakalopi sagāthāvaggo. Sakalampi
atk-abh01a0:220_5: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:220_6: taṃ veyyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Dhammapadaṃ theragāthā therīgāthā suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā
atk-abh01a0:220_7: suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā. Somanassañāṇamayikagāthāppaṭisaṃyuttā dvāsīti
atk-abh01a0:220_9: itivuttakanti veditabbaṃ. Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti
atk-abh01a0:220_10: veditabbaṃ. “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayapavattā
atk-abh01a0:221_1: sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā vedallanti veditabbaṃ. Evametaṃ aṅgato navaṅgāni.
atk-abh01a0:222: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhato caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti? Sabbameva hidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:224: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:225_0: Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha ekānusandhikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:225_1: suttaṃ eko dhammakkhandho. Yaṃ anekānusandhikaṃ tattha anusandhivasena dhammakkhandhagaṇanā.
atk-abh01a0:225_2: Gāthābandhesu pañhāpucchanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho, vissajjanaṃ eko. Abhidhamme ekamekaṃ
atk-abh01a0:225_3: tikadukabhājanaṃ ekamekañca cittavārabhājanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho. Vinaye atthi vatthu,
atk-abh01a0:225_4: atthi mātikā, atthi padabhājanīyaṃ, atthi āpatti, atthi anāpatti, atthi antarāpatti,
atk-abh01a0:225_5: atthi tikacchedo. Tattha ekameko koṭṭhāso ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:226_0: Evametaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ pañcasatikasaṅgītikāle saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena
atk-abh01a0:226_1: vasīgaṇena ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:226_2: idaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:226_3: ayaṃ dīghanikāyo…pe… ayaṃ khuddakanikāyo, imāni suttādīni navaṅgāni, imāni caturāsīti
atk-abh01a0:226_4: dhammakkhandhasahassānīti imaṃ pabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva saṅgītaṃ. Na kevalañca imameva
atk-abh01a0:226_6: paṇṇāsasaṅgahādianekavidhaṃ, tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva
atk-abh01a0:227_0: Saṅgītipariyosāne cassa idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ
atk-abh01a0:227_1: pavattanasamatthaṃ katanti sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī
atk-abh01a0:227_2: udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi. Anekāni
atk-abh01a0:228: Evaṃ saṅgīte panettha ayaṃ abhidhammo piṭakato abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, nikāyato khuddakanikāyo, aṅgato veyyākaraṇaṃ, dhammakkhandhato katipayāni dhammakkhandhasahassāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:229_0: Taṃ dhārayantesu bhikkhūsu pubbe eko bhikkhu sabbasāmayikaparisāya nisīditvā abhidhammato
atk-abh01a0:229_1: suttaṃ āharitvā dhammaṃ kathento “rūpakkhandho abyākato, cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā
atk-abh01a0:229_2: siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā; dasāyatanā abyākatā, dve āyatanā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā
atk-abh01a0:229_3: siyā abyākatā; soḷasa dhātuyo abyākatā, dve dhātuyo siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā
atk-abh01a0:229_4: abyākatā; samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ, maggasaccaṃ kusalaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ abyākataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:229_5: dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ; dasindriyā abyākatā, domanassindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:229_6: akusalaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ kusalaṃ, cattāri indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā,
atk-abh01a0:229_7: cha indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā”ti dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:230_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne eko bhikkhu nisinno ‘dhammakathika tvaṃ sineruṃ parikkhipanto viya dīghasuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:230_1: āharasi, kiṃ suttaṃ nāmeta’nti āha. ‘Abhidhammasuttaṃ nāma, āvuso’ti. ‘Abhidhammasuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:230_2: kasmā āharasi? Kiṃ aññaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ āharituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti? ‘Abhidhammo
atk-abh01a0:230_3: kena bhāsito’ti? ‘Na eso buddhabhāsito’ti. ‘Kiṃ pana te, āvuso, vinayapiṭakaṃ uggahita’nti?
atk-abh01a0:230_4: ‘Na uggahitaṃ, āvuso’ti. ‘Avinayadhāritāya maññe tvaṃ ajānanto evaṃ vadesī’ti. ‘Vinayamattameva,
atk-abh01a0:230_5: āvuso, uggahita’nti. ‘Tampi te duggahitaṃ, parisapariyante nisīditvā niddāyantena
atk-abh01a0:230_6: uggahitaṃ bhavissati; tumhādise hi pabbājento vā upasampādento vā sātisāro hoti’.
atk-abh01a0:230_7: ‘Kiṃ kāraṇā’? Vinayamattassapi duggahitattā; vuttañhetaṃ – “tattha anāpatti, na vivaṇṇetukāmo
atk-abh01a0:230_8: iṅgha tāva, āvuso, suttantaṃ vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu, pacchāpi
atk-abh01a0:230_9: vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇissasī”ti bhaṇati. “Suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā abhidhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:230_10: vā pucchati, abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati, vinaye
atk-abh01a0:230_11: okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchatī”ti. ‘Tvaṃ pana ettakampi na
atk-abh01a0:231_0: Mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ pana itopi balavataraṃ. Tatra hi dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero
atk-abh01a0:231_1: aññamaññaṃ pucchitapañhañca vissajjanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-abh01a0:231_2: vissajjanaṃ ārocento “idhāvuso sāriputta, dve bhikkhū abhidhammakathaṃ kathenti,
atk-abh01a0:231_3: te aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti, aññamaññassa pañhaṃ puṭṭhā vissajjenti, no ca saṃsādenti,
atk-abh01a0:231_4: dhammī ca nesaṃ kathāpavattinī hoti, evarūpena kho, āvuso, sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_5: sobheyyā”ti āha. Satthā ābhidhammikā nāma mama sāsane paribāhirāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgasadisaṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_6: gīvaṃ unnāmetvā puṇṇacandasassirīkaṃ mahāmukhaṃ pūretvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento
atk-abh01a0:231_7: “sādhu sādhu sāriputtā”ti mahāmoggallānattherassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “yathā taṃ moggallāno
atk-abh01a0:231_8: ca sammā byākaramāno byākareyya, moggallāno hi sāriputta dhammakathiko”ti āha. Ābhidhammikabhikkhūyeva
atk-abh01a0:231_9: kira dhammakathikā nāma, avasesā dhammakathaṃ kathentāpi na dhammakathikā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:231_10: Te hi dhammakathaṃ kathentā kammantaraṃ vipākantaraṃ rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ dhammantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_11: āloḷetvā kathenti. Ābhidhammikā pana dhammantaraṃ na āloḷenti. Tasmā ābhidhammiko
atk-abh01a0:231_12: bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathetu vā mā vā, pucchitakāle pana pañhaṃ kathessatīti. Ayameva
atk-abh01a0:231_13: ekantadhammakathiko nāma hoti. Idaṃ sandhāya satthā sādhukāraṃ datvā ‘sukathitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:232_0: Abhidhammaṃ paṭibāhento imasmiṃ jinacakke pahāraṃ deti, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭibāhati,
atk-abh01a0:232_1: satthu vesārajjaññāṇaṃ paṭinivatteti, sotukāmaṃ parisaṃ visaṃvādeti, ariyamagge āvaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:232_2: bandhati, aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu ekasmiṃ sandissati ukkhepanīyakammatajjanīyakammāraho
atk-abh01a0:232_3: hoti. Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo ‘gaccha vighāsādo hutvā jīvissasī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:233_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyya – “sace abhidhammo buddhabhāsito, yathā anekesu suttasahassesu
atk-abh01a0:233_1: ‘ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharatī’tiādinā nayena nidānaṃ sajjitaṃ, evamassāpi
atk-abh01a0:233_2: nidānaṃ sajjitaṃ bhaveyyā”ti. So ‘jātakasuttanipātadhammapadādīnaṃ evarūpaṃ nidānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:233_3: natthi, na cetāni na buddhabhāsitānī’ti paṭikkhipitvā uttaripi evaṃ vattabbo – ‘paṇḍita,
atk-abh01a0:233_4: abhidhammo nāmesa sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva visayo, na aññesaṃ visayo. Buddhānañhi okkanti
atk-abh01a0:233_5: pākaṭā, abhijāti pākaṭā, abhisambodhi pākaṭā, dhammacakkappavattanaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:233_6: pākaṭaṃ, tidivakkamo pākaṭo, devaloke desitabhāvo pākaṭo, devorohanaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:233_7: nāma cakkavattirañño hatthiratanaṃ vā assaratanaṃ vā thenetvā yānake yojetvā vicaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:233_8: nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ; cakkaratanaṃ vā pana thenetvā palālasakaṭe olambitvā vicaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:233_9: nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ; yojanappamāṇaṃ obhāsanasamatthaṃ maṇiratanaṃ vā pana kappāsapacchiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:233_10: pakkhipitvā vaḷañjanaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Rājārahabhaṇḍatāya; evameva
atk-abh01a0:233_11: abhidhammo nāma na aññesaṃ visayo, sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva visayo. Tesaṃ vasena desetabbadesanā.
atk-abh01a0:233_12: Buddhānañhi okkanti pākaṭā…pe… devorohanaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Abhidhammassa nidānakiccaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:233_13: natthi paṇḍitā’ti. Na hi sakkā evaṃ vutte paravādinā sahadhammikaṃ udāharaṇaṃ udāharituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:234_0: Maṇḍalārāmavāsī tissabhūtitthero pana mahābodhinidāno esa abhidhammo nāmāti dassetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:234_1: “yena svāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vihārena paṭhamābhisambuddho viharāmi tassa padesena vihāsi”nti
atk-abh01a0:234_2: imaṃ padesavihārasuttantaṃ āharitvā kathesi. Dasavidho hi padeso nāma – khandhapadeso,
atk-abh01a0:234_3: āyatanapadeso, dhātupadeso, saccapadeso, indriyapadeso, paccayākārapadeso, satipaṭṭhānapadeso,
atk-abh01a0:234_4: jhānapadeso, nāmapadeso, dhammapadesoti. Tesu satthā mahābodhimaṇḍe pañcakkhandhe
atk-abh01a0:234_5: nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ vedanākkhandhavaseneva vihāsi. Dvādasāyatanāni
atk-abh01a0:234_6: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo nippadesena paṭivijjhi. Imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammāyatane vedanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:234_7: dhammadhātuyañca vedanāvaseneva vihāsi. Cattāri saccāni nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ
atk-abh01a0:234_8: temāsaṃ dukkhasacce vedanāvaseneva vihāsi. Bāvīsatindriyāni nippadesena paṭivijjhi,
atk-abh01a0:234_9: imaṃ temāsaṃ vedanāpañcakaindriyavasena vihāsi. Dvādasapadikaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ
atk-abh01a0:234_10: nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ phassapaccayā vedanāvaseneva vihāsi. Cattāro
atk-abh01a0:234_11: satipaṭṭhāne nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ vedanāsatipaṭṭhānavaseneva vihāsi.
atk-abh01a0:234_12: Cattāri jhānāni nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ jhānaṅgesu vedanāvaseneva vihāsi.
atk-abh01a0:234_13: Nāmaṃ nippadesena paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ tattha vedanāvaseneva vihāsi. Dhamme nippadesena
atk-abh01a0:234_14: paṭivijjhi, imaṃ temāsaṃ vedanāttikavaseneva vihāsīti. Evaṃ thero padesavihārasuttantavasena
atk-abh01a0:235_0: Gāmavāsī sumanadevatthero pana heṭṭhālohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento ‘ayaṃ paravādī
atk-abh01a0:235_1: bāhā paggayha araññe kandanto viya, asakkhikaṃ aḍḍaṃ karonto viya ca, abhidhamme
atk-abh01a0:235_2: nidānassa atthibhāvampi na jānātī’ti vatvā nidānaṃ kathento evamāha – ekaṃ samayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:235_3: bhagavā devesu viharati tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ. Tatra
atk-abh01a0:235_4: kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi – “kusalā dhammā, akusalā
atk-abh01a0:236_0: Aññesu pana suttesu ekameva nidānaṃ. Abhidhamme dve nidānāni – adhigamanidānañca
atk-abh01a0:236_1: desanānidānañca. Tattha adhigamanidānaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā
atk-abh01a0:236_2: veditabbaṃ. Desanānidānaṃ yāva dhammacakkappavattanā. Evaṃ ubhayanidānasampannassa
atk-abh01a0:236_3: panassa abhidhammassa nidānakosallatthaṃ idaṃ tāva pañhākammaṃ veditabbaṃ – ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:236_4: abhidhammo nāma kena pabhāvito? Kattha paripācito? Kattha adhigato? Kadā adhigato?
atk-abh01a0:236_5: Kena adhigato? Kattha vicito? Kadā vicito? Kena vicito? Kattha desito? Kassatthāya
atk-abh01a0:236_6: desito? Kimatthaṃ desito? Kehi paṭiggahito? Ke sikkhanti? Ke sikkhitasikkhā? Ke dhārenti?
atk-abh01a0:237_0: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ – kena pabhāvitoti bodhiabhinīhārasaddhāya pabhāvito. Kattha
atk-abh01a0:237_1: paripācitoti aḍḍhachakkesu jātakasatesu. Kattha adhigatoti bodhimūle. Kadā adhigatoti
atk-abh01a0:237_2: visākhāpuṇṇamāsiyaṃ. Kenādhigatoti sabbaññubuddhena. Kattha vicitoti bodhimaṇḍe.
atk-abh01a0:237_3: Kadā vicitoti ratanagharasattāhe. Kena vicitoti sabbaññubuddhena. Kattha desitoti
atk-abh01a0:237_4: devesu tāvatiṃsesu. Kassatthāya desitoti devatānaṃ. Kimatthaṃ desitoti caturoghaniddharaṇatthaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:237_5: Kehi paṭiggahitoti devehi. Ke sikkhantīti sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇā ca. Ke sikkhitasikkhāti
atk-abh01a0:237_6: arahanto khīṇāsavā. Ke dhārentīti yesaṃ vattati te dhārenti. Kassa vacananti bhagavato
atk-abh01a0:238_0: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddaji sobhito piyajālī piyapālo piyadassī kosiyaputto siggavo
atk-abh01a0:238_1: sandeho moggaliputto sudatto dhammiyo dāsako soṇako revatoti evamādīhi yāva tatiyasaṅgītikālā
atk-abh01a0:238_2: ābhato. Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva jambudīpatale ācariyaparamparāya
atk-abh01a0:239: Tato mahindo iṭṭiyo, uttiyo sambalo tathā;
atk-abh01a0:240: Paṇḍito bhaddanāmo ca, ete nāgā mahāpaññā.
atk-abh01a0:242: Imehi mahānāgehi ābhato. Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissasaṅkhātāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanakālā ābhato.
atk-abh01a0:244_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa yaṃ taṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā
atk-abh01a0:244_1: adhigamanidānaṃ, yāva dhammacakkappavattanā desanānidānañca vuttaṃ, tassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:245_0: Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma
atk-abh01a0:245_1: nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto, mātito ca pitito
atk-abh01a0:245_2: ca, saṃsuddhagahaṇiko, yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-abh01a0:245_3: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato. So aññaṃ kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:245_4: akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi. Tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Athassa
atk-abh01a0:245_5: rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādipūrite gabbhe vivaritvā
atk-abh01a0:245_6: ‘ettakaṃ te kumāra mātu santakaṃ, ettakaṃ pitu santakaṃ, ettakā ayyakapayyakānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:245_7: santakāti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā etaṃ paṭipajjāhī’ti āha. Sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-abh01a0:245_8: cintesi – ‘imaṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi
atk-abh01a0:245_9: gahetvā na gatā, mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti so rañño ārocetvā
atk-abh01a0:245_10: nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Imasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:245_11: pana ṭhāne sumedhakathā kathetabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ buddhavaṃse –
atk-abh01a0:246: Kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye;
atk-abh01a0:257: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.
atk-abh01a0:259: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:264: Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-abh01a0:266: Yathāpi dukkhe vijjante, sukhaṃ nāmapi vijjati;
atk-abh01a0:268: Yathāpi uṇhe vijjante, aparaṃ vijjati sītalaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:272: Yathā gūthagato puriso, taḷākaṃ disvāna pūritaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:273: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-abh01a0:275: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-abh01a0:277: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-abh01a0:279: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-abh01a0:281: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-abh01a0:283: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake.
atk-abh01a0:284: Yathāpi kuṇapaṃ puriso, kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ jigucchiya;
atk-abh01a0:291: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:314_0: Tattha assamo sukato mayhaṃ, paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti imissā pāḷiyā sumedhapaṇḍitena
atk-abh01a0:314_1: assamapaṇṇasālācaṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā. Ayaṃ panettha attho – mahāsattañhi
atk-abh01a0:314_2: “himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ajja dhammikapabbataṃ pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantaṃ disvā sakko
atk-abh01a0:314_3: devānamindo vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantesi – “gaccha, tāta, ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito ‘pabbajissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:314_4: nikkhanto etassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpehī”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:314_5: assamaṃ suguttaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ, manoramaṃ caṅkamañca māpesi. Bhagavā pana tadā attano
atk-abh01a0:314_6: puññānubhāvena nipphannaṃ taṃ assamapadaṃ sandhāya “sāriputta tasmiṃ dhammikapabbate –
atk-abh01a0:317: Āha. Tattha assamo sukato mayhanti sukato mayā. Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇacchannā sālāpi me sumāpitā ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:318_0: Pañcadosavivajjitanti pañcime caṅkamadosā nāma thaddhavisamatā, antorukkhatā, gahanacchannatā,
atk-abh01a0:318_2: pādā rujjanti, phoṭā uṭṭhahanti, cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjati.
atk-abh01a0:318_3: Mudusamatale pana phāsuvihāraṃ āgamma kammaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati. Tasmā thaddhavisamabhūmibhāgatā
atk-abh01a0:318_4: eko dosoti veditabbo. Caṅkamanassa anto vā majjhe vā koṭiyaṃ vā rukkhe sati pamādamāgamma
atk-abh01a0:318_5: caṅkamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā paṭihaññatīti antorukkhatā dutiyo doso. Tiṇalatādigahanacchanne
atk-abh01a0:318_6: caṅkame caṅkamanto andhakāravelāyaṃ uragādike pāṇe akkamitvā vā māreti, tehi vā daṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:318_7: dukkhaṃ āpajjatīti gahanacchannatā tatiyo doso. Atisambādhe caṅkame vitthārato ratanike
atk-abh01a0:318_8: vā aḍḍharatanike vā caṅkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvā nakhāpi aṅguliyopi bhijjantīti
atk-abh01a0:318_9: atisambādhatā catuttho doso. Ativisāle caṅkame caṅkamantassa cittaṃ vidhāvati, ekaggataṃ
atk-abh01a0:318_10: na labhatīti ativisālatā pañcamo doso. Puthulato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ dvīsu passesu
atk-abh01a0:318_11: ratanamattaanucaṅkamaṃ dīghato saṭṭhihatthaṃ mudutalaṃ samavippakiṇṇavālukaṃ caṅkamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:318_12: vaṭṭati, cetiyagirimhi dīpappasādakamahāmahindattherassa caṅkamanaṃ viya, tādisaṃ
atk-abh01a0:318_13: taṃ ahosi. Tenāha “caṅkamaṃ tattha māpesiṃ, pañcadosavivajjita”nti.
atk-abh01a0:319_0: Aṭṭhaguṇasamupetanti aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ. Aṭṭhimāni samaṇasukhāni nāma dhanadhaññapariggahābhāvo
atk-abh01a0:319_2: vā sīsakahāpaṇādīni vā gaṇhantesu rājakulesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo, upakaraṇesu
atk-abh01a0:319_4: catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā tasmiṃ assame vasantena
atk-abh01a0:319_5: sakkā honti imāni aṭṭha samaṇasukhāni vindituṃ, evaṃ aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ taṃ assamaṃ māpesi” nti.
atk-abh01a0:320_0: Abhiññābalamāharinti pacchā tasmiṃ assame vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññānañca
atk-abh01a0:320_1: samāpattīnañca uppādanatthāya aniccato dukkhato vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā thāmappattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:320_2: vipassanābalaṃ āhariṃ. Yathā tasmiṃ vasanto taṃ balaṃ āharituṃ sakkomi, evaṃ taṃ
atk-abh01a0:320_3: assamaṃ tassa abhiññatthāya vipassanābalassa anucchavikaṃ katvā māpesinti attho.
atk-abh01a0:321_0: Sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ tattha, navadosamupāgatanti etthāyaṃ anupubbikathā, tadā kira kuṭileṇacaṅkamādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_2: pavivekakkhamaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā alaṅkatacaṅkamassa ubhosu antesu ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_3: saṃvidhāya nisīdanatthāya caṅkamavemajjhe samatalaṃ muggavaṇṇasilaṃ māpetvā antopaṇṇasālāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_5: aggisālāyaṃ aṅgārakapalladāruādīnīti evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ pabbajitānaṃ upakārāya saṃvattati,
atk-abh01a0:321_6: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāya bhittiyaṃ “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre
atk-abh01a0:321_7: gahetvā pabbajantū”ti akkharāni chinditvā devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-abh01a0:321_8: himavantapāde girikandarānusārena attano nivāsanānurūpaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento
atk-abh01a0:321_9: nadīnivattane vissakammanimmitaṃ sakkadattiyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ assamaṃ disvā caṅkamakoṭiṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_10: gantvā padavalañjaṃ apassanto “dhuvaṃ pabbajitā dhuragāme bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā kilantarūpā
atk-abh01a0:321_11: āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnā bhavissantī”ti cintetvā thokaṃ āgametvā “ativiya
atk-abh01a0:321_12: cirāyanti, jānissāmī”ti paṇṇasālakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā ito cito ca
atk-abh01a0:321_13: olokento mahābhittiyaṃ akkharāni vācetvā “mayhaṃ kappiyaparikkhārā ete, ime gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:321_14: pabbajissāmī”ti attanā nivatthapārutaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ pajahi. Tenāha “sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_15: tatthā”ti. Evaṃ paviṭṭho ahaṃ sāriputta tassaṃ paṇṇasālāyaṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:322_0: Navadosamupāgatanti sāṭakaṃ pajahanto nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti. Tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-abh01a0:322_1: pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā upaṭṭhahanti. Tesu tassa mahagghabhāvo eko doso,
atk-abh01a0:322_2: parapaṭibaddhatāya uppajjanabhāvo eko, paribhogena lahuṃ kilissanabhāvo eko, kiliṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:322_3: hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti, paribhogena lahukaṃ jīraṇabhāvo eko jiṇṇassa
atk-abh01a0:322_4: hi tunnaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti. Punapariyesanāya durabhisambhavabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:322_5: eko, tāpasapabbajjāya asāruppabhāvo eko, paccatthikānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvo eko, yathā
atk-abh01a0:322_6: hi naṃ paccatthikā na gaṇhanti, evaṃ gopetabbo hoti. Paribhuñjantassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:323_0: Vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti tadā ahaṃ sāriputta ime nava dose disvā sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ
atk-abh01a0:323_1: nivāsesiṃ muñjatiṇaṃ hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-abh01a0:324_0: Dvādasaguṇamupāgatanti dvādasahi ānisaṃsehi samannāgataṃ, vākacīrasmiñhi dvādasānisaṃsā
atk-abh01a0:324_1: – appagghaṃ sundaraṃ kappiyanti ayaṃ tāva eko ānisaṃso, sahatthā kātuṃ sakkāti ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:324_2: dutiyo, paribhogena saṇikaṃ kilissati dhoviyamānepi papañco natthīti ayaṃ tatiyo,
atk-abh01a0:324_3: paribhogena jiṇṇepi sibbitabbābhāvo catuttho, puna pariyesantassa sukhena karaṇabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:324_4: pañcamo, tāpasapabbajjāya sāruppabhāvo chaṭṭho, paccatthikānaṃ nirupabhogabhāvo sattamo,
atk-abh01a0:324_5: paribhuñjantassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānābhāvo aṭṭhamo, dhāraṇe sallahukabhāvo navamo, cīvarapaccaye
atk-abh01a0:324_6: appicchabhāvo dasamo, vākuppattiyā dhammikaanavajjabhāvo ekādasamo vākacīre naṭṭhepi
atk-abh01a0:325_0: Aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ, pajahiṃ paṇṇasālakanti kathaṃ pajahiṃ? So kira varasāṭakayugaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_1: omuñcanto cīvaravaṃse laggitaṃ anojapupphadāmasadisaṃ rattavākacīraṃ gahetvā nivāsetvā
atk-abh01a0:325_2: tassupari aparaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vākacīraṃ paridahitvā punnāgapupphasantharasadisaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_3: sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭimuñcitvā cūḷāya saddhiṃ niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_4: sārasūciṃ pavesetvā muttājālasadisāya sikkāya pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍikaṃ odahitvā tīsu
atk-abh01a0:325_5: ṭhānesu vaṅkakājaṃ ādāya ekissā kājakoṭiyā kuṇḍikaṃ, ekissā aṅkusakapacchitidaṇḍakādīni
atk-abh01a0:325_6: olaggetvā khārikājaṃ aṃse katvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā paṇṇasālato
atk-abh01a0:325_7: nikkhamitvā saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto attano vesaṃ oloketvā
atk-abh01a0:325_8: “mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ patto, sobhati vata me pabbajjā, buddhapaccekabuddhādīhi
atk-abh01a0:325_9: sabbehipi dhīrapurisehi vaṇṇitā thomitā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma, pahīnaṃ me gihibandhanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:325_10: nikkhantosmi nekkhammaṃ, laddhā me uttamapabbajjā, karissāmi samaṇadhammaṃ, labhissāmi
atk-abh01a0:325_11: aggaphalasukha”nti ussāhajāto khārikājaṃ otāretvā caṅkamavemajjhe muggavaṇṇasilāpaṭṭe
atk-abh01a0:325_12: suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya nisinno divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā
atk-abh01a0:325_13: bidalamañcakapasse kaṭṭhattharikāya nipanno sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā balavapaccūse
atk-abh01a0:325_14: pabujjhitvā attano āgamanaṃ āvajjesi “ahaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā amitabhogaṃ anantayasaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_15: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā nekkhamagavesako hutvā pabbajito, ito dāni paṭṭhāya pamādacāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_16: carituṃ na vaṭṭati, pavivekañhi pahāya vicarantaṃ micchāvitakkamakkhikā khādanti,
atk-abh01a0:325_17: idāni mayā pavivekamanubrūhetuṃ vaṭṭati, ahañhi gharāvāsaṃ palibodhato disvā nikkhanto,
atk-abh01a0:325_18: ayañca manāpā paṇṇasālā, beluvapakkavaṇṇā paribhaṇḍakatā bhūmi, rajatavaṇṇā setabhittiyo,
atk-abh01a0:325_20: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, na etto atirekatarā viya me gehasampadā paññāyatī”ti paṇṇasālāya dose
atk-abh01a0:326_0: Paṇṇasālāparibhogasmiñhi aṭṭha ādīnavā – mahāsamārambhena? Dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a0:326_1: karaṇapariyesanabhāvo eko ādīnavo. Tiṇapaṇṇamattikāsu patitāsu tāsaṃ punappunaṃ ṭhapetabbatāya
atk-abh01a0:326_2: nibaddhajagganabhāvo dutiyo, senāsanaṃ nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇāti, avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa
atk-abh01a0:326_3: cittekaggatā na hotīti uṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo tatiyo, sītuṇhapaṭighātena kāyassa sukhumālakaraṇabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:326_4: catuttho, gehaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahapaṭicchādanabhāvo pañcamo,
atk-abh01a0:326_5: “mayha”nti pariggahakaraṇabhāvo chaṭṭho, gehassa atthibhāvo nāmesa dutiyakavāso viyāti
atk-abh01a0:326_6: sattamo ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvo aṭṭhamoti ime
atk-abh01a0:326_7: aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahi. Tenāha “aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ, pajahiṃ paṇṇasālaka”nti.
atk-abh01a0:327: Upāgamiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:328_0: Tatrime dasa guṇā – appasamārambhatā eko guṇo upagamanamattameva hi tattha hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:328_1: Appaṭijagganatā dutiyo tañhi sammaṭṭhampi asammaṭṭhampi paribhogaphāsukaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-abh01a0:328_2: Anuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo tatiyo, garahaṃ nappaṭicchādeti, tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti
atk-abh01a0:328_3: garahāya appaṭicchādanabhāvo catuttho, abbhokāsāvāso viya kāyaṃ na santhambhetīti
atk-abh01a0:328_4: kāyassa asanthambhanabhāvo pañcamo. Pariggahakaraṇābhāvo chaṭṭho, gehālayapaṭikkhepo
atk-abh01a0:328_5: sattamo, bahusādhāraṇagehe viya “paṭijaggissāmi naṃ, nikkhamathā”ti nīharaṇābhāvo
atk-abh01a0:328_6: aṭṭhamo, vasantassa sappītikabhāvo navamo, rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya
atk-abh01a0:328_7: anapekkhabhāvo dasamoti, ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:329_0: Imāni ettakāni kāraṇāni sallakkhetvā mahāsatto punadivase bhikkhāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh01a0:329_1: Athassa sampattagāme manussā mahantena ussāhena bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. So bhattakiccaṃ
atk-abh01a0:329_2: niṭṭhāpetvā assamaṃ āgamma nisīditvā cintesi “nāhaṃ ‘āhāraṃ na labhāmī’ti pabbajito
atk-abh01a0:329_3: siniddhāhāro nāmesa mānamadapurisamade vaḍḍheti. Āhāramūlakassa dukkhassa anto natthi
atk-abh01a0:329_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ vāpitaṃ ropitaṃ dhaññanibbattakaṃ āhāraṃ pajahitvā pavattaphalabhojano
atk-abh01a0:329_5: bhaveyya”nti. So tato paṭṭhāya tathā katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-abh01a0:329_6: aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:346: Te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu “buddho loke anuttaro;
atk-abh01a0:352: “Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā”.
atk-abh01a0:353: Yadi buddhassa sodhetha, ekokāsaṃ dadātha me;
atk-abh01a0:355: Adaṃsu te mamokāsaṃ, sodhetuṃ añjasaṃ tadā;
atk-abh01a0:362: Devā manusse passanti, manussāpi ca devatā;
atk-abh01a0:364: Devā dibbehi turiyehi, manussā mānusehi ca;
atk-abh01a0:374: Akkamitvāna maṃ buddho, saha sissehi gacchatu;
atk-abh01a0:375: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:376: Pathaviyaṃ nipannassa, evaṃ me āsi cetaso;
atk-abh01a0:389: Aparimeyye ito kappe, buddho loke bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:399: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-abh01a0:401: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-abh01a0:414: Yathā manussā nadiṃ tarantā, paṭititthaṃ virajjhiya;
atk-abh01a0:416: Evameva mayaṃ sabbe, yadi muñcāmimaṃ jinaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:420: Ye tatthāsuṃ jinaputtā, sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu maṃ;
atk-abh01a0:421: Narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:425: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.
atk-abh01a0:435: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:437: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:438: Mahāvātā na vāyanti, na sandanti savantiyo;
atk-abh01a0:439: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:440: Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:441: Tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:442: Latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:443: Tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:444: Ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā, ratanā jotanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:445: Tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:446: Mānussakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:449: Tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:453: Tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:454: Vimalo hoti sūriyo, sabbā dissanti tārakā;
atk-abh01a0:455: Tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:461: Tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:462: Na hoti arati sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:463: Tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:466: Rogo tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati;
atk-abh01a0:467: Tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:468: Bhayaṃ tadā na bhavati, ajjapetaṃ padissati;
atk-abh01a0:469: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:471: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:473: Sopajja vāyati gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:475: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:476: Yāvatā nirayā nāma, sabbe dissanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:477: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:478: Kuṭṭā kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā;
atk-abh01a0:480: Cutī ca upapatti ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati;
atk-abh01a0:482: Daḷhaṃ paggaṇha vīriyaṃ, mā nivatta abhikkama;
atk-abh01a0:487: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:488: Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:498: Handa buddhakare dhamme, vicināmi ito cito;
atk-abh01a0:499: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-abh01a0:502: Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:504: Yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adhokato;
atk-abh01a0:505: Vamate vudakaṃ nissesaṃ, na tattha parirakkhati.
atk-abh01a0:507: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adhokato.
atk-abh01a0:512: Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:515: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:517: Parirakkha sadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:522: Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:525: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttimeva gavesati.
atk-abh01a0:526: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbabhave, passa andugharaṃ viya;
atk-abh01a0:532: Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:535: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:536: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbakālaṃ, paripucchaṃ budhaṃ janaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:542: Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:546: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbabhave, paggaṇha vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:552: Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:554: Yathāpi pathavī nāma, sucimpi asucimpi ca;
atk-abh01a0:555: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-abh01a0:562: Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:565: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati, vīthito.
atk-abh01a0:566: Tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkamasi vīthito;
atk-abh01a0:572: Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:573: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-abh01a0:576: Tatheva tvampi adhiṭṭhāne, sabbadā acalo bhava;
atk-abh01a0:582: Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:583: Mettāya asamo hohi, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-abh01a0:584: Yathāpi udakaṃ nāma, kalyāṇe pāpake jane;
atk-abh01a0:586: Tatheva tvampi hitāhite, samaṃ mettāya bhāvaya;
atk-abh01a0:592: Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:594: Yathāpi pathavī nāma, nikkhittaṃ asuciṃ suciṃ;
atk-abh01a0:596: Tatheva tvampi sukhadukkhe, tulābhūto sadā bhava;
atk-abh01a0:598: Ettakāyeva te loke, ye dhammā bodhipācanā;
atk-abh01a0:599: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-abh01a0:603: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medinī.
atk-abh01a0:605: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā sesi bhūmiyā.
atk-abh01a0:611: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma.
atk-abh01a0:613: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-abh01a0:614: Yamahaṃ ajja byākāsiṃ, buddho loke bhavissati;
atk-abh01a0:618: Buddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā, mano nibbāyi tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:622: Dibbaṃ mānusakaṃ pupphaṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-abh01a0:624: Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-abh01a0:625: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:627: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:628: Yathāpi samaye patte, pupphanti pupphino dumā;
atk-abh01a0:630: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasapāramī;
atk-abh01a0:632: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, bodhimaṇḍamhi bujjhare;
atk-abh01a0:634: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, dhammacakkaṃ pavattayuṃ;
atk-abh01a0:639: Tatheva lokā muñcitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:640: Yathā yā kāci nadiyo, osaranti mahodadhiṃ;
atk-abh01a0:642: Tehi thutappasattho so, dasa dhamme samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:643: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā.
atk-abh01a0:648: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:650: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-abh01a0:673: Vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ, iddhaṃ phītaṃ ahu tadā;
atk-abh01a0:677: Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:681: Nagaraṃ rammavatī nāma, sudevo nāma khattiyo;
atk-abh01a0:683: Sumaṅgalo ca tisso ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā;
atk-abh01a0:685: Nandā ceva sunandā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā;
atk-abh01a0:691: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:694: Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-abh01a0:696_0: Dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma satthā
atk-abh01a0:696_1: udapādi. Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:697_0: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa
atk-abh01a0:697_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. Satthā bodhisattaṃ “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā
atk-abh01a0:697_2: dhammaṃ desesi. So satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rajjaṃ niyyātetvā pabbaji. So tīṇi piṭakāni
atk-abh01a0:697_3: uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo, pañca ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke
atk-abh01a0:697_4: nibbatti. Koṇḍaññabuddhassa pana rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ, sunando nāma khattiyo pitā,
atk-abh01a0:697_5: sujātā nāma mātā, bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā, anuruddho nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-abh01a0:697_6: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā, sālakalyāṇī bodhi, aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:698_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu
atk-abh01a0:698_1: maṅgalo sumano revato sobhitoti. Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato tīsu sāvakasannipātesu
atk-abh01a0:698_2: paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ. Dutiye koṭisahassaṃ. Tatiye navutikoṭiyo.
atk-abh01a0:698_3: Vemātikabhātā panassa ānandakumāro nāma navutikoṭisaṅkhyāya parisāya saddhiṃ dhammasavanatthāya
atk-abh01a0:698_4: satthu santikaṃ agamāsi, satthā tassa anupubbikathaṃ kathesi. So saddhiṃ parisāya
atk-abh01a0:698_5: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ pubbacariyakaṃ olokento
atk-abh01a0:698_6: iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha bhikkhavo”ti
atk-abh01a0:698_7: āha. Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya ākappasampannā
atk-abh01a0:698_8: hutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā parivārayiṃsu ayamassa tatiyo sāvakasannipāto ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:699_0: Yathā pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ samantā asītihatthappamāṇāyeva sarīrappabhā hoti, na,
atk-abh01a0:699_1: evaṃ tassa. Tassa pana bhagavato sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā
atk-abh01a0:699_2: aṭṭhāsi. Rukkhapathavīpabbatasamuddādayo antamaso ukkhaliyādīni upādāya suvaṇṇapaṭa
atk-abh01a0:699_3: pariyonaddhā viya ahesuṃ. Āyuppamāṇaṃ panassa navutivassasahassāni ahosi. Ettakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:699_4: kālaṃ candimasūriyādayo attano pabhāya virocituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, rattindivaparicchedo
atk-abh01a0:699_5: na paññāyittha. Divā sūriyālokena viya sattā niccaṃ buddhālokeneva vicariṃsu. Sāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:699_6: pupphitānaṃ kusumānaṃ, pāto ravanakasakuṇānañca vasena loko rattindivaparicchedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:699_7: sallakkhesi. Kiṃ pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ayamānubhāvo natthīti? No natthi, tepi hi
atk-abh01a0:699_8: ākaṅkhamānā dasasahassiṃ vā lokadhātuṃ, tato vā bhiyyo ābhāya phareyyuṃ. Maṅgalassa
atk-abh01a0:699_9: pana bhagavato pubbapatthanāvasena aññesaṃ byāmappabhā viya sarīrappabhā niccameva
atk-abh01a0:700_0: So kira bodhisattacariyakāle vessantarasadise attabhāve ṭhito saputtadāro vaṅkapabbatasadise
atk-abh01a0:700_1: pabbate vasi. Atheko kharadāṭhiko nāma yakkho mahāpurisassa dānajjhāsayataṃ sutvā
atk-abh01a0:700_2: brāhmaṇavaṇṇena upasaṅkamitvā mahāsattaṃ dve dārake yāci. Mahāsatto “dadāmi brāhmaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:700_3: puttake”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udakapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ kampento dvepi dārake adāsi. Yakkho
atk-abh01a0:700_4: caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhatvā passantasseva mahāsattassa muḷālakalāpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:700_5: viya dve dārake khādi. Mahāpurisassa yakkhaṃ oloketvā vivaṭamatte aggijālaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:700_6: lohitadhāraṃ uggiramānaṃ tassa mukhaṃ disvāpi kesaggamattampi domanassaṃ nuppajji,
atk-abh01a0:700_7: “sudinnaṃ vata me dāna”nti cintayato panassa sarīre mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:700_8: So “imassa me nissandena anāgate imināva nīhārena sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamantū”ti
atk-abh01a0:700_9: patthanaṃ akāsi. Tassa taṃ patthanaṃ nissāya buddhabhūtassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamitvā
atk-abh01a0:701_0: Aparampissa pubbacaritaṃ atthi. So kira bodhisattakāle ekassa buddhassa cetiyaṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:701_1: “imassa buddhassa mayā jīvitaṃ pariccajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti daṇḍakadīpikāveṭhananiyāmena
atk-abh01a0:701_2: sakalasarīraṃ veṭhāpetvā ratanamattamakulaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sappissa
atk-abh01a0:701_3: pūrāpetvā tattha sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā taṃ sīsenādāya sakalasarīraṃ jālāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:701_4: cetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto sakalarattiṃ vītināmesi. Evaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vāyamantassāpissa
atk-abh01a0:701_5: lomakūpamattampi usumaṃ na gaṇhi, padumagabbhaṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya ahosi. Dhammo hi
atk-abh01a0:701_6: nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh01a0:706: Imassāpi kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sarīrobhāso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:707_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā “satthāraṃ nimantessāmī”ti upasaṅkamitvā
atk-abh01a0:707_1: madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha bhante”ti āha. Brāhmaṇa kittakehi
atk-abh01a0:707_2: te bhikkhūhi atthoti, kittakā pana vo bhante parivārā bhikkhūti. Tadā satthu paṭhamasannipātoyeva
atk-abh01a0:707_3: hoti. Tasmā “koṭisatasahassa”nti āha. “Bhante, sabbehipi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:707_4: gaṇhathā”ti āha. Satthā adhivāsesi. Brāhmaṇo svātanāya nimantetvā gehaṃ gacchanto
atk-abh01a0:707_5: cintesi “ahaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattavatthādīni dātuṃ no na sakkomi, nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:707_6: pana kathaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Tassa sā cintā caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhitassa
atk-abh01a0:707_7: devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhabhāvaṃ janesi. Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ imasmā
atk-abh01a0:707_8: ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti dibbacakkhunā olokento mahāpurisaṃ disvā “ayaṃ suruci brāhmaṇo
atk-abh01a0:707_9: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nisīdanaṭṭhānatthāya cintesi, mayāpi tattha
atk-abh01a0:707_10: gantvā puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakivaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā vāsipharasuhattho
atk-abh01a0:707_11: mahāpurisassa purato pāturahosi. “Atthi nu kho kassaci bhatiyā kattabbakicca”nti
atk-abh01a0:707_12: āha. Mahāpuriso taṃ disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti āha. Mama ajānanasippaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:707_13: gehaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā yo yaṃ kāreti, tassa taṃ kātuṃ jānāmīti. Tena hi mayhaṃ kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:707_14: atthīti. Kiṃ, ayyāti? Svātanāya me koṭisatasahassabhikkhū nimantitā, tesaṃ nisīdanamaṇḍapaṃ
atk-abh01a0:707_15: karissasīti. Ahaṃ nāma kareyyaṃ, sace me bhatiṃ dātuṃ sakkhissathāti. Sakkhissāmi,
atk-abh01a0:707_16: tātāti. “Sādhu karissāmī”ti gantvā ekaṃ padesaṃ olokesi.
atk-abh01a0:708_0: Dvādasaterasayojanappamāṇo padeso kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samatalo ahosi. So “ettake
atk-abh01a0:708_1: ṭhāne sattaratanamayo maṇḍapo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi. Tāvadeva pathaviṃ bhinditvā
atk-abh01a0:708_2: maṇḍapo uṭṭhahi. Tassa suvaṇṇamayesu thambhesu rajatamayā ghaṭakā ahesuṃ, rajatamayesu
atk-abh01a0:708_3: thambhesu suvaṇṇamayā, maṇitthambhesu pavāḷamayā, pavāḷatthambhesu maṇimayā, sattaratanamayesu
atk-abh01a0:708_4: thambhesu sattaratanamayāva ghaṭakā ahesuṃ. Tato “maṇḍapassa antarantena kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ
atk-abh01a0:708_5: olambatū”ti olokesi. Saha olokaneneva kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambi, yassa mandavāteritassa
atk-abh01a0:708_6: pañcaṅgikasseva tūriyassa madhurasaddo niggacchati. Dibbasaṅgītivattanakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:708_7: ahosi. “Antarantarā gandhadāmamālādāmāni olambantū”ti cintesi. Tāvadeva dāmāni olambiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:708_8: “Koṭisatasahassasaṅkhyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni ca ādhārakāni ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā
