atk-abh01a0:942_5: yañca abhidhammapariyāyena kusalaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tīhipi atthehi imasmiṃ citte labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:943_3: hi tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ nāma. Kiccaṃ vā sampatti
atk-abh01a0:943_4: vā raso nāma. Upaṭṭhānākāro vā phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:943_5: nāma. Iti yattha yattha lakkhaṇādīni vakkhāma tattha tattha imināva nayena tesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:944_0: Cittanti ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ; vijānātīti attho. Yasmā vā ‘citta’nti sabbacittasādhāraṇo
atk-abh01a0:944_1: esa saddo, tasmā yadettha lokiyakusalākusalakiriyacittaṃ, taṃ javanavīthivasena attano
atk-abh01a0:944_2: santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ. Vipākaṃ kammakilesehi citanti cittaṃ. Apica sabbampi yathānurūpato
atk-abh01a0:944_3: cittatāya cittaṃ. Cittakaraṇatāya cittanti evampettha attho veditabbo. Tattha yasmā
atk-abh01a0:944_4: aññadeva sarāgaṃ cittaṃ, aññaṃ sadosaṃ, aññaṃ samohaṃ; aññaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, aññaṃ rūpāvacarādibhedaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:944_5: aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ saddādiārammaṇaṃ; rūpārammaṇesu cāpi aññaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:944_6: aññaṃ pītādiārammaṇaṃ; saddādiārammaṇesupi eseva nayo; sabbesupi cetesu aññaṃ hīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:944_7: aññaṃ majjhimaṃ aññaṃ paṇītaṃ; hīnādīsupi aññaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:944_8: aññaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyaṃ, tasmā assa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:944_9: vasena cittatā veditabbā. Kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti, cittānaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:944_10: antogadhattā etesu yaṃkiñci ekampi cittatāya cittanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ tāva cittatāya cittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:945_0: Kathaṃ cittakaraṇatāyāti? Lokasmiñhi cittakammato uttari aññaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:945_1: Tasmimpi caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ aticittameva hoti. Taṃ karontānaṃ cittakārānaṃ ‘evaṃvidhāni
atk-abh01a0:945_2: ettha rūpāni kātabbānī’ti cittasaññā uppajjati. Tāya cittasaññāya lekhāgahanarañjanaujjotanavattanādinipphādikā
atk-abh01a0:945_3: cittakiriyā uppajjanti, tato caraṇasaṅkhāte citte aññataraṃ vicittarūpaṃ nipphajjati.
atk-abh01a0:945_4: Tato ‘imassa rūpassa upari idaṃ hotu, heṭṭhā idaṃ, ubhayapasse ida’nti cintetvā yathācintitena
atk-abh01a0:945_5: kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti, evaṃ yaṃkiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:945_6: taṃ citteneva kariyati, evaṃ imāya karaṇavicittatāya tassa tassa cittassa nipphādakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:945_7: cittampi tatheva cittaṃ hoti. Yathācintitassa vā anavasesassa anipphajjanato tatopi
atk-abh01a0:946_0: “Diṭṭhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, caraṇaṃ nāma cittanti? ‘Evaṃ, bhante’. Tampi kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:946_1: caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ citteneva cintitaṃ. Tenapi kho, bhikkhave, caraṇena cittena cittaṃyeva cittatara”nti.
atk-abh01a0:947_1: ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ tampi cittakatameva. Kāyakammādibhedañhi dānasīlavihiṃsāsāṭheyyādinayappavattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:947_2: kusalākusalakammaṃ cittanipphāditaṃ kammanānattaṃ. Kammanānatteneva ca tāsu tāsu
atk-abh01a0:947_4: yathāgahitasaṇṭhānavasena ‘ayaṃ itthī ayaṃ puriso’ti uppajjamānāya saññāya saññānānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_5: Saññānānattato saññānurūpena ‘itthī’ti vā ‘puriso’ti vā voharantānaṃ vohāranānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_6: Vohāranānattavasena pana yasmā ‘itthī bhavissāmi puriso bhavissāmi, khattiyo bhavissāmi
atk-abh01a0:947_7: brāhmaṇo bhavissāmī’ti evaṃ tassa tassa attabhāvassa janakaṃ kammaṃ karīyati, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:947_8: vohāranānattato kammanānattaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ kammanānattaṃ yathāpatthitaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattentaṃ
atk-abh01a0:947_9: yasmā gativasena nibbatteti tasmā kammanānattato gatinānattaṃ. Kammanānatteneva ca
atk-abh01a0:947_10: tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tassā tassā gatiyā apādakadvipādakāditā, tassā tassā upapattiyā
atk-abh01a0:947_11: uccanīcāditā, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāditā, lokadhammesu lābhālābhāditā
atk-abh01a0:947_12: ca paññāyati. Tasmā sabbametaṃ devamanussanirayatiracchānabhedāsu gatīsu kammaliṅgasaññāvohārādibhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:947_13: ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ citteneva katanti veditabbaṃ. Svāyamattho imassa saṅgītianāruḷhassa
atk-abh01a0:948_4: bhavati. Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ gatiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati – apadā dvipadā
atk-abh01a0:948_5: catuppadā bahuppadā, rūpino arūpino, saññino asaññino nevasaññīnāsaññino. Kammanānākaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:948_6: paṭicca sattānaṃ upapattiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati – uccanīcatā hīnapaṇītatā sugataduggatatā.
atk-abh01a0:948_7: Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ attabhāve nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati – suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā
atk-abh01a0:948_8: sujātadujjātatā susaṇṭhitadussaṇṭhitatā. Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ lokadhamme
atk-abh01a0:948_9: nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati – lābhālābhe yasāyase nindāpasaṃsāyaṃ sukhadukkhe”ti.
atk-abh01a0:951: Saññāto bhedaṃ gacchanti, itthāyaṃ purisoti vā.
atk-abh01a0:958: “Kammassakā māṇava sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā; kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:959_0: Evaṃ imāya karaṇacittatāyapi cittassa cittatā veditabbā. Sabbānipi hi etāni vicitrāni
atk-abh01a0:959_1: citteneva katāni. Aladdhokāsassa pana cittassa yaṃ vā pana avasesapaccayavikalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:959_2: tassa ekaccacittakaraṇābhāvato yadetaṃ cittena kataṃ ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ vuttaṃ, tatopi
atk-abh01a0:960: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā… tehipi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatehi pāṇehi cittaṃyeva cittatara”nti.
atk-abh01a0:961_2: nāma. Ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddhaṃ, anubhūtāpagatasaṅkhātaṃ kusalākusalaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:961_3: uppādādittayaṃ anuppatvā niruddhaṃ, bhūtāpagatasaṅkhātaṃ, sesasaṅkhatañca bhūtāpagatuppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:961_4: nāma. “Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni kammānī”ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ kammaṃ atītampi
atk-abh01a0:961_5: samānaṃ, aññaṃ vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassokāsaṃ katvā ṭhitattā, tathā katokāsañca
atk-abh01a0:961_6: vipākaṃ anuppannampi samānaṃ evaṃ kate okāse ekantena uppajjanato okāsakatuppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:961_7: nāma. Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamūhataṃ akusalaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma. Ettha ca bhūmiyā
atk-abh01a0:961_8: bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bhūmīti vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakā
atk-abh01a0:961_9: pañcakkhandhā. Bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattārahaṃ kilesajātaṃ. Tena hesā
atk-abh01a0:961_10: bhūmi laddhā nāma hoti, tasmā bhūmiladdhanti vuccati. Evametesu catūsu uppannesu
atk-abh01a0:962_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – pubbantato uddhaṃ uppādādiabhimukhaṃ pannanti uppannaṃ. ‘Uppanna’-saddo
atk-abh01a0:962_1: panesa atīte paṭiladdhe samuṭṭhite avikkhambhite asamucchinne khaṇattayagateti anekesu
atk-abh01a0:962_2: atthesu dissati. Ayañhi “tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṃ
atk-abh01a0:962_3: sammāsambuddho loke uppanno”ti ettha atīte āgato. “Āyasmato ānandassa atirekacīvaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:962_4: uppannaṃ hotī”ti ettha paṭiladdhe. “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, uppannaṃ mahāmeghaṃ tamenaṃ
atk-abh01a0:962_5: mahāvāto antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti ettha samuṭṭhite. “Uppannaṃ gamiyacittaṃ duppaṭivinodanīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:962_6: ; uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti ettha avikkhambhite.
atk-abh01a0:962_7: “Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme
atk-abh01a0:962_8: ṭhānaso antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti ettha asamucchinne. “Uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti?
atk-abh01a0:962_9: Āmantā”ti ettha khaṇattayagate. Svāyamidhāpi khaṇattayagateva daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ‘uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:962_10: hotī’ti ettha khaṇattayagataṃ hoti, vattamānaṃ hoti, paccuppannaṃ hotīti. Ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
atk-abh01a0:963_0: Cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti cetaṃ desanāsīsameva. Na pana cittaṃ ekakameva uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:963_1: Tasmā yathā rājā āgatoti vutte na parisaṃ pahāya ekakova āgato, rājaparisāya pana
atk-abh01a0:963_2: saddhiṃyeva āgatoti paññāyati, evamidampi paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva uppannanti
atk-abh01a0:963_3: veditabbaṃ. Pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena pana “cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti”cceva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:964_0: Lokiyadhammañhi patvā cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ hoti. Lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:964_1: patvā paññā jeṭṭhikā paññā dhurā paññā pubbaṅgamā. Teneva bhagavā vinayapariyāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:964_2: patvā pañhaṃ pucchanto ‘kiṃphassosi, kiṃvedanosi, kiṃsaññosi, kiṃcetanosī’ti apucchitvā
atk-abh01a0:964_3: “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti cittameva dhuraṃ katvā pucchati. “Atheyyacitto ahaṃ bhagavā”ti
atk-abh01a0:964_4: ca vutte ‘anāpatti atheyyaphassassā’tiādīni avatvā “anāpatti bhikkhu atheyyacittassā”ti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:965_0: Na kevalañca vinayapariyāyaṃ, aññampi lokiyadesanaṃ desento cittameva dhuraṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:965_1: deseti. Yathāha – “ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā
atk-abh01a0:965_2: sabbete manopubbaṅgamā. Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati”.
atk-abh01a0:967: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-abh01a0:968: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:970: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-abh01a0:975: “Pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ” ;
atk-abh01a0:976_0: “Citte, gahapati, arakkhite kāyakammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi arakkhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:976_1: hoti, manokammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti; citte, gahapati, rakkhite…pe… citte, gahapati,
atk-abh01a0:976_2: byāpanne…pe… citte, gahapati, abyāpanne…pe… citte, gahapati, avassute…pe… citte,
atk-abh01a0:976_3: gahapati, anavassute kāyakammampi anavassutaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi anavassutaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:977_0: Evaṃ lokiyadhammaṃ patvā cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti, cittaṃ dhuraṃ hoti, cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:977_1: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Imesu pana suttesu ekaṃ vā dve vā aggahetvā suttānurakkhaṇatthāya
atk-abh01a0:978_0: Lokuttaradhammaṃ pucchanto pana ‘kataraphassaṃ adhigatosi, kataravedanaṃ katarasaññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:978_1: kataracetanaṃ kataracitta’nti apucchitvā, ‘katarapaññaṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu adhigato’si,
atk-abh01a0:978_2: ‘kiṃ paṭhamaṃ maggapaññaṃ, udāhu dutiyaṃ…pe… tatiyaṃ…pe… catutthaṃ maggapaññaṃ adhigato’ti
atk-abh01a0:978_3: paññaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā pucchati. Paññuttarā sabbe kusalā dhammā na
atk-abh01a0:978_4: parihāyanti. Paññā pana kimatthiyā ? “Paññavato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tadanvayā
atk-abh01a0:978_5: saddhā saṇṭhāti, tadanvayaṃ vīriyaṃ saṇṭhāti, tadanvayā sati saṇṭhāti, tadanvayo
atk-abh01a0:978_6: samādhi saṇṭhātī”ti evamādīni panettha suttāni daṭṭhabbāni. Iti lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:978_7: patvā paññā jeṭṭhikā hoti paññā dhurā paññā pubbaṅgamāti veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana lokiyadesanā.
atk-abh01a0:978_8: Tasmā cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā desento “cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:979_1: gataṃ. Ayaṃ pana ‘sahagata’-saddo tabbhāve vokiṇṇe nissaye ārammaṇe saṃsaṭṭheti imesu
atk-abh01a0:979_2: atthesu dissati. Tattha “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā”ti tabbhāve veditabbo;
atk-abh01a0:979_3: nandirāgabhūtāti attho. “Yā, bhikkhave, vīmaṃsā kosajjasahagatā kosajjasampayuttā”ti
atk-abh01a0:979_4: vokiṇṇe veditabbo; antarantarā uppajjamānena kosajjena vokiṇṇāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh01a0:979_6: nissāya aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvetvā paṭiladdhanti attho. “Lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:979_7: samāpattīnaṃ arūpasahagatānaṃ vā”ti ārammaṇe; veditabbo rūpārūpārammaṇānanti attho.
atk-abh01a0:979_8: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta”nti saṃsaṭṭhe.
atk-abh01a0:979_9: Imasmimpi pade ayamevattho adhippeto. Somanassasaṃsaṭṭhañhi idha somanassasahagatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:980_0: ‘Saṃsaṭṭha’-saddopi cesa sadise avassute mittasanthave sahajāteti bahūsu atthesu
atk-abh01a0:980_1: dissati. Ayañhi “kise thūle vivajjetvā saṃsaṭṭhā yojitā hayā”ti ettha sadise āgato.
atk-abh01a0:980_2: “Saṃsaṭṭhāva tumhe ayye viharathā”ti avassute. “Gihi saṃsaṭṭho viharatī”ti mittasanthave.
atk-abh01a0:980_3: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta”nti sahajāte.
atk-abh01a0:980_4: Idhāpi sahajāte adhippeto. Tattha ‘sahagataṃ’ asahajātaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ asampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:980_5: nāma natthi. Sahajātaṃ pana saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ hotipi, na hotipi. Rūpārūpadhammesu
atk-abh01a0:980_6: hi ekato jātesu rūpaṃ arūpena sahajātaṃ hoti, na saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, na sampayuttaṃ; tathā
atk-abh01a0:980_7: arūpaṃ rūpena; rūpañca rūpena; arūpaṃ pana arūpena saddhiṃ niyamatova sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:980_8: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttameva hotīti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘somanassasahagata’nti.
atk-abh01a0:981_0: Ñāṇasampayuttanti ñāṇena sampayuttaṃ, samaṃ ekuppādādippakārehi yuttanti attho. Yaṃ
atk-abh01a0:981_1: panettha vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāya vedanāttike vuttanayameva. Tasmā ekuppādā
atk-abh01a0:981_2: ekanirodhā ekavatthukā ekārammaṇāti iminā lakkhaṇenetaṃ sampayuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:981_3: Ukkaṭṭhaniddeso cesa. Arūpe pana vināpi ekavatthukabhāvaṃ sampayogo labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:982_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ? Kāmāvacarakusalesu somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:982_1: asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ kathitaṃ. “Katame dhammā kusalā”ti hi aniyamitapucchāya catubhūmakakusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:982_2: gahitaṃ. ‘Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī’ti vacanena pana tebhūmakaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:982_4: tato catubbidhaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ pariccajitvā catubbidhaṃ somanassasahagatameva
atk-abh01a0:982_5: gahitaṃ. ‘Ñāṇasampayutta’nti vacanena tato duvidhaṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-abh01a0:982_6: dve ñāṇasampayuttāneva gahitāni. Asaṅkhārikabhāvo pana anābhaṭṭhatāyeva na gahito.
atk-abh01a0:982_7: Kiñcāpi na gahito, parato pana ‘sasaṅkhārenā’ti vacanato idha ‘asaṅkhārenā’ti avuttepi
atk-abh01a0:982_8: asaṅkhārikabhāvo veditabbo. Sammāsambuddho hi āditova idaṃ mahācittaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:982_9: niyametvāva imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti evamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:983_0: Idāni tameva cittaṃ ārammaṇato dassetuṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vātiādimāha. Bhagavā hi arūpadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:983_1: dassento vatthunā vā dasseti, ārammaṇena vā, vatthārammaṇehi vā, sarasabhāvena vā.
atk-abh01a0:983_3: vedanā; cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇa”ntiādīsu hi vatthunā arūpadhammā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:983_5: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso…pe… manañca
atk-abh01a0:983_6: paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādīsu vatthārammaṇehi.
atk-abh01a0:983_8: arūpadhammā dassitā. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ārammaṇena dassento ‘rūpārammaṇaṃ’ vātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:984_0: Tattha catusamuṭṭhānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ. Dvisamuṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:984_2: gandhova gandhārammaṇaṃ. Catusamuṭṭhāno atītānāgatapaccuppanno rasova rasārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:984_5: cittacetasikā, tathā navattabbā ca, vuttāvasesā cittagocarasaṅkhātā dhammāyeva dhammārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:984_6: Ye pana anāpāthagatā rūpādayopi dhammārammaṇamicceva vadanti te iminā suttena paṭikkhipitabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:985: “Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano paṭisaraṇaṃ mano nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:986_0: Etesañhi rūpārammaṇādīni gocaravisayo nāma. Tāni manena paccanubhaviyamānānipi rūpārammaṇādīniyevāti
atk-abh01a0:986_1: ayamattho siddho hoti. Dibbacakkhuñāṇādīnañca rūpādiārammaṇattāpi ayamattho siddhoyeva
atk-abh01a0:986_2: hoti. Anāpāthagatāneva hi rūpārammaṇādīni dibbacakkhuādīnaṃ ārammaṇāni, na ca tāni
atk-abh01a0:987_0: Tattha ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchati. Rūpārammaṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ
atk-abh01a0:987_1: ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇaññeva manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati; bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotīti
atk-abh01a0:987_2: attho. Saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇesupi eseva nayo. Yathā hi sakuṇo ākāsenāgantvā
atk-abh01a0:987_3: rukkhagge nilīyamānova rukkhasākhañca ghaṭṭeti, chāyā cassa pathaviyaṃ paṭihaññati
atk-abh01a0:987_4: sākhāghaṭṭanachāyāpharaṇāni apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bhavanti, evaṃ paccuppannarūpādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:987_6: acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti. Tato bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā cakkhudvārādīsu uppannānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:987_7: āvajjanādīnaṃ voṭṭhabbanapariyosānānaṃ anantarā tesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:988_0: Suddhamanodvāre pana pasādaghaṭṭanakiccaṃ natthi. Pakatiyā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:988_1: etāni ārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchanti. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco katasudhākammaṃ haritālamanosilādivaṇṇavicittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:988_3: siriyā virocamānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā soḷasasu pādapiṭṭhikāsu
atk-abh01a0:988_4: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha ullokento buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:988_5: tiṭṭhati. Tassa evaṃ cetiyaṃ passitvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ nibbattetvā aparabhāge
atk-abh01a0:988_6: yattha katthaci gatassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinnassa āvajjamānassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:988_7: mahācetiyaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgatasadisameva hoti, padakkhiṇaṃ katvā cetiyavandanakālo
atk-abh01a0:988_8: viya hoti. Evaṃ tāva diṭṭhavasena rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh01a0:989_0: Madhurena pana sarena dhammakathikassa vā dhammaṃ kathentassa, sarabhāṇakassa vā
atk-abh01a0:989_1: sarena bhaṇantassa saddaṃ sutvā aparabhāge yattha katthaci nisīditvā āvajjamānassa
atk-abh01a0:989_2: dhammakathā vā sarabhaññaṃ vā sotadvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti, sādhukāraṃ datvā
atk-abh01a0:989_3: suṇanakālo viya hoti. Evaṃ sutavasena saddārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh01a0:990_0: Sugandhaṃ pana gandhaṃ vā mālaṃ vā labhitvā āsane vā cetiye vā gandhārammaṇena cittena
atk-abh01a0:990_1: pūjaṃ katvā aparabhāge yattha katthaci nisīditvā āvajjamānassa taṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:990_2: ghānadvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti, pūjākaraṇakālo viya hoti. Evaṃ ghāyitavasena
atk-abh01a0:991_0: Paṇītaṃ pana khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitvā paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh01a0:991_1: aparabhāge yattha katthaci kudrūsakādibhojanaṃ labhitvā ‘asukakāle paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:991_2: sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitvā paribhutta’nti āvajjamānassa taṃ rasārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:991_3: jivhādvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti, paribhuñjanakālo viya hoti. Evaṃ sāyitavasena
atk-abh01a0:992_0: Mudukaṃ pana sukhasamphassaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā attharaṇapāpuraṇaṃ vā paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh01a0:992_1: aparabhāge yattha katthaci dukkhaseyyaṃ kappetvā ‘asukakāle me mudukaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:992_2: attharaṇapāvuraṇaṃ paribhutta’nti āvajjamānassa taṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre
atk-abh01a0:992_3: āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti. Sukhasamphassaṃ vedayitakālo viya hoti. Evaṃ phuṭṭhavasena
atk-abh01a0:992_4: phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati. Evaṃ suddhamanodvāre pasādaghaṭṭanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:992_5: Pakatiyā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavaseneva etāni ārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:993_0: Idāni pakatiyā diṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena āpāthagamane ayamaparopi aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo
atk-abh01a0:993_1: hoti. Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ ubhayasambandhanti ime tāva diṭṭhādayo veditabbā. Tattha ‘diṭṭhaṃ’
atk-abh01a0:993_2: nāma pañcadvāravasena gahitapubbaṃ. ‘Suta’nti paccakkhato adisvā anussavavasena gahitā
atk-abh01a0:993_3: rūpādayova. Tehi dvīhipi sambandhaṃ ‘ubhayasambandhaṃ’ nāma. Iti imesampi diṭṭhādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:993_4: vasena etāni manodvāre āpāthamāgacchantīti veditabbāni. Tattha diṭṭhavasena tāva
atk-abh01a0:994_0: Ekacco pana suṇāti – ‘bhagavato puññātisayanibbattaṃ evarūpaṃ nāma rūpaṃ, atimadhuro
atk-abh01a0:994_1: saddo, kismiñci padese kesañci pupphānaṃ atimanuñño gandho, kesañci phalānaṃ atimadhuro
atk-abh01a0:994_2: raso, kesañci pāvuraṇādīnaṃ atisukho samphasso’ti. Tassa, cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:994_3: vinā, sutamattāneva tāni manodvāre āpāthamāgacchanti. Athassa taṃ cittaṃ tasmiṃ rūpe
atk-abh01a0:994_4: vā sadde vā pasādavasena gandhādīsu ariyānaṃ dātukāmatāvasena aññehi dinnesu anumodanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:994_5: vā pavattati. Evaṃ sutavasena etāni manodvāre āpāthamāgacchanti.
atk-abh01a0:995_0: Aparena pana yathāvuttāni rūpādīni diṭṭhāni vā sutāni vā honti. Tassa ‘īdisaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:995_1: āyatiṃ uppajjanakabuddhassāpi bhavissatī’tiādinā nayena cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanaṃ vinā
atk-abh01a0:995_2: diṭṭhasutasambandheneva tāni manodvāre āpāthamāgacchanti. Athassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:995_3: tesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ idaṃ mahācittaṃ pavattati. Evaṃ ubhayasambandhavasena etāni
atk-abh01a0:996_1: vasena vitthārato etesaṃ manodvāre āpāthagamanaṃ veditabbameva. Yasmā pana evaṃ āpāthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:996_2: āgacchantāni bhūtānipi honti abhūtānipi, tasmā ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na gahito.
atk-abh01a0:996_3: Evaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Rūpārammaṇañhi
atk-abh01a0:996_4: javanaṃ cakkhudvārepi uppajjati manodvārepi. Saddādiārammaṇesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:997_0: Tattha manodvāre uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayanti
atk-abh01a0:997_1: tividhaṃ hoti. Tesu ekekaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti tividhameva hoti. Saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammārammaṇesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:998_0: Tattha rūpaṃ tāva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānaṃ etaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ nīlapītalohitodātavaṇṇesu
atk-abh01a0:998_1: pupphavatthadhātūsu aññataraṃ subhanimittasaṅkhātaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ rajanīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:998_2: vaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati. Nanu cetaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu? Kathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:998_3: etaṃ cittaṃ kusalaṃ nāma jātanti? Niyamitavasena pariṇāmitavasena samudācāravasena
atk-abh01a0:998_4: ābhujitavasenāti. Yassa hi ‘kusalameva mayā kattabba’nti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:998_5: hoti, akusalappavattito nivattetvā kusalakaraṇeyeva pariṇāmitaṃ, abhiṇhakaraṇena
atk-abh01a0:998_7: ca upanissayehi yoniso ca ābhogo pavattati, tassa iminā niyamitavasena pariṇāmitavasena
atk-abh01a0:998_8: samudācāravasena ābhujitavasena ca kusalaṃ nāma jātaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:999_0: Ārammaṇavasena panettha somanassasahagatabhāvo veditabbo. Iṭṭhārammaṇasmiñhi uppannattā
atk-abh01a0:999_1: etaṃ somanassasahagataṃ jātaṃ. Saddhābahulatādīnipettha kāraṇāniyeva. Assaddhānañhi
atk-abh01a0:999_2: micchādiṭṭhīnañca ekantaiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ tathāgatarūpampi disvā somanassaṃ nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:999_3: Ye ca kusalappavattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ na passanti tesaṃ parehi ussāhitānaṃ kusalaṃ karontānampi
atk-abh01a0:999_4: somanassaṃ nuppajjati. Tasmā saddhābahulatā visuddhadiṭṭhitā ānisaṃsadassāvitāti.
atk-abh01a0:999_5: Evampettha somanassasahagatabhāvo veditabbo. Apica ekādasadhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh01a0:999_6: uppādāya saṃvattanti – buddhānussati dhammānussati saṅghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati
atk-abh01a0:999_8: tadadhimuttatāti. Imehipi kāraṇehettha somanassasahagatabhāvo veditabbo. Imesaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1000_0: Kammato, upapattito, indriyaparipākato, kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi panettha kāraṇehi
atk-abh01a0:1000_1: ñāṇasampayuttatā veditabbā. Yo hi paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjāṭṭhānāni
atk-abh01a0:1000_2: sikkhāpeti dhammakathikaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathāpeti, ‘āyatiṃ paññavā bhavissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1000_3: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nānappakāraṃ dānaṃ deti, tassa evarūpaṃ kammaṃ upanissāya kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1000_4: uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Abyāpajje loke uppannassa vāpi “tassa tattha
atk-abh01a0:1000_5: sukhino dhammapadā pilavanti… dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo, atha so satto khippaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1000_6: visesagāmī hotī”ti iminā nayena upapattiṃ nissāyapi uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1000_7: uppajjati. Tathā indriyaparipākaṃ upagatānaṃ paññādasakappattānaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1000_8: nissāyapi kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Yehi pana kilesā vikkhambhitā
atk-abh01a0:1000_9: tesaṃ kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāyapi uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1002: Evaṃ kammato upapattito indriyaparipākato kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi kāraṇehi ñāṇasampayuttatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1003_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paripucchakatā,
atk-abh01a0:1003_3: veditabbā. Imesaṃ pana vitthāro bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:1004_0: Evaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hutvā uppannañcetaṃ asaṅkhārena appayogena anupāyacintanāya
atk-abh01a0:1004_1: uppannattā asaṅkhāraṃ nāma jātaṃ. Tayidaṃ rajanīyavaṇṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā uppajjamānameva
atk-abh01a0:1004_2: tividhena niyamena uppajjati – dānamayaṃ vā hoti, sīlamayaṃ vā, bhāvanāmayaṃ vā.
atk-abh01a0:1005_0: Kathaṃ? Yadā hi nīlapītalohitodātesu pupphādīsu aññataraṃ labhitvā vaṇṇavasena ābhujitvā
atk-abh01a0:1005_1: ‘vaṇṇadānaṃ mayha’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti, tadā dānamayaṃ hoti. Tatridaṃ vatthu
atk-abh01a0:1005_2: – bhaṇḍāgārikasaṅghamitto kira ekaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ vatthaṃ labhitvā idampi vatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1005_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ, sammāsambuddhopi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇasseva
atk-abh01a0:1005_4: anucchavikaṃ, amhākañca vaṇṇadānaṃ bhavissatīti mahācetiye āropesi. Evarūpe kāle
atk-abh01a0:1005_5: dānamayaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Yadā pana tathārūpameva deyyadhammaṃ labhitvā ‘mayhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1005_6: kulavaṃso, kulatanti kulappaveṇī esā, kulavattaṃ eta’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti
atk-abh01a0:1005_7: tadā sīlamayaṃ hoti. Yadā pana tādiseneva vatthunā ratanattayassa pūjaṃ katvā ‘ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1005_8: vaṇṇo khayaṃ gacchissati, vayaṃ gacchissatī’ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti, tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1006_0: Dānamayaṃ pana hutvā vattamānampi yadā tīṇi ratanāni sahatthena pūjentassa pavattatti,
atk-abh01a0:1006_1: tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā tīṇi ratanāni pūjento puttadāradāsakammakaraporisādayopi
atk-abh01a0:1006_2: āṇāpetvā pūjāpeti tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā tadeva vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1006_3: ārabbha vaṇṇadānaṃ dassāmīti cinteti tadā manokammaṃ hoti. Vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā
atk-abh01a0:1006_4: hi ‘dassāmi karissāmī’ti vācā bhinnā hotīti iminā lakkhaṇena dānaṃ nāma hoti. Abhidhammapariyāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1006_5: patvā pana vijjamānakavatthuṃ ārabbha ‘dassāmī’ti manasā cintitakālato paṭṭhāya kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1006_6: hoti. Aparabhāge kāyena vā vācāya vā kattabbaṃ karissatīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ dānamayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1007_0: Yadā pana taṃ vuttappakāraṃ vatthuṃ labhitvā kulavaṃsādivasena sahatthā ratanattayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1007_1: pūjeti tadā sīlamayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:1007_2: pūjāpeti tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā ‘mayhaṃ kulavaṃso, kulatanti kulappaveṇī esā,
atk-abh01a0:1007_3: kulavattameta’nti vijjamānakavatthuṃ ārabbha ‘vaṇṇadānaṃ dassāmī’ti cinteti tadā
atk-abh01a0:1007_4: manokammaṃ hoti. Evaṃ sīlamayaṃ kāyavacīmanokammavasena tividhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1008_0: Yadā pana taṃ vuttappakāraṃ vatthuṃ labhitvā tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā caṅkamanto khayavayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1008_1: paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti. Vācāya sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vacīkammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1008_2: hoti, kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1008_3: Evaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyavacīmanokammavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Evametaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1008_4: tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā. Saddārammaṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1009_0: Bherisaddādīsu hi rajanīyasaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1009_1: kusalaṃ uppajjati. Tattha saddaṃ kandamūlaṃ viya uppāṭetvā nīluppalahatthakaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:1009_2: ca hatthe ṭhapetvā dātuṃ nāma na sakkā, savatthukaṃ pana katvā dento saddadānaṃ deti
atk-abh01a0:1009_3: nāma. Tasmā yadā ‘saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti bherimudiṅgādīsu aññataratūriyena tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1009_4: ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karoti, ‘saddadānaṃ me’ti bheriādīni ṭhapāpeti, dhammakathikabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1009_5: sarabhesajjatelaphāṇitādīni deti, dhammasavanaṃ ghoseti, sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇati, dhammakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1009_6: katheti, upanisinnakakathaṃ anumodanakathaṃ karoti, tadā dānamayaṃyeva hoti. Yadā
atk-abh01a0:1009_7: etadeva vidhānaṃ kulavaṃsādivasena vattavasena karoti tadā sīlamayaṃ hoti. Yadā sabbampetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1009_8: katvā ayaṃ ettako saddo brahmalokappamāṇopi hutvā ‘khayaṃ gamissati, vayaṃ gamissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1010_0: Tattha dānamayaṃ tāva yadā bheriādīni gahetvā sahatthā upahāraṃ karoti, niccupahāratthāya
atk-abh01a0:1010_1: ṭhapentopi sahatthā ṭhapeti, ‘saddadānaṃ me’ti dhammasavanaṃ ghosetuṃ gacchati, dhammakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1010_2: sarabhaññaṃ kātuṃ vā gacchati, tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā ‘gacchatha, tātā, amhākaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1010_3: saddadānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karothā’ti āṇāpeti, ‘saddadānaṃ me’ti cetiyaṅgaṇesu
atk-abh01a0:1010_4: ‘imaṃ bheriṃ, imaṃ mudiṅgaṃ ṭhapethā’ti āṇāpeti, sayameva dhammasavanaṃ ghoseti,
atk-abh01a0:1010_5: dhammakathaṃ katheti, sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇati, tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni
atk-abh01a0:1010_6: acopetvā ‘saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti vijjamānakavatthuṃ manasā pariccajati, tadā manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1011_0: Sīlamayampi ‘saddadānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī’ti bheriādīhi
atk-abh01a0:1011_1: sahatthā upahāraṃ karontassa, bheriādīni sahatthā cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu ṭhapentassa, dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1011_3: ca gacchantassa kāyakammaṃ hoti. ‘Saddadānaṃ nāma amhākaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī,
atk-abh01a0:1011_4: gacchatha, tātā, buddharatanādīnaṃ upahāraṃ karothā’ti āṇāpentassa kulavaṃsavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:1011_5: attanā dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā karontassa ca vacīkammaṃ hoti. ‘Saddadānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1011_6: nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃso saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva vijjamānakavatthuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1012_0: Bhāvanāmayampi yadā caṅkamanto sadde khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1012_1: Kāyaṅgaṃ pana acopetvā vācāya sammasantassa vacīkammaṃ hoti. Kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopetvā
atk-abh01a0:1012_2: manasāva saddāyatanaṃ sammasantassa manokammaṃ hoti. Evaṃ saddārammaṇampi kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1012_3: tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1013_0: Mūlagandhādīsupi rajanīyagandhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1013_1: kusalaṃ uppajjati. Tattha yadā mūlagandhādīsu yaṃkiñci gandhaṃ labhitvā gandhavasena
atk-abh01a0:1013_2: ābhujitvā ‘gandhadānaṃ mayha’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti, tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1013_3: vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ gandhārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena
atk-abh01a0:1014_0: Mūlarasādīsu pana rajanīyarasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1014_1: kusalaṃ uppajjati. Tattha yadā mūlarasādīsu yaṃkiñci rajanīyaṃ rasavatthuṃ labhitvā
atk-abh01a0:1014_2: rasavasena ābhujitvā ‘rasadānaṃ mayha’nti deti pariccajati, tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti
atk-abh01a0:1014_3: sabbaṃ vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Sīlamaye panettha ‘saṅghassa
atk-abh01a0:1014_4: adatvā paribhuñjanaṃ nāma amhākaṃ na āciṇṇa’nti dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ dāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:1014_5: sādurasaṃ paribhuttassa duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayarañño vatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1014_6: vatthūni āgatāni. Ayameva viseso. Evaṃ rasārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena
atk-abh01a0:1015_0: Phoṭṭhabbārammaṇepi pathavīdhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti tīṇi mahābhūtāni phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1015_1: nāma. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne etesaṃ vasena yojanaṃ akatvā mañcapīṭhādivasena kātabbā. Yadā
atk-abh01a0:1015_2: hi mañcapīṭhādīsu yaṃkiñci rajanīyaṃ phoṭṭhabbavatthuṃ labhitvā phoṭṭhabbavasena
atk-abh01a0:1015_3: ābhujitvā ‘phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mayha’nti deti pariccajati, tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1015_4: vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇampi kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1015_5: tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1016_0: Dhammārammaṇe cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, tīṇi lakkhaṇāni, tayo arūpino khandhā,
atk-abh01a0:1016_1: pannarasa sukhumarūpāni, nibbānapaññattīti ime dhammāyatane pariyāpannā ca, apariyāpannā
atk-abh01a0:1016_2: ca, dhammā dhammārammaṇaṃ nāma. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne etesaṃ vasena yojanaṃ akatvā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānavasena
atk-abh01a0:1016_3: kātabbā. Ojādīsu hi rajanīyaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1017_0: Tattha yadā ‘ojadānaṃ mayha’nti sappinavanītādīni deti, pānadānanti aṭṭha pānāni
atk-abh01a0:1017_1: deti, jīvitadānanti salākabhattasaṅghabhattādīni deti, aphāsukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1017_2: deti, vejjaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, jālaṃ phālāpeti, kumīnaṃ viddhaṃsāpeti, sakuṇapañjaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1017_3: viddhaṃsāpeti, bandhanamokkhaṃ kārāpeti, māghātabheriṃ carāpeti, aññānipi jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1017_4: evarūpāni kammāni karoti tadā dānamayaṃ hoti. Yadā pana ‘ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni
atk-abh01a0:1017_5: mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī’ti vattasīsena ojadānādīni pavatteti tadā
atk-abh01a0:1017_6: sīlamayaṃ hoti. Yadā dhammārammaṇasmiṃ khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1018_0: Dānamayaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānampi yadā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni sahatthā deti,
atk-abh01a0:1018_1: tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā dāpeti, tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā
atk-abh01a0:1019_0: Yadā pana vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ kulavaṃsādivasena sahatthā deti, tadā
atk-abh01a0:1019_1: sīlamayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā dāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1019_2: tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ ‘dassāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1020_0: Caṅkamitvā dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa pana bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1020_1: Kāyaṅgaṃ acopetvā vācāya khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vacīkammaṃ hoti. Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni
atk-abh01a0:1020_2: acopetvā manasāva dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa manokammaṃ hoti. Evaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1020_3: kāyavacīmanokammavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Evametaṃ dhammārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena
atk-abh01a0:1021_0: Evamidaṃ cittaṃ nānāvatthūsu nānārammaṇavasena dīpitaṃ. Idaṃ pana ekavatthusmimpi
atk-abh01a0:1021_1: nānārammaṇavasena labbhatiyeva. Kathaṃ? Catūsu hi paccayesu cīvare cha ārammaṇāni
atk-abh01a0:1021_2: labbhanti – navarattassa hi cīvarassa vaṇṇo manāpo hoti dassanīyo, idaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1021_3: Paribhogakāle paṭapaṭasaddaṃ karoti, idaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ. Yo tattha kāḷakacchakādigandho,
atk-abh01a0:1021_4: idaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ. Rasārammaṇaṃ pana paribhogarasavasena kathitaṃ. Yā tattha sukhasamphassatā,
atk-abh01a0:1021_5: idaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ. Cīvaraṃ paṭicca uppannā sukhā vedanā, dhammārammaṇaṃ. Piṇḍapāte
atk-abh01a0:1021_6: rasārammaṇaṃ nippariyāyeneva labbhati. Evaṃ catūsu paccayesu nānārammaṇavasena yojanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1022: Imassa pana cittassa ārammaṇameva nibaddhaṃ, vinā ārammaṇena anuppajjanato. Dvāraṃ pana anibaddhaṃ. Kasmā? Kammassa anibaddhattā. Kammasmiñhi anibaddhe dvārampi anibaddhameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1025_0: Imassa panatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dvārakathā kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1025_1: Tattha tīṇi kammāni, tīṇi kammadvārāni, pañca viññāṇāni, pañca viññāṇadvārāni, cha
atk-abh01a0:1025_2: phassā, cha phassadvārāni, aṭṭha asaṃvarā, aṭṭha asaṃvaradvārāni, aṭṭha saṃvarā,
atk-abh01a0:1025_3: aṭṭha saṃvaradvārāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa akusalakammapathāti, idaṃ ettakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1026_0: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi kammāni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, tāni pana ṭhapetvā ādito tāva tīṇi
atk-abh01a0:1026_1: kammadvārāni bhājetvā dassitāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Kāyakammadvāraṃ, vacīkammadvāraṃ, manokammadvāranti.
atk-abh01a0:1027_0: Tattha catubbidho kāyo – upādinnako, āhārasamuṭṭhāno, utusamuṭṭhāno, cittasamuṭṭhānoti.
atk-abh01a0:1027_1: Tattha cakkhāyatanādīni jīvitindriyapariyantāni aṭṭha kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānipi, kammasamuṭṭhānāneva
atk-abh01a0:1027_2: catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti aṭṭha upādinnakakāyo nāma. Tāneva aṭṭha āhārajāni
atk-abh01a0:1027_3: āhārasamuṭṭhānikakāyo nāma. Aṭṭha utujāni utusamuṭṭhānikakāyo nāma. Aṭṭha cittajāni
atk-abh01a0:1028_0: Tesu kāyakammadvāranti neva upādinnakakāyassa nāmaṃ na itaresaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānesu
atk-abh01a0:1028_1: pana aṭṭhasu rūpesu ekā viññatti atthi, idaṃ kāyakammadvāraṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1028_2: – “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññatti? Yā kusalacittassa vā, akusalacittassa vā, abyākatacittassa
atk-abh01a0:1028_3: vā, abhikkamantassa vā paṭikkamantassa vā, ālokentassa vā vilokentassa vā, samiñjentassa
atk-abh01a0:1028_4: vā pasārentassa vā, kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhitattaṃ, viññatti viññāpanā
atk-abh01a0:1028_5: viññāpitattaṃ, idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññattī”ti. ‘Abhikkamissāmi paṭikkamissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1028_6: hi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha yā pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu
atk-abh01a0:1028_7: vāyodhātu tannissito vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ rūpakalāpānaṃ abbhantare
atk-abh01a0:1028_8: cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu, sā attanā sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambheti sandhāreti
atk-abh01a0:1029_0: Tattha ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ sattasu javanesu paṭhamacittasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu attanā
atk-abh01a0:1029_1: sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ sakkoti, aparāparaṃ pana cāletuṃ na
atk-abh01a0:1029_2: sakkoti. Dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1029_3: chahi cittehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhanapaccayaṃ labhitvā attanā sahajātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1029_4: rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ cāletuṃ abhikkamāpetuṃ paṭikkamāpetuṃ ālokāpetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1029_5: vilokāpetuṃ sammiñjāpetuṃ pasārāpetuṃ sakkoti. Tena gamanaṃ nāma jāyati, āgamanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1029_6: nāma jāyati, gamanāgamanaṃ nāma jāyati. ‘Yojanaṃ gato dasayojanaṃ gato’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1030_0: Yathā hi sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbe sakaṭe paṭhamayuge yuttagoṇā yugaṃ tāva santhambhetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1030_1: sandhāretuṃ sakkonti, cakkaṃ pana napavaṭṭenti; dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo; sattamayuge
atk-abh01a0:1030_2: pana goṇe yojetvā yadā cheko sārathi dhure nisīditvā yottāni ādāya sabbapurimato
atk-abh01a0:1030_3: paṭṭhāya patodalaṭṭhiyā goṇe ākoṭeti, tadā sabbeva ekabalā hutvā dhurañca sandhārenti
atk-abh01a0:1030_4: cakkāni ca pavaṭṭenti. ‘Sakaṭaṃ gahetvā dasayojanaṃ vīsatiyojanaṃ gatā’ti vattabbataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1031_0: Tattha yo cittasamuṭṭhānikakāyo na so viññatti, cittasamuṭṭhānāya pana vāyodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1031_1: sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ cāletuṃ paccayo bhavituṃ samattho eko
atk-abh01a0:1031_2: ākāravikāro atthi, ayaṃ viññatti nāma. Sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na cittasamuṭṭhānā. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:1031_3: pana aniccādibhedānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā, “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādi
atk-abh01a0:1031_4: vuttaṃ, evaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ viññattitāya sāpi cittasamuṭṭhānā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1032_0: Viññāpanattā panesā viññattīti vuccati. Kiṃ viññāpetīti? Ekaṃ kāyikakaraṇaṃ. Cakkhupathasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1032_1: ṭhito hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā ukkhipati, sīsaṃ vā bhamukaṃ vā cāleti, ayaṃ hatthādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1032_2: ākāro cakkhuviññeyyo hoti. Viññatti pana na cakkhuviññeyyā manoviññeyyā eva. Cakkhunā
atk-abh01a0:1032_3: hi hatthavikārādivasena vipphandamānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇameva passati. Viññattiṃ pana manodvārikacittena
atk-abh01a0:1033_0: Yathā hi araññe nidāghasamaye udakaṭṭhāne manussā ‘imāya saññāya idha udakassa atthibhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1033_1: jānissantī’ti rukkhagge tālapaṇṇādīni bandhāpenti, surāpānadvāre dhajaṃ ussāpenti,
atk-abh01a0:1033_2: uccaṃ vā pana rukkhaṃ vāto paharitvā cāleti, antoudake macche calante upari bubbuḷakāni
atk-abh01a0:1033_3: uṭṭhahanti, mahoghassa gatamaggapariyante tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭaṃ ussāritaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1033_5: ‘ettha udakaṃ bhavissati, surā bhavissati, ayaṃ rukkho vātena pahato bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:1033_6: antoudake maccho bhavissati, ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ajjhottharitvā ogho gato bhavissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1033_7: manoviññāṇena jānāti, evameva viññattipi na cakkhuviññeyyā manoviññeyyāva. Cakkhunā
atk-abh01a0:1033_8: hi hatthavikārādivasena vipphandamānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇameva passati. Viññattiṃ pana manodvārikacittena
atk-abh01a0:1034_0: Na kevalañcesā viññāpanatova viññatti nāma. Viññeyyatopi pana viññattiyeva nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1034_1: Ayañhi paresaṃ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi pākaṭā hoti. Tattha tattha sannipatitā
atk-abh01a0:1034_2: hi soṇasiṅgālakākagoṇādayo daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā gahetvā paharaṇākāre dassite ‘ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1034_3: no paharitukāmo’ti ñatvā yena vā tena vā palāyanti. Pākārakuṭṭādiantarikassa pana
atk-abh01a0:1034_4: parassa apākaṭakālopi atthi. Kiñcāpi tasmiṃ khaṇe apākaṭā sammukhībhūtānaṃ pana pākaṭattā
atk-abh01a0:1035_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānike pana kāye calante tisamuṭṭhāniko calati na calatīti? Sopi tatheva
atk-abh01a0:1035_1: calati. Taṃgatiko tadanuvattakova hoti. Yathā hi udake gacchante udake patitāni sukkhadaṇḍakatiṇapaṇṇādīnipi
atk-abh01a0:1035_2: udakagatikāneva bhavanti, tasmiṃ gacchante gacchanti, tiṭṭhante tiṭṭhanti – evaṃsampadamidaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1035_3: veditabbaṃ. Evamesā cittasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu viññatti kāyakammadvāraṃ nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1036_0: Yā pana tasmiṃ dvāre siddhā cetanā yāya pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, micchācāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1036_1: carati, pāṇātipātādīhi viramati, idaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Evaṃ paravādimhi sati kāyo
atk-abh01a0:1036_2: dvāraṃ, tamhi dvāre siddhā cetanā kāyakammaṃ ‘kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā’ti ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1036_3: Paravādimhi pana asati ‘abyākataṃ vā’ti tikaṃ pūretvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Tattha yathā
atk-abh01a0:1036_4: nagaradvāraṃ kataṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati, aṅgulamattampi aparāparaṃ na saṅkamati, tena
atk-abh01a0:1036_5: tena pana dvārena mahājano sañcarati, evameva dvāre dvāraṃ na sañcarati, kammaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1036_6: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uppajjanato carati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-abh01a0:1037: Dvāre caranti kammāni, na dvārā dvāracārino;
atk-abh01a0:1039_0: Tattha kammenāpi dvāraṃ nāmaṃ labhati, dvārenāpi kammaṃ. Yathā hi viññāṇādīnaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhānāni
atk-abh01a0:1039_1: viññāṇadvāraṃ phassadvāraṃ asaṃvaradvāraṃ saṃvaradvāranti nāmaṃ labhanti, evaṃ kāyakammassa
atk-abh01a0:1039_2: uppajjanaṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammadvāranti nāmaṃ labhati. Vacīmanokammadvāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1039_3: Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā simbalidevatā palāsadevatā pucimandadevatā
atk-abh01a0:1039_4: phandanadevatāti tena tena rukkhena nāmaṃ labhati, evameva kāyadvārena kataṃ kammampi
atk-abh01a0:1039_5: kāyakammanti dvārena nāmaṃ labhati. Vacīkammamanokammesupi eseva nayo. Tattha añño
atk-abh01a0:1039_6: kāyo, aññaṃ kammaṃ, kāyena pana katattā taṃ kāyakammanti vuccati. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā –
atk-abh01a0:1040: Kāyena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, kāyakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1042: Sūciyā ce kataṃ kammaṃ, sūcikammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1044: Vāsiyā ce kataṃ kammaṃ, vāsikammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1046: Purisena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, purisakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1049: Kāyena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, kāyakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1051_0: Evaṃ sante neva dvāravavatthānaṃ yujjati, na kammavavatthānaṃ. Kathaṃ? Kāyaviññattiyañhi
atk-abh01a0:1051_1: “dvāre caranti kammānī”ti vacanato vacīkammampi pavattati, tenassā kāyakammadvāranti
atk-abh01a0:1051_2: vavatthānaṃ na yuttaṃ. Kāyakammañca vacīviññattiyampi pavattati, tenassa kāyakammanti
atk-abh01a0:1051_3: vavatthānaṃ na yujjatī’ti. ‘No na yujjati. Kasmā? Yebhuyyavuttitāya ceva tabbahulavuttitāya
atk-abh01a0:1051_4: ca. Kāyakammameva hi yebhuyyena kāyaviññattiyaṃ pavattati na itarāni, tasmā kāyakammassa
atk-abh01a0:1051_5: yebhuyyena pavattito tassā kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho. Brāhmaṇagāmaambavananāgavanādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1051_6: brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viyāti dvāravavatthānaṃ yujjati. Kāyakammaṃ pana kāyadvāramhiyeva
atk-abh01a0:1051_7: bahulaṃ pavattati appaṃ vacīdvāre. Tasmā kāyadvāre bahulaṃ pavattito etassa kāyakammabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1051_8: siddho, vanacarakathullakumārikādigocarānaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viyāti. Evaṃ kammavavatthānampi yujjatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1054_0: Vacīkammadvārakathāyaṃ pana cetanāviratisaddavasena tividhā vācā nāma. Tattha “catūhi,
atk-abh01a0:1054_1: bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā
atk-abh01a0:1054_2: ca viññūna”nti ; ayaṃ cetanāvācā nāma. Yā “catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1054_3: ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti, ayaṃ virativācā nāma. “Vācā girā byappatho udīraṇaṃ ghoso
atk-abh01a0:1054_4: ghosakammaṃ vācā vacībhedo”ti, ayaṃ saddavācā nāma. Tāsu vacīkammadvāranti neva cetanāya
atk-abh01a0:1054_5: nāmaṃ na viratiyā. Sahasaddā pana ekā viññatti atthi, idaṃ vacīkammadvāraṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1054_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ vacīviññatti? Yā kusalacittassa vā akusalacittassa
atk-abh01a0:1054_7: vā abyākatacittassa vā vācā girā byappatho udīraṇaṃ ghoso ghosakammaṃ vācā vacībhedo,
atk-abh01a0:1054_8: ayaṃ vuccati vācā. Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ, idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ vacīviññattī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1055_0: ‘Idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmī’ti hi vitakkayato vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1055_1: Ayaṃ na sotaviññeyyo manoviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana
atk-abh01a0:1055_3: saddaṃ; ‘sutvā’ti taṃ sutvā, yaṃ vitakkayato tassa so saddo uppanno; tassa vasena
atk-abh01a0:1055_4: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano’ti ādisatīti vatvā vatthūnipi kathitāni. Paṭṭhānepi
atk-abh01a0:1055_6: Tasmā vinā viññattighaṭṭanāya uppajjamāno asotaviññeyyo vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma
atk-abh01a0:1055_7: natthi. ‘Idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmī’ti uppajjamānaṃ pana cittaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātu
atk-abh01a0:1055_8: tejodhātu vāyodhātu vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Tesaṃ abbhantare
atk-abh01a0:1055_9: cittasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭayamānāva uppajjati. Tena dhātusaṅghaṭṭanena
atk-abh01a0:1055_10: saheva saddo uppajjatīti. Ayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānasaddo nāma. Ayaṃ na viññatti. Tassā
atk-abh01a0:1055_11: pana cittasamuṭṭhānāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnakaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūto eko ākāravikāro
atk-abh01a0:1055_12: atthi, ayaṃ vacīviññatti nāma. Ito paraṃ sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na cittasamuṭṭhānātiādi
atk-abh01a0:1056_0: Idhāpi hi ‘tissa, datta, mittā’ti pakkosantassa saddaṃ sutvā viññattiṃ manodvārikacittena
atk-abh01a0:1056_1: cintetvā ‘idañcidañca esa kāreti maññe’ti jānāti. Kāyaviññatti viya ca ayampi tiracchānagatānampi
atk-abh01a0:1056_2: pākaṭā hoti. ‘Ehi, yāhī’ti hi saddaṃ sutvā tiracchānagatāpi ‘idaṃ nāmesa kāreti maññe’ti
atk-abh01a0:1056_3: ñatvā āgacchanti ceva gacchanti ca. Tisamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ cāleti na cāletīti, ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1056_4: pana vāro idha na labbhati. Purimacittasamuṭṭhānāya upatthambhanakiccampi natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1056_5: Yā pana tasmiṃ vacīdvāre siddhā cetanā, yāya musā katheti, pesuññaṃ katheti, pharusaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1056_6: katheti, samphaṃ palapati, musāvādādīhi viramati, idaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Ito paraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1056_7: sabbaṃ kammavavatthānañca dvāravavatthānañca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a0:1059_0: Manokammadvārakathāyaṃ pana kāmāvacarādivasena catubbidho mano mano nāma. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1059_1: kāmāvacaro catupaññāsavidho hoti, rūpāvacaro pannarasavidho, arūpāvacaro dvādasavidho,
atk-abh01a0:1059_2: lokuttaro aṭṭhavidhoti sabbopi ekūnanavutividho hoti. Tattha ayaṃ nāma mano manodvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1059_3: na hotīti na vattabbo. Yathā hi ayaṃ nāma cetanā kammaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā, antamaso
atk-abh01a0:1059_4: pañcaviññāṇasampayuttāpi hi cetanā mahāpakaraṇe kammantveva niddiṭṭhā, evameva ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1059_5: nāma mano manodvāraṃ na hotīti na vattabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1060_0: Etthāha – kammaṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃ karotīti? Āyūhati, abhisaṅkharoti, piṇḍaṃ karoti, ceteti,
atk-abh01a0:1060_1: kappeti, pakappetīti. Evaṃ sante pañcaviññāṇacetanā kiṃ āyūhati, abhisaṅkharoti,
atk-abh01a0:1060_2: piṇḍaṃ karoti, ceteti, kappeti, pakappetīti?. Sahajātadhamme. Sāpi hi sahajāte sampayuttakkhandhe
atk-abh01a0:1060_3: āyūhati abhisaṅkharoti piṇḍaṃ karoti ceteti kappeti pakappetīti. Kiṃ vā iminā vādena?
atk-abh01a0:1060_4: Sabbasaṅgāhikavasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – tebhūmakakusalākusalo
atk-abh01a0:1060_5: ekūnatiṃsavidho mano manokammadvāraṃ nāma. Yā pana tasmiṃ manodvāre siddhā cetanā
atk-abh01a0:1060_6: yāya abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanāni ceva anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādassanāni ca gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1060_7: idaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ kammavavatthānañca dvāravavatthānañca heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1060_8: vuttanayeneva veditabbanti. Imāni tīṇi kammadvārāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1063_0: Idāni yāni tīṇi kammāni ṭhapetvā imāni kammadvārāni dassitāni, tāni ādiṃ katvā avasesassa
atk-abh01a0:1063_1: dvārakathāya mātikāṭhapanassa vitthārakathā hoti. Tīṇi hi kammāni – kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1063_2: manokammanti. Kiṃ panetaṃ kammaṃ nāmāti? Cetanā ceva, ekacce ca cetanāsampayuttakā
atk-abh01a0:1063_3: dhammā. Tattha cetanāya kammabhāve imāni suttāni –
atk-abh01a0:1064_0: “Cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”.
atk-abh01a0:1064_1: “Kāye vā hi, ānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ, vācāya
atk-abh01a0:1064_2: vā, ānanda, sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ; mane vā, ānanda,
atk-abh01a0:1064_3: sati manosañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ”. “Tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā
atk-abh01a0:1064_4: akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ, dukkhavipākaṃ; catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1064_5: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā akusalaṃ manokammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1064_6: tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ catubbidhā,
atk-abh01a0:1064_7: bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā…pe… tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā, kusalaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1064_8: sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ”. “Sacāyaṃ, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa
atk-abh01a0:1064_9: paribbājakassa evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākareyya – sañcetaniyaṃ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1064_10: katvā kāyena vācāya manasā, sukhavedanīyaṃ sukhaṃ so vedayati…pe… adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1064_11: adukkhamasukhaṃ so vedayatīti; evaṃ byākaramāno kho, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso
atk-abh01a0:1065: Imāni tāva cetanāya kammabhāve suttāni. Cetanāsampayuttadhammānaṃ pana kammabhāvo kammacatukkena dīpito. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1066_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni. Katamāni
atk-abh01a0:1066_1: cattāri? Atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākaṃ, atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sukkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1066_2: sukkavipākaṃ, atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ kaṇhasukkavipākaṃ, atthi, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:1066_3: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.… Katamañca,
atk-abh01a0:1066_4: bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati? Yadidaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1066_5: satta bojjhaṅgā – satisambojjhaṅgo…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:1066_6: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.… Katamañca,
atk-abh01a0:1066_7: bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati? Ayameva
atk-abh01a0:1066_8: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo – seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi. Idaṃ vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1066_9: bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1067_0: Evaṃ ime bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgappabhedato pannarasa dhammā kammacatukkena dīpitā. Abhijjhā,
atk-abh01a0:1067_1: byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhi, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhīti imehi pana chahi saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1068_0: Tattha lokuttaramaggo bhajāpiyamāno kāyakammādīni tīṇi kammāni bhajati. Yañhi kāyena
atk-abh01a0:1068_1: dussīlyaṃ ajjhācarati, tamhā saṃvaro kāyikoti veditabbo. Yaṃ vācāya dussīlyaṃ ajjhācarati,
atk-abh01a0:1068_2: tamhā saṃvaro vācasikoti veditabbo. Iti sammākammanto kāyakammaṃ, sammāvācā vacīkammaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1068_3: Etasmiṃ dvaye gahite sammāājīvo tappakkhikattā gahitova hoti. Yaṃ pana manena dussīlyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1068_4: ajjhācarati, tamhā saṃvaro mānasikoti veditabbo. So diṭṭhisaṅkappavāyāmasatisamādhivasena
atk-abh01a0:1068_5: pañcavidho hoti. Ayaṃ pañcavidhopi manokammaṃ nāma. Evaṃ lokuttaramaggo bhajāpiyamāno
atk-abh01a0:1069_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne dvārasaṃsandanaṃ nāma hoti. Kāyavacīdvāresu hi copanaṃ patvā kammapathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1069_1: appattampi atthi, manodvāre ca samudācāraṃ patvā kammapathaṃ appattampi atthi; taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1070_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – yo ‘migavaṃ gamissāmī’ti dhanuṃ sajjeti, jiyaṃ vaṭṭeti, sattiṃ niseti,
atk-abh01a0:1070_1: bhattaṃ bhuñjati, vatthaṃ paridahati, ettāvatā kāyadvāre copanaṃ pattaṃ hoti. So
atk-abh01a0:1070_2: araññe divasaṃ caritvā antamaso sasabiḷāramattampi na labhati, idaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1070_3: nāma hoti na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Kammapathaṃ appattatāya. Kevalaṃ pana kāyaduccaritaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1070_4: nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ. Macchaggahaṇādī supayogesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1071_0: Vacīdvārepi ‘migavaṃ gamissāmi’ ‘vegena dhanuādīni sajjethā’ti āṇāpetvā purimanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1071_1: araññe kiñci alabhantassa kiñcāpi vacīdvāre copanaṃ pattaṃ, kammapathaṃ appattatāya
atk-abh01a0:1071_2: pana kāyakammaṃ na hoti. Kevalaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1072_0: Manodvāre pana vadhakacetanāya uppannamattāya eva kammapathabhedova hoti. So ca kho
atk-abh01a0:1072_1: byāpādavasena na pāṇātipātavasena. Akusalañhi kāyakammaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu samuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1072_2: na manodvāre; tathā akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Akusalaṃ manokammaṃ pana tīsupi dvāresu
atk-abh01a0:1073_0: Kathaṃ? Sahatthā hi pāṇaṃ hanantassa adinnaṃ ādiyantassa micchācāraṃ carantassa kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1073_1: kāyakammameva hoti. Dvārampi kāyadvārameva hoti. Evaṃ tāva akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kāyadvāre
atk-abh01a0:1073_2: samuṭṭhāti. Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā
atk-abh01a0:1073_3: vā bhavanti, abbohārikā vā. ‘Gaccha itthannāmaṃ jīvitā voropehi, itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1073_4: avaharā’ti āṇāpentassa pana kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti, dvāraṃ pana vacīdvāraṃ. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1073_5: akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo
atk-abh01a0:1073_6: cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti abbohārikā vā. Ettakā ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1074: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ manodvārepi samuṭṭhātī’ti. So ‘tayo saṅgahe āruḷhaṃ suttaṃ āharāhī’ti vutto idaṃ kulumbasuttaṃ nāma āhari –
atk-abh01a0:1075_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto
atk-abh01a0:1075_1: aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasā anupekkhako hoti – ‘aho vatāyaṃ kucchigato
atk-abh01a0:1075_2: gabbho na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā’ti. Evaṃ, bhikkhave, kulumbassa upaghāto hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1076_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā āha – ‘evaṃ cintitamatteyeva manasā kucchigato gabbho pheṇapiṇḍo
atk-abh01a0:1076_1: viya vilīyati. Ettha kuto kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā? Manodvārasmiṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1077_0: Tamenaṃ ‘tava suttassa atthaṃ tulayissāmā’ti vatvā evaṃ tulayiṃsu – ‘tvaṃ iddhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1077_1: parūpaghātaṃ vadesi. Iddhi nāma cesā – adhiṭṭhāniddhi, vikubbaniddhi, manomayiddhi,
atk-abh01a0:1077_2: ñāṇavipphāriddhi, samādhivipphāriddhi, ariyiddhi, kammavipākajiddhi, puññavato iddhi,
atk-abh01a0:1077_3: vijjāmayiddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti dasavidhā.
atk-abh01a0:1077_4: Tattha kataraṃ iddhiṃ vadesī’ti? ‘Bhāvanāmaya’nti. ‘Kiṃ pana bhāvanāmayiddhiyā parūpaghātakammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1077_5: hotī’ti? ‘Āma, ekacce ācariyā ekavāraṃ hotī’ti; vadanti yathā hi paraṃ paharitukāmena
atk-abh01a0:1077_6: udakabharite ghaṭe khitte ghaṭopi bhijjati, udakampi nassati, evameva bhāvanāmayiddhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1077_7: ekavāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya pana sā nassatīti. Atha naṃ ‘bhāvanāmayiddhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1077_8: neva ekavāraṃ na dve vāre parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī’ti vatvā taṃ saññattiṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1077_9: pucchiṃsu – ‘bhāvanāmayiddhi kiṃ kusalā, akusalā, abyākatā? Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1077_10: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā? Savitakkasavicārā,
atk-abh01a0:1078_0: Imaṃ pana pañhaṃ yo jānāti so evaṃ vakkhati – ‘bhāvanāmayiddhi kusalā vā hoti, abyākatā
atk-abh01a0:1078_1: vā; adukkhamasukhavedanīyā eva, avitakkaavicārā eva, rūpāvacarā evā’ti. So vattabbo
atk-abh01a0:1078_2: – ‘pāṇātipātacetanā kusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī’ti? Jānanto vakkhati – ‘pāṇātipātacetanā
atk-abh01a0:1078_3: akusalā eva, dukkhavedanīyā eva, savitakkasavicārā eva kāmāvacarā evā’ti. ‘Evaṃ sante
atk-abh01a0:1078_4: tava pañho neva kusalattikena sameti, na vedanāttikena, na vitakkattikena, na bhūmantarenā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1079_0: ‘Kiṃ pana evaṃ mahantaṃ suttaṃ niratthaka’nti? ‘No niratthakaṃ; tvaṃ panassa atthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1079_1: na jānāsi. “Iddhimā cetovasippatto”ti ettha hi neva bhāvanāmayiddhi adhippetā, āthabbaṇiddhi
atk-abh01a0:1079_2: pana adhippetā. Sā hi ettha labbhamānā labbhati. Sā pana kāyavacīdvārāni muñcitvā
atk-abh01a0:1079_3: kātuṃ na sakkā. Āthabbaṇiddhikā hi sattāhaṃ aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1079_4: sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame divase susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1079_5: vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ parijappanti. Atha nesaṃ kammaṃ samijjhati. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1079_6: ayampi iddhi kāyavacīdvārāni muñcitvā kātuṃ na sakkāti. ‘Na kāyakammaṃ manodvāre
atk-abh01a0:1080_0: Hatthamuddāya pana musāvādādīni kathentassa kammaṃ vacīkammaṃ, dvāraṃ pana kāyadvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1080_1: hoti. Evaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammampi kāyadvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā
atk-abh01a0:1080_2: abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti, abbohārikā vā. Vacībhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1080_3: pana katvā musāvādādīni kathentassa kammampi vacīkammaṃ dvārampi vacīdvārameva. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1080_4: akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo
atk-abh01a0:1080_5: cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti abbohārikā vā. Ettakā ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1081: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ manodvārepi samuṭṭhātī’ti. So ‘tayo saṅgahe āruḷhaṃ suttaṃ āharāhī’ti vutto idaṃ uposathakkhandhakato suttaṃ āhari –
atk-abh01a0:1082: “Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyamāne saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya sampajānamusāvādassa hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1083_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā āha – ‘evaṃ āpattiṃ anāvikaronto tuṇhībhūtova aññaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1083_1: āpajjati, ettha kuto kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā? Manodvārasmiṃyeva pana
atk-abh01a0:1084_0: So vattabbo – ‘kiṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ udāhu nītattha’nti? ‘Nītatthameva mayhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1084_1: sutta’nti. So ‘mā evaṃ avaca, tulayissāmassa attha’nti vatvā evaṃ pucchitabbo – ‘sampajānamusāvāde
atk-abh01a0:1084_2: kiṃ hotī’ti? Jānanto ‘sampajānamusāvāde dukkaṭaṃ hotī’ti vakkhati. Tato vattabbo
atk-abh01a0:1084_3: ‘vinayassa dve mūlāni – kāyo ca vācā ca; sammāsambuddhena hi sabbāpattiyo imesuyeva
atk-abh01a0:1084_4: dvīsu dvāresu paññattā, manodvāre āpattipaññapanaṃ nāma natthi. Tvaṃ ativiya vinaye
atk-abh01a0:1084_5: pakataññū, yo satthārā apaññatte ṭhāne āpattiṃ paññapesi, sammāsambuddhaṃ abbhācikkhasi,
atk-abh01a0:1084_6: jinacakkaṃ paharasī’tiādivacanehi niggaṇhitvā uttari pañhaṃ pucchitabbo – ‘sampajānamusāvādo
atk-abh01a0:1084_7: kiriyato samuṭṭhāti udāhu akiriyato’ti? Jānanto ‘kiriyato’ti vakkhati. Tato vattabbo
atk-abh01a0:1084_8: – ‘anāvikaronto kataraṃ kiriyaṃ karotī’ti? Addhā hi kiriyaṃ apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjissati.
atk-abh01a0:1084_9: Tato imassa suttassa atthena saññāpetabbo. Ayañhettha attho – yvāyaṃ ‘sampajānamusāvādo
atk-abh01a0:1084_10: hotī’ti vutto, so āpattito kiṃ hoti? ‘Katarāpatti hotī’ti attho. ‘Dukkaṭāpatti hoti’.
atk-abh01a0:1084_11: Sā ca kho na musāvādalakkhaṇena, bhagavato pana vacanena vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:1089: Evaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ na manodvāre samuṭṭhātīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1090_0: Yadā pana abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā kāyaṅgaṃ copento hatthaggāhādīni karoti, byāpādasahagatena
atk-abh01a0:1090_3: hoti, dvāraṃ pana kāyadvāraṃ. Evaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ kāyadvāre samuṭṭhāti. Cetanā
atk-abh01a0:1091_0: Yadā pana abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā vācaṅgaṃ copento ‘aho vata yaṃ parassa, taṃ mamassā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1091_1: paravittūpakaraṇaṃ abhijjhāyati, byāpādasahagatena cetasā ‘ime sattā haññantu vā,
atk-abh01a0:1091_2: bajjhantu vā, ucchijjantu vā, mā vā ahesu’nti vadati, micchādiṭṭhisahagatena cetasā
atk-abh01a0:1091_3: ‘natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭha’ntiādīni vadati, tadā kammaṃ manokammaṃ hoti, dvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1091_4: pana vacīdvāraṃ. Evaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Cetanā panettha abbohārikā.
atk-abh01a0:1092_0: Yadā pana kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā raho nisinno abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhisahagatāni
atk-abh01a0:1092_1: cittāni uppādeti, tadā kammaṃ manokammaṃ, dvārampi manodvārameva. Evaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1092_2: manodvāre samuṭṭhāti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttakā dhammāpi manodvāreyeva
atk-abh01a0:1092_3: samuṭṭhahanti. Evaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ tīsupi dvāresu samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1093_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ‘tathā kusalāni kāyavacīmanokammānī’ti, tatrāyaṃ nayo – yadā hi kenaci
atk-abh01a0:1093_1: kāraṇena vattuṃ asakkonto ‘pāṇātipātā adinnādānā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviramāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1093_2: imāni sikkhāpadāni hatthamuddāya gaṇhāti, tadā kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ dvārampi kāyadvārameva.
atk-abh01a0:1093_3: Evaṃ kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kāyadvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi cittehi sahagatā anabhijjhādayo
atk-abh01a0:1094_0: Yadā pana tāneva sikkhāpadāni vacībhedaṃ katvā gaṇhāti, tadā kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, dvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1094_1: pana vacīdvāraṃ hoti. Evaṃ kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi cittehi
atk-abh01a0:1094_2: sahagatā anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā vā honti, abbohārikā vā.
atk-abh01a0:1095_0: Yadā pana tesu sikkhāpadesu diyyamānesu kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva ‘pāṇātipātā
atk-abh01a0:1095_1: adinnādānā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviramāmī’ti gaṇhāti, tadā kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, dvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1095_2: pana manodvāraṃ hoti. Evaṃ kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ manodvāre samuṭṭhāti. Tehi cittehi
atk-abh01a0:1095_3: sahagatā anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā vā honti, abbohārikā vā.
atk-abh01a0:1096_0: ‘Musāvādā veramaṇī’ādīni pana cattāri sikkhāpadāni vuttanayeneva kāyādīhi gaṇhantassa
atk-abh01a0:1096_1: kusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ tīsu dvāresu samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā
atk-abh01a0:1097_1: karontassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ hoti, dvāraṃ pana kāyadvāraṃ. Evaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1097_2: kāyadvāre samuṭṭhāti. Cetanā panettha abbohārikā. Anabhijjhāsahagatena cittena vācaṅgaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1097_3: copetvā ‘aho vata yaṃ parassa vittūpakaraṇaṃ na taṃ mamassā’ti anabhijjhāyato abyāpādasahagatena
atk-abh01a0:1097_4: cittena ‘sabbe sattā averā abyābajjhā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū’ti vadantassa
atk-abh01a0:1097_5: sammādiṭṭhisahagatena cittena ‘atthi dinna’ntiādīni udāharantassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1097_6: hoti, dvāraṃ pana vacīdvāraṃ. Evaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Cetanā
atk-abh01a0:1097_7: panettha abbohārikā. Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni pana acopetvā raho nisinnassa manasāva anabhijjhādisahagatāni
atk-abh01a0:1097_8: cittāni uppādentassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ, dvārampi manodvārameva. Evaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1097_9: manodvāre samuṭṭhāti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttakā dhammāpi manodvāreyeva samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:1098_0: Tattha āṇattisamuṭṭhitesu pāṇātipātaadinnādānesu kammampi kāyakammaṃ dvārampi kammavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:1098_1: kāyadvāranti vadanto kammaṃ rakkhati, dvāraṃ bhindati nāma. Hatthamuddāya samuṭṭhitesu
atk-abh01a0:1098_2: musāvādādīsu dvārampi kāyadvāraṃ, kammampi dvāravaseneva kāyakammanti vadanto dvāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1098_3: rakkhati kammaṃ bhindati nāma. Tasmā ‘kammaṃ rakkhāmī’ti dvāraṃ na bhinditabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1098_4: ‘dvāraṃ rakkhāmī’ti kammaṃ na bhinditabbaṃ. Yathāvutteneva pana nayena kammañca dvārañca
atk-abh01a0:1098_5: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ kathento hi neva kammaṃ na dvāraṃ bhindatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1100_0: Idāni ‘pañca viññāṇāni pañcaviññāṇadvārānī’tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1100_1: jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇanti imāni pañca viññāṇāni nāma. Cakkhuviññāṇadvāraṃ sota…
atk-abh01a0:1100_2: ghāna… jivhā… kāyaviññāṇadvāranti imāni pañca viññāṇadvārāni nāma. Imesaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1100_3: dvārānaṃ vasena uppannā cetanā neva kāyakammaṃ hoti, na vacīkammaṃ, manokammameva
atk-abh01a0:1100_4: hotīti veditabbā. Cakkhusamphasso sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya… manosamphassoti ime pana
atk-abh01a0:1100_5: cha samphassā nāma. Cakkhusamphassadvāraṃ sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya… manosamphassadvāranti
atk-abh01a0:1101_0: Cakkhuasaṃvaro sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāyaasaṃvaro vācāasaṃvaro manoasaṃvaroti
atk-abh01a0:1101_1: – ime aṭṭha asaṃvarā nāma. Te atthato ‘dussīlyaṃ muṭṭhassaccaṃ aññāṇaṃ akkhanti kosajja’nti
atk-abh01a0:1101_2: ime pañca dhammā honti. Tesu ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu
atk-abh01a0:1101_3: nuppajjati, javanakkhaṇeyeva uppajjati. Javane uppannopi pañcadvāre asaṃvaroti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1102_0: Cakkhuviññāṇasahajāto hi phasso cakkhusamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1102_1: cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma. Ettha pañcavidho asaṃvaro natthi. Sampaṭicchanasahajāto
atk-abh01a0:1102_2: phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1102_3: Etthāpi asaṃvaro natthi. Santīraṇavoṭṭhabbanesupi eseva nayo. Javanasahajāto pana
atk-abh01a0:1102_4: phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1102_5: Ettha asaṃvaro cakkhuasaṃvaro nāma hoti. Sotaghānajivhāpasādakāyadvāresupi eseva
atk-abh01a0:1102_6: nayo. Yadā pana rūpādīsu aññatarārammaṇaṃ manodvārikajavanaṃ vinā vacīdvārena suddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1102_7: kāyadvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso
atk-abh01a0:1102_8: manosamphasso nāma, cetanā kāyakammaṃ nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, copanassa
atk-abh01a0:1102_9: uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Ettha asaṃvaro copanakāyaasaṃvaro nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1102_10: Yadā tādisaṃyeva javanaṃ vinā kāyadvārena suddhaṃ vacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1102_11: uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā vacīkammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1102_12: nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, copanassa uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na
atk-abh01a0:1102_13: gacchati. Ettha asaṃvaro vācāasaṃvaro nāma. Yadā pana tādisaṃ javanacittaṃ vinā kāyavacīdvārehi
atk-abh01a0:1102_14: suddhaṃ manodvārameva hutvā uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso
atk-abh01a0:1102_15: nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma. Ettha asaṃvaro
atk-abh01a0:1102_16: manoasaṃvaro nāma. Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ asaṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhuasaṃvaradvāraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1102_17: sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāya… vācā… manoasaṃvaradvāranti imāni aṭṭha
atk-abh01a0:1103_0: Cakkhusaṃvaro sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāya… vācā… manosaṃvaroti ime
atk-abh01a0:1103_1: pana aṭṭha saṃvarā nāma. Te atthato ‘sīlaṃ sati ñāṇaṃ khanti vīriya’nti ime pañca
atk-abh01a0:1103_2: dhammā honti. Tesupi ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1103_3: Javanakkhaṇeyeva uppajjati. Javane uppannopi pañcadvāre saṃvaroti vuccati. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1103_4: sabbassāpi cakkhuviññāṇasahajāto hi phasso cakkhusamphassotiādinā asaṃvare vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1103_5: uppatti veditabbā. Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ saṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhusaṃvaradvāraṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1105: Pāṇātipāto, adinnādānaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro, musāvādo, pisuṇavācā, pharusavācā, samphappalāpo, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhīti ime pana dasa akusalakammapathā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1106_0: Tattha pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto nāma; pāṇavadho, pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti
atk-abh01a0:1106_1: cettha vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-abh01a0:1106_2: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. So guṇavirahitesu
atk-abh01a0:1106_3: tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1106_4: Payogamahantatāya. Payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe
atk-abh01a0:1106_5: appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca
atk-abh01a0:1107_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – pāṇo, pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti.
atk-abh01a0:1107_1: Cha payogā – sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti. Imasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1107_2: panatthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco hoti. Tasmā taṃ na vitthārayāma. Aññañca evarūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1107_3: atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_0: Adinnassa ādānaṃ ‘adinnādānaṃ’; parassaharaṇaṃ, theyyaṃ, corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1108_1: adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo
atk-abh01a0:1108_2: ca hoti. Tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-abh01a0:1108_3: theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_4: Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_5: Taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1109_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1109_1: upakkamo, tena haraṇanti. Cha payogā – sāhatthikādayova. Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro,
atk-abh01a0:1109_2: pasayhāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, parikappāvahāro, kusāvahāroti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1109_3: avahārānaṃ vasena pavattanti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1110_1: lāmakācāro. Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-abh01a0:1111_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma – purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā, piturakkhitā, mātāpiturakkhitā,
atk-abh01a0:1111_1: bhāturakkhitā, bhaginirakkhitā, ñātirakkhitā, gottarakkhitā, dhammarakkhitā, sārakkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1111_2: saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa; dhanakkītā, chandavāsinī, bhogavāsinī, paṭavāsinī,
atk-abh01a0:1111_3: odapattakinī, obhaṭacumbaṭā, dāsī ca bhariyā, kammakārī ca bhariyā, dhajāhaṭā, muhuttikāti
atk-abh01a0:1111_4: etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo. Itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1111_5: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1112_0: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne
atk-abh01a0:1112_1: mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanappayogo,
atk-abh01a0:1113_0: ‘Musā’ti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako vacīpayogo, kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena
atk-abh01a0:1113_1: panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo. Aparo nayo – ‘musā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1113_2: abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. ‘Vādo’ti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. Lakkhaṇato pana
atk-abh01a0:1113_3: atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-abh01a0:1113_4: So yamatthaṃ bhañjati tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Apica
atk-abh01a0:1113_6: Sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1113_7: vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena ‘ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī’ti pūraṇakathānayena
atk-abh01a0:1113_8: pavatto appasāvajjo. Adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-abh01a0:1114_0: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa
atk-abh01a0:1114_1: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo – sāhatthikova. So ca kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena
atk-abh01a0:1114_2: vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1114_3: jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhāpikacetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati. Yasmā pana
atk-abh01a0:1114_4: yathā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti, tathā imassa ‘imaṃ bhaṇāhī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1114_5: āṇāpentopi, paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi, ‘ayamattho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo’ti kuṭṭādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1114_6: likhitvā ṭhapentopi; tasmā ettha āṇattikanissaggiyathāvarāpi payogā yujjanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-abh01a0:1115_0: ‘Pisuṇavācā’tiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1115_1: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇavācā. Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1115_2: karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā, na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ ‘pharusavācā’.
atk-abh01a0:1115_3: Yena samphaṃ palapati, niratthakaṃ, so ‘samphappalāpo’. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi
atk-abh01a0:1115_4: pisuṇavācādināmameva labhati. Sā eva ca idha adhippetāti.
atk-abh01a0:1116_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-abh01a0:1116_1: cetanā pisuṇavācā nāma. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā.
atk-abh01a0:1117_0: Tassā cattāro sambhārā – ‘bhinditabbo paro’ iti ‘ime nānā bhavissa’nti vinā bhavissantīti
atk-abh01a0:1117_1: bhedapurekkhāratā vā, ‘iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko’ti piyakamyatā vā, tajjo
atk-abh01a0:1117_2: vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti. Pare pana abhinne kammapathabhedo natthi, bhinne eva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1118_1: Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1118_2: gacchati. Taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī ‘caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū’ti akkosi.
atk-abh01a0:1118_3: Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako ‘yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1118_4: mā hotu, yaṃ cittena cintesi taṃ hotū’ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva baddhā
atk-abh01a0:1118_5: viya aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti. Mātāpitaro
atk-abh01a0:1118_6: hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti – ‘corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū’ti, uppalapattampi
atk-abh01a0:1118_7: ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti
atk-abh01a0:1118_8: – ‘kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne’ti; atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1118_9: icchanti. Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi
atk-abh01a0:1118_10: na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa ‘imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā’ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1118_11: Cittapharusatāya panesā pharusavācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā tassa appaguṇatāya
atk-abh01a0:1118_12: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro, kupitacittaṃ, akkosananti.
atk-abh01a0:1119_1: appasāvajjo. Āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā,
atk-abh01a0:1119_2: tathārūpīkathākathanañcāti. Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1120_0: Abhijjhāyatīti ‘abhijjhā’. Parabhaṇḍābhimukhī hutvā tanninnatāya pavattatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1120_1: Sā ‘aho tava idaṃ mamassā’ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā. Adinnādānaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:1120_2: appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā – parabhaṇḍaṃ, attano pariṇāmanañcāti.
atk-abh01a0:1120_3: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva na ‘aho vata
atk-abh01a0:1121_0: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti ‘byāpādo’. So paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo. Pharusavācā
atk-abh01a0:1121_1: viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā – parasatto ca, tassa ca vināsacintāti.
atk-abh01a0:1121_2: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva ‘aho vatāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1121_3: ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā’ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cintesi.
atk-abh01a0:1122_1: nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. Samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Apica
atk-abh01a0:1122_2: aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. Tassā dve sambhārā – vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā,
atk-abh01a0:1122_3: yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti tathābhāvena tassupaṭṭhānanti. Tattha natthikāhetukaakiriyadiṭṭhīhi
atk-abh01a0:1123: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlato cāti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1124: Tattha ‘dhammato’ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti, abhijjhādayo tayo cetanāsampayuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1125_0: ‘Koṭṭhāsato’ti paṭipāṭiyā satta, micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti;
atk-abh01a0:1125_1: no mūlāni. Abhijjhābyāpādā kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca. Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā ‘lobho
atk-abh01a0:1126_1: sattārammaṇaṃ vā hoti saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā. Micchācāro phoṭṭhabbavasena saṅkhārārammaṇo
atk-abh01a0:1126_2: hoti; sattārammaṇotipi eke. Musāvādo sattārammaṇo vā, saṅkhārārammaṇo vā. Tathā pisuṇavācā.
atk-abh01a0:1126_4: vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā. Tathā abhijjhā. Byāpādo sattārammaṇova. Micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavasena saṅkhārārammaṇāva.
atk-abh01a0:1127_0: ‘Vedanāto’ti pāṇātipāto dukkhavedano hoti. Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi
atk-abh01a0:1127_1: ‘gacchatha naṃ ghātethā’ti vadanti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana nesaṃ dukkhasampayuttāva
atk-abh01a0:1127_2: hoti. Adinnādānaṃ tivedanaṃ. Tañhi parabhaṇḍaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa gaṇhato sukhavedanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1127_3: hoti, bhītatasitassa gaṇhato dukkhavedanaṃ. Tathā vipākanissandaphalāni paccavekkhantassa.
atk-abh01a0:1127_4: Gahaṇakāle majjhattabhāve ṭhitassa pana gaṇhato adukkhamasukhavedanaṃ hotīti. Micchācāro
atk-abh01a0:1127_5: sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedano. Sanniṭṭhāpakacitte pana majjhattavedano na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1127_6: Musāvādo adinnādāne vuttanayeneva tivedano; tathā pisuṇavācā. Pharusavācā dukkhavedanā.
atk-abh01a0:1127_7: Samphappalāpo tivedano. Paresu hi sādhukāraṃ dentesu celukkhepādīni khipantesu haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa
atk-abh01a0:1127_8: sītāharaṇabhāratayuddhādīni kathanakāle so sukhavedano hoti. Paṭhamaṃ dinnavetanena
atk-abh01a0:1127_9: ekena pacchā āgantvā ‘ādito paṭṭhāya kathehī’ti vutte ‘ananusandhikaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1127_10: kathessāmi nu kho no’ti domanassitassa kathanakāle dukkhavedano hoti, majjhattassa
atk-abh01a0:1127_11: kathayato adukkhamasukhavedano hoti. Abhijjhā sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedanā; tathā
atk-abh01a0:1128_0: ‘Mūlato’ti pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako hoti. Adinnādānaṃ dosamohavasena vā
atk-abh01a0:1128_1: lobhamohavasena vā. Micchācāro lobhamohavasena. Musāvādo dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena
atk-abh01a0:1128_2: vā; tathā pisuṇavācā samphappalāpo ca. Pharusavācā dosamohavasena. Abhijjhā mohavasena
atk-abh01a0:1128_3: ekamūlā; tathā byāpādo. Micchādiṭṭhi lobhamohavasena dvimūlāti.
atk-abh01a0:1131_0: Pāṇātipātādīhi pana viratiyo anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyo cāti ime dasa kusalakammapathā
atk-abh01a0:1131_1: nāma. Tattha pāṇātipātādayo vuttatthā eva. Pāṇātipātādīhi etāya viramanti, sayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1131_2: vā viramati, viramaṇamattameva vā etanti virati. Yā pāṇātipātā viramantassa “yā tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1131_3: samaye pāṇātipātā ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttā kusalacittasampayuttā virati, sā pabhedato
atk-abh01a0:1132_1: amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ kātu’nti sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati
atk-abh01a0:1132_2: ‘sampattaviratī’ti veditabbā – sīhaḷadīpe cakkanaupāsakassa viya. Tassa kira daharakāleyeva
atk-abh01a0:1132_3: mātuyā rogo uppajji. Vejjena ca ‘allasasamaṃsaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vuttaṃ. Tato cakkanassa
atk-abh01a0:1132_4: bhātā ‘gaccha, tāta, khettaṃ āhiṇḍāhī’ti cakkanaṃ pesesi. So tattha gato. Tasmiñca
atk-abh01a0:1132_5: samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti. So taṃ disvāva vegena dhāvanto
atk-abh01a0:1132_6: valliyā baddho ‘kiri kirī’ti saddamakāsi. Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:1132_7: cintesi – ‘mātu bhesajjaṃ karomī’ti. Puna cintesi – ‘na metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ mātu
atk-abh01a0:1132_8: jīvitakāraṇā paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya’nti. Atha naṃ ‘gaccha, araññe sasehi saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1132_9: tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā’ti muñci. Bhātarā ca ‘kiṃ tāta saso laddho’ti pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ
