atk-abh01a0:1132_10: ācikkhi. Tato naṃ bhātā paribhāsi. So mātusantikaṃ gantvā ‘yato ahaṃ jāto nābhijānāmi
atk-abh01a0:1132_11: sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropetā’ti saccaṃ vatvā aṭṭhāsi. Tāvadevassa mātā arogā ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:1133_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttariñca attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā
atk-abh01a0:1133_1: vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati ‘samādānaviratī’ti veditabbā. Uttaravaḍḍhamānapabbatavāsīupāsakassa
atk-abh01a0:1133_2: viya. So kira ambariyavihāravāsino piṅgalabuddharakkhitattherassa santike sikkhāpadāni
atk-abh01a0:1133_3: gahetvā khettaṃ kasati. Athassa goṇo naṭṭho. So taṃ gavesanto uttaravaḍḍhamānapabbataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1133_4: āruhi. Tatra naṃ mahāsappo aggahesi. So cintesi – ‘imāyassa tikhiṇavāsiyā sīsaṃ chindāmī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1133_5: Puna cintesi – ‘na metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadāni
atk-abh01a0:1133_6: gahetvā bhindeyya’nti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ cintetvā ‘jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, na sikkhāpada’nti
atk-abh01a0:1133_7: aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi. Tāvadeva naṃ mahāvāḷo muñcitvā agamāsīti.
atk-abh01a0:1134: Ariyamaggasampayuttā pana virati ‘samucchedaviratī’ti veditabbā, yassā uppattito pabhuti ‘pāṇaṃ ghātessāmī’ti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi nuppajjatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1135: Idāni yathā akusalānaṃ evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1136: Tattha ‘dhammato’ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti, viratiyopi; ante tayo cetanāsampayuttāva.
atk-abh01a0:1137_0: ‘Koṭṭhāsato’ti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā eva, no mūlāni. Ante tayo kammapathā ceva
atk-abh01a0:1137_1: mūlāni ca. Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā ‘alobho kusalamūlaṃ’ hoti. Abyāpādo ‘adoso kusalamūlaṃ’,
atk-abh01a0:1138_1: hi veramaṇī nāma hoti. Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati, evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1138_2: jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1139: ‘Vedanāto’ti sabbe sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā. Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1140_0: ‘Mūlato’ti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena
atk-abh01a0:1140_1: timūlā honti; ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa dvimūlā. Anabhijjhā ñāṇasampayuttacittena
atk-abh01a0:1140_2: viramantassa dvimūlā hoti; ñāṇavippayuttacittena ekamūlā. Alobho pana attanāva attano
atk-abh01a0:1140_3: mūlaṃ na hoti. Abyāpādepi eseva nayo. Sammādiṭṭhi alobhādosavasena dvimūlāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1142_0: Idāni imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammapathasaṃsandanaṃ nāma veditabbaṃ. Pañcaphassadvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1142_1: hi uppanno asaṃvaro akusalaṃ manokammameva hoti. Manophassadvāravasena uppanno tīṇipi
atk-abh01a0:1142_2: kammāni honti – so hi kāyadvāre copanappatto akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti, vacīdvāre
atk-abh01a0:1142_3: akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ, ubhayattha copanaṃ appatto akusalaṃ manokammaṃ. Pañcaasaṃvaradvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1142_4: uppannopi akusalaṃ manokammameva hoti. Copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāravasena uppanno akusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1142_5: kāyakammameva hoti, vācāasaṃvaradvāravasena uppanno akusalaṃ vacīkammameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1142_6: manoasaṃvaradvāravasena uppanno akusalaṃ manokammameva hoti. Tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1142_7: akusalaṃ kāyakammameva hoti, catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1143_0: Pañcaphassadvāravasena uppanno saṃvaropi kusalaṃ manokammameva hoti. Manophassadvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1143_1: uppanno pana ayampi, asaṃvaro viya, tīṇipi kammāni honti. Pañcasaṃvaradvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1143_2: uppannopi kusalaṃ manokammameva hoti, copanakāyasaṃvaradvāravasena uppanno kusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1143_3: kāyakammameva hoti, vācāsaṃvaradvāravasena uppanno kusalaṃ vacīkammameva hoti, manosaṃvaradvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1143_4: uppanno kusalaṃ manokammameva hoti. Tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kusalaṃ kāyakammameva
atk-abh01a0:1143_5: hoti, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ kusalaṃ vacīkammameva hoti, tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1144_0: Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ pañcaphassadvāravasena nuppajjati; manophassadvāravaseneva uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1144_1: Tathā akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Akusalaṃ manokammaṃ pana chaphassadvāravasena uppajjati;
atk-abh01a0:1144_2: taṃ kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ pattaṃ akusalaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ hoti, copanaṃ appattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1144_3: akusalaṃ manokammameva. Yathā ca pañcaphassadvāravasena, evaṃ pañcaasaṃvaradvāravasenapi
atk-abh01a0:1144_4: akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ nuppajjati, copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāravasena pana vācāasaṃvaradvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1144_5: ca uppajjati; manoasaṃvaradvāravasena nuppajjati. Akusalaṃ vacīkammampi pañcaasaṃvaradvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1144_7: nuppajjati. Akusalaṃ manokammaṃ aṭṭhaasaṃvaradvāravasenapi uppajjateva. Kusalakāyakammādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1145_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā akusalakāyakammavacīkammāni manoasaṃvaradvāravasena nuppajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1145_1: na tathā etāni. Etāni pana kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopetvā sikkhāpadāni gaṇhantassa manosaṃvaradvārepi
atk-abh01a0:1145_2: uppajjanti eva. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ tividhakammadvāravasena uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1145_4: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā’ti iminā pana nayena chaphassadvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1145_7: idampi cittaṃ tividhakammadvāravasena vā uppannaṃ hotu, chaphassadvāravasena vā,
atk-abh01a0:1145_8: aṭṭhasaṃvaradvāravasena vā dasakusalakammapathavasena vā. “Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1145_9: uppannaṃ hoti…pe… rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā”ti vutte sabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1147_0: Yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhāti ettha ayaṃ yojanā – heṭṭhā vuttesu rūpārammaṇādīsu rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_1: vā ārabbha, ārammaṇaṃ katvāti attho. Saddārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:1147_2: uppannaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā etassa cittassa etesu ārammaṇesu yaṃkiñci ekameva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_3: anuññātasadisaṃ hoti. Idañca ekasmiṃ samaye ekassa vā puggalassa rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:1147_4: uppannaṃ puna aññasmiṃ samaye aññassa vā puggalassa saddādīsupi aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_5: ārabbha uppajjati eva. Evaṃ uppajjamānassa cassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭhamaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_6: ārabbha pavatti hoti, pacchā saddārammaṇanti ayampi kamo natthi. Rūpādīsu cāpi paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_7: nīlārammaṇaṃ pacchā pītārammaṇanti ayampi niyamo natthi. Iti imaṃ sabbārammaṇatañceva,
atk-abh01a0:1147_8: kamābhāvañca, kamābhāvepi ca nīlapītādīsu niyamābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1147_9: āha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imesu rūpādīsu na yaṃkiñci ekameva, atha kho yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha
atk-abh01a0:1147_10: uppannaṃ hoti. Evaṃ uppajjamānampi ca ‘paṭhamaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ pacchā saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_11: ārabbhā’ti evampi anuppajjitvā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha uppannaṃ hoti; ‘paṭilomato vā
atk-abh01a0:1147_12: anulomato vā, ekantarikadvantarikādinayena vā, rūpārammaṇādīsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1147_13: katvā uppannaṃ hotī’ti attho. Rūpārammaṇesupi ca ‘paṭhamaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ pacchā pītārammaṇa’nti
atk-abh01a0:1147_14: imināpi niyamena anuppajjitvā, yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha ‘nīlapītakādīsu rūpārammaṇesu
atk-abh01a0:1147_15: yaṃ vā taṃ vā rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ hotī’ti attho. Saddārammaṇādīsupi eseva
atk-abh01a0:1148_0: Ayaṃ pana aparā – rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti rūpārammaṇaṃ…pe… dhammo ārammaṇaṃ etassāti
atk-abh01a0:1148_1: dhammārammaṇaṃ. Iti rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti
atk-abh01a0:1148_2: vatvā puna ‘yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā’ti āha. Tassattho – etesu rūpādīsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1148_3: yaṃ vā taṃ vā pana ārabbha uppannaṃ hotīti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yevāpanake abhinavaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1148_4: natthi, heṭṭhā gahitameva gahita’nti vatvā ‘rūpaṃ vā ārabbha…pe… dhammaṃ vā ārabbha,
atk-abh01a0:1148_5: idaṃ vā idaṃ vā ārabbhāti kathetuṃ idaṃ vutta’nti ettakameva āgataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1151_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti idaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa samayassa niyamato paṭiniddesavacanaṃ. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1151_1: ‘yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva samaye phasso
atk-abh01a0:1151_2: hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī’ti ayamattho veditabbo. Tattha yatheva cittaṃ evaṃ phassādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:1151_3: phasso hoti. Kiṃ hoti? ‘Kāmāvacaro hoti, kusalo hoti, uppanno hoti, somanassasahagato
atk-abh01a0:1151_4: hotī’tiādinā nayena labbhamānapadavasena yojanā kātabbā. Vedanāyañhi ‘somanassasahagatā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1151_5: paññindriye ca ‘ñāṇasampayutta’nti na labbhati, tasmā ‘labbhamānapadavasenā’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1151_6: Idaṃ aṭṭhakathāmuttakaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ; na panetaṃ sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1152_0: Kasmā panettha phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti? Cittassa paṭhamābhinipātattā. Ārammaṇasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1152_1: cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto hutvā phasso ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno uppajjati, tasmā paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1152_2: vutto. Phassena pana phusitvā vedanāya vedayati, saññāya sañjānāti, cetanāya ceteti.
atk-abh01a0:1152_3: Tena vuttaṃ – “phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti phuṭṭho cetetī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1153_0: Apica, ayaṃ phasso nāma yathā pāsādaṃ patvā thambho nāma sesadabbasambhārānaṃ balavapaccayo,
atk-abh01a0:1153_2: patiṭṭhitā, evameva sahajātasampayuttadhammānaṃ balavapaccayo hoti. Thambhasadiso
atk-abh01a0:1153_3: hi esa. Avasesā dabbasambhārasadisāti. Tasmāpi paṭhamaṃ vutto. Idaṃ pana akāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1153_4: Ekacittasmiñhi uppannadhammānaṃ ‘ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppanno ayaṃ pacchā’ti idaṃ vattuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1153_5: na labbhā. Balavapaccayabhāvepi phassassa kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Desanāvāreneva pana
atk-abh01a0:1153_6: phasso paṭhamaṃ vutto. Vedanā hoti phasso hoti, saññā hoti phasso hoti, cetanā hoti
atk-abh01a0:1153_7: phasso hoti, cittaṃ hoti phasso hoti, vedanā hoti saññā hoti, cetanā hoti vitakko
atk-abh01a0:1153_8: hotīti āharitumpi hi vaṭṭeyya. Desanāvārena pana phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1153_9: Yathā cettha evaṃ sesadhammesupi pubbāparakkamo nāma na pariyesitabbo. Vacanatthalakkhaṇarasādīhi
atk-abh01a0:1154: Seyyathidaṃ – phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanaraso, sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno, āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1155_0: Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattatīti phusanalakkhaṇo.
atk-abh01a0:1155_1: Ekadesena ca anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ, cittaṃ ārammaṇañca
atk-abh01a0:1155_2: saṅghaṭṭetīti saṅghaṭṭanaraso. Vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato vā uppannattā sampattiatthenapi
atk-abh01a0:1155_4: hi nophusanalakkhaṇo nāma natthi. Saṅghaṭṭanaraso pana pañcadvārikova hoti. Pañcadvārikassa
atk-abh01a0:1155_5: hi phusanalakkhaṇotipi saṅghaṭṭanarasotipi nāmaṃ; manodvārikassa phusanalakkhaṇotveva
atk-abh01a0:1156_0: Idañca vatvā idaṃ suttaṃ ābhataṃ – “yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṃ, tesu yathā
atk-abh01a0:1156_1: eko meṇḍo evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā dutiyo meṇḍo evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ; yathā
atk-abh01a0:1156_2: tesaṃ sannipāto evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo”. Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo ca phasso, saṅghaṭṭanaraso
atk-abh01a0:1156_3: ca. “Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṃ…pe… dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṃ, yathā eko pāṇi
atk-abh01a0:1156_4: evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā dutiyo pāṇi evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā tesaṃ sannipāto
atk-abh01a0:1156_5: evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo ca phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso cā”ti vitthāro.
atk-abh01a0:1157_0: Yathā vā “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīni cakkhuādināmena vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:1157_1: evamidhāpi tāni cakkhuādināmena vuttānīti veditabbāni. Tasmā ‘evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabba’ntiādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1157_2: evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sante cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato
atk-abh01a0:1157_3: imasmimpi sutte kiccaṭṭheneva rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasoti siddho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1158_0: Tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa pana attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1158_1: Ayañhi tattha tattha “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti evaṃ kāraṇassa vasena paveditoti.
atk-abh01a0:1158_2: Imassa ca suttapadassa tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phassoti ayamattho; na saṅgatimattameva phassoti.
atk-abh01a0:1159_0: Evaṃ paveditattā pana tenevākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti sannipātapaccupaṭṭhānoti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1159_1: Phalaṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānenesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno nāma hoti. Vedanañhesa paccupaṭṭhāpeti
atk-abh01a0:1159_2: uppādetīti attho. Uppādayamāno ca yathā bahiddhā uṇhapaccayāpi lākhāsaṅkhātadhātunissitā
atk-abh01a0:1159_3: usmā attano nissaye mudubhāvakārī hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi bahiddhā vītaccitaṅgārasaṅkhāte
atk-abh01a0:1159_4: uṇhabhāve, evaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅkhātaaññapaccayopi samāno, cittanissitattā attano
atk-abh01a0:1159_5: nissayabhūte citte eva esa vedanuppādako hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi vatthumhi
atk-abh01a0:1159_6: ārammaṇe vāti veditabbo. Tajjāsamannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena
atk-abh01a0:1160: Vedayatīti vedanā. Sā vedayitalakkhaṇā, anubhavanarasā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasā vā, cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānā, passaddhipadaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:1161_0: ‘Catubhūmikavedanā hi novedayitalakkhaṇā nāma natthi. Anubhavanarasatā pana sukhavedanāyameva
atk-abh01a0:1161_1: labbhatī’ti vatvā puna taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ‘sukhavedanā vā hotu, dukkhavedanā
atk-abh01a0:1161_2: vā, adukkhamasukhavedanā vā, sabbā anubhavanarasā’ti vatvā ayamattho dīpito – ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1161_3: patvā sesasampayuttadhammā ekadesamattakameva anubhavanti. Phassassa hi phusanamattakameva
atk-abh01a0:1161_4: hoti, saññāya sañjānanamattakameva, cetanāya cetanāmattakameva, viññāṇassa vijānanamattakameva.
atk-abh01a0:1161_5: Ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya vissavitāya sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati.
atk-abh01a0:1162_0: Rājā viya hi vedanā, sūdo viya sesadhammā. Yathā sūdo nānārasabhojanaṃ sampādetvā
atk-abh01a0:1162_1: peḷāya pakkhipitvā lañchanaṃ datvā rañño santike otāretvā lañchanaṃ bhinditvā peḷaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1162_2: vivaritvā sabbasūpabyañjanehi aggaggaṃ ādāya bhājane pakkhipitvā sadosaniddosabhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1162_3: ajjhoharati, tato rañño nānaggarasabhojanaṃ upanāmeti. Rājā issaravatāya vissavitāya
atk-abh01a0:1162_4: sāmī hutvā icchiticchitaṃ bhuñjati. Tattha hi sūdassa bhattavīmaṃsanamattamiva avasesadhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1162_5: ārammaṇarasassa ekadesānubhavanaṃ. Yathā hi sūdo bhattekadesamattameva vīmaṃsati
atk-abh01a0:1162_6: evaṃ sesadhammāpi ārammaṇarasekadesameva anubhavanti. Yathā pana rājā issaravatāya
atk-abh01a0:1162_7: vissavitāya sāmī hutvā yadicchakaṃ bhuñjati, evaṃ vedanāpi issaravatāya vissavitāya
atk-abh01a0:1162_8: sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati. Tasmā anubhavanarasāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1163_0: Dutiye atthavikappe ayaṃ idha adhippetā vedanā yathā vā tathā vā ārammaṇassa iṭṭhākārameva
atk-abh01a0:1163_1: sambhuñjatīti iṭṭhākārasambhogarasāti vuttā. Cetasikaassādato panesā attano sabhāveneva
atk-abh01a0:1163_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttā. Yasmā pana “passaddhikāyo
atk-abh01a0:1164_0: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā paccābhiññāṇarasā.
atk-abh01a0:1164_1: Catubhūmikasaññā hi nosañjānanalakkhaṇā nāma natthi. Sabbā sañjānanalakkhaṇāva. Yā
atk-abh01a0:1164_2: panettha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1165_0: Tassā, vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena taṃ paccābhijānanakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1165_1: purisassa kāḷatilakādiabhiññāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena asuko nāma esoti
atk-abh01a0:1165_2: tassa paccābhijānanakāle, rañño piḷandhanagopakabhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piḷandhane
atk-abh01a0:1165_3: nāmapaṇṇakaṃ bandhitvā ‘asukaṃ piḷandhanaṃ nāma āharā’ti vutte dīpaṃ jāletvā ratanagabbhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1165_4: pavisitvā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā tassa tasseva piḷandhanassa āharaṇakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1166_0: Aparo nayo – sabbasaṅgāhikavasena hi sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā. Punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā,
atk-abh01a0:1166_2: hatthidassakaandhā viya. Ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā,
atk-abh01a0:1166_4: uppannasaññā viya. Yā panettha ñāṇasampayuttā hoti sā saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati.
atk-abh01a0:1167_0: Cetayatīti cetanā saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1167_1: Sā cetayitalakkhaṇā, cetanābhāvalakkhaṇāti attho. Āyūhanarasā. Catubhūmikacetanā
atk-abh01a0:1167_2: hi nocetayitalakkhaṇā nāma natthi. Sabbā cetayitalakkhaṇāva. Āyūhanarasatā pana kusalākusalesu
atk-abh01a0:1167_3: eva hoti. Kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṭṭhānañhi patvā sesasampayuttadhammānaṃ ekadesamattakameva
atk-abh01a0:1167_4: kiccaṃ hoti. Cetanā pana atirekaussāhā atirekavāyāmā, diguṇussāhā diguṇavāyāmā. Tenāhu
atk-abh01a0:1167_5: porāṇā – “thāvariyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā ca panesā cetanā”ti. Thāvariyoti khettasāmī vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1167_6: Yathā khettasāmī puriso pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurise gahetvā ‘lāyissāmī’ti ekato khettaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1167_7: otarati. Tassa atireko ussāho atireko vāyāmo, diguṇo ussāho diguṇo vāyāmo hoti, ‘nirantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1167_8: gaṇhathā’tiādīni vadati, sīmaṃ ācikkhati, tesaṃ surābhattagandhamālādīni jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1167_9: maggaṃ samakaṃ harati. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Khettasāmipuriso viya hi cetanā.
atk-abh01a0:1167_10: Pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurisā viya cittaṅgavasena uppannā pañcapaṇṇāsa kusalā dhammā. Khettasāmipurisassa
atk-abh01a0:1167_12: diguṇussāho diguṇavāyāmo hoti. Evamassā āyūhanarasatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1168_0: Sā panesā saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Saṃvidahamānā hi ayaṃ upaṭṭhāti, sakiccaparakiccasādhakā,
atk-abh01a0:1168_1: jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakīādayo viya. Yathā hi jeṭṭhasisso upajjhāyaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1168_2: disvā sayaṃ adhīyamāno itarepi dārake attano attano ajjhayanakamme pavattayati, tasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1168_3: adhīyituṃ āraddhe tepi adhīyanti, tadanuvattitāya. Yathā ca mahāvaḍḍhakī sayaṃ tacchanto
atk-abh01a0:1168_4: itarepi tacchake attano attano tacchanakamme pavattayati, tasmiñhi tacchituṃ āraddhe
atk-abh01a0:1168_5: tepi tacchanti, tadanuvattitāya. Yathā ca yodhanāyako sayaṃ yujjhamāno itarepi yodhe
atk-abh01a0:1168_6: sampahāravuttiyaṃ pavattayati, tasmiñhi yujjhituṃ āraddhe tepi anivattamānā yujjhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1168_7: tadanuvattitāya. Evamesāpi attano kiccena ārammaṇe pavattamānā aññepi sampayuttadhamme
atk-abh01a0:1168_8: attano attano kiriyāya pavatteti. Tassā hi attano kiccaṃ āraddhāya, taṃsampayuttāpi
atk-abh01a0:1168_10: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussāhanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1169_0: ‘Ārammaṇaṃ cintetī’ti cittanti nayena cittassa vacanattho vutto eva. Lakkhaṇādito
atk-abh01a0:1169_1: pana vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ, pubbaṅgamarasaṃ, sandahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1169_2: Catubhūmakacittañhi novijānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Sabbaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇameva.
atk-abh01a0:1169_3: Dvāraṃ pana patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ hoti. Cakkhunā
atk-abh01a0:1169_4: hi diṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ citteneva vijānāti…pe… manena viññātaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ citteneva
atk-abh01a0:1169_5: vijānāti. Yathā hi nagaraguttiko nāma nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā ‘ayaṃ nevāsiko
atk-abh01a0:1169_6: ayaṃ āgantuko’ti āgatāgataṃ janaṃ upadhāreti vavatthapeti – evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1169_7: Vuttampi cetaṃ mahātherena – “yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko nāma majjhe nagarassa
atk-abh01a0:1169_8: siṅghāṭake nisinno puratthimato disato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ passeyya… pacchimato…
atk-abh01a0:1169_9: dakkhiṇato… uttarato disato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ passeyya, evameva kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1169_10: yaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti, yaṃ sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena
atk-abh01a0:1169_11: gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati, manasā dhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1169_12: vijānāti, taṃ viññāṇena vijānātī”ti. Evaṃ dvāraṃ patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittameva
atk-abh01a0:1170_0: Tadetaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ uppajjamānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ nirantaraṃ katvā sandahanameva
atk-abh01a0:1170_1: upaṭṭhātīti sandahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pañcavokārabhave panassa niyamato nāmarūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1170_2: catuvokārabhave nāmameva padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmā nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1171_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ cittaṃ purimaniddiṭṭhacittena saddhiṃ ekameva udāhu aññanti? Ekameva.
atk-abh01a0:1171_1: Atha kasmā purimaniddiṭṭhaṃ puna vuttanti? Avicāritaṃ etaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha
atk-abh01a0:1171_2: yutti – yathā hi rūpādīni upādāya paññattā sūriyādayo na atthato rūpādīhi aññe honti,
atk-abh01a0:1171_3: teneva yasmiṃ samaye sūriyo udeti tasmiṃ samaye tassa tejasaṅkhātaṃ rūpampīti. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1171_4: vuccamānepi na rūpādīhi añño sūriyo nāma atthi. Na tathā cittaṃ; phassādayo dhamme
atk-abh01a0:1171_5: upādāya paññāpiyati; atthato panetaṃ tehi aññameva. Tena ‘yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1171_6: hoti ekaṃseneva tasmiṃ samaye phassādīhi atthato aññameva taṃ hotī’ti imassatthassa
atk-abh01a0:1172_0: Yathā ca “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti…pe… pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1172_1: phasso hoti vedanā hotī”tiādīsu pana bhāventena vavatthāpite samaye yo bhāveti na
atk-abh01a0:1172_2: so atthato uppajjati nāma, teneva tattha yathā “phasso hoti vedanā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1172_3: na evaṃ “yo bhāveti so hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1172_4: uppannaṃ hotī”tiādīsu pana cittena vavatthāpite samaye samayavavatthāpitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1172_5: na tathā atthato nuppajjati. Yatheva pana tadā ‘phasso hoti vedanā hoti’, tathā ‘cittampi
atk-abh01a0:1172_6: hotī’ti imassapi atthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ puna vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ panettha
atk-abh01a0:1172_7: sanniṭṭhānaṃ – uddesavāre saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ niddesavāre ca vibhajanatthaṃ purimena
atk-abh01a0:1172_8: hi ‘citta’-saddena kevalaṃ samayo vavatthāpito. Tasmiṃ pana cittena vavatthāpitasamaye
atk-abh01a0:1172_9: ye dhammā honti tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cittañcāpi tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1172_10: samaye hotiyeva. Tasmā tassāpi saṅgaṇhanatthametaṃ puna vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca ṭhāne etasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1172_11: avuccamāne “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye citta”nti na sakkā bhaveyya niddesavāre vibhajituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_12: Evamassa vibhajanaṃyeva parihāyetha. Tasmā tassa niddesavāre vibhajanatthampi etañca
atk-abh01a0:1173_0: Yasmā vā “uppannaṃ hotī”ti ettha cittaṃ uppannanti etaṃ desanāsīsameva, ‘na pana
atk-abh01a0:1173_1: cittaṃ ekameva uppajjatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāritaṃ, tasmā cittaṃ “uppanna”nti etthāpi
atk-abh01a0:1173_2: cittamattameva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva cittaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1173_3: tattha saṅkhepato sabbepi cittacetasikadhamme gahetvā idha sarūpena pabhedato dassetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1173_4: “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Iti phassādayo viya cittampi vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1176_0: Vitakketīti vitakko; vitakkanaṃ vā vitakko; ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1176_1: cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo. So hi ārammaṇe cittaṃ āropeti. Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1176_2: ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1176_3: ārohati. Tasmā so ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇoti vutto. Nāgasenatthero
atk-abh01a0:1176_4: panāha – ākoṭanalakkhaṇo vitakko. “Yathā, mahārāja, bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati
atk-abh01a0:1176_5: anusaddāyati, evameva kho, mahārāja, yathā ākoṭanā evaṃ vitakko daṭṭhabbo. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:1176_6: pacchā anuravanā anusaddāyanā evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo”ti. Svāyaṃ āhananapariyāhananaraso.
atk-abh01a0:1176_7: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1177_0: Ārammaṇe tena cittaṃ vicaratīti vicāro; vicaraṇaṃ vā vicāro. Anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1177_1: hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo. Tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso. Cittassa anuppabandhapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1177_2: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci aviyoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇṭābhighāto
atk-abh01a0:1177_3: viya abhiniropanaṭṭhena ca cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko. Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1177_4: ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko, paṭhamuppattikāle
atk-abh01a0:1177_5: paripphandabhūto cittassa. Ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya. Padumābhimukhapāto
atk-abh01a0:1177_6: viya ca gandhānubaddhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1177_7: cittassa, ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya, paribbhamanaṃ viya ca
atk-abh01a0:1178_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe
atk-abh01a0:1178_1: sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko.
atk-abh01a0:1178_2: So hi ekaggo hutvā appeti vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya.
atk-abh01a0:1178_3: Anumajjabhāvena pavatto vicāro. So hi ārammaṇaṃ anumajjatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ anuppabandhanena
atk-abh01a0:1178_4: pavattiyaṃ ativiya yujjati. So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1178_5: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
atk-abh01a0:1178_6: parimajjantassa daḷhaggahaṇahattho viya vitakko, parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:1178_7: kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho
atk-abh01a0:1178_8: viya vitakko, ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro. Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa
atk-abh01a0:1178_9: majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko, bahiparibbhamanakaṇṭako
atk-abh01a0:1179_0: Piṇayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā. Kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā. Odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:1179_1: Sā panesā khuddikāpīti, khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti, ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1180_0: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti khaṇe khaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1180_1: vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti, samuddatīraṃ vīci viya, kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1180_2: bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti, kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā.
atk-abh01a0:1180_3: Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā
atk-abh01a0:1180_4: candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho hutvā ‘imāya vata velāya catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1180_5: vandantī’ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ ubbegaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale
atk-abh01a0:1180_6: pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_0: Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi balavabuddhārammaṇāya
atk-abh01a0:1181_1: ubbegāya pītiyā ākāse laṅghesi. Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammasavanatthāya vihāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_2: gacchantā ‘amma, tvaṃ garubhārā, akāle vicarituṃ na sakkosi, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_3: katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā’ti agamaṃsu. Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī
atk-abh01a0:1181_4: ghare ohīyitvā gharadvāre ṭhatvā candālokena girikaṇḍake ākāsacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokentī
atk-abh01a0:1181_5: cetiyassa dīpapūjaṃ addasa. Catasso ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_6: karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi. Athassā ‘dhaññā vatime manussā
atk-abh01a0:1181_7: ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcarituṃ evarūpañca madhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_8: sotuṃ labhantī’ti muttarāsisadisaṃ cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi. Sā
atk-abh01a0:1181_9: ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā
atk-abh01a0:1181_10: dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro āgantvā ‘amma, tvaṃ katarena maggena
atk-abh01a0:1181_11: āgatāsī’ti pucchiṃsu. Sā ‘ākāsena āgatāmhi, na maggenā’ti vatvā ‘amma, ākāsena nāma
atk-abh01a0:1181_12: khīṇāsavā sañcaranti, tvaṃ kathaṃ āgatā’ti puṭṭhā āha – ‘mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_13: olokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajjati, athāhaṃ neva attano ṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_14: na nisinnabhāvaṃ aññāsiṃ, gahitanimitteneva pana ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitāmhī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1182_0: Pharaṇapītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya, mahatā udakoghena
atk-abh01a0:1182_1: pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti. Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1182_2: gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti – kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca.
atk-abh01a0:1182_3: Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ paripūreti – kāyikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1182_4: cetasikañca. Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti
atk-abh01a0:1182_5: – khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhinti. Tāsu ṭhapetvā appanāsamādhipūrikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1183_0: Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ; yassa uppajjati taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati,
atk-abh01a0:1183_1: khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ. Somanassavedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇādīni
atk-abh01a0:1184_0: Aparo nayo – sātalakkhaṇaṃ sukhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, anuggahaṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1184_1: Satipi ca nesaṃ pītisukhānaṃ katthaci avippayoge, iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti;
atk-abh01a0:1184_2: paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ sukhaṃ. Yattha pīti tattha sukhaṃ. Yattha sukhaṃ tattha
atk-abh01a0:1184_3: na niyamato pīti. Saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā pīti, vedanākkhandhasaṅgahitaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1184_4: Kantārakhinnassa vanantodakadassanasavanesu viya pīti. Vanacchāyāpavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1185_0: Yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto tasito pipāsito paṭipathe
atk-abh01a0:1185_1: purisaṃ disvā ‘kattha pānīyaṃ atthī’ti puccheyya. So ‘aṭaviṃ uttaritvā jātassaravanasaṇḍo
atk-abh01a0:1185_2: atthi, tattha gantvā labhissasī’ti vadeyya. So tassa kathaṃ sutvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:1185_3: bhaveyya. Tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanālapattādīni disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1185_4: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya, vanakukkuṭamorādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1185_5: saddaṃ suṇeyya, jātassarapariyante jātaṃ maṇijālasadisaṃ nīlavanasaṇḍaṃ passeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1185_6: sare jātāni uppalapadumakumudādīni passeyya, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakaṃ passeyya.
atk-abh01a0:1185_7: So bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā ca pivitvā
atk-abh01a0:1185_8: ca paṭippassaddhadaratho bhisamuḷālapokkharādīni khāditvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā
atk-abh01a0:1185_9: mandālakamūlāni khandhe karitvā uttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā, udakasāṭakaṃ ātape katvā,
atk-abh01a0:1185_10: sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante nipanno ‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’nti vadeyya.
atk-abh01a0:1186_0: Tassa hi purisassa jātassaravanasaṇḍasavanato paṭṭhāya yāva udakadassanā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhakālo
atk-abh01a0:1186_1: viya pubbabhāgārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārā pīti. Nhatvā ca pivitvā ca sītacchāyāya
atk-abh01a0:1186_2: mandamande vāte paharante ‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’nti vadato nipannakālo viya balavappattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1186_3: ārammaṇarasānubhavanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sukhaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1186_4: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yattha pana pīti sukhampi tattha atthīti vuttamevetaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1187_0: Cittassekaggatāti cittassa ekaggabhāvo; samādhissetaṃ nāmaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīsu panassa
atk-abh01a0:1187_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttaṃ – “pāmokkhalakkhaṇo ca samādhi avikkhepalakkhaṇo ca”. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:1187_2: hi kūṭāgārakaṇṇikā sesadabbasambhārānaṃ ābandhanato pamukhā hoti evameva sabbakusaladhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1187_3: samādhicittena ijjhanato sabbesampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samādhi pāmokkho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1188_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā honti, kūṭaninnā
atk-abh01a0:1188_1: kūṭasamosaraṇā, kūṭaṃ tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati, evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci kusalā
atk-abh01a0:1188_2: dhammā sabbe te samādhininnā honti, samādhipoṇā, samādhipabbhārā, samādhi tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1189_0: Yathā ca senaṅgaṃ patvā rājā nāma yattha yattha senā osīdati taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1189_1: tassa gatagataṭṭhāne senā paripūrati, parasenā bhijjitvā rājānameva anuvattati, evameva
atk-abh01a0:1189_2: sahajātadhammānaṃ vikkhipituṃ vippakirituṃ appadānato samādhi avikkhepalakkhaṇo nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1190_0: Aparo pana nayo – ayaṃ cittassekaggatāsaṅkhāto samādhi nāma avisāralakkhaṇo vā avikkhepalakkhaṇo
atk-abh01a0:1190_1: vā, sahajātadhammānaṃ, sampiṇḍanaraso nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya, upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:1190_2: ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhāno vā. “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Visesato
atk-abh01a0:1190_3: sukhapadaṭṭhāno, nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1192_0: Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā. Sāva assaddhiyassa
atk-abh01a0:1192_1: abhibhavanato adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ. Adhimokkhalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-abh01a0:1192_2: indriyaṃ. Saddhāva indriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ. Sā panesā sampasādanalakkhaṇā ca saddhā
atk-abh01a0:1193_0: Yathā hi rañño cakkavattissa udakappasādako maṇi udake pakkhitto paṅkasevālapaṇakakaddamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1193_1: sannisīdāpeti, udakaṃ acchaṃ karoti vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ, evameva saddhā uppajjamānā
atk-abh01a0:1193_2: nīvaraṇe vikkhambheti, kilese sannisīdāpeti, cittaṃ pasādeti, anāvilaṃ karoti. Pasannena
atk-abh01a0:1193_3: cittena yogāvacaro kulaputto dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1193_4: bhāvanaṃ ārabhati. Evaṃ tāva saddhā sampasādanalakkhaṇāti veditabbā. Tenāha āyasmā nāgaseno –
atk-abh01a0:1194_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, rājā cakkavatti caturaṅginiyā senāya saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno
atk-abh01a0:1194_1: parittaṃ udakaṃ tareyya, taṃ udakaṃ hatthīhi ca assehi ca rathehi ca pattīhi ca saṅkhubhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1194_2: bhaveyya āvilaṃ lulitaṃ kalalībhūtaṃ, uttiṇṇo ca rājā cakkavatti manusse āṇāpeyya
atk-abh01a0:1194_3: ‘pānīyaṃ bhaṇe āharatha, taṃ pivissāmī’ti. Rañño ca udakappasādako maṇi bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:1194_4: ‘Evaṃ devā’ti kho te manussā rañño cakkavattissa paṭissutvā taṃ udakappasādakaṃ maṇiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1194_5: udake pakkhipeyyuṃ. Tasmiṃ udake pakkhittamatte paṅkasevālapaṇakaṃ vigaccheyya, kaddamo
atk-abh01a0:1194_6: ca sannisīdeyya, acchaṃ bhaveyya udakaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ, tato rañño cakkavattissa
atk-abh01a0:1195_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, udakaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā te manussā evaṃ yogāvacaro
atk-abh01a0:1195_1: daṭṭhabbo. Yathā paṅkasevālapaṇakaṃ kaddamo ca evaṃ kilesā daṭṭhabbā. Yathā udakappasādako
atk-abh01a0:1195_2: maṇi evaṃ saddhā daṭṭhabbā. Yathā udakappasādake maṇimhi pakkhittamatte paṅkasevālapaṇakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1195_3: vigacchati kaddamo ca sannisīdati, acchaṃ bhavati udakaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ, evameva
atk-abh01a0:1195_4: kho, mahārāja, saddhā uppajjamānā nīvaraṇe vikkhambheti, vinīvaraṇaṃ cittaṃ hoti
atk-abh01a0:1196_0: Yathā pana kumbhilamakaragāharakkhasādikiṇṇaṃ pūraṃ mahānadiṃ āgamma bhīrukajano
atk-abh01a0:1196_1: ubhosu tīresu tiṭṭhati. Saṅgāmasūro pana mahāyodho āgantvā ‘kasmā ṭhitatthā’ti pucchitvā
atk-abh01a0:1196_2: ‘sappaṭibhayabhāvena otarituṃ na visahāmā’ti vutte sunisitaṃ asiṃ gahetvā ‘mama pacchato
atk-abh01a0:1196_3: etha, mā bhāyitthā’ti vatvā nadiṃ otaritvā āgatāgate kumbhilādayo paṭibāhitvā orimatīrato
atk-abh01a0:1196_4: manussānaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ karonto pārimatīraṃ neti. Pārimatīratopi sotthinā orimatīraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1196_5: āneti. Evameva dānaṃ dadato sīlaṃ rakkhato uposathakammaṃ karoto bhāvanaṃ ārabhato
atk-abh01a0:1196_6: saddhā pubbaṅgamā purecārikā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘sampakkhandanalakkhaṇā ca saddhā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1197_0: Aparo nayo – saddahanalakkhaṇā saddhā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā. Pasādanarasā udakappasādakamaṇi
atk-abh01a0:1197_1: viya, pakkhandanarasā vā oghuttaraṇo viya. Akālusiyapaccupaṭṭhānā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:1197_2: vā. Saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānā vā, sā hatthavittabījāni viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1198_0: Vīrassa bhāvo vīriyaṃ, vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ vīriyaṃ. Vidhinā vā nayena upāyena īrayitabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1198_1: pavattayitabbanti vīriyaṃ. Tadeva kosajjassa abhibhavanato adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1198_2: Paggahaṇalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Vīriyameva indriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1198_3: Taṃ panetaṃ upatthambhanalakkhaṇañca vīriyaṃ paggahaṇalakkhaṇañca. Yathā hi jiṇṇagharaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1198_4: āgantukena thūṇupatthambhena tiṭṭhati, evameva yogāvacaro vīriyupatthambhena upatthambhito
atk-abh01a0:1198_5: hutvā sabbakusaladhammehi na hāyati, na parihāyati. Evaṃ tāvassa upatthambhanalakkhaṇatā
atk-abh01a0:1199_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, puriso gehe patante tamaññena dārunā upatthambheyya, upatthambhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1199_1: santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na pateyya, evameva kho mahārāja upatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1199_2: vīriyupatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na hāyanti na parihāyantī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1200_0: Yathā vā pana khuddikāya ca mahatikāya ca senāya saṅgāme pavatte khuddikā senā olīyeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1200_1: tato rañño āroceyya, rājā balavāhanaṃ peseyya, tena paggahitā sakasenā parasenaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1200_2: parājeyya, evameva vīriyaṃ sahajātasampayuttadhammānaṃ olīyituṃ osakkituṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:1201_0: Aparo nayo – ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1201_2: vā. Sammā āraddhaṃ sabbāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1202_0: Saranti etāya, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati. Sāva muṭṭhassaccassa
atk-abh01a0:1202_1: abhibhavanato adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-abh01a0:1202_2: indriyaṃ. Sati eva indriyaṃ satindriyaṃ. Sā panesā apilāpanalakkhaṇā ca sati upaggaṇhanalakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:1202_3: ca. Yathā hi rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ gopayanto sāyaṃpātaṃ rājānaṃ issariyasampattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1202_4: sallakkhāpeti sāreti, evameva sati kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sallakkhāpeti sarāpeti. Tenāha thero –
atk-abh01a0:1203_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, rañño cakkavattissa bhaṇḍāgāriko rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ sāyaṃpātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1203_1: yasaṃ sarāpeti – ‘ettakā, deva, hatthī, ettakā assā, ettakā rathā, ettakā pattī,
atk-abh01a0:1203_2: ettakaṃ hiraññaṃ, ettakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ, ettakaṃ sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, taṃ devo saratū’ti,
atk-abh01a0:1203_3: evameva kho, mahārāja, sati kusale dhamme apilāpeti – ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, ime
atk-abh01a0:1203_4: cattāro sammappadhānā, ime cattāro iddhipādā, imāni pañcindriyāni, imāni pañca balāni,
atk-abh01a0:1203_5: ime satta bojjhaṅgā, ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, ayaṃ samatho, ayaṃ vipassanā, ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1203_6: vijjā, ayaṃ vimutti, ime lokuttarā dhammāti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja, apilāpanalakkhaṇā satī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1204_0: Yathā pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rañño ahite ca hite ca ñatvā ahite
atk-abh01a0:1204_1: apayāpeti, hite upayāpeti, evameva sati hitāhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesitvā
atk-abh01a0:1204_2: ‘ime kāyaduccaritādayo dhammā ahitā’ti ahite dhamme apanudeti, ‘ime kāyasucaritādayo
atk-abh01a0:1204_3: dhammā hitā’ti hite dhamme upaggaṇhāti. Tenāha thero –
atk-abh01a0:1205_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rañño hitāhite jānāti ‘ime
atk-abh01a0:1205_1: rañño hitā ime ahitā, ime upakārā ime anupakārā’ti, tato ahite apanudeti hite upaggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1205_2: evameva kho, mahārāja, sati uppajjamānā hitāhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesati
atk-abh01a0:1205_3: ‘ime dhammā hitā ime dhammā ahitā, ime dhammā upakārā ime dhammā anupakārā’ti, tato
atk-abh01a0:1205_4: ahite dhamme apanudeti hite dhamme upaggaṇhāti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja, upaggaṇhanalakkhaṇā satī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1206_0: Aparo nayo – apilāpanalakkhaṇā sati, asammosanarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā visayābhimukhībhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:1206_1: vā, thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā, kāyādisatipaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā vā, ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhitattā
atk-abh01a0:1206_2: pana esikā viya, cakkhudvārādirakkhaṇato dovāriko viya ca daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1207_0: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā adhiyati ṭhapetīti samādhi. Sova vikkhepassa abhibhavanato
atk-abh01a0:1207_1: adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ. Avikkhepalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Samādhiyeva
atk-abh01a0:1207_2: indriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīni panassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1208_0: Pajānātīti paññā. Kiṃ pajānāti? ‘Idaṃ dukkha’ntiādinā nayena ariyasaccāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1208_1: pana ‘paññāpetīti paññā’ti vuttaṃ. Kinti paññāpetīti? Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti paññāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1208_2: Sāva avijjāya abhibhavanato adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ. Dassanalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1208_3: kāretīti indriyaṃ. Paññāva indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Sā panesā obhāsanalakkhaṇā ca paññā
atk-abh01a0:1208_4: pajānanalakkhaṇā ca. Yathā hi catubhittike gehe rattibhāge dīpe jalite andhakāro
atk-abh01a0:1208_5: nirujjhati āloko pātubhavati, evameva obhāsanalakkhaṇā paññā. Paññobhāsasamo obhāso
atk-abh01a0:1208_6: nāma natthi. Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā hoti. Tenāha thero –
atk-abh01a0:1209_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, puriso andhakāre gehe padīpaṃ paveseyya, paviṭṭho padīpo andhakāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1209_1: viddhaṃseti, obhāsaṃ janeti, ālokaṃ vidaṃseti, pākaṭāni ca rūpāni karoti, evameva
atk-abh01a0:1209_2: kho, mahārāja, paññā uppajjamānā avijjandhakāraṃ viddhaṃseti, vijjobhāsaṃ janeti,
atk-abh01a0:1209_3: ñāṇālokaṃ vidaṃseti, pākaṭāni ca ariyasaccāni karoti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja, obhāsanalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1210_0: Yathā pana cheko bhisakko āturānaṃ sappāyāsappāyāni bhojanāni jānāti, evaṃ paññā
atk-abh01a0:1210_2: dhamme pajānāti. Vuttampi cetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā – “pajānāti pajānātīti kho, āvuso,
atk-abh01a0:1210_3: tasmā paññavāti vuccati. Kiñca pajānāti? Idaṃ dukkhanti pajānātī”ti vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1211_0: Aparo nayo – yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā; akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho
atk-abh01a0:1211_1: viya. Visayobhāsarasā padīpo viya. Asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā araññagatasudesako viya.
atk-abh01a0:1212_0: Manatīti mano; vijānātīti attho. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāhu – nāḷiyā minamāno viya,
atk-abh01a0:1212_1: mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca, ārammaṇaṃ minati pajānātīti manoti. Tadeva mananalakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1212_2: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Manova indriyaṃ manindriyaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttacittassevetaṃ vevacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1213_0: Pītisomanassasampayogato sobhanaṃ mano assāti sumano. Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1213_1: Sātalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Somanassameva indriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1214_0: Jīvanti tena taṃsampayuttakā dhammāti jīvitaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-abh01a0:1214_1: indriyaṃ. Jīvitameva indriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Taṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1214_2: Lakkhaṇādīhi pana attanā avinibhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1214_4: Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti
atk-abh01a0:1214_5: udakaṃ viya uppalādīni, yathāsakaṃpaccayuppannepi ca dhamme pāleti dhātī viya kumāraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1214_6: sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva ca pavattati niyāmako viya, na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1214_7: pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā, na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā
atk-abh01a0:1214_8: khīyamāno viya vaṭṭisineho dīpasikhaṃ. Na ca anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanānubhāvavirahitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1216_0: Sammādiṭṭhiādīsu dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi. Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo, paggahanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1216_1: sammāvāyāmo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati, avikkhepanaṭṭhena sammāsamādhīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1216_2: Vacanatthato pana sammā passati, sammā vā tāya passantīti sammādiṭṭhi. Sammā saṅkappeti,
atk-abh01a0:1216_3: sammā vā tena saṅkappentīti sammāsaṅkappo. Sammā vāyāmeti, sammā vā tena vāyamantīti
atk-abh01a0:1216_4: sammāvāyāmo. Sammā sarati, sammā vā tāya sarantīti sammāsati. Sammā samādhiyati,
atk-abh01a0:1216_5: sammā vā tena samādhiyantīti sammāsamādhi. Apica, pasatthā sundarā vā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti.
atk-abh01a0:1216_6: Imināpi nayena tesaṃ vacanattho veditabbo. Lakkhaṇādīni pana heṭṭhā vuttāneva.
atk-abh01a0:1218_0: Saddhābalādīsupi saddhādīni vuttatthāneva. Akampiyaṭṭhena pana balanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1218_1: Evametesu assaddhiye na kampatīti saddhābalaṃ. Kosajje na kampatīti vīriyabalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1218_2: Muṭṭhassacce na kampatīti satibalaṃ. Uddhacce na kampatīti samādhibalaṃ. Avijjāya
atk-abh01a0:1218_3: na kampatīti paññābalaṃ. Ahirike na kampatīti hiribalaṃ. Anottappe na kampatīti ottappabalanti.
atk-abh01a0:1219_0: Tattha purimāni pañca heṭṭhā lakkhaṇādīhi pakāsitāneva. Pacchimadvaye kāyaduccaritādīhi
atk-abh01a0:1219_1: hiriyatīti hirī; lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehi eva ottappatīti ottappaṃ; pāpato ubbegassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1219_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tesaṃ nānākaraṇadīpanatthaṃ ‘samuṭṭhānaṃ adhipati lajjā bhayalakkhaṇena
atk-abh01a0:1219_3: cā’ti imaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayaṃ vitthārakathā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1220_0: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī nāma; bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma. Attādhipati hirī
atk-abh01a0:1220_1: nāma; lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī nāma; bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1220_2: ottappaṃ nāma. Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī nāma; vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1221_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti – jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā,
atk-abh01a0:1221_1: vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā, sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā, bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1221_2: ‘Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1221_3: Mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti, evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-abh01a0:1221_4: pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi
atk-abh01a0:1221_5: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti, evaṃ vayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1221_6: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1221_7: dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, na sūrabhāvānaṃ. Mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1221_8: kātuṃ na yutta’nti, evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ
atk-abh01a0:1221_9: samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ. Mādisassa
atk-abh01a0:1221_10: paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti, evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-abh01a0:1221_11: pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānahiriṃ catūhi
atk-abh01a0:1221_12: kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti. Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1221_13: na karoti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1222: Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma? Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:1223: Garahissanti taṃ viññū, asuciṃ nāgariko yathā;
atk-abh01a0:1225: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1226_0: Kathaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1226_1: ‘mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1226_2: kātu’nti pāpaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “so attānaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1226_3: adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati
atk-abh01a0:1227_0: Kathaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1227_1: pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha – “mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso. Mahantasmiṃ kho
atk-abh01a0:1227_2: pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno,
atk-abh01a0:1227_3: te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānanti, tepimaṃ evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1227_4: jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno
atk-abh01a0:1227_5: vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti. Santi devatā iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā
atk-abh01a0:1227_6: paracittaviduniyo. Tā dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānanti,
atk-abh01a0:1227_7: tāpi maṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito
atk-abh01a0:1227_8: samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti… so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1227_9: katvā akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1227_10: pariharatī”ti. Evaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1228_0: Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappanti. Ettha pana lajjāti lajjanākāro;
atk-abh01a0:1228_1: tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti apāyabhayaṃ; tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1228_2: Tadubhayampi pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi, yathā nāma eko kulaputto uccārapassāvādīni
atk-abh01a0:1228_3: karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya hīḷito, evameva
atk-abh01a0:1228_4: ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto hutvā
atk-abh01a0:1229_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko
atk-abh01a0:1229_1: uṇho āditto. Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1229_2: ḍāhabhayena. Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhanajigucchāya agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1229_3: okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ. Uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa
atk-abh01a0:1230_0: Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappanti. Idampi dvayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1230_1: pāpaparivajjane eva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:1230_3: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1230_4: duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:1230_5: pāpaṃ na karoti. Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca
atk-abh01a0:1232_0: Na lubbhanti etena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho. Adosāmohesupi
atk-abh01a0:1232_1: eseva nayo. Tesu alobho ārammaṇe cittassa agedhalakkhaṇo, alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo vā
atk-abh01a0:1232_2: kamaladale jalabindu viya. Apariggahaṇaraso muttabhikkhu viya. Anallīnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:1232_3: asucimhi patitapuriso viya. Adoso acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo, avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto
atk-abh01a0:1232_4: viya. Āghātavinayaraso pariḷāhavinayaraso vā candanaṃ viya. Sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:1232_5: puṇṇacando viya. Amoho lakkhaṇādīhi heṭṭhā paññindriyapade vibhāvito eva.
atk-abh01a0:1233_0: Imesu pana tīsu alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho, adoso dussīlyamalassa, amoho kusalesu
atk-abh01a0:1233_1: dhammesu abhāvanāya paṭipakkho. Alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu.
atk-abh01a0:1233_2: Tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṃ gaṇhāti, luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato. Adosena anūnaṃ, duṭṭhassa
atk-abh01a0:1234_0: Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati; luddho hi dosaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1234_1: paṭicchādeti. Adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati; duṭṭho hi
atk-abh01a0:1234_2: guṇaṃ makkheti. Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve
atk-abh01a0:1234_3: pavattati. Mūḷho hi ‘tacchaṃ atacchanti atacchaṃ ca taccha’nti gaṇhāti. Alobhena
atk-abh01a0:1234_4: ca piyavippayogadukkhaṃ na hoti, luddhassa piyasabhāvato piyavippayogāsahanato ca.
atk-abh01a0:1234_5: Adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṃ na hoti, duṭṭhassa hi appiyasabhāvato appiyasampayogāsahanato
atk-abh01a0:1234_6: ca. Amohena icchitālābhadukkhaṃ na hoti, amūḷhassa hi ‘taṃ kutettha labbhā’tievamādipaccavekkhaṇasambhavato.
atk-abh01a0:1235_0: Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṃ na hoti, alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato taṇhāmūlakattā ca
atk-abh01a0:1235_1: jātidukkhassa. Adosena jarādukkhaṃ na hoti, tikkhadosassa khippaṃ jarāsambhavato.
atk-abh01a0:1235_2: Amohena maraṇadukkhaṃ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṃ, na cetaṃ amūḷhassa hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1235_3: Alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ, amohena pabbajitānaṃ, adosena pana sabbesampi sukhasaṃvāsatā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1236_0: Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti. Yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya
atk-abh01a0:1236_1: pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho. Adosena niraye upapatti na
atk-abh01a0:1236_2: hoti. Dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti. Dosassa ca paṭipakkho
atk-abh01a0:1236_3: adoso. Amohena tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatti na hoti. Mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ
atk-abh01a0:1236_4: upapajjanti. Mohassa paṭipakkho ca amoho. Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa
atk-abh01a0:1236_5: abhāvakaro, adoso dosavasena apagamanassa, amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa.
atk-abh01a0:1237_0: Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso.
atk-abh01a0:1237_1: Asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti. Alobhena pana
atk-abh01a0:1237_3: amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ. Tathā alobhena abhijjhākāyaganthassa
atk-abh01a0:1237_4: pabhedanaṃ hoti, adosena byāpādakāyaganthassa, amohena sesaganthadvayassa. Purimāni
atk-abh01a0:1237_5: ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena, pacchimāni pacchimasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1238_0: Alobho cettha ārogyassa paccayo hoti; aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati,
atk-abh01a0:1238_1: tena kho arogo hoti. Adoso yobbanassa; aduṭṭho hi valipalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno
atk-abh01a0:1238_2: dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya; amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjanto
atk-abh01a0:1239_0: Alobho cettha bhogasampattiyā paccayo hoti, aluddhassa hi cāgena bhogapaṭilābho.
atk-abh01a0:1239_1: Adoso mittasampattiyā, mettāya mittānaṃ paṭilābhato ceva aparihānato ca. Amoho attasampattiyā,
atk-abh01a0:1239_2: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti. Alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo
atk-abh01a0:1240_0: Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti, tesaṃ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa
atk-abh01a0:1240_1: dukkhassa abhāvā; adosena parapakkhesu, aduṭṭhassa hi verīsupi verisaññāya abhāvato;
atk-abh01a0:1241_0: Alobhena ca aniccadassanaṃ hoti; luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato
atk-abh01a0:1241_1: na passati. Adosena dukkhadassanaṃ; adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho
atk-abh01a0:1241_2: saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. Amohena anattadassanaṃ; amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo
atk-abh01a0:1241_3: apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. Yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni
atk-abh01a0:1241_4: evametepi aniccadassanādīhi honti. Aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena
atk-abh01a0:1241_5: adoso, anattadassanena amoho hoti. Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya
atk-abh01a0:1241_6: pihaṃ uppādeyya, saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1243_1: kittisaddañca na byāpādetīti abyāpādo. Sammā passati, sobhanā vā diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1243_2: Alobhādīnaṃyeva tāni nāmāni. Heṭṭhā panete dhammā mūlavasena gahitā, idha kammapathavasenāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1245: Hirottappānipi heṭṭhā balavasena gahitāni, idha lokapālavasena. Lokañhi ime dve dhammā pālayanti. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:1246_0: “Dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Katame dve? Hirī ca ottappañca. Ime
atk-abh01a0:1246_1: kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Sace, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā
atk-abh01a0:1246_2: lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha mātāti vā, mātucchāti vā, mātulānīti vā, ācariyabhariyāti
atk-abh01a0:1246_3: vā, garūnaṃ dārāti vā. Sambhedaṃ loko agamissa yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
atk-abh01a0:1246_4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, ime dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti, tasmā paññāyati mātāti
atk-abh01a0:1246_5: vā mātucchāti vā mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1248_0: Kāyassa passambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittassa passambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti
atk-abh01a0:1248_1: cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:1249_0: Kāyassa lahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittassa lahubhāvo cittalahutā. Tā kāyacittagarubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:1250_0: Kāyassa mudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittassa mudubhāvo cittamudutā. Tā kāyacittathaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:1251_0: Kāyassa kammaññabhāvo kāyakammaññatā. Cittassa kammaññabhāvo cittakammaññatā. Tā
atk-abh01a0:1251_4: pasādāvahā, hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhemabhāvāvahā suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1252_0: Kāyassa pāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittassa pāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1253_0: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:1254_0: Saratīti sati. Sampajānātīti sampajaññaṃ; samantato pakārehi jānātīti attho. Sātthakasampajaññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1254_1: sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ panassa
atk-abh01a0:1254_2: vasena bhedo veditabbo. Lakkhaṇādīni ca tesaṃ satindriyapaññindriyesu vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1254_3: veditabbāni. Iti heṭṭhā vuttamevetaṃ dhammadvayaṃ puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne upakāravasena gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1255_0: Kāmacchandādayo paccanīkadhamme sametīti samatho. Aniccādivasena vividhehi ākārehi
atk-abh01a0:1255_1: dhamme passatīti vipassanā. Paññāvesā atthato. Imesampi dvinnaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1256_0: Sahajātadhamme paggaṇhātīti paggāho. Uddhaccasaṅkhātassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato
atk-abh01a0:1256_1: na vikkhepoti avikkhepo. Etesampi lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Idha panetaṃ dvayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1258_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā, ime dhammā
atk-abh01a0:1258_1: kusalāti ‘phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī’ti na kevalaṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhā ime
atk-abh01a0:1258_2: paropaṇṇāsadhammā eva, atha kho yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ tihetukaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1258_3: paṭhamaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye ye vā pana aññepi tehiyeva
atk-abh01a0:1258_4: phassādīhi sampayuttā hutvā pavattamānā atthi, attano attano anurūpaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh01a0:1258_5: samuppannā rūpābhāvena arūpino, sabhāvato upalabbhamānā dhammā sabbepi ime dhammā kusalā.
atk-abh01a0:1259_0: Ettāvatā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiyaṃ āruḷhe paropaṇṇāsadhamme dīpetvā yevāpanakavasena
atk-abh01a0:1259_1: aparepi nava dhamme dhammarājā dīpeti. Tesu tesu hi suttapadesu ‘chando adhimokkho
atk-abh01a0:1259_2: manasikāro tatramajjhattatā karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati vacīduccaritavirati
atk-abh01a0:1259_3: micchājīvaviratī’ti ime nava dhammā paññāyanti. Imasmiñcāpi mahācitte kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando
atk-abh01a0:1259_4: atthi, cittaṅgavasena pana pāḷiyaṃ na āruḷho. So idha yevāpanakavasena gahito.
atk-abh01a0:1260_0: Adhimokkho atthi, manasikāro atthi, tatramajjhattatā atthi. Mettāpubbabhāgo atthi;
atk-abh01a0:1260_1: so adose gahite gahito eva hoti. Karuṇāpubbabhāgo atthi, muditāpubbabhāgo atthi.
atk-abh01a0:1260_2: Upekkhāpubbabhāgo atthi; so pana tatramajjhattatāya gahitāya gahitova hoti. Sammāvācā
atk-abh01a0:1260_3: atthi, sammākammanto atthi. Sammāājīvo atthi; cittaṅgavasena pana pāḷiyaṃ na āruḷho.
atk-abh01a0:1261_0: Imesu pana navasu chando adhimokkho manasikāro tatramajjhattatāti ime cattārova ekakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1261_1: labbhanti, sesā nānākkhaṇe. Yadā hi iminā cittena micchāvācaṃ pajahati, virativasena
atk-abh01a0:1261_2: sammāvācaṃ pūreti, tadā chandādayo cattāro, sammāvācā cāti ime pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1261_3: Yadā micchākammantaṃ pajahati, virativasena sammākammantaṃ pūreti…pe… micchāājīvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1261_4: pajahati, virativasena sammāājīvaṃ pūreti…pe… yadā karuṇāya parikammaṃ karoti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1261_5: yadā muditāya parikammaṃ karoti, tadā chandādayo cattāro, muditāpubbabhāgo cāti ime
atk-abh01a0:1261_6: pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti. Ito pana muñcitvā, dānaṃ dentassa sīlaṃ pūrentassa yoge
atk-abh01a0:1262_0: Evametesu navasu yevāpanakadhammesu ‘chando’ti kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1262_1: so kattukamyatālakkhaṇo chando, ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1262_2: Tadevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Ārammaṇassa gahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1263: Adhimuccanaṃ ‘adhimokkho’. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno sanniṭṭhātabbadhammapadaṭṭhāno. Ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1264_0: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro ‘manasikāro’. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotītipi
atk-abh01a0:1264_1: manasikāro. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako vīthipaṭipādako javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro.
atk-abh01a0:1264_2: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭipādako manasmiṃ kāroti manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1264_4: Ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathi viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pana
atk-abh01a0:1264_5: pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassa. Na te idha adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:1265_0: Tesu dhammesu majjhattatā ‘tatramajjhattatā’. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:1265_2: ajjhupekkhanavasena samappavattānaṃ ājāneyyānaṃ ajjhupekkhanasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1266: ‘Karuṇāmuditā’ brahmavihāraniddese āvi bhavissanti. Kevalañhi tā appanappattā rūpāvacarā, idha kāmāvacarāti ayameva viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1267_0: Kāyaduccaritato virati ‘kāyaduccaritavirati’. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Lakkhaṇādito
atk-abh01a0:1267_1: panetā tissopi kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā; amaddanalakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1268_0: Iti phassādīni chappaññāsa yevāpanakavasena vuttāni navāti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre
atk-abh01a0:1268_1: pañcasaṭṭhi dhammapadāni bhavanti. Tesu ekakkhaṇe kadāci ekasaṭṭhi bhavanti, kadāci
atk-abh01a0:1268_2: samasaṭṭhi. Tāni hi sammāvācāpūraṇādivasena. Uppattiyaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu ekasaṭṭhi
atk-abh01a0:1268_3: bhavanti. Tehi mutte ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samasaṭṭhi bhavanti. Ṭhapetvā pana yevāpanake
atk-abh01a0:1268_4: pāḷiyaṃ yathārutavasena gayhamānāni chappaññāsāva honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena panettha
atk-abh01a0:1268_5: phassapañcakaṃ, vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā, pañcindriyāni, hiribalaṃ ottappabalanti
atk-abh01a0:1268_6: dve balāni, alobho adosoti dve mūlāni, kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādayo dvādasa dhammāti
atk-abh01a0:1269_0: Tesu samatiṃsāya dhammesu aṭṭhārasa dhammā avibhattikā honti, dvādasa savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1269_1: Katame aṭṭhārasa? Phasso saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ, kāyapassaddhiādayo
atk-abh01a0:1269_2: dvādasa dhammāti ime aṭṭhārasa avibhattikā. Vedanā cittaṃ vitakko cittekaggatā, saddhindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1269_3: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ, hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ, alobho adosoti ime
atk-abh01a0:1269_4: dvādasa dhammā savibhattikā. Tesu satta dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu,
atk-abh01a0:1269_5: dve catūsu, eko chasu, eko sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1270: Kathaṃ? Cittaṃ vitakko saddhā hirī ottappaṃ alobho adosoti ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1271_0: Etesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, indriyāni patvā manindriyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1271_1: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsaṅkappoti.
atk-abh01a0:1271_2: Saddhā indriyāni patvā saddhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā, balāni patvā saddhābalanti. Hirī
atk-abh01a0:1271_3: balāni patvā hiribalaṃ hotīti vuttā, lokapāladukaṃ patvā hirīti. Ottappepi eseva
atk-abh01a0:1271_4: nayo. Alobho mūlaṃ patvā alobho hotīti vutto, kammapathaṃ patvā anabhijjhāti. Adoso
atk-abh01a0:1271_5: mūlaṃ patvā adoso hotīti vutto, kammapathaṃ patvā abyāpādoti. Ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1272: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā sukhanti, indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti. Evaṃ eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1273_0: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāvāyāmoti,
atk-abh01a0:1273_1: balāni patvā vīriyabalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā paggāhoti. Satipi indriyāni patvā satindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1273_2: hotīti vuttā, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsatīti, balāni patvā satibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1273_3: patvā sati hotīti vuttā. Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1274_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto, indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti,
atk-abh01a0:1274_1: maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsamādhīti. Balāni patvā samādhibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā samatho
atk-abh01a0:1274_2: avikkhepoti. Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1275_0: Paññā pana indriyāni patvā paññindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā, maggaṅgāni patvā sammādiṭṭhīti,
atk-abh01a0:1275_1: balāni patvā paññābalanti, mūlāni patvā amohoti, kammapathaṃ patvā sammādiṭṭhīti,
atk-abh01a0:1275_2: piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā sampajaññaṃ vipassanāti. Evaṃ eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1276_0: Sace pana koci vadeyya – ‘ettha apubbaṃ nāma natthi, heṭṭhā gahitameva gaṇhitvā tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1276_1: tasmiṃ ṭhāne padaṃ pūritaṃ, ananusandhikā kathā uppaṭipāṭiyā corehi ābhatabhaṇḍasadisā,
atk-abh01a0:1276_2: goyūthena gatamagge ālulitatiṇasadisā ajānitvā kathitā’ti, so ‘māheva’nti paṭisedhetvā
atk-abh01a0:1276_3: vattabbo – ‘buddhānaṃ desanā ananusandhikā nāma natthi, sānusandhikā va hoti. Ajānitvā
atk-abh01a0:1276_4: kathitāpi natthi, sabbā jānitvā kathitāyeva. Sammāsambuddho hi tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1276_5: kiccaṃ jānāti, taṃ ñatvā kiccavasena vibhattiṃ āropento aṭṭhārasa dhammā ekekakiccāti
atk-abh01a0:1276_6: ñatvā ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne vibhattiṃ āropesi. Satta dhammā dvedvekiccāti ñatvā dvīsu dvīsu
atk-abh01a0:1276_7: ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi. Vedanā tikiccāti ñatvā tīsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_8: Vīriyasatīnaṃ cattāri cattāri kiccānīti ñatvā catūsu catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_9: Samādhi chakiccoti ñatvā chasu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi. Paññā sattakiccāti ñatvā
atk-abh01a0:1277_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – eko kira paṇḍito rājā rahogato cintesi – ‘imaṃ rājakulasantakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1277_1: na yathā vā tathā vā khāditabbaṃ, sippānucchavikaṃ vetanaṃ vaḍḍhessāmī’ti. So sabbe
atk-abh01a0:1277_2: sippike sannipātāpetvā ‘ekekasippajānanake pakkosathā’ti āha. Evaṃ pakkosiyamānā
atk-abh01a0:1277_3: aṭṭhārasa janā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tesaṃ ekekaṃ paṭivīsaṃ dāpetvā vissajjesi. ‘Dve dve sippāni
atk-abh01a0:1277_4: jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte pana satta janā āgamaṃsu. Tesaṃ dve dve paṭivīse dāpesi.
atk-abh01a0:1277_5: ‘Tīṇi sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi. Tassa tayo paṭivīse dāpesi.
atk-abh01a0:1277_6: ‘Cattāri sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte dve janā āgamaṃsu. Tesaṃ cattāri cattāri
atk-abh01a0:1277_7: paṭivīse dāpesi. ‘Pañca sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekopi nāgacchi. ‘Cha
atk-abh01a0:1277_8: sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi. Tassa cha paṭivīse dāpesi. ‘Satta
atk-abh01a0:1277_9: sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi. Tassa satta paṭivīse dāpesi.
atk-abh01a0:1278_0: Tattha paṇḍito rājā viya anuttaro dhammarājā. Sippajānanakā viya cittacittaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a0:1278_1: uppannā dhammā. Sippānucchavikavetanavaḍḍhanaṃ viya kiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhattiāropanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1279_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggavasena
atk-abh01a0:1279_1: balavasena mūlavasena kammapathavasena lokapālavasena passaddhivasena lahutāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1282: 2. Idāni tāneva dhammuddesavāre pāḷiāruḷhāni chappaññāsa padāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ‘katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī’tiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1283_0: Tattha pucchāya tāva ayamattho – yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1283_1: tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotīti vutto, katamo
atk-abh01a0:1283_2: so phassoti iminā nayena sabbapucchāsu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1284_0: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phassoti tasmiṃ samaye yo phusanakavasena uppanno phasso, so phassoti.
atk-abh01a0:1284_1: Idaṃ phassassa sabhāvadīpanato sabhāvapadaṃ nāma. Phusanāti phusanākāro. Samphusanāti
atk-abh01a0:1284_2: phusanākārova upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vutto. Samphusitattanti samphusitabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1284_3: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – yo tasmiṃ samaye phusanakavasena phasso, yā tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1284_4: phusanā, yā tasmiṃ samaye samphusanā, yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye samphusitattaṃ; atha vā,
atk-abh01a0:1284_5: yo tasmiṃ samaye phusanavasena phasso, aññenāpi pariyāyena phusanā samphusanā samphusitattanti
atk-abh01a0:1284_6: vuccati, ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotīti. Vedanādīnampi niddesesu imināva nayena
atk-abh01a0:1285_0: Ayaṃ panettha sabbasādhāraṇo vibhattivinicchayo. Yānimāni bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1285_1: kusalaṃ mahācittaṃ bhājetvā dassentena atirekapaṇṇāsapadāni mātikāvasena ṭhapetvā
atk-abh01a0:1285_2: puna ekekapadaṃ gahetvā vibhattiṃ āropitāni, tāni vibhattiṃ gacchantāni tīhi kāraṇehi
atk-abh01a0:1285_3: vibhattiṃ gacchanti; nānā hontāni catūhi kāraṇehi nānā bhavanti. Aparadīpanā panettha
atk-abh01a0:1285_4: dve ṭhānāni gacchati. Kathaṃ? Etānihi byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasenāti
atk-abh01a0:1285_5: imehi tīhi kāraṇehi vibhattiṃ gacchanti. Tattha kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ, doso
atk-abh01a0:1285_6: dussanā dussitattanti evaṃ byañjanavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha hi ekova
atk-abh01a0:1285_7: kodho byañjanavasena evaṃ vibhattiṃ gato. Cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāroti evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1285_8: pana upasaggavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā
atk-abh01a0:1285_9: cintā upaparikkhāti evaṃ atthavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tesu phassapadaniddese
atk-abh01a0:1285_10: tāva imā tissopi vibhattiyo labbhanti. ‘Phasso phusanā’ti hi byañjanavasena vibhattigamanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1286_0: Nānā hontānipi pana nāmanānattena lakkhaṇanānattena kiccanānattena paṭikkhepanānattenāti
atk-abh01a0:1286_1: imehi catūhi kāraṇehi nānā honti. Tattha katamo tasmiṃ samaye byāpādo hoti? Yo tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1286_2: samaye doso dussanāti ettha byāpādoti vā, dosoti vā, dvepi ete kodho eva, nāmena
atk-abh01a0:1287_0: Rāsaṭṭhena ca pañcapi khandhā ekova khandho hoti. Ettha pana rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1287_1: vedanā vedayitalakkhaṇā, saññā sañjānanalakkhaṇā, cetanā cetayitalakkhaṇā, viññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1287_2: vijānanalakkhaṇanti iminā lakkhaṇanānattena pañcakkhandhā honti. Evaṃ ‘lakkhaṇanānattena’
atk-abh01a0:1288_0: Cattāro sammappadhānā – “idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1288_1: anuppādāya…pe… cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahatī”ti ekameva vīriyaṃ kiccanānattena catūsu
atk-abh01a0:1289_0: Cattāro asaddhammā – kodhagarutā na saddhammagarutā, makkhagarutā na saddhammagarutā,
atk-abh01a0:1289_1: lābhagarutā na saddhammagarutā, sakkāragarutā na saddhammagarutāti, evamādīsu pana
atk-abh01a0:1290_0: Imāni pana cattāri nānattāni na phasseyeva labbhanti, sabbesupi phassapañcakādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1290_1: labbhanti. Phassassa hi phassoti nāmaṃ…pe… cittassa cittanti. Phasso ca phusanalakkhaṇo,
atk-abh01a0:1290_2: vedanā vedayitalakkhaṇā, saññā sañjānanalakkhaṇā, cetanā cetayitalakkhaṇā, viññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1290_3: vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ. Tathā phasso phusanakicco, vedanā anubhavanakiccā, saññā sañjānanakiccā,
atk-abh01a0:1290_4: cetanā cetayitakiccā, viññāṇaṃ vijānanakiccanti. Evaṃ kiccanānattena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1291_0: Paṭikkhepanānattaṃ phassapañcamake natthi. Alobhādiniddese pana alobho alubbhanā
atk-abh01a0:1291_1: alubbhitattantiādinā nayena labbhatīti evaṃ paṭikkhepanānattena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1291_2: Evaṃ sabbapadaniddesesu labbhamānavasena catubbidhampi nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1292_0: Aparadīpanā pana padatthuti vā hoti daḷhīkammaṃ vāti evaṃ dve ṭhānāni gacchati. Yaṭṭhikoṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:1292_1: uppīḷentena viya hi sakimeva phassoti vutte etaṃ padaṃ phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1292_2: nāma na hoti. Punappunaṃ byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena ‘phasso phusanā
atk-abh01a0:1292_3: samphusanā samphusitatta’nti vutte phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ nāma hoti. Yathā hi
atk-abh01a0:1292_4: daharakumāraṃ nhāpetvā, manoramaṃ vatthaṃ paridahāpetvā pupphāni piḷandhāpetvā akkhīni
atk-abh01a0:1292_5: añjetvā athassa nalāṭe ekameva manosilābinduṃ kareyyuṃ, tassa na ettāvatā cittatilako
atk-abh01a0:1292_6: nāma hoti. Nānāvaṇṇehi pana parivāretvā bindūsu katesu cittatilako nāma hoti. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1293_0: Byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena ca punappunaṃ bhaṇanameva daḷhīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1293_1: Yathā hi ‘āvuso’ti vā ‘bhante’ti vā ‘yakkho’ti vā ‘sappo’ti vā vutte daḷhīkammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1293_2: nāma na hoti. ‘Āvuso āvuso’‘bhante bhante’‘yakkho yakkho’‘sappo sappo’ti vutte pana
atk-abh01a0:1293_3: daḷhīkammaṃ nāma hoti. Evameva sakideva yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷentena viya ‘phasso’ti
atk-abh01a0:1293_4: vutte padaṃ daḷhīkammaṃ nāma na hoti. Punappunaṃ byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena
atk-abh01a0:1293_5: ‘phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitatta’nti vutteyeva ‘daḷhīkammaṃ’ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_6: Evaṃ aparadīpanā dve ṭhānāni gacchati. Etassāpi vasena labbhamānakapadaniddesesu
atk-abh01a0:1294_0: Ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotīti yasmiṃ samaye paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ mahākusalacittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1294_1: uppajjati, tasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ phasso nāma hotīti attho. Ayaṃ tāva phassapadaniddesassa
atk-abh01a0:1294_2: vaṇṇanā. Ito paresu pana vedanādīnaṃ padānaṃ niddesesu visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1295_0: 3. Yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti ettha kiñcāpi katamā tasmiṃ samaye vedanā hotīti āraddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1295_2: vuccati tassa sātasukhassa anucchavikā sāruppā. Anucchavikatthopi hi ayaṃ ‘tajjā’-saddo
atk-abh01a0:1295_3: hoti. Yathāha – “tajjaṃ tassāruppaṃ kathaṃ mantetī”ti. Tehi vā rūpādīhi ārammaṇehi
atk-abh01a0:1295_4: imassa ca sukhassa paccayehi jātātipi tajjā. Manoviññāṇameva nissattaṭṭhena dhātūti
atk-abh01a0:1295_5: manoviññāṇadhātu. Samphassato jātaṃ, samphasse vā jātanti samphassajaṃ. Cittanissitattā
atk-abh01a0:1295_6: cetasikaṃ. Madhuraṭṭhena sātaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye yathāvuttena
atk-abh01a0:1295_7: atthena tajjāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā samphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ, ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1295_8: vedanā hotīti. Evaṃ sabbapadehi saddhiṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1296_0: Idāni cetasikaṃ sukhantiādīsu cetasikapadena kāyikasukhaṃ paṭikkhipati, sukhapadena
atk-abh01a0:1296_1: cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Cetosamphassajanti cittasamphasse jātaṃ. Sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitanti
atk-abh01a0:1296_2: sātaṃ vedayitaṃ, na asātaṃ vedayitaṃ; sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ, na dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ. Parato
atk-abh01a0:1296_3: tīṇi padāni itthiliṅgavasena vuttāni. Sātā vedanā, na asātā; sukhā vedanā, na dukkhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1297_1: manoviññāṇadhātuyā samphassamhi jātā. Saññāti sabhāvanāmaṃ. Sañjānanāti sañjānanākāro.
atk-abh01a0:1299_0: Cittaniddese cittavicittatāya cittaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ minamānaṃ jānātīti mano. Mānasanti
atk-abh01a0:1299_1: mano eva. “Antalikkhacaro pāso yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha pana sampayuttakadhammo ‘mānaso’ti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1301: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:1302: Ettha arahattaṃ ‘mānasa’nti vuttaṃ. Idha pana ‘manova’ mānasaṃ. Byañjanavasena hetaṃ padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1303_0: Hadayanti cittaṃ. “Cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro
atk-abh01a0:1303_1: hadayanti vuttaṃ. “Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṃ. “Vakkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1303_2: hadaya”nti ettha hadayavatthu. Idha pana cittameva abbhantaraṭṭhena ‘hadaya’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1303_3: Tameva parisuddhaṭṭhena paṇḍaraṃ. Bhavaṅgaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha – “pabhassaramidaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1303_4: bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti. Tato nikkhantattā
atk-abh01a0:1303_5: pana akusalampi, gaṅgāya nikkhantā nadī gaṅgā viya, godhāvarito nikkhantā godhāvarī
atk-abh01a0:1304_0: Mano manāyatananti idha pana manoggahaṇaṃ manasseva āyatanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1304_1: dīpeti – ‘nayidaṃ devāyatanaṃ viya manassa āyatanattā manāyatanaṃ, atha kho mano
atk-abh01a0:1304_2: eva āyatanaṃ manāyatana’nti. Tattha nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1304_3: sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi loke ‘issarāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1304_5: ākaro. Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_7: pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ. Idha pana sañjātidesaṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1305_0: Phassādayo hi dhammā ettha sañjāyantīti sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi etaṃ āyatanaṃ. Bahiddhā
atk-abh01a0:1305_2: āyatanaṃ. Phassādīnaṃ pana sahajātādipaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇattā kāraṇaṭṭhenapi āyatananti
atk-abh01a0:1306_0: Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ viññāṇameva khandho viññāṇakkhandho. Tassa rāsiādivasena attho
atk-abh01a0:1306_1: veditabbo. Mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti. Ettha hi rāsaṭṭhena khandho
atk-abh01a0:1306_2: vutto. “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādīsu guṇaṭṭhena. “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1306_3: dārukkhandha”nti ettha paṇṇattimattaṭṭhena. Idha pana ruḷhito khandho vutto. Rāsaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1306_4: hi viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadeso ekaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tasmā yathā rukkhassa ekadesaṃ chindanto
atk-abh01a0:1306_5: rukkhaṃ chindatīti vuccati, evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1307_0: Tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
atk-abh01a0:1307_1: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano, vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ, sabhāvaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1307_2: nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ phassapañcamake phasso
atk-abh01a0:1307_3: tāva yasmā phasso eva, na tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajo, cittañca yasmā tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:1307_4: eva, tasmā imasmiṃ padadvaye ‘tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā’ti paññatti na āropitā.
atk-abh01a0:1307_5: Vitakkapadādīsu pana labbhamānāpi idha pacchinnattā na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh01a0:1308_0: Imesañca pana phassapañcamakānaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1308_1: paññattiṃ uddharamānena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ kataṃ. Nānāudakānañhi nānātelānaṃ vā ekabhājane
atk-abh01a0:1308_2: pakkhipitvā divasaṃ nimmathitānaṃ vaṇṇa gandharasānaṃ nānatāya disvā vā ghāyitvā
atk-abh01a0:1308_3: vā sāyitvā vā nānākaraṇaṃ sakkā bhaveyya ñātuṃ. Evaṃ santepi taṃ dukkaranti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1308_4: Sammāsambuddhena pana imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1308_5: pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā paññattiṃ uddharamānena atidukkaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1309_0: “Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā katanti. ‘Kiṃ, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā dukkaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1309_1: kata’nti. ‘Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā kataṃ, yaṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1309_2: dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ – ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā,
atk-abh01a0:1309_3: ayaṃ saññā, ayaṃ cetanā, idaṃ citta’nti. ‘Opammaṃ, bhante, karohī’ti. ‘Yathā, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1309_4: kocideva puriso nāvāya samuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā hatthapuṭena udakaṃ gahetvā jivhāya
atk-abh01a0:1309_5: sāyitvā jāneyya nu kho, mahārāja, so puriso – idaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ, idaṃ yamunāya
atk-abh01a0:1309_6: udakaṃ, idaṃ aciravatiyā udakaṃ, idaṃ sarabhuyā udakaṃ, idaṃ mahiyā udaka’nti? ‘Dukkaraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1309_7: bhante, jānitu’nti. ‘Tato dukkarataraṃ kho, mahārāja, bhagavatā kataṃ yaṃ imesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1310_0: 7. Vitakkaniddese takkanavasena takko. Tassa tittakaṃ takkesi kumbhaṃ takkesi sakaṭaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1310_1: takkesi yojanaṃ takkesi addhayojanaṃ takkesīti evaṃ takkanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1310_2: Idaṃ takkassa sabhāvapadaṃ. Vitakkanavasena vitakko. Balavataratakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1310_3: Suṭṭhu kappanavasena saṅkappo. Ekaggaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇe appetīti appanā. Dutiyapadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1310_4: upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Balavatarā vā appanā byappanā. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti
atk-abh01a0:1310_5: patiṭṭhāpetīti cetaso abhiniropanā. Yāthāvatāya niyyānikatāya ca kusalabhāvappatto
