atk-abh01a0:1311_0: 8. Vicāraniddese ārammaṇe caraṇakavasena cāro. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ. Vicaraṇavasena
atk-abh01a0:1311_1: vicāro. Anugantvā vicaraṇavasena anuvicāro. Upagantvā vicaraṇavasena upavicāroti.
atk-abh01a0:1311_2: Upasaggavasena vā padāni vaḍḍhitāni. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ, saraṃ viya jiyāya, anusandahitvā
atk-abh01a0:1311_3: ṭhapanato cittassa anusandhānatā. Ārammaṇaṃ anupekkhamāno viya tiṭṭhatīti anupekkhanatā.
atk-abh01a0:1312_0: 9. Pītiniddese pītīti sabhāvapadaṃ. Pamuditassa bhāvo pāmojjaṃ. Āmodanākāro āmodanā.
atk-abh01a0:1312_1: Pamodanākāro pamodanā. Yathā vā bhesajjānaṃ vā telānaṃ vā uṇhodakasītodakānaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:1312_2: ekatokaraṇaṃ modanāti vuccati, evamayampi pīti dhammānaṃ ekatokaraṇena modanā. Upasaggavasena
atk-abh01a0:1312_3: pana maṇḍetvā āmodanā pamodanāti vuttā. Hāsetīti hāso. Pahāsetīti pahāso. Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārānametaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1312_4: adhivacanaṃ. Vittīti vittaṃ; dhanassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ayaṃ pana somanassapaccayattā vittisarikkhatāya
atk-abh01a0:1312_5: vitti. Yathā hi dhanino dhanaṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ pītimatopi pītiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1312_6: paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati, tasmā vittīti vuttā. Tuṭṭhisabhāvasaṇṭhitāya pītiyā
atk-abh01a0:1312_7: etaṃ nāmaṃ. Pītimā pana puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā abbhuggatattā udaggoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1312_8: Udaggassa bhāvo odagyaṃ. Attano manatā attamanatā. Anabhiraddhassa hi mano dukkhapadaṭṭhānattā
atk-abh01a0:1312_9: attano mano nāma na hoti, abhiraddhassa pana sukhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma
atk-abh01a0:1312_10: hoti. Iti attano manatā attamanatā, sakamanatā. Sakamanassa bhāvoti attho. Sā pana
atk-abh01a0:1312_11: yasmā na aññassa kassaci attano manatā, cittasseva paneso bhāvo, cetasiko dhammo,
atk-abh01a0:1313_0: 11. Ekaggatāniddese acalabhāvena ārammaṇe tiṭṭhatīti ṭhiti. Parato padadvayaṃ upasaggavasena
atk-abh01a0:1313_1: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Apica sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇamhi sampiṇḍetvā tiṭṭhatīti saṇṭhiti. Ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1313_2: ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhiti. Kusalapakkhasmiñhi cattāro dhammā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1313_3: ogāhanti – saddhā sati samādhi paññāti. Teneva saddhā okappanāti vuttā, sati apilāpanatāti,
atk-abh01a0:1313_4: samādhi avaṭṭhitīti, paññā pariyogāhanāti. Akusalapakkhe pana tayo dhammā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1313_5: ogāhanti – taṇhā diṭṭhi avijjāti. Teneva te oghāti vuttā. Cittekaggatā panettha na
atk-abh01a0:1313_6: balavatī hoti. Yathā hi rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne udakena siñcitvā sammaṭṭhe thokameva kālaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1313_7: rajo sannisīdati, sukkhante sukkhante puna pakatibhāvena vuṭṭhāti, evameva akusalapakkhe
atk-abh01a0:1313_8: cittekaggatā na balavatī hoti. Yathā pana tasmiṃ ṭhāne ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kudālena
atk-abh01a0:1313_9: khanitvā ākoṭanamaddanaghaṭṭanāni katvā upalitte ādāse viya chāyā paññāyati, vassasatātikkamepi
atk-abh01a0:1313_10: taṃmuhuttakataṃ viya hoti, evameva kusalapakkhe cittekaggatā balavatī hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1314_0: Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāro. Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva
atk-abh01a0:1314_1: gacchantaṃ cittaṃ vikkhipati nāma. Ayaṃ pana tathāvidho vikkhepo na hotīti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a0:1314_2: Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva ca cittaṃ visāhaṭaṃ nāma hoti, ito cito ca harīyati. Ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1314_3: pana evaṃ avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvoti avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-abh01a0:1315_0: Samathoti tividho samatho – cittasamatho, adhikaraṇasamatho, sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti.
atk-abh01a0:1315_1: Tattha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cittekaggatā cittasamatho nāma. Tañhi āgamma cittacalanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1315_2: cittavipphanditaṃ sammati vūpasammati, tasmā so cittasamathoti vuccati. Sammukhāvinayādisattavidho
atk-abh01a0:1315_3: samatho adhikaraṇasamatho nāma. Tañhi āgamma tāni tāni adhikaraṇāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-abh01a0:1315_4: tasmā so adhikaraṇasamathoti vuccati. Yasmā pana sabbe saṅkhārā nibbānaṃ āgamma sammanti
atk-abh01a0:1315_5: vūpasammanti, tasmā taṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti vuccati. Imasmiṃ atthe cittasamatho
atk-abh01a0:1315_6: adhippeto. Samādhilakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti samādhindriyaṃ. Uddhacce na kampatīti
atk-abh01a0:1316_0: 12. Saddhindriyaniddese buddhādiguṇānaṃ saddahanavasena saddhā. Buddhādīni vā ratanāni
atk-abh01a0:1316_1: saddahati pattiyāyatīti saddhā. Saddahanāti saddahanākāro. Buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ogāhati,
atk-abh01a0:1316_2: bhinditvā viya anupavisatīti okappanā. Buddhādīnaṃ guṇesu etāya sattā ativiya pasīdanti,
atk-abh01a0:1316_3: sayaṃ vā abhippasīdatīti abhippasādo. Idāni yasmā saddhindriyādīnaṃ samāsapadānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1316_4: vasena aññasmiṃ pariyāye āraddhe ādipadaṃ gahetvāva padabhājanaṃ karīyati – ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1316_5: abhidhamme dhammatā – tasmā puna saddhāti vuttaṃ. Yathā vā itthiyā indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1316_6: na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana saddhāva indriyaṃ saddhindriyanti. Evaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvañāpanatthampi
atk-abh01a0:1316_7: puna saddhāti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbapadaniddesesu ādipadassa puna vacane payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1316_8: Adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ. Asaddhiye na kampatīti saddhābalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1317_0: 13. Vīriyindriyaniddese cetasikoti idaṃ vīriyassa niyamato cetasikabhāvadīpanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1317_1: vuttaṃ. Idañhi vīriyaṃ “yadapi, bhikkhave, kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo,
atk-abh01a0:1317_2: yadapi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti. Itihidaṃ uddesaṃ gacchatī”ti
atk-abh01a0:1317_3: evamādīsu suttesu caṅkamādīni karontassa uppannattā ‘kāyika’nti vuccamānampi kāyaviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1317_4: viya kāyikaṃ nāma natthi, cetasikameva panetanti dassetuṃ ‘cetasiko’ti vuttaṃ. Vīriyārambhoti
atk-abh01a0:1317_5: vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho. Iminā sesārambhe paṭikkhipati. Ayañhi ‘ārambha’-saddo kamme
atk-abh01a0:1317_6: āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
atk-abh01a0:1320_0: Ettha hi kammaṃ ‘ārambho’ti āgataṃ. “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-abh01a0:1320_1: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā. “Ārambhatha
atk-abh01a0:1320_2: nikkamatha yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti ettha vīriyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1320_3: ārabhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā. “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha chedanabhañjanādikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1320_4: vikopanaṃ. Idha pana vīriyameva adhippetaṃ. Tenāha – ‘vīriyārambhoti vīriyasaṅkhāto
atk-abh01a0:1320_5: ārambho’ti. Vīriyañhi ārambhanakavasena ārambhoti vuccati. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1320_6: Kosajjato nikkhamanavasena nikkamo. Paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanavasena parakkamo.
atk-abh01a0:1320_7: Uggantvā yamanavasena uyyāmo. Byāyamanavasena vāyāmo. Ussāhanavasena ussāho. Adhimattussāhanavasena
atk-abh01a0:1320_8: ussoḷhī. Thirabhāvaṭṭhena thāmo. Cittacetasikānaṃ dhāraṇavasena avicchedato vā pavattanavasena
atk-abh01a0:1321_0: Aparo nayo – nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāya, parakkamo ceso bandhanacchedāya, uyyāmo
atk-abh01a0:1321_1: ceso oghanittharaṇāya, vāyāmo ceso pāraṅgamanaṭṭhena, ussāho ceso pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena,
atk-abh01a0:1321_2: ussoḷhī ceso adhimattaṭṭhena, thāmo ceso palighugghāṭanatāya, dhiti ceso avaṭṭhitikāritāyāti.
atk-abh01a0:1322_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti evaṃ pavattikāle asithilaparakkamavasena
atk-abh01a0:1322_1: asithilaparakkamatā; thiraparakkamo, daḷhaparakkamoti attho. Yasmā panetaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1322_2: kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne chandaṃ na nikkhipati, dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, na otāreti,
atk-abh01a0:1322_3: na vissajjeti, anosakkitamānasataṃ āvahati, tasmā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratāti
atk-abh01a0:1322_4: vuttaṃ. Yathā pana tajjātike udakasambhinnaṭṭhāne dhuravāhagoṇaṃ gaṇhathāti vadanti,
atk-abh01a0:1322_5: so jaṇṇunā bhūmiṃ uppīḷetvāpi dhuraṃ vahati, bhūmiyaṃ patituṃ na deti, evameva vīriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1322_6: kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhuraṃ ukkhipati paggaṇhāti, tasmā dhurasampaggāhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1322_7: Paggahalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti vīriyindriyaṃ. Kosajje na kampatīti vīriyabalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1323_0: 14. Satindriyaniddese saraṇakavasena sati. Idaṃ satiyā sabhāvapadaṃ. Punappunaṃ saraṇato
atk-abh01a0:1323_1: anussaraṇavasena anussati. Abhimukhaṃ gantvā viya saraṇato paṭisaraṇavasena paṭissati.
atk-abh01a0:1323_2: Upasaggavasena vā vaḍḍhitamattametaṃ. Saraṇākāro saraṇatā. Yasmā pana saraṇatāti
atk-abh01a0:1323_3: tiṇṇaṃ saraṇānampi nāmaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ puna satiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Satisaṅkhātā
atk-abh01a0:1323_4: saraṇatāti ayañhettha attho. Sutapariyattassa dhāraṇabhāvato dhāraṇatā. Anupavisanasaṅkhātena
atk-abh01a0:1323_5: ogāhanaṭṭhena apilāpanabhāvo apilāpanatā. Yathā hi lābukaṭāhādīni udake plavanti,
atk-abh01a0:1323_6: na anupavisanti, na tathā ārammaṇe sati. Ārammaṇañhesā anupavisati, tasmā apilāpanatāti
atk-abh01a0:1323_8: jotanalakkhaṇe ca indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Satisaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ satindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1323_9: Pamāde na kampatīti satibalaṃ. Yāthāvasati niyyānikasati kusalasatīti sammāsati.
atk-abh01a0:1324_0: 16. Paññindriyaniddese tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1324_1: paññā. Tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātītipi paññā. Idamassā sabhāvapadaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1324_2: Pajānanākāro pajānanā. Aniccādīni vicinātīti vicayo. Pavicayoti upasaggena padaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1324_3: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Catusaccadhamme vicinātīti dhammavicayo. Aniccādīnaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena
atk-abh01a0:1324_4: sallakkhaṇā. Sāyeva puna upasagganānattena upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti vuttā. Paṇḍitassa
atk-abh01a0:1324_5: bhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ. Kusalassa bhāvo kosallaṃ. Nipuṇassa bhāvo nepuññaṃ. Aniccādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1324_6: vibhāvanavasena vebhabyā. Aniccādīnaṃ cintanakavasena cintā. Yassa vā uppajjati taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1324_7: aniccādīni cintāpetītipi cintā. Aniccādīni upaparikkhatīti upaparikkhā. Bhūrīti pathaviyā
atk-abh01a0:1324_8: nāmaṃ. Ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthaṭaṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī. Tena vuttaṃ – “bhūrī
atk-abh01a0:1324_9: vuccati pathavī. Tāya pathavīsamāya vitthaṭāya vipulāya paññāya samannāgatoti bhūripaññoti.
atk-abh01a0:1324_10: Apica paññāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ bhūrī”ti. Bhūte atthe ramatītipi bhūrī. Asani viya
atk-abh01a0:1324_11: siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā. Yassa
atk-abh01a0:1324_12: uppajjati taṃ attahitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe parinetīti
atk-abh01a0:1324_13: pariṇāyikā. Aniccādivasena dhamme vipassatīti vipassanā. Sammā pakārehi aniccādīni
atk-abh01a0:1324_14: jānātīti sampajaññaṃ. Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe
atk-abh01a0:1324_15: dhāvanakaṃ kūṭacittaṃ vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viya patodo. Dassanalakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1324_16: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ. Paññāsaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Avijjāya na kampatīti
atk-abh01a0:1324_17: paññābalaṃ. Kilesacchedanaṭṭhena paññāva satthaṃ paññāsatthaṃ. Accuggataṭṭhena paññāva pāsādo paññāpāsādo.
atk-abh01a0:1325_0: Ālokanaṭṭhena paññāva āloko paññāāloko. Obhāsanaṭṭhena paññāva obhāso paññāobhāso.
atk-abh01a0:1325_1: Pajjotanaṭṭhena paññāva pajjoto paññāpajjoto. Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa
atk-abh01a0:1325_2: dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā ekobhāsā ekapajjotā hoti, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Imesu pana
atk-abh01a0:1325_3: tīsu padesu ekapadenapi etasmiṃ atthe siddhe, yāni panetāni “cattārome, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:1325_4: ālokā. Katame cattāro? Candāloko sūriyāloko agyāloko paññāloko. Ime kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:1325_5: cattāro ālokā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ catunnaṃ ālokānaṃ yadidaṃ paññāloko”.
atk-abh01a0:1325_6: Tathā “cattārome, bhikkhave, obhāsā…pe… cattārome, bhikkhave, pajjotā”ti sattānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1325_7: ajjhāsayavasena suttāni desitāni, tadanurūpeneva idhāpi desanā katā. Attho hi anekehi
atk-abh01a0:1325_8: ākārehi vibhajjamāno suvibhatto hoti. Aññathā ca añño bujjhati, aññathā ca aññoti.
atk-abh01a0:1326_0: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena pana ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1326_1: atulaṭṭhena anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ca paññāva ratanaṃ paññāratanaṃ. Na tena sattā
atk-abh01a0:1326_2: muyhanti, sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho. Dhammavicayapadaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-abh01a0:1326_3: Kasmā panetaṃ puna vuttanti? Amohassa mohapaṭipakkhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti
atk-abh01a0:1326_4: – yvāyaṃ amoho so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo, mohassa pana paṭipakkho, dhammavicayasaṅkhāto
atk-abh01a0:1326_5: amoho nāma idha adhippetoti. Sammādiṭṭhīti yāthāvaniyyānikakusaladiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1327_0: 19. Jīvitindriyaniddese yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti tesaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1327_1: yo āyāpanaṭṭhena āyu, tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā ayanti gacchanti pavattanti, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1327_2: āyūti vuccati. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ. Yasmā panete dhammā āyusmiṃyeva sati tiṭṭhanti
atk-abh01a0:1327_3: yapenti yāpenti iriyanti vattanti pālayanti, tasmā ṭhitītiādīni vuttāni. Vacanattho
atk-abh01a0:1327_4: panettha – etāya tiṭṭhantīti ṭhiti. Yapentīti yapanā. Tathā yāpanā. Evaṃ bujjhantānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1327_5: pana vasena purimapade rassattaṃ kataṃ. Etāya iriyantīti iriyanā. Vattantīti vattanā.
atk-abh01a0:1327_6: Pālayantīti pālanā. Jīvanti etenāti jīvitaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti jīvitindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1328_0: 30. Hiribalaniddese yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti yena dhammena tasmiṃ samaye. Liṅgavipallāsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1328_1: vā katvā yo dhammo tasmiṃ samayetipi attho veditabbo. Hiriyitabbenāti upayogatthe
atk-abh01a0:1328_2: karaṇavacanaṃ. Hiriyitabbayuttakaṃ kāyaduccaritādidhammaṃ hiriyati jigucchatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1328_3: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Samāpattiyāti
atk-abh01a0:1328_4: idampi upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṭilābhaṃ samaṅgībhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1329_1: ottappassa hetubhūtena kāyaduccaritādinā vuttappakārāya ca samāpattiyā ottappassa
atk-abh01a0:1330_0: 32. Alobhaniddese alubbhanakavasena alobho. Na lubbhatītipi alobho. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1330_1: Alubbhanāti alubbhanākāro. Lobhasamaṅgī puggalo lubbhito nāma. Na lubbhito alubbhito.
atk-abh01a0:1330_2: Alubbhitassa bhāvo alubbhitattaṃ. Sārāgapaṭipakkhato na sārāgoti asārāgo. Asārajjanāti
atk-abh01a0:1330_3: asārajjanākāro. Asārajjitassa bhāvo asārajjitattaṃ. Na abhijjhāyatīti anabhijjhā.
atk-abh01a0:1330_4: Alobho kusalamūlanti alobhasaṅkhātaṃ kusalamūlaṃ. Alobho hi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mūlaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1330_5: paccayaṭṭhenāti kusalamūlaṃ. Kusalañca taṃ paccayaṭṭhena mūlañcātipi kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1331_0: 33. Adosaniddese adussanakavasena adoso. Na dussatītipi adoso. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1331_1: Adussanāti adussanākāro. Adussitassa bhāvo adussitattaṃ. Byāpādapaṭipakkhato na byāpādoti
atk-abh01a0:1331_2: abyāpādo. Kodhadukkhapaṭipakkhato na byāpajjoti abyāpajjo. Adosasaṅkhātaṃ kusalamūlaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1332_0: 40-41. Kāyapassaddhiniddesādīsu yasmā kāyoti tayo khandhā adhippetā, tasmā vedanākkhandhassātiādi
atk-abh01a0:1332_1: vuttaṃ. Passambhanti etāya te dhammā, vigatadarathā bhavanti, samassāsappattāti passaddhi.
atk-abh01a0:1332_2: Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Passambhanāti passambhanākāro. Dutiyapadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1332_4: bhāvo paṭippassambhitattaṃ. Sabbapadehipi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhi
atk-abh01a0:1332_5: eva kathitā. Dutiyanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa darathapaṭippassaddhi kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1333_0: 42-43. Lahutāti lahutākāro. Lahupariṇāmatāti lahupariṇāmo etesaṃ dhammānanti lahupariṇāmā;
atk-abh01a0:1333_1: tesaṃ bhāvo lahupariṇāmatā; sīghaṃ sīghaṃ parivattanasamatthatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Adandhanatāti
atk-abh01a0:1333_3: abhāvena athaddhatā. Evaṃ paṭhamena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ lahutākāro kathito. Dutiyena
atk-abh01a0:1334_0: 44-45. Mudutāti mudubhāvo. Maddavatāti maddavaṃ vuccati siniddhaṃ, maṭṭhaṃ; maddavassa
atk-abh01a0:1334_1: bhāvo maddavatā. Akakkhaḷatāti akakkhaḷabhāvo. Akathinatāti akathinabhāvo. Idhāpi
atk-abh01a0:1334_2: purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa mudutākārova kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1335_0: 46-47. Kammaññatāti kammani sādhutā; kusalakiriyāya viniyogakkhamatāti attho. Sesapadadvayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1335_1: byañjanavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Padadvayenāpi hi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena
atk-abh01a0:1336_0: 48-49. Paguṇatāti paguṇabhāvo, anāturatā niggilānatāti attho. Sesapadadvayaṃ byañjanavasena
atk-abh01a0:1336_1: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Idhāpi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa
atk-abh01a0:1337_0: 50-51. Ujukatāti ujukabhāvo, ujukenākārena pavattanatāti attho. Ujukassa khandhattayassa
atk-abh01a0:1337_1: viññāṇakkhandhassa ca bhāvo ujukatā. Ajimhatāti gomuttavaṅkabhāvapaṭikkhepo. Avaṅkatāti
atk-abh01a0:1338_0: Yo hi pāpaṃ katvāva ‘na karomī’ti bhāsati, so gantvā paccosakkanatāya ‘gomuttavaṅko’
atk-abh01a0:1338_1: nāma hoti. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘bhāyāmahaṃ pāpassā’ti bhāsati, so yebhuyyena kuṭilatāya
atk-abh01a0:1338_2: ‘candalekhāvaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyā’ti bhāsati,
atk-abh01a0:1338_3: so nātikuṭilatāya ‘naṅgalakoṭivaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yassa vā tīṇipi kammadvārāni asuddhāni,
atk-abh01a0:1338_4: so ‘gomuttavaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yassa yāni kānici dve, so ‘candalekhāvaṅko’ nāma. Yassa
atk-abh01a0:1339_0: Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu – ekacco bhikkhu sabbavaye ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu, chasu ca agocaresu
atk-abh01a0:1339_1: carati, ayaṃ ‘gomuttavaṅko’ nāma. Eko paṭhamavaye catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripūreti,
atk-abh01a0:1339_2: lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, majjhimavayapacchimavayesu purimasadiso, ayaṃ ‘candalekhāvaṅko’
atk-abh01a0:1339_3: nāma. Eko paṭhamavaye majjhimavayepi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako
atk-abh01a0:1339_4: sikkhākāmo hoti, pacchimavaye purimasadiso. Ayaṃ ‘naṅgalakoṭivaṅko’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1340_0: Tassa kilesavasena evaṃ vaṅkassa puggalassa bhāvo jimhatā vaṅkatā kuṭilatāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1340_1: Tāsaṃ paṭikkhepavasena ajimhatādikā vuttā. Khandhādhiṭṭhānāva desanā katā. Khandhānañhi
atk-abh01a0:1340_2: etā ajimhatādikā, no puggalassāti. Evaṃ sabbehipi imehi padehi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1340_3: khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassāti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ nikkilesatāya
atk-abh01a0:1341: Idāni yvāyaṃ yevāpanāti appanāvāro vutto, tena dhammuddesavāre dassitānaṃ ‘yevāpanakānaṃ’yeva saṅkhepato niddeso kathito hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1343_0: Ettāvatā pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti uddesavāre catūhi paricchedehi,
atk-abh01a0:1343_1: pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti niddesavāre catūhi paricchedehīti aṭṭhaparicchedapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-abh01a0:1345_0: 58-120. Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontīti saṅgahavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1345_1: So uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesānaṃ vasena tividho hoti. Tattha ‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye
atk-abh01a0:1345_2: cattāro khandhā’ti evamādiko uddeso. Katame tasmiṃ samaye cattāro khandhā’tiādiko
atk-abh01a0:1345_3: niddeso. Katamo tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhotiādiko paṭiniddesoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1346_0: Tattha uddesavāre cattāro khandhātiādayo tevīsati koṭṭhāsā honti. Tesaṃ evamattho
atk-abh01a0:1346_1: veditabbo – yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati, ye tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1346_2: samaye cittaṅgavasena uppannā, ṭhapetvā yevāpanake, pāḷiāruḷhā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā,
atk-abh01a0:1346_3: te sabbepi saṅgayhamānā rāsaṭṭhena cattārova khandhā honti. Heṭṭhā vuttena āyatanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1346_4: dve āyatanāni honti. Sabhāvaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena dveva dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh01a0:1346_5: Paccayasaṅkhātena āhāraṭṭhena tayovettha dhammā āhārā honti. Avasesā no āhārā.
atk-abh01a0:1347_0: ‘Kiṃ panete aññamaññaṃ vā taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa vā paccayā na hontī’ti? ‘No na honti.
atk-abh01a0:1347_1: Ime pana tathā ca honti, aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1347_2: āhārāti vuttā. Kathaṃ? Etesu hi phassāhāro, yesaṃ dhammānaṃ avasesā cittacetasikā
atk-abh01a0:1347_3: paccayā honti, tesañca paccayo hoti, tisso ca vedanā āharati. Manosañcetanāhāro tesañca
atk-abh01a0:1347_4: paccayo hoti tayo ca bhave āharati. Viññāṇāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti paṭisandhināmarūpañca
atk-abh01a0:1347_5: āharatī’ti. ‘Nanu ca so vipākova idaṃ pana kusalaviññāṇa’nti? ‘Kiñcāpi kusalaviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1347_6: taṃsarikkhatāya pana viññāṇāhāro’tveva vuttaṃ. Upatthambhakaṭṭhena vā ime tayo āhārāti
atk-abh01a0:1347_7: vuttā. Ime hi sampayuttadhammānaṃ, kabaḷīkārāhāro viya rūpakāyassa, upatthambhakapaccayā
atk-abh01a0:1347_8: honti. Teneva vuttaṃ – “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca
atk-abh01a0:1348_0: Aparo nayo – ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ca ime ca tayo dhammā
atk-abh01a0:1348_1: āhārāti vuttā. Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro
atk-abh01a0:1348_2: āhāro; nāmakāye vedanāya phasso, viññāṇassa manosañcetanā, nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:1349: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati”. Tathā phassapaccayā vedanā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti.
atk-abh01a0:1350_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhena pana aṭṭheva dhammā indriyāni honti, na avasesā. Tena vuttaṃ – aṭṭhindriyāni
atk-abh01a0:1350_1: hontīti. Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena pañceva dhammā jhānaṅgāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ – pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1351_0: Niyyānaṭṭhena ca hetvaṭṭhena ca pañceva dhammā maggaṅgāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ – pañcaṅgiko
atk-abh01a0:1351_1: maggo hotīti. Kiñcāpi hi aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo, lokiyacitte pana ekakkhaṇe tisso
atk-abh01a0:1351_2: viratiyo na labbhanti, tasmā pañcaṅgikoti vutto. ‘Nanu ca “yathāgatamaggoti kho,
atk-abh01a0:1351_3: bhikkhu, ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ sutte ‘yatheva
atk-abh01a0:1351_4: lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko, pubbabhāgavipassanāmaggopi tatheva aṭṭhaṅgiko’ti yathāgatavacanena
atk-abh01a0:1351_5: imassatthassa dīpitattā, lokiyamaggenāpi aṭṭhaṅgikena bhavitabbanti? Na bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1351_6: Ayañhi suttantikadesanā nāma pariyāyadesanā. Tenāha – “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1351_7: vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti. Ayaṃ pana nippariyāyadesanā. Lokiyacittasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1351_8: tisso viratiyo ekakkhaṇe na labbhanti, tasmā ‘pañcaṅgiko’va vuttoti.
atk-abh01a0:1352_0: Akampiyaṭṭhena pana satteva dhammā balāni honti. Mūlaṭṭhena tayova dhammā hetū. Phusanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1352_1: ekova dhammo phasso. Vedayitaṭṭhena ekova dhammo vedanā. Sañjānanaṭṭhena ekova dhammo
atk-abh01a0:1352_2: saññā. Cetayanaṭṭhena ekova dhammo cetanā. Cittavicittaṭṭhena ekova dhammo cittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1352_3: Rāsaṭṭhena ceva vedayitaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo vedanākkhandho. Rāsaṭṭhena ca sañjānanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1352_4: ca ekova dhammo saññākkhandho. Rāsaṭṭhena ca abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo
atk-abh01a0:1352_5: saṅkhārakkhandho. Rāsaṭṭhena ca cittavicittaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo viññāṇakkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1352_6: Vijānanaṭṭhena ceva heṭṭhā vuttaāyatanaṭṭhena ca ekameva manāyatanaṃ. Vijānanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1352_7: ca adhipatiyaṭṭhena ca ekameva manindriyaṃ. Vijānanaṭṭhena ca sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1352_8: ca ekova dhammo manoviññāṇadhātu nāma hoti, na avasesā. Ṭhapetvā pana cittaṃ, yathāvuttena
atk-abh01a0:1352_9: atthena avasesā sabbepi dhammā ekaṃ dhammāyatanameva, ekā ca dhammadhātuyeva hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1353_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayeti iminā pana appanāvārena idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttā yevāpanakāva
atk-abh01a0:1353_1: saṅgahitā. Yathā ca idha evaṃ sabbattha. Ito parañhi ettakampi na vicārayissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1357_0: 121-145. Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontīti suññatavāro āraddho. So uddesaniddesavasena
atk-abh01a0:1357_1: dvidhā vavatthito. Tattha uddesavāre ‘dhammā hontī’ti iminā saddhiṃ catuvīsati koṭṭhāsā
atk-abh01a0:1357_2: honti. Sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ca ‘cattāro dve tayo’ti gaṇanaparicchedo na vutto. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1357_3: Saṅgahavāre paricchinnattā. Tattha paricchinnadhammāyeva hi idhāpi vuttā. Na hettha
atk-abh01a0:1357_4: satto vā bhāvo vā attā vā upalabbhati. Dhammāva ete dhammamattā asārā apariṇāyakāti
atk-abh01a0:1357_5: imissā suññatāya dīpanatthaṃ vuttā. Tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo – yasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1357_6: kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṅgavasena uppannā
atk-abh01a0:1357_7: atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammā eva honti. Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1357_8: vā poso vā puggalo vā hotīti. Tathā rāsaṭṭhena khandhāva hontīti. Evaṃ purimanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1357_9: sabbapadesu atthayojanā veditabbā. Yasmā pana jhānato aññaṃ jhānaṅgaṃ, maggato vā
atk-abh01a0:1357_10: aññaṃ maggaṅgaṃ natthi, tasmā idha ‘jhānaṃ hoti, maggo hoti’ icceva vuttaṃ. Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1357_11: hi jhānameva hetvaṭṭhena maggova hoti. Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo vāti. Evaṃ sabbapadesu
atk-abh01a0:1359: Niṭṭhitā ca tīhi mahāvārehi maṇḍetvā niddiṭṭhassa
atk-abh01a0:1362_0: 146. Idāni dutiyacittādīni dassetuṃ puna “katame dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tesu sabbesupi
atk-abh01a0:1362_1: paṭhamacitte vuttanayeneva tayo tayo mahāvārā veditabbā. Na kevalañca mahāvārā eva,
atk-abh01a0:1362_2: paṭhamacitte vuttasadisānaṃ sabbapadānaṃ atthopi vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ito parampi
atk-abh01a0:1362_3: apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma. Imasmiṃ tāva dutiyacittaniddese sasaṅkhārenāti
atk-abh01a0:1362_4: idameva apubbaṃ. Tassattho – saha saṅkhārenāti sasaṅkhāro. Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena
atk-abh01a0:1362_5: saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti attho. Yena hi ārammaṇādinā paccayagaṇena paṭhamaṃ mahācittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1362_6: uppajjati, teneva sappayogena saupāyena idaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1363_0: Tassevaṃ uppatti veditabbā – idhekacco bhikkhu vihārapaccante vasamāno cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanavelāya
atk-abh01a0:1363_1: vā therupaṭṭhānavelāya vā sampattāya, dhammasavanadivase vā sampatte ‘mayhaṃ gantvā
atk-abh01a0:1363_2: paccāgacchato atidūraṃ bhavissati, na gamissāmī’ti cintetvā puna cinteti – ‘bhikkhussa
atk-abh01a0:1363_3: nāma cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ vā therupaṭṭhānaṃ vā dhammasavanaṃ vā agantuṃ asāruppaṃ, gamissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1363_4: gacchati. Tassevaṃ attano payogena vā, parena vā vattādīnaṃ akaraṇe ca ādīnavaṃ karaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1363_5: ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā ovadiyamānassa, niggahavaseneva vā ‘ehi, idaṃ karohī’ti kāriyamānassa
atk-abh01a0:1363_6: uppannaṃ kusalacittaṃ sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1366_0: 147-148. Tatiye ñāṇena vippayuttanti ñāṇavippayuttaṃ. Idampi hi ārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1366_1: hoti paricchindakañāṇaṃ panettha na hoti. Tasmā idaṃ daharakumārakānaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:1366_2: ‘ayaṃ thero mayha’nti vandanakāle, teneva nayena cetiyavandanadhammasavanakālādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1366_3: ca uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ panettha sattasu ṭhānesu paññā parihāyati. Sesaṃ pākatikamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1369_0: 149. Catutthacittepi eseva nayo. Idaṃ pana sasaṅkhārenāti vacanato yadā mātāpitaro
atk-abh01a0:1369_1: daharakumārake sīse gahetvā cetiyādīni vandāpenti te ca anatthikā samānāpi haṭṭhapahaṭṭhāva
atk-abh01a0:1372_0: 150. Pañcame upekkhāsahagatanti upekkhāvedanāya sampayuttaṃ. Idañhi ārammaṇe majjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1372_1: hoti. Paricchindakañāṇaṃ panettha hotiyeva. Pāḷiyaṃ panettha jhānacatukke upekkhā
atk-abh01a0:1372_2: hotīti indriyaṭṭhake upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vatvā sabbesampi vedanādipadānaṃ niddese
atk-abh01a0:1372_3: sātāsātasukhadukkhapaṭikkhepavasena desanaṃ katvā adukkhamasukhavedanā kathitā. Tassā
atk-abh01a0:1372_5: ca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pīti parihīnā. Tasmā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhā pañcapaṇṇāseva dhammā
atk-abh01a0:1372_6: honti. Tesaṃ vasena sabbakoṭṭhāsesu sabbavāresu ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1375_1: Kevalañhi imesu vedanāparivattanañceva pītiparihānañca hoti. Sesaṃ saddhiṃ uppattinayena
atk-abh01a0:1375_2: tādisameva. Karuṇāmuditā parikammakālepi hi imesaṃ uppatti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātā
atk-abh01a0:1377_0: Tāni sabbānipi dasahi puññakiriyavatthūhi dīpetabbāni. Kathaṃ? Dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
atk-abh01a0:1377_2: abbhanumodanaṃ… desanāmayaṃ… savanamayaṃ… diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthūti imāni
atk-abh01a0:1377_3: dasa puññakiriyavatthūni nāma. Tattha dānameva dānamayaṃ. Puññakiriyā ca sā tesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1377_4: tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthu cāti puññakiriyavatthu. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1378_0: Tattha cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu, rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu, annādīsu vā dasasu
atk-abh01a0:1378_1: dānavatthūsu, taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge, pariccāgakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1378_2: pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇakāle cāti tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā ‘dānamayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1379_0: Pañcasīlaṃ aṭṭhasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādiyantassa, ‘pabbajissāmī’ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa,
atk-abh01a0:1379_1: pabbajantassa, ‘manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā pabbajito vata’mhi, ‘sādhu sādhū’ti
atk-abh01a0:1379_2: āvajjentassa, pātimokkhaṃ saṃvarantassa, cīvarādayo paccaye paccavekkhantassa, āpāthagatesu
atk-abh01a0:1379_3: rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa, ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā ‘sīlamayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1380_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1380_1: manaṃ… rūpe…pe… dhamme… cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ,… cakkhusamphassaṃ…pe… manosamphassaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1380_2: cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, …pe… rūpasaññaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1380_3: aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā, aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu
atk-abh01a0:1380_4: appanaṃ appattā sabbāpi cetanā ‘bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1382_0: Vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattappaṭipattikaraṇavasena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:1382_1: pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena, ‘gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1382_2: āharā’ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca kāyaveyyāvaṭikakāle ‘veyyāvaccasahagataṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1383_0: Dānaṃ datvā gandhādīhi pūjaṃ katvā ‘asukassa nāma patti hotū’ti vā, ‘sabbasattānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1383_1: hotū’ti vā pattiṃ dadato ‘pattānuppadānaṃ’ veditabbaṃ. Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato
atk-abh01a0:1383_2: puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti. Yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa
atk-abh01a0:1383_3: paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo; purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimāloko ekato hutvā
atk-abh01a0:1383_4: atimahā hoti. Evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma natthi. Vuḍḍhiyeva pana hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1384: Parehi dinnāya pattiyā vā aññāya vā puññakiriyāya ‘sādhu sādhū’ti anumodanavasena ‘abbhanumodanaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1385_0: Eko ‘evaṃ maṃ dhammakathikoti maṃ jānissantī’ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhagaruko hutvā
atk-abh01a0:1385_1: deseti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. Eko attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ apaccāsīsamāno vimuttāyatanasīsena
atk-abh01a0:1386_0: Eko suṇanto ‘iti maṃ saddhoti jānissantī’ti suṇāti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. Eko ‘evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1386_1: me mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’ti hitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ ‘savanamayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1387_0: Diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma. Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu
atk-abh01a0:1387_1: – ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci puññaṃ karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1388_0: Etesu pana puññakiriyavatthūsu dānamayaṃ tāva ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1388_1: dānaṃ dadato uppajjati, ‘dinnaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati. Evaṃ pubbacetanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1388_2: muñcanacetanaṃ aparacetananti tissopi cetanā ekato katvā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’
atk-abh01a0:1388_3: nāma hoti. Sīlamayampi ‘sīlaṃ pūressāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati, sīlapūraṇakāle
atk-abh01a0:1388_4: uppajjati, ‘pūritaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati. Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘sīlamayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1388_5: puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti…pe… diṭṭhijukammampi ‘diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentassa
atk-abh01a0:1388_6: uppajjati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa uppajjati, ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh01a0:1388_7: uppajjati. Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1389_0: Sutte pana tīṇiyeva puññakiriyavatthūni āgatāni. Tesu itaresampi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1389_1: Apacitiveyyāvaccāni hi sīlamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Pattānuppadānaabbhanumodanāni
atk-abh01a0:1389_2: dānamaye. Desanāsavanadiṭṭhijukammāni bhāvanāmaye. Ye pana ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1389_3: niyamalakkhaṇa’nti vadanti tesaṃ taṃ tīsupi saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Evametāni saṅkhepato
atk-abh01a0:1390_0: Tesu ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintento aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva cinteti;
atk-abh01a0:1390_1: dadamānopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena deti; ‘dānaṃ me dinna’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1390_2: aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Sīlaṃ pūressāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti;
atk-abh01a0:1390_3: sīlaṃ pūrentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena pūreti, ‘sīlaṃ me pūrita’nti paccavekkhantopi
atk-abh01a0:1390_4: tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Bhāvanaṃ bhāvessāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1390_5: aññatarena cinteti; bhāventopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena bhāveti; ‘bhāvanā me bhāvitā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1391_0: ‘Jeṭṭhāpacitikammaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, karontopi
atk-abh01a0:1391_1: tesaṃyeva aññatarena karoti, ‘kataṃ me’ti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1391_3: tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Pattiṃ dassāmī’ti cintentopi, dadantopi, ‘dinnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1391_4: me’ti paccavekkhantopi, ‘pattiṃ vā sesakusalaṃ vā anumodissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1391_5: aññatarena cinteti; anumodantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena anumodati, ‘anumoditaṃ me’ti
atk-abh01a0:1391_6: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Dhammaṃ desessāmī’ti cintentopi
atk-abh01a0:1391_7: tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, desentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena deseti, ‘desito me’ti
atk-abh01a0:1391_8: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Dhammaṃ sossāmī’ti cintentopi
atk-abh01a0:1391_9: tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, suṇantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena suṇāti, ‘suto me’ti
atk-abh01a0:1391_10: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1391_11: cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, ujuṃ karonto pana catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1391_12: aññatarena karoti, ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhanto aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1392_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri anantāni nāma gahitāni. Cattāri hi anantāni – ākāso ananto,
atk-abh01a0:1392_1: cakkavāḷāni anantāni, sattanikāyo ananto, buddhaññāṇaṃ anantaṃ. Ākāsassa hi puratthimāya
atk-abh01a0:1392_2: disāya vā pacchimuttaradakkhiṇāsu vā ettakāni vā yojanasatāni ettakāni vā yojanasahassānīti
atk-abh01a0:1392_3: paricchedo natthi. Sinerumattampi ayokūṭaṃ pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā heṭṭhā khittaṃ bhassetheva,
atk-abh01a0:1392_4: no patiṭṭhaṃ labhetha, evaṃ ākāsaṃ anantaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1393_0: Cakkavāḷānampi satehi vā sahassehi vā paricchedo natthi. Sacepi hi akaniṭṭhabhavane
atk-abh01a0:1393_1: nibbattā, daḷhathāmadhanuggahassa lahukena sarena tiriyaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanamattena
atk-abh01a0:1393_2: kālena cakkavāḷasatasahassaṃ atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgatā cattāro mahābrahmāno
atk-abh01a0:1393_3: ‘cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ passissāmā’ti tena javena dhāveyyuṃ, cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ adisvāva
atk-abh01a0:1394: Ettakesu pana cakkavāḷesu udakaṭṭhakathalaṭṭhakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Evaṃ sattanikāyo ananto nāma. Tatopi buddhañāṇaṃ anantameva.
atk-abh01a0:1395_1: ekassa bahūni uppajjanti. Bahūnampi bahūni uppajjanti. Tāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaraṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1395_3: Ekameva somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ hoti. Tathā sasaṅkhārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1395_4: mahācittaṃ…pe… tathā upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ dvihetukaṃ sasaṅkhārikacittanti.
atk-abh01a0:1395_5: Evaṃ sabbānipi aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjamānāni kāmāvacarakusalacittāni
atk-abh01a0:1395_6: sammāsambuddho mahātulāya tulayamāno viya, tumbe pakkhipitvā minamāno viya, sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:1395_7: paricchinditvā ‘aṭṭhevetānī’ti sarikkhaṭṭhena aṭṭheva koṭṭhāse katvā dassesi.
atk-abh01a0:1396_0: Puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne chabbidhena puññāyūhanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ. Puññañhi atthi sayaṃkāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1396_1: atthi paraṃkāraṃ, atthi sāhatthikaṃ atthi āṇattikaṃ, atthi sampajānakataṃ atthi asampajānakatanti.
atk-abh01a0:1397_0: Tattha attano dhammatāya kataṃ ‘sayaṃkāraṃ’ nāma. Paraṃ karontaṃ disvā kataṃ ‘paraṃkāraṃ’
atk-abh01a0:1397_1: nāma. Sahatthena kataṃ ‘sāhatthikaṃ’ nāma. Āṇāpetvā kāritaṃ ‘āṇattikaṃ’ nāma. Kammañca
atk-abh01a0:1397_2: phalañca saddahitvā kataṃ ‘sampajānakataṃ’ nāma. Kammampi phalampi ajānitvā kataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1397_3: ‘asampajānakataṃ’ nāma. Tesu sayaṃkāraṃ karontopi imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1397_4: aññatareneva karoti. Paraṃkāraṃ karontopi, sahatthena karontopi, āṇāpetvā karontopi
atk-abh01a0:1397_5: imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva karoti. Sampajānakaraṇaṃ pana catūhi
atk-abh01a0:1398_0: Aparāpi imasmiṃ ṭhāne catasso dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo gahitā – paccayānaṃ dhammikatā,
atk-abh01a0:1398_1: cetanāmahattaṃ, vatthusampatti, guṇātirekatāti. Tattha dhammena samena uppannā paccayā
atk-abh01a0:1398_2: ‘dhammikā’ nāma. Saddahitvā okappetvā dadato pana ‘cetanāmahattaṃ’ nāma hoti. Khīṇāsavabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1398_4: Imāni cattāri samodhānetvā dātuṃ sakkontassa kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-abh01a0:1399_0: Saṅkhepato panetaṃ sabbampi kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ ‘citta’nti karitvā cittavicittaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1399_1: ekameva hoti. Vedanāvasena somanassasahagataṃ upekkhāsahagatanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Ñāṇavibhattidesanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1399_2: catubbidhaṃ hoti. Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittañhi upekkhāsahagataṃ
atk-abh01a0:1399_4: ca ekameva hoti. Tathā ñāṇasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1399_5: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārikañcāti. Evaṃ ñāṇavibhattidesanāvasena catubbidhe panetasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1399_6: asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravibhattito cattāri asaṅkhārikāni cattāri sasaṅkhārikānīti aṭṭheva
atk-abh01a0:1399_7: kusalacittāni honti. Tāni yāthāvato ñatvā bhagavā sabbaññū gaṇīvaro muniseṭṭho ācikkhati
atk-abh01a0:1399_8: deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkarotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1404_0: 160. Idāni rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1404_1: rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetīti rūpaṃ vuccati rūpabhavo. Upapattīti nibbatti jāti
atk-abh01a0:1404_2: sañjāti. Maggoti upāyo. Vacanattho panettha – taṃ upapattiṃ maggati gavesati janeti
atk-abh01a0:1404_3: nipphādetīti maggo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena maggena rūpabhave upapatti hoti nibbatti
atk-abh01a0:1404_4: jāti sañjāti, taṃ maggaṃ bhāvetīti. Kiṃ panetena niyamato rūpabhave upapatti hotīti?
atk-abh01a0:1404_5: Na hoti. “Samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha, samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī”ti
atk-abh01a0:1404_6: evaṃ vuttena hi nibbedhabhāgiyena rūpabhavātikkamopi hoti. Rūpūpapattiyā pana ito
atk-abh01a0:1404_7: añño maggo nāma natthi, tena vuttaṃ ‘rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī’ti. Atthato cāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1404_8: maggo nāma cetanāpi hoti, cetanāya sampayuttadhammāpi, tadubhayampi. “Nirayañcāhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1404_9: sāriputta, pajānāmi nirayagāmiñca magga”nti hi ettha cetanā maggo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1405: “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānaṃ, dhammā ete sappurisānuyātā;
atk-abh01a0:1406: Etañhi maggaṃ diviyaṃ vadanti, etena hi gacchati devaloka”nti. ;
atk-abh01a0:1407_0: Ettha cetanāsampayuttadhammā maggo nāma. “Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, ayaṃ paṭipadā”ti
atk-abh01a0:1407_1: saṅkhārupapattisuttādīsu cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi maggo nāma. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1407_2: ṭhāne ‘jhāna’nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttā adhippetā. Yasmā pana jhānacetanā paṭisandhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1408_0: Bhāvetīti janeti uppādeti vaḍḍheti. Ayaṃ tāva idha bhāvanāya attho. Aññattha pana
atk-abh01a0:1408_1: upasaggavasena sambhāvanā paribhāvanā vibhāvanāti evaṃ aññathāpi attho hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1408_2: “idhudāyi mama sāvakā adhisīle sambhāventi – sīlavā samaṇo gotamo, paramena sīlakkhandhena
atk-abh01a0:1408_3: samannāgato”ti ayaṃ sambhāvanā nāma; okappanāti attho. “Sīlaparibhāvito samādhi mahapphalo
atk-abh01a0:1408_4: hoti mahānisaṃso, samādhiparibhāvitā paññā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā, paññāparibhāvitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1408_5: cittaṃ sammadeva āsavehi vimuccatī”ti ayaṃ paribhāvanā nāma; vāsanāti attho. “Iṅgha
atk-abh01a0:1408_6: rūpaṃ vibhāvehi, vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ vibhāvehī”ti ayaṃ vibhāvanā
atk-abh01a0:1408_7: nāma; antaradhāpanāti attho. “Puna caparaṃ, udāyi, akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā,
atk-abh01a0:1408_8: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”ti, ayaṃ pana uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1408_9: bhāvanā nāma. Imasmimpi ṭhāne ayameva adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘bhāvetīti janeti
atk-abh01a0:1409_0: Kasmā panettha, yathā kāmāvacarakusalaniddese dhammapubbaṅgamā desanā katā tathā
atk-abh01a0:1409_1: akatvā, puggalapubbaṅgamā katāti? Paṭipadāya sādhetabbato. Idañhi catūsu paṭipadāsu
atk-abh01a0:1409_2: aññatarāya sādhetabbaṃ; na kāmāvacaraṃ viya vinā paṭipadāya uppajjati. Paṭipadā ca
atk-abh01a0:1409_3: nāmesā paṭipannake sati hotīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puggalapubbaṅgamaṃ desanaṃ karonto
atk-abh01a0:1410_0: Vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā, vinā hutvā, apakkamitvā. Yo panāyamettha ‘eva’-kāro
atk-abh01a0:1410_1: so niyamatthoti veditabbo. Yasmā ca niyamattho, tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-abh01a0:1410_2: viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ, kāmapariccāgeneva
atk-abh01a0:1410_3: cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ? ‘Vivicceva kāmehī’ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1410_4: paññāyati – nūnimassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ na pavattati, andhakāre
atk-abh01a0:1410_5: sati padīpobhāso viya? Tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti orimatīrapariccāgena
atk-abh01a0:1411_0: Tattha siyā – ‘kasmā panesa pubbapadeyeva vutto, na uttarapade? Kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi
atk-abh01a0:1411_1: aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā’ti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃnissaraṇato
atk-abh01a0:1411_2: hi pubbapade esa vutto. Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1411_3: jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha – “kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti.
atk-abh01a0:1411_4: Uttarapadepi pana, yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha
atk-abh01a0:1411_5: ‘eva’-kāro ānetvā vuccati, evaṃ vattabbo. Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi
atk-abh01a0:1411_6: akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ, tasmā ‘vivicceva kāmehi
atk-abh01a0:1411_7: vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī’ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo. Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi
atk-abh01a0:1411_8: viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā
atk-abh01a0:1411_9: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1412_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā? Manāpiyā rūpā”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:1412_1: nayena vatthukāmā vuttā, ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo, rāgo kāmo, chandarāgo
atk-abh01a0:1412_2: kāmo; saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo kāmo; ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā
atk-abh01a0:1412_3: vuttā, te sabbepi saṅgahitāicceva daṭṭhabbā. Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi
atk-abh01a0:1412_4: viviccevāti attho yujjati. Tena kāyaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1413_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-abh01a0:1413_1: Tena cittaviveko vutto hoti. Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
atk-abh01a0:1413_2: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1413_4: dutiyena saṃkilesappahānaṃ; paṭhamena lolabhāvassa hetupariccāgo, dutiyena bālabhāvassa;
atk-abh01a0:1413_5: paṭhamena ca payogasuddhi, dutiyena āsayaposanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hotīti ñātabbaṃ. Esa
atk-abh01a0:1414_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana ‘chandoti ca rāgo’ti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva
atk-abh01a0:1414_1: kāmoti adhippeto. So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmacchando kāmo”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:1414_2: nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto. Kilesakāmattā vā purimapade vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1414_4: vuttaṃ. Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā?
atk-abh01a0:1414_6: nīvaraṇāneva vuttāni. Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni. Tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni,
atk-abh01a0:1414_7: viddhaṃsakāni, vighātakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi “samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho,
atk-abh01a0:1414_8: pīti byāpādassa, vitakko thinamiddhassa, sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāyā”ti peṭake vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1415_0: Evamettha ‘vivicceva kāmehī’ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1415_1: ‘Vivicca akusalehi dhammehī’ti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana
atk-abh01a0:1415_2: paṭhamena kāmacchandassa, dutiyena sesanīvaraṇānaṃ; tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu
atk-abh01a0:1415_6: dutiyena avijjāya taṃsampayuttakānañca. Apica paṭhamena lobhasampayuttaaṭṭhacittuppādānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1415_7: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1415_8: Ayaṃ tāva ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī’ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-abh01a0:1416_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1416_1: savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇādivibhāgena appanāsampayogato
atk-abh01a0:1416_2: rūpāvacarabhāvappattena vitakkena ceva vicārena ca saha vattati. Rukkho viya pupphena
atk-abh01a0:1416_3: ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ savitakkaṃ savicāranti vuccati. Vibhaṅge pana “iminā
atk-abh01a0:1416_4: ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:1416_5: desanā katā. Attho pana tatrapi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1417_0: Vivekajanti – ettha vivitti viveko. Nīvaraṇavigamoti attho. Vivittoti vā viveko,
atk-abh01a0:1417_1: nīvaraṇavivitto jhānasampayuttadhammarāsīti attho. Tasmā vivekā, tasmiṃ vā viveke,
atk-abh01a0:1417_2: jātanti vivekajaṃ. Pītisukhanti – ettha pītisukhāni heṭṭhā pakāsitāneva. Tesu pana
atk-abh01a0:1417_3: vuttappakārāya pañcavidhāya pītiyā yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1417_4: gatā pharaṇāpīti – ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā pītīti. Ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1417_5: assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati. Atha vā pīti
atk-abh01a0:1417_6: ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ, dhammavinayādayo viya. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhamassa jhānassa,
atk-abh01a0:1417_7: asmiṃ vā jhāne, atthīti evampi vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ. Yatheva hi jhānaṃ evaṃ pītisukhampettha
atk-abh01a0:1417_8: vivekajameva hoti. Tañcassa atthi. Tasmā ekapadeneva ‘vivekajaṃ pītisukha’nti vattuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1417_9: yujjati. Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1418_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānanti – ettha gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ uppannanti paṭhamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1418_1: Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjitabbantipi paṭhamaṃ. Idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ. Ciṇṇavasībhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1418_2: hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti. Matthakato
atk-abh01a0:1418_3: paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti. Antarantarā okkamantopi sakkoti. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1419_0: Jhānanti duvidhaṃ jhānaṃ – ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti. Tattha aṭṭha
atk-abh01a0:1419_2: gatā. Vipassanāmaggaphalāni pana lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ nāma. Tattha vipassanā aniccādilakkhaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1419_3: upanijjhānato lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. Vipassanāya katakiccassa maggena ijjhanato maggo
atk-abh01a0:1419_4: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. Phalaṃ pana nirodhasaccaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1419_5: nāma. Tesu imasmiṃ atthe ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tasmā ārammaṇūpanijjhānato
atk-abh01a0:1420_0: Upasampajjāti upagantvā, pāpuṇitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasampādayitvā vā nipphādetvāti
atk-abh01a0:1420_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti
atk-abh01a0:1420_2: sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi evamevattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1420_3: Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajjhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa
atk-abh01a0:1420_4: iriyanaṃ vuttiṃ pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1420_5: vibhaṅge – “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati, tena
atk-abh01a0:1421_0: Pathavikasiṇanti ettha pathavimaṇḍalampi sakalaṭṭhena pathavikasiṇanti vuccati. Taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1421_1: nissāya paṭiladdhaṃ nimittampi. Pathavikasiṇanimitte paṭiladdhajjhānampi. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1421_2: imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti veditabbaṃ. Pathavikasiṇasaṅkhātaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-abh01a0:1421_3: viharatīti ayañhettha saṅkhepattho. Imasmiṃ pana pathavikasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catukkapañcakajjhānāni
atk-abh01a0:1421_4: nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattukāmena kulaputtena
atk-abh01a0:1421_6: cattāri sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena, yvāssa āvāsādīsu dasasu
atk-abh01a0:1421_7: palibodhesu palibodho atthi, taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1421_8: pāḷiyā āgatesu aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhantena
atk-abh01a0:1421_9: sacassa idaṃ pathavikasiṇaṃ anukūlaṃ hoti, idameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jhānabhāvanāya
atk-abh01a0:1421_10: ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1421_12: sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena jhānādhigamatthāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Ayamettha
atk-abh01a0:1421_13: saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Yathā cettha evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1421_14: ito paresupi. Sabbakammaṭṭhānānañhi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:1421_15: visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ. Kiṃ tena tattha tattha puna vuttenāti na naṃ puna vitthārayāma.
atk-abh01a0:1421_16: Pāḷiyā pana heṭṭhā anāgataṃ atthaṃ aparihāpentā nirantaraṃ anupadavaṇṇanameva karissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1422_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye. Phasso hoti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1422_1: avikkhepo hotīti ime kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusalacitte vuttappakārāya padapaṭipāṭiyā chapaṇṇāsa
atk-abh01a0:1422_2: dhammā honti. Kevalañhi te kāmāvacarā, ime bhūmantaravasena mahaggatā rūpāvacarāti
atk-abh01a0:1422_3: ayamettha viseso. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Yevāpanakā panettha chandādayo cattārova labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1425_0: 161-162. Dutiyajjhānaniddese vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa
atk-abh01a0:1425_1: cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā, samatikkamā; dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe apātubhāvāti vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1425_2: hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi, aññeyeva
atk-abh01a0:1425_3: hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo aññe idha, oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā
atk-abh01a0:1425_4: paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1425_5: vūpasamāti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ajjhattanti idha – niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1425_6: Vibhaṅge pana “ajjhattaṃ paccatta”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Yasmā niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1425_7: tasmā attani jātaṃ, attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh01a0:1426_0: Sampasādananti sampasādanaṃ vuccati saddhā. Sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1426_1: nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena
atk-abh01a0:1426_2: ca ceto sampasādayati, tasmāpi sampasādananti vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca atthavikappe ‘sampasādanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1426_3: cetaso’ti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo. Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe ‘cetaso’ti etaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1427_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthayojanā – eko udetīti ekodi, vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā aggo seṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:1427_1: hutvā udetīti attho. Seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccati. Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko
atk-abh01a0:1427_2: asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha vā sampayuttadhamme udāyatīti udi. Uṭṭhāpetīti
atk-abh01a0:1427_3: attho. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi. Samādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iti imaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1427_4: ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ. So panāyaṃ ekodi yasmā
atk-abh01a0:1427_5: cetaso, na sattassa, na jīvassa, tasmā etaṃ ‘cetaso ekodibhāva’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1428_0: ‘Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, ayañca ekodināmako samādhi, atha kasmā
atk-abh01a0:1428_1: idameva sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcāti vuttanti? Vuccate – ‘aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1428_2: vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satiyāpi
atk-abh01a0:1428_3: saddhāya sampasādana’nti na vuttaṃ. Na suppasannattā eva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu
atk-abh01a0:1428_4: pākaṭo. Tasmā ekodibhāvantipi na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1428_5: laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā, balavasaddhāsahāyapaṭilābheneva samādhipi pākaṭo. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1428_6: idameva evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā
atk-abh01a0:1428_7: okappanā abhippasādo; cetaso ekodibhāvanti yā cittassa ṭhiti…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti
atk-abh01a0:1428_8: ettakameva vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati
atk-abh01a0:1428_9: aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca, evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1429_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1429_1: Imināva nayena avicāraṃ. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ – “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā
atk-abh01a0:1429_2: honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā
atk-abh01a0:1430_0: Etthāha – nanu ca vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho? Atha kasmā
atk-abh01a0:1430_1: puna ‘vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ, siddhovāyamattho, na panetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1430_2: tadatthadīpakaṃ. Nanu avocumha – ‘oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā
atk-abh01a0:1430_3: paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1431_0: Apica vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ sampasādanaṃ, na kilesakālusiyassa; vitakkavicārānañca
atk-abh01a0:1431_1: vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ, na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā; na paṭhamajjhānamiva
atk-abh01a0:1431_2: ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:1431_3: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya,
atk-abh01a0:1431_4: cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca, abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
atk-abh01a0:1431_6: avitakkaṃ avicāranti idaṃ vacanaṃ, tasmā purimaṃ vatvāpi puna vattabbamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1432_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1432_1: kiñcāpi paṭhamampi sampayuttasamādhito jātaṃ, atha kho ayameva samādhi ‘samādhī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1432_2: vattabbataṃ arahati, vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā suppasannattā
atk-abh01a0:1432_3: ca. Tasmā imassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva samādhijanti vuttaṃ. Pītisukhanti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-abh01a0:1433_0: Dutiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā dutiyaṃ. Idaṃ dutiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi dutiyaṃ. Tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1433_1: phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake vitakkavicārapadāni maggapañcake ca sammāsaṅkappapadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1433_2: parihīnaṃ. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikapadavinicchayo veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavārepi
atk-abh01a0:1433_3: tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hotīti āgataṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhamajjhānasadisamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1436_0: 163. Tatiyajjhānaniddese pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1436_1: vā samatikkamo vā. Ubhinnaṃ pana antarā ‘ca’-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. So vūpasamaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:1436_2: sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā. Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā
atk-abh01a0:1436_3: virāgā ca, kiñca bhiyyo ‘vūpasamā’ cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya
atk-abh01a0:1436_4: virāgo jigucchanattho hoti. Tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1436_5: Yadā pana vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamaṃ sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo
atk-abh01a0:1436_6: ‘vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā’ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo
atk-abh01a0:1436_7: samatikkamanattho hoti, tasmā pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti
atk-abh01a0:1437_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā, imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1437_1: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ. Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati
atk-abh01a0:1437_2: – nūna vitakkavicāravūpasamo maggo imassa jhānassāti? Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge
atk-abh01a0:1437_4: evaṃ pahānaṃ vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti, tadadhigamāya ussukkānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1437_5: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1437_6: Tenāyamattho vutto – ‘pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1438_0: Upekkhako ca viharatīti – ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā. Samaṃ passati, apakkhapatitā
atk-abh01a0:1438_1: hutvā passatīti attho. Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī
atk-abh01a0:1439_0: Upekkhā pana dasavidhā hoti – chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā vīriyupekkhā
atk-abh01a0:1439_1: saṅkhārupekkhā vedanupekkhā vipassanupekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhā jhānupekkhā pārisuddhupekkhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1440_0: Tattha yā “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti, na dummano,
atk-abh01a0:1440_1: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
atk-abh01a0:1441: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘brahmavihārupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1442: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘bojjhaṅgupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1443: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘vīriyupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1444_0: Yā “kati saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, kati saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1444_1: uppajjanti? Aṭṭha saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1445: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā ayaṃ ‘vedanupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1446: Yā “yadatthi, yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘vipassanupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1447: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā ayaṃ, ‘tatramajjhattupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1448: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘jhānupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1449: Yā “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘pārisuddhupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1450_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā
atk-abh01a0:1450_1: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti. Tena
atk-abh01a0:1450_2: tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo. Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvathera senāpatirājādivasena
atk-abh01a0:1450_3: bhedo viya. Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo, yattha
atk-abh01a0:1450_4: vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1451_0: Yathā cetāsaṃ atthato ekībhāvo, evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhānampi. Paññā eva
atk-abh01a0:1451_1: hi esā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā. Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1451_2: ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā ‘sappo nu
atk-abh01a0:1451_3: kho no’ti avalokentassa sovatthikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa ‘sappo, na sappo’ti
atk-abh01a0:1451_4: vicinane majjhattatā hoti; evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye
atk-abh01a0:1451_5: diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati, ayaṃ ‘vipassanupekkhā’.
atk-abh01a0:1451_6: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍakena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā ‘kintāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1451_7: sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya’nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato
atk-abh01a0:1451_8: gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti; evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā, āditte viya tayo
atk-abh01a0:1451_9: bhave passato, saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā, ayaṃ ‘saṅkhārupekkhā’. Iti vipassanupekkhāya
atk-abh01a0:1451_10: siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti. Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena
atk-abh01a0:1451_11: kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti. Viriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi
atk-abh01a0:1452_0: Imāsu dasasu upekkhāsu ‘jhānupekkhā’ idha adhippetā. Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā anābhogarasā
atk-abh01a0:1452_1: abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha – nanu cāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva
atk-abh01a0:1452_2: hoti? Sā ca paṭhamadutiyajjhānesupi atthi, tasmā tatrāpi ‘upekkhako ca viharatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1452_3: evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā. Sā kasmā na vuttāti? Aparibyattakiccato. Aparibyattañhi tassā
atk-abh01a0:1452_4: tattha kiccaṃ, vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā. Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā
atk-abh01a0:1452_5: ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā, tasmā vuttāti.
atk-abh01a0:1455_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato. Sampajānātīti sampajāno. Iti puggalena
atk-abh01a0:1455_1: sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ. Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati, asammussanarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:1456_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi – muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa
atk-abh01a0:1456_1: upacāramattampi na sampajjati, pageva appanā – oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ, bhūmiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1456_2: viya purisassa, cittassa gati sukhā hoti, abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
atk-abh01a0:1456_3: pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa, purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya, satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
atk-abh01a0:1456_4: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo? Yathā dhenupago vaccho
atk-abh01a0:1456_5: dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati, evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1456_6: pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-abh01a0:1456_7: pītisampayuttameva siyā. Sukhe vāpi sattā sārajjanti, idañca atimadhuraṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1456_8: tato paraṃ sukhābhāvā. Satisampajaññānubhāvena panettha sukhe asārajjanā hoti, no
atk-abh01a0:1456_9: aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1457_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo
atk-abh01a0:1457_1: natthi, evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, yaṃ vā taṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1457_2: sukhaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo, yassa phuṭattā
atk-abh01a0:1457_3: jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento ‘sukhañca kāyena
atk-abh01a0:1458_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu
atk-abh01a0:1458_1: yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā “ācikkhanti desenti
atk-abh01a0:1458_2: paññāpenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāse”nti pasaṃsantīti
atk-abh01a0:1458_3: adhippāyo – kinti? ‘Upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti – taṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-abh01a0:1459_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti? Pasaṃsārahato. Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe
atk-abh01a0:1459_1: sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako, na tattha sukhābhisaṅgena ākaḍḍhīyati,
atk-abh01a0:1459_2: ‘yathā ca pīti na uppajjati’ evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā, yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1459_3: ariyajanasevitameva asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti tasmā pasaṃsāraho;
atk-abh01a0:1459_4: iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā ‘upekkhako satimā
atk-abh01a0:1460_0: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā tatiyaṃ. Idaṃ tatiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi tatiyaṃ. Tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh01a0:1460_1: phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake pītipadampi parihīnaṃ. Tassāpi vasena savibhattikāvibhattikapadavinicchayo
atk-abh01a0:1460_2: veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavārepi duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hotīti āgataṃ. Sesaṃ dutiyajjhānasadisamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1463_0: 165. Catutthajjhānaniddese sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa
atk-abh01a0:1463_1: ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā. Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe.
atk-abh01a0:1463_2: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi
atk-abh01a0:1463_3: dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā; pahānā icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti?
atk-abh01a0:1463_4: Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe. Somanassañhi catutthajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva
atk-abh01a0:1463_6: pahānakkamena avuttānaṃ indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1464_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, atha kasmā “kattha
atk-abh01a0:1464_1: cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
atk-abh01a0:1464_2: kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1464_3: nirujjhati. Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ… sukhindriyaṃ… somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1464_4: nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-abh01a0:1464_5: viharati. Etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva
atk-abh01a0:1464_6: nirodho vuttoti? Atisayanirodhattā. Atisayanirodho hi tesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu, na
atk-abh01a0:1464_7: nirodhoyeva. Nirodhoyeva pana upacārakkhaṇe, nātisayanirodho. Tathā hi nānāvajjane
atk-abh01a0:1464_8: paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā, visamāsanupatāpena
atk-abh01a0:1464_9: vā siyā uppatti, natveva antoappanāyaṃ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1464_10: hoti, paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto
atk-abh01a0:1464_11: hoti. Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ, paṭipakkhena vihatattā.
atk-abh01a0:1464_12: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi
atk-abh01a0:1464_13: kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicārābhāve neva uppajjati;
atk-abh01a0:1464_14: yattha pana uppajjati tattha vitakkavicārabhāve; appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre
atk-abh01a0:1464_15: vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti, natveva dutiyajjhāne, pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:1464_17: siyā uppatti, natveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
atk-abh01a0:1464_18: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā,
atk-abh01a0:1464_19: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca, siyā uppatti, natveva
atk-abh01a0:1464_20: catutthajjhāne. Tasmā eva ca ‘etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1465_0: Etthāha – ‘athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1465_1: ‘Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ’. Yā hi ayaṃ ‘adukkhamasukha’nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1465_2: sā sukhumā, dubbiññeyyā, na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ. Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
atk-abh01a0:1465_3: tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje
atk-abh01a0:1465_4: sabbā gāvo samāharati, athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ ‘ayaṃ so, gaṇhatha na’nti
atk-abh01a0:1465_5: tampi gāhāpayati; evameva bhagavā sukhagahaṇatthaṃ sabbāpi etā samāharīti. Evañhi
atk-abh01a0:1465_6: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ, na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1466_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_1: Sukhadukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
atk-abh01a0:1466_2: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso bhikkhu, sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1466_3: upasampajja viharati, ime kho, āvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā
atk-abh01a0:1466_4: samāpattiyā”ti. Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1466_5: tattha pahīnāti vuttā, evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_6: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_7: Etāsu hi sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa; dukkhaṃ domanassassa, domanassaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1466_8: dosassa. Sukhādighātena ca sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-abh01a0:1467_0: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṃ, sukhābhāvena asukhaṃ. Etenettha dukkhasukhappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1467_1: tatiyavedanaṃ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṃ. Tatiyavedanā nāma adukkhamasukhā.
atk-abh01a0:1467_2: Upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a0:1468_0: Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti upekkhāya janitasatipārisuddhiṃ. Imasmiñhi jhāne suparisuddhā
atk-abh01a0:1468_1: sati. Yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi sā upekkhāya katā, na aññena. Tasmā etaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhīti
atk-abh01a0:1468_2: vuccati. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
atk-abh01a0:1468_3: tena vuccati upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti. Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti
atk-abh01a0:1468_4: sā atthato tatramajjhattatāti veditabbā. Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā
atk-abh01a0:1468_5: apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā. Satisīsena pana desanā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1469_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati – yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
atk-abh01a0:1469_1: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
atk-abh01a0:1469_2: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā – evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
atk-abh01a0:1469_4: vijjamānāpi paṭhamādijjhānabhedesu aparisuddhā hoti. Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā
atk-abh01a0:1469_5: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1469_6: tesu ekampi ‘upekkhāsatipārisuddhī’ti na vuttaṃ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
atk-abh01a0:1469_7: sabhāgāya ca upekkhā vedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
atk-abh01a0:1469_8: ativiya parisuddhā. Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi
atk-abh01a0:1469_9: satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā. Tasmā idameva upekkhāsatipārisuddhīti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1470_0: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṃ. Idaṃ catutthaṃ samāpajjatītipi catutthaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1470_1: Phasso hotītiādīsu phassapañcake tāva vedanāti upekkhāvedanā veditabbā. Jhānapañcakaindriyaaṭṭhakesu
atk-abh01a0:1470_2: pana upekkhā hoti upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttameva. Sesāni tatiye parihīnapadāni idhāpi
atk-abh01a0:1470_3: parihīnāneva. Koṭṭhāsavārepi duvaṅgikaṃ jhānanti upekkhācittekaggatāvaseneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1473_0: 167. Idāni katame dhammā kusalāti pañcakanayo āraddho. Kasmāti ce, puggalajjhāsayavasena
atk-abh01a0:1473_1: ceva desanāvilāsena ca. Sannisinnadevaparisāya kira ekaccānaṃ devānaṃ vitakko eva
atk-abh01a0:1473_2: oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, vicārapītisukhacittekaggatā santato. Tesaṃ sappāyavasena satthā
atk-abh01a0:1473_3: caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi. Ekaccānaṃ vicāro
atk-abh01a0:1473_4: oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, pītisukhacittekaggatā santato. Tesaṃ sappāyavasena tivaṅgikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1473_5: tatiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi. Ekaccānaṃ pīti oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, sukhacittekaggatā
atk-abh01a0:1473_6: santato. Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi. Ekaccānaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1473_7: oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, upekkhācittekaggatā santato. Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1474_0: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti – sā tathāgatassa
atk-abh01a0:1474_1: suṭṭhu paṭividdhā – tasmā ñāṇamahattatāya desanāvidhānesu kusalo desanāvilāsappatto
atk-abh01a0:1474_2: satthā yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati tassa tassa vasena yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā
atk-abh01a0:1474_3: desanaṃ niyāmetīti so idha pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhājesi, caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1474_4: vicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ, bhājesi tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ, bhājesi duvaṅgikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1474_5: catutthajjhānaṃ, duvaṅgikameva pañcamajjhānaṃ bhājesi. Ayaṃ ‘desanāvilāso’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1475_0: Apica ye bhagavatā “tayome, bhikkhave, samādhī – savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto
atk-abh01a0:1475_1: samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhī”ti suttante tayo samādhī desitā, tesu heṭṭhā savitakkasavicāro
atk-abh01a0:1475_2: samādhi avitakkaavicāro samādhi ca bhājetvā dassito, avitakkavicāramatto na dassito.
atk-abh01a0:1475_3: Taṃ dassetumpi ayaṃ pañcakanayo āraddhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1476_0: Tattha dutiyajjhānaniddese phassādīsu vitakkamattaṃ parihāyati, koṭṭhāsavāre “caturaṅgikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1476_1: jhānaṃ hoti caturaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti ayameva viseso. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamajjhānasadisameva.
atk-abh01a0:1476_2: Yāni ca catukkanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthāni tāneva idha tatiyacatutthapañcamāni. Tesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1477_0: Eko kira amaccaputto rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ janapadato nagaraṃ āgato. So ekadivasameva
atk-abh01a0:1477_1: rājānaṃ disvā pānabyasanena sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ nāsesi. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ surāmadamattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1477_2: niccoḷaṃ katvā jiṇṇakaṭasārakamattena paṭicchādetvā pānāgārato nīhariṃsu. Tamenaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1477_3: saṅkārakūṭe nipajjitvā niddāyantaṃ eko aṅgavijjāpāṭhako disvā ‘ayaṃ puriso mahājanassa
atk-abh01a0:1477_4: avassayo bhavissati, paṭijaggitabbo eso’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā mattikāya nhāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:1477_5: thūlasāṭakayugaṃ nivāsāpetvā puna gandhodakena nhāpetvā sukhumena dukūlayugaḷena
atk-abh01a0:1477_6: acchādetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā ‘evaṃ naṃ paricāreyyāthā’ti paricārake
atk-abh01a0:1477_7: paṭipādetvā pakkāmi. Atha naṃ te sayanaṃ āropesuṃ. Pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthañca
atk-abh01a0:1477_8: naṃ cattāro tāva janā catūsu hatthapādesu uppīḷetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Eko pāde parimajji.
atk-abh01a0:1477_9: Eko tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bīji. Eko vīṇaṃ vādayamāno gāyanto nisīdi.
atk-abh01a0:1478_0: So sayanupagamanena vigatakilamatho thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito hatthapādanippīḷanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1478_1: asahamāno ‘ko me hatthapāde uppīḷeti? Apagacchathā’ti tajjesi. Te ekavacaneneva apagacchiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1478_2: Tato puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito pādaparimajjanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me pāde parimajjati?
atk-abh01a0:1478_3: Apagacchā’ti āha. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi. Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito vātavuṭṭhi
atk-abh01a0:1478_4: viya tālavaṇṭavātaṃ asahanto ‘ko esa? Apagacchatū’ti āha. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi.
atk-abh01a0:1478_5: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito kaṇṇasūlaṃ viya gītavāditasaddaṃ asahamāno vīṇāvādakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1478_6: tajjesi. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi. Athevaṃ anukkamena pahīnakilamathuppīḷanaparimajjanavātappahāragītavāditasaddupaddavo
atk-abh01a0:1478_7: sukhaṃ sayitvā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Rājāpissa mahantaṃ issariyamadāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1479_0: Tattha pānabyasanena pārijuññappatto so amaccaputto viya anekabyasanapārijuññappatto
atk-abh01a0:1479_1: gharāvāsagato kulaputto daṭṭhabbo. Aṅgavijjāpāṭhako puriso viya tathāgato. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1479_2: purisassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati, paṭijagganaṃ arahatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1479_3: viya tathāgatassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati, pabbajjaṃ arahati kulaputto’ti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1480_0: Athassa amaccaputtassa mattikāmattena nhāpanaṃ viya kulaputtassāpi pabbajjāpaṭilābho.
atk-abh01a0:1481_0: Dukūlacchāditassa panassa pāsādāropanaṃ viya imassāpi sīlavisuddhidukūlacchāditassa
atk-abh01a0:1481_1: samādhibhāvanāpāsādārohanaṃ. Tato tassa subhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya imassāpi samādhiupakārakasatisampajaññādidhammāmataparibhuñjanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1482_0: Bhuttabhojanassa pana tassa paricārakehi sayanāropanaṃ viya imassāpi vitakkādīhi
atk-abh01a0:1482_2: viya imassāpi kāmasaññābhimukhagamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ ārammaṇe cittuppīḷanako nekkhammavitakko.
atk-abh01a0:1482_3: Tassa pādaparimajjakapuriso viya imassāpi ārammaṇe cittānumajjanako vicāro. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1482_4: tālavaṇṭavātadāyako viya imassāpi cetaso sītalabhāvadāyikā pīti.
atk-abh01a0:1483_0: Tassa sotānuggahakaro gandhabbapuriso viya imassāpi cittānuggāhakaṃ somanassaṃ. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1483_1: sayanupagamanena vigatakilamathassa thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi upacārajjhānasannissayena
atk-abh01a0:1484_0: Athassa niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāduppīḷanāsahanena hatthapāduppīḷakānaṃ santajjanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1484_1: tesañca apagamanena puna thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa
atk-abh01a0:1484_2: cittuppīḷakavitakkāsahanena vitakkadosadassanaṃ, vitakkappahānā ca puna avitakkavicāramattadutiyajjhānupagamanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1485_0: Tato tassa punappunaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttena kamena pādaparimajjanādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1485_1: asahanena paṭipāṭiyā pādaparimajjakādīnaṃ santajjanaṃ, tesaṃ tesañca apagamanena
atk-abh01a0:1485_2: punappunaṃ thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi punappunaṃ dutiyādīhi jhānehi vuṭṭhitassa
atk-abh01a0:1485_3: yathāvuttadosānaṃ vicārādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā vicārādidosadassanaṃ. Tesaṃ tesañca
atk-abh01a0:1486: Tassa pana sayanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gatassa issariyappatti viya imassāpi pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa vipassanā maggaṃ upagatassa arahattappatti.
atk-abh01a0:1487: Tassa pattissariyassa bahūnaṃ janānaṃ avassayabhāvo viya imassāpi arahattappattassa bahūnaṃ avassayabhāvo veditabbo. Ettāvatā hi esa anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1489: Ettāvatā catukkapañcakanayadvayabhedo suddhikanavako nāma pakāsito hoti. Atthato panesa pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā jhānapañcako evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1491_0: 176-180. Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma paṭipadākamena sijjhati, tasmā tassa paṭipadābhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1491_1: dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā assāti dukkhapaṭipadaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1491_2: Dandhā abhiññā assāti dandhābhiññaṃ. Iti dukkhapaṭipadanti vā dandhābhiññanti vā
atk-abh01a0:1491_3: pathavīkasiṇanti vā tīṇipi jhānasseva nāmāni. Dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1492_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati
atk-abh01a0:1492_1: tāva pavattā jhānabhāvanā ‘paṭipadā’ti vuccati. Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā
atk-abh01a0:1492_2: tāva pavattā paññā ‘abhiññā’ti vuccati. Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1492_4: tadabhāvena sukhā. Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā hoti, mandā, asīghappavatti. Ekaccassa
atk-abh01a0:1492_5: khippā amandā sīghappavatti. Tasmā yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena
atk-abh01a0:1492_6: sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā nāma hoti. Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso
atk-abh01a0:1492_7: appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1492_8: Yo khippaṃ aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa khippābhiññā nāma hoti. Yo kilese vikkhambhento
atk-abh01a0:1492_9: sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti, tassa sukhā paṭipadā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1493_0: Tattha yāni sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni
atk-abh01a0:1493_1: ca visuddhimagge cittabhāvanāniddese niddiṭṭhāni, tesu yo asappāyasevī hoti, tassa
atk-abh01a0:1493_2: dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti. Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
atk-abh01a0:1493_3: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti, pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ
