atk-abh01a0:1493_4: sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī, tassa vomissakatā veditabbā. Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1493_5: pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti, vipariyāyena sukhā.
atk-abh01a0:1493_6: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti, sampādentassa khippā.
atk-abh01a0:1494_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanākatādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1494_1: Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti, anabhibhūtassa sukhā. Avijjābhibhūtassa
atk-abh01a0:1494_2: ca dandhā abhiññā hoti, anabhibhūtassa khippā. Yo ca samathe akatādhikāro tassa dukkhā
atk-abh01a0:1494_3: paṭipadā hoti, katādhikārassa sukhā. Yo pana vipassanāya akatādhikāro hoti, tassa
atk-abh01a0:1495_0: Kilesindriyavasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa
atk-abh01a0:1495_1: dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā, tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññā. Mandakilesassa
atk-abh01a0:1495_2: ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā, tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññāti.
atk-abh01a0:1496: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya abhiññāya jhānaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa taṃ jhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññanti vuccati. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1497_0: Tattha ‘tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhitibhāginī paññā’ti evaṃ vuttasatiyā vā
atk-abh01a0:1497_1: taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vā vikkhambhane paṭipadā, taṃtaṃjhānupacārappattassa appanāya
atk-abh01a0:1497_2: parivāse abhiññā ca veditabbā. Āgamanavasenāpi ca paṭipadā abhiññā hontiyeva. Dukkhapaṭipadañhi
atk-abh01a0:1497_3: dandhābhiññaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ patvā pavattaṃ dutiyampi tādisameva hoti. Tatiyacatutthesupi
atk-abh01a0:1497_4: eseva nayo. Yathā ca catukkanaye evaṃ pañcakanayepi paṭipadāvasena catudhā bhedo
atk-abh01a0:1497_5: veditabbo. Iti paṭipadāvasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti. Tesu pāṭhato chattiṃsa
atk-abh01a0:1497_6: cittāni, atthato pana pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā vīsatimeva bhavantīti.
atk-abh01a0:1500_0: 181. Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma yathā paṭipadābhedena evaṃ ārammaṇabhedenāpi catubbidhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1500_1: hoti. Tasmāssa taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1500_2: parittaṃ parittārammaṇantiādīsu yaṃ appaguṇaṃ hoti, uparijjhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ
atk-abh01a0:1500_3: na sakkoti, idaṃ parittaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana avaḍḍhite suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1500_4: pavattaṃ, taṃ parittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti parittārammaṇaṃ. Yaṃ paguṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ uparijjhānassa
atk-abh01a0:1500_5: paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, idaṃ appamāṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ vipule ārammaṇe pavattaṃ taṃ vuḍḍhippamāṇattā
atk-abh01a0:1500_6: appamāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Vuttalakkhaṇavomissakatāya pana vomissakanayo
atk-abh01a0:1500_7: veditabbo. Iti ārammaṇavasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti. Cittagaṇanāpettha purimasadisā evāti.
atk-abh01a0:1503_0: 186. Idāni ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissakaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā
atk-abh01a0:1503_1: kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha paṭhamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadattā dandhābhiññattā
atk-abh01a0:1503_2: parittattā parittārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi hīnaṃ, soḷasamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ sukhapaṭipadattā
atk-abh01a0:1503_3: khippābhiññattā appamāṇattā appamāṇārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi paṇītaṃ. Sesesu
atk-abh01a0:1503_4: cuddasasu ekena dvīhi tīhi ca kāraṇehi hīnappaṇītatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1504_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ nayo desitoti? Jhānuppattikāraṇattā. Sammāsambuddhena hi pathavīkasiṇe
atk-abh01a0:1504_1: suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena pañcakanayavasena ca dassitaṃ; tathā suddhikapaṭipadā,
atk-abh01a0:1504_2: tathā suddhikārammaṇaṃ. Tattha yā devatā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena
atk-abh01a0:1504_3: desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti, tāsaṃ sappāyavasena suddhikajjhāne catukkanayo desito.
atk-abh01a0:1504_4: Yā pañcakanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti, tāsaṃ sappāyavasena pañcakanayo.
atk-abh01a0:1504_5: Yā suddhikapaṭipadāya, suddhikārammaṇe catukkanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a0:1504_6: tāsaṃ sappāyavasena suddhikapaṭipadāya suddhikārammaṇe catukkanayo desito. Yā pañcakanayavasena
atk-abh01a0:1504_7: desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti tāsaṃ sappāyavasena pañcakanayo. Iti heṭṭhā puggalajjhāsayavasena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a0:1505_1: yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇassa suppaṭividdhattā dhammapaññattikusalatāya yo yo nayo labbhati
atk-abh01a0:1505_2: tassa tassa vasena desanaṃ niyametuṃ sakkoti, tasmā imāya desanāvilāsappattiyāpi
atk-abh01a0:1505_3: tena esā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikacatukkanayādivasena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a0:1506: Yasmā pana ye keci jhānaṃ uppādenti nāma na te ārammaṇapaṭipadāhi vinā uppādetuṃ sakkonti, tasmā niyamato jhānuppattikāraṇattā ayaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayo kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1507_0: Ettāvatā suddhikanavako, cattāro paṭipadānavakā, cattāro ārammaṇanavakā, ime ca soḷasa
atk-abh01a0:1507_1: navakāti pañcavīsati navakā kathitā honti. Tattha ekekasmiṃ navake catukkapañcakavasena
atk-abh01a0:1507_2: dve dve nayāti paññāsa nayā. Tattha “pañcavīsatiyā catukkanayesu sataṃ, pañcakanayesu
atk-abh01a0:1507_3: pañcavīsasata”nti pāṭhato pañcavīsādhikāni dve jhānacittasatāni honti. Pañcakanaye
atk-abh01a0:1507_4: pana catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā atthato pañcavīsādhikameva cittasataṃ hoti. Yāni
atk-abh01a0:1507_5: cetāni pāṭhe pañcavīsādhikāni dve cittasatāni tesu ekekassa niddese dhammavavatthānādayo
atk-abh01a0:1507_6: tayo tayo mahāvārā honti. Te pana tattha tattha nayamattameva dassetvā saṃkhittāti.
atk-abh01a0:1509_0: 203. Idāni yasmā āpokasiṇādīsupi etāni jhānāni uppajjanti, tasmā tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1509_1: puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tesu sabbo pāḷinayo ca atthavibhāvanā ca
atk-abh01a0:1509_2: cittagaṇanā ca vārasaṅkhepo ca pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Bhāvanānayo
atk-abh01a0:1509_3: pana kasiṇaparikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbo visuddhimagge (visuddhi 1.91 ādayo) pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:1509_4: Mahāsakuludāyisutte pana dasakasiṇāni vuttāni. Tesu viññāṇakasiṇaṃ ākāse pavattitamahaggataviññāṇampi
atk-abh01a0:1509_5: tattha parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattipi hotīti sabbappakārena
atk-abh01a0:1509_6: āruppadesanameva bhajati, tasmā imasmiṃ ṭhāne na kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1510_0: Ākāsakasiṇanti pana kasiṇugghāṭimamākāsampi, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattakkhandhāpi,
atk-abh01a0:1510_1: bhitticchiddādīsu aññatarasmiṃ gahetabbanimittaparicchedākāsampi, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1510_2: uppannaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānampi vuccati. Tattha purimanayo āruppadesanaṃ bhajati,
atk-abh01a0:1510_3: pacchimanayo rūpāvacaradesanaṃ. Iti missakattā imaṃ rūpāvacaradesanaṃ na āruḷhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1510_4: Paricchedākāse nibbattajjhānaṃ pana rūpūpapattiyā maggo hoti tasmā taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1510_5: Tasmiṃ pana catukkapañcakajjhānameva uppajjati, arūpajjhānaṃ nuppajjati. Kasmā? Kasiṇugghāṭanassa
atk-abh01a0:1510_6: alābhato. Tañhi punappunaṃ ugghāṭiyamānampi ākāsameva hotīti na tattha kasiṇugghāṭanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1510_7: labbhati, tasmā tatthuppannaṃ jhānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati, abhiññāpādakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1510_8: hoti, vipassanāpādakaṃ hoti, nirodhapādakaṃ na hoti. Anupubbanirodho panettha yāva
atk-abh01a0:1510_9: pañcamajjhānā labbhati vaṭṭapādakaṃ hotiyeva. Yathā cetaṃ evaṃ purimakasiṇesu uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1510_10: jhānampi. Nirodhapādakabhāvo panettha viseso. Sesamettha ākāsakasiṇe yaṃ vattabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1511_0: ‘Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’tiādinayaṃ pana vikubbanaṃ icchantena purimesu aṭṭhasu
atk-abh01a0:1511_1: kasiṇesu aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā kasiṇānulomato kasiṇapaṭilomato, kasiṇānulomapaṭilomato;
atk-abh01a0:1511_4: aṅgavavatthānato, ārammaṇavavatthānatoti imehi cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ paridametabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1512_0: Evaṃ pana cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā, pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro
atk-abh01a0:1512_1: iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ādikammikassa hi kasiṇaparikammampi
atk-abh01a0:1512_2: bhāro; satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Katakasiṇaparikammassa nimittuppādanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1512_3: bhāro; satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo
atk-abh01a0:1512_4: bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Adhigatappanassa cuddasahākārehi cittaparidamanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1512_5: bhāro; satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Cuddasahākārehi paridamitacittassāpi iddhivikubbanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1512_6: nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Vikubbanappattassāpi khippanisantibhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1512_7: nāma bhāro; satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisanti hoti. Therambatthale mahārohanaguttattherassa
atk-abh01a0:1512_8: gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko
atk-abh01a0:1512_9: rakkhitatthero viya. Sabbaṃ vatthu visuddhimagge vitthāritamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1515_0: 204. Evaṃ aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu rūpāvacarakusalaṃ niddisitvā, idāni yasmā samānepi ārammaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1515_1: bhāvanāya asamānaṃ imesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aññampi abhibhāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1515_2: pavattati, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ajjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1515_3: arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-abh01a0:1515_4: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu kataparikammatāya parikammavasena
atk-abh01a0:1515_5: ceva appanāvasena ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu rūpāni passati. Parittānīti avaḍḍhitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1515_6: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā ‘kiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1515_7: ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī’ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti, evameva ñāṇuttariko
atk-abh01a0:1515_8: puggalo visadañāṇo ‘kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi, nāyaṃ mama
atk-abh01a0:1515_9: bhāro’ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati. Saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1515_10: nibbattetīti attho. Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa pubbabhāgo kathito. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-abh01a0:1515_11: pana vuttaṃ – imināssa pana ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1516_0: Appamāṇānīti vaḍḍhitappamāṇāni. Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1516_1: bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā ‘aññāpi hotu ‘kimesā mayhaṃ karissatī’ti taṃ na mahantato
atk-abh01a0:1516_2: passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadaññāṇo ‘kimettha samāpajjitabbaṃ, na idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1516_3: appamāṇaṃ, na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī’ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1517_0: Parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇanti idha parittānīti āgatattā appamāṇārammaṇatā
atk-abh01a0:1517_1: na gahitā, parato appamāṇānīti āgatattā parittārammaṇatā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1517_2: – ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri cattāri ārammaṇāni aggahetvā dve dveva gahitāni. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
atk-abh01a0:1517_3: Catūsu hi gahitesu desanā soḷasakkhattukā hoti, satthārā ca heṭṭhā soḷasakkhattukā
atk-abh01a0:1517_4: desanā kilañjamhi tile pattharantena viya vitthārato kathitā. Tassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1517_5: aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ desanaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo. Tasmā dve dveyeva gahitānīti veditabbānīti.
atk-abh01a0:1518_0: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇāni. Parisuddhāni hi nīlādīni suvaṇṇāni,
atk-abh01a0:1518_1: aparisuddhāni ca dubbaṇṇānīti idha adhippetāni. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘suvaṇṇāni
atk-abh01a0:1518_2: vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittaappamāṇavaseneva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitānī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1518_3: vuttaṃ. Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena,
atk-abh01a0:1518_4: suvaṇṇaṃ dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. Etesañhi etāni sappāyāni.
atk-abh01a0:1518_5: Sā ca tesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge cariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1519_0: Kasmā pana, yathā suttante “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī”tiādi
atk-abh01a0:1519_1: vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti?
atk-abh01a0:1519_2: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato. Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhārūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
atk-abh01a0:1519_3: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrapi idhapi vuttāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1519_4: pana satthu desanāvilāsamattameva. Ayaṃ tāva catūsu abhibhāyatanesu apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh01a0:1519_5: Suddhikanayapaṭipadābhedo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane
atk-abh01a0:1519_6: veditabbo. Kevalañcettha ārammaṇacatukkaṃ ārammaṇadukaṃ hoti, soḷasakkhattukañca
atk-abh01a0:1519_7: aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Evamettha ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane eko suddhikanavako,
atk-abh01a0:1519_8: cattāro paṭipadānavakā, dve ārammaṇanavakā, ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissake aṭṭha navakāti
atk-abh01a0:1519_9: pannarasa navakāti catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu samasaṭṭhi navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1520_2: ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīlanibhāsānīti idaṃ pana obhāsanavasena
atk-abh01a0:1520_3: vuttaṃ; nīlobhāsāni nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena nesaṃ suvisuddhataṃ dasseti.
atk-abh01a0:1520_4: Suvisuddhavaṇṇavasena hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. Pītānītiādīsupi imināva
atk-abh01a0:1520_5: nayena attho veditabbo. Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. Pupphasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1520_6: vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vātiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca
atk-abh01a0:1520_7: sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva. Yathā ca pathavīkasiṇe evamettha ekekasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1523_0: 248. Idāni yasmā idaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ āyatanānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1523_1: abhibhavanato abhibhāyatanavaseneva uppajjati, atha kho vimokkhavasenapi uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1523_2: tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1524_0: Kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkho veditabboti? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:1524_1: nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe ca abhirativasena suṭṭhu
atk-abh01a0:1524_2: vimuccanaṭṭho. Pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1524_3: nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃlakkhaṇañhi vimokkhabhāvappattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1525_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ, tadassatthīti rūpī.
atk-abh01a0:1525_1: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti. Pītaparikammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1525_2: karonto mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto
atk-abh01a0:1525_3: maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_4: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_5: Evaṃ parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānasamaṅginaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Rūpāni passatīti
atk-abh01a0:1525_6: bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati. Iminā ajjhattabahiddhāvatthukesu
atk-abh01a0:1526: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī. Attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti attho. Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:1527_0: Subhanti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni. Tattha kiñcāpi
atk-abh01a0:1527_1: antoappanāya ‘subha’nti ābhogo natthi, yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1527_2: katvā viharati, so yasmā ‘subha’nti…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tathā
atk-abh01a0:1527_3: dutiyādīni, tasmā evaṃ desanā katā. Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “kathaṃ subhantveva adhimutto
atk-abh01a0:1527_4: hotīti vimokkho? Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ…pe… viharati, mettāya
atk-abh01a0:1527_5: bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti; karuṇā… muditā… upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1527_6: disaṃ…pe… viharati, upekkhāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti, evaṃ subhantveva
atk-abh01a0:1527_7: adhimutto hotī”ti vimokkhoti vuttaṃ. Idha pana upari pāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1527_9: subhavimokkho anuññāto. Iti kasiṇanti vā abhibhāyatananti vā vimokkhoti vā rūpāvacarajjhānameva.
atk-abh01a0:1527_10: Tañhi ārammaṇassa sakalaṭṭhena kasiṇaṃ nāma, ārammaṇaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena abhibhāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1527_11: nāma, ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṭṭhena paccanīkadhammehi ca vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkho nāmāti
atk-abh01a0:1527_12: vuttaṃ. Tattha kasiṇadesanā abhidhammavasena, itarā pana suttantadesanāvasena vuttāti
atk-abh01a0:1527_13: veditabbā. Ayamettha apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Ekekasmiṃ pana vimokkhe pathavīkasiṇe viya
atk-abh01a0:1527_14: pañcavīsati pañcavīsatīti katvā pañcasattati navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1530_0: 251. Idāni mettādibrahmavihāravasena pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna
atk-abh01a0:1530_1: katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mettāsahagatanti mettāya samannāgataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1530_2: Parato karuṇāsahagatādīsupi eseva nayo. Yena panesa vidhānena paṭipanno mettādisahagatāni
atk-abh01a0:1530_3: jhānāni upasampajja viharati, taṃ mettādīnaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge
atk-abh01a0:1530_4: vitthāritameva. Avasesāya pāḷiyā attho pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1531_0: Kevalañhi pathavīkasiṇe pañcavīsati navakā, idha purimāsu tīsu tikacatukkajjhānikavasena
atk-abh01a0:1531_1: pañcavīsati sattakā, upekkhāya catutthajjhānavasena pañcavīsati ekakā, karuṇāmuditāsu
atk-abh01a0:1531_2: ca chandādīhi catūhi saddhiṃ karuṇāmuditāti imepi yevāpanakā labbhanti. Dukkhapaṭipadādibhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1531_3: cettha mettāya tāva byāpādavikkhambhanavasena, karuṇāya vihiṃsāvikkhambhanavasena,
atk-abh01a0:1533: Brahmuttamena kathite, brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā;
atk-abh01a0:1535_0: Etāsu hi mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhāsu atthato tāva mejjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1535_1: Mitte vā bhavā, mittassa vā esā pavattatīpi mettā. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1535_2: karotīti karuṇā. Kiṇāti vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināsetīti karuṇā. Kirīyati vā dukkhitesu
atk-abh01a0:1535_3: pharaṇavasena pasāriyatīti karuṇā. Modanti tāya taṃsamaṅgino, sayaṃ vā modati, modanamattameva
atk-abh01a0:1535_4: vā tanti muditā. ‘Averā hontū’tiādibyāpārappahānena majjhattabhāvūpagamanena ca upekkhatīti upekkhā.
atk-abh01a0:1536_1: sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Byāpādūpasamo etissā sampatti, sinehasambhavo
atk-abh01a0:1536_3: dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Vihiṃsūpasamo tassā sampatti, sokasambhavo
atk-abh01a0:1536_5: sattānaṃ sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Arativūpasamo tassā sampatti, pahāsasambhavo
atk-abh01a0:1536_7: paṭighānunayavūpasamapaccupaṭṭhānā, “kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā
atk-abh01a0:1536_8: bhavissanti, dukkhato vā muccissanti, pattasampattito vā na parihāyissantī”ti? Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1537_0: Catunnampi panetesaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti ca sādhāraṇappayojanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1537_1: byāpādādipaṭighāto āveṇikaṃ. Byāpādapaṭighātappayojanā hettha mettā, vihiṃsāaratirāgapaṭighātappayojanā
atk-abh01a0:1538_0: “Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa yadidaṃ mettācetovimutti, nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso,
atk-abh01a0:1538_1: vihesāya yadidaṃ karuṇācetovimutti; nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, aratiyā yadidaṃ muditācetovimutti,
atk-abh01a0:1539_0: Ekamekassa cettha āsannadūravasena dve dve paccatthikā. Mettābrahmavihārassa hi,
atk-abh01a0:1539_1: samīpacāro viya purisassa sapatto, guṇadassanasabhāgatāya rāgo āsannapaccatthiko.
atk-abh01a0:1539_2: So lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati. Tasmā tato suṭṭhu mettā rakkhitabbā. Pabbatādigahananissito
atk-abh01a0:1539_3: viya purisassa sapatto sabhāvavisabhāgatāya byāpādo dūrapaccatthiko. Tasmā tato nibbhayena
atk-abh01a0:1539_4: mettāyitabbaṃ. Mettāyissati ca nāma kopañca karissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1540_0: Karuṇābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1540_1: lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1540_2: atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1540_3: idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ domanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ domanassaṃ vipattidassanasabhāgatāya
atk-abh01a0:1540_4: āsannapaccatthikaṃ. Sabhāvavisabhāgatāya vihesā dūrapaccatthikā. Tasmā tato nibbhayena
atk-abh01a0:1540_5: karuṇāyitabbaṃ. Karuṇañca nāma karissati pāṇiādīhi ca vihesissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1541_0: Muditābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1541_1: lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1541_2: atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1541_3: idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ somanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ somanassaṃ sampattidassanasabhāgatāya
atk-abh01a0:1541_4: āsannapaccatthikaṃ. Sabhāvavisabhāgatāya arati dūrapaccatthikā. Tasmā tato nibbhayena
atk-abh01a0:1541_5: muditā bhāvetabbā. Pamudito ca nāma bhavissati pantasenāsanesu ca adhikusaladhammesu
atk-abh01a0:1542_0: Upekkhābrahmavihārassa pana “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa
atk-abh01a0:1542_1: puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
atk-abh01a0:1542_2: Yā evarūpā upekkhā rūpaṃ sā nātivattati. Tasmā sā upekkhā gehassitāti vuccatī”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:1542_3: nayena āgatā gehassitā aññāṇupekkhā dosaguṇānaṃ avicāraṇavasena sabhāgattā āsannapaccatthikā.
atk-abh01a0:1542_4: Sabhāvavisabhāgatāya rāgapaṭighā dūrapaccatthikā. Tasmā tato nibbhayena upekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1542_5: Upekkhissati ca nāma rajjissati ca paṭihaññissati cāti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1543_0: Sabbesampi ca etesaṃ kattukāmatāchando ādi, nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanaṃ majjhaṃ, appanā
atk-abh01a0:1543_1: pariyosānaṃ, paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto anekā vā sattā ārammaṇaṃ, upacāre
atk-abh01a0:1544_0: Tatrāyaṃ vaḍḍhanakkamo – yathā hi kusalo kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā
atk-abh01a0:1544_1: kasati, evaṃ paṭhamameva ekaṃ āvāsaṃ paricchinditvā tattha sattesu ‘imasmiṃ āvāse
atk-abh01a0:1544_2: sattā averā hontū’tiādinā nayena mettā bhāvetabbā. Tattha cittaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1544_3: katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā. Tato anukkamena tayo cattāro pañca cha satta aṭṭha
atk-abh01a0:1544_4: nava dasa, ekā racchā, upaḍḍhagāmo, gāmo, janapado, rajjaṃ, ekā disāti evaṃ yāva
atk-abh01a0:1544_5: ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ, tato vā pana bhiyyo tattha tattha sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:1545_0: Yathā pana kasiṇānaṃ nissando āruppā, samādhīnaṃ nissando nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1545_1: vipassanānaṃ nissando phalasamāpatti, samathavipassanānaṃ nissando nirodhasamāpatti,
atk-abh01a0:1545_2: evaṃ purimabrahmavihārattayassa nissando ettha upekkhābrahmavihāro. Yathā hi thambhe
atk-abh01a0:1545_3: anussāpetvā tulāsaṅghāṭaṃ anāropetvā na sakkā ākāse kūṭagopānasiyo ṭhapetuṃ, evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1545_4: purimesu tatiyajjhānaṃ vinā na sakkā catutthaṃ bhāvetuṃ. Kasiṇesu pana uppannatatiyajjhānassapesā
atk-abh01a0:1546_0: Ettha siyā – ‘kasmā panetā mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā brahmavihārāti vuccanti? Kasmā
atk-abh01a0:1546_1: ca, catassova? Ko ca etāsaṃ kamo? Vibhaṅge ca kasmā appamaññāti vuttā’ti? Vuccate
atk-abh01a0:1546_2: – seṭṭhaṭṭhena tāva niddosabhāvena cettha brahmavihāratā veditabbā. Sattesu sammāpaṭipattibhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1546_3: hi seṭṭhā ete vihārā. Yathā ca brahmāno niddosacittā viharanti, evaṃ etehi sampayuttā
atk-abh01a0:1546_4: yogino brahmasamāva hutvā viharantīti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca brahmavihārāti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:1547: Kasmā ca catassotiādipañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1552_0: Etāsu hi yasmā mettā byāpādabahulassa, karuṇā vihiṃsābahulassa, muditā aratibahulassa,
atk-abh01a0:1552_2: catubbidhoyeva sattesu manasikāro; yasmā ca yathā mātā daharagilānayobbanappattasakiccapasutesu
atk-abh01a0:1552_3: catūsu puttesu daharassa abhivuḍḍhikāmā hoti, gilānassa gelaññāpanayanakāmā, yobbanappattassa
atk-abh01a0:1552_4: yobbanasampattiyā ciraṭṭhitikāmā, sakiccapasutassa kismiñcipi pariyāye abyāvaṭā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1552_5: tathā appamaññāvihārikenāpi sabbasattesu mettādivasena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā ito visuddhimaggādivasā
atk-abh01a0:1553_0: Yasmā pana catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1553_1: hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā ca mettā; tato evaṃ patthitahitānaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhābhibhavaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1553_2: disvā vā sutvā vā sambhāvetvā vā dukkhāpanayanākārappavattivasena, dukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:1553_3: ca karuṇā; athevaṃ patthitahitānaṃ patthitadukkhāpagamānañca nesaṃ sampattiṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:1553_4: sampattippamodanavasena, pamodanalakkhaṇā ca muditā; tato paraṃ pana kattabbābhāvato
atk-abh01a0:1553_6: ca upekkhā; tasmā ito hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ mettā vuttā. Atha karuṇā muditā
atk-abh01a0:1554_0: Yasmā pana sabbāpetā appamāṇe gocare pavattanti, tasmā appamaññāti vuccanti. Appamāṇā
atk-abh01a0:1554_1: hi sattā etāsaṃ gocarabhūtā, ‘ekasattassāpi ca ettake padese mettādayo bhāvetabbā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1554_2: evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā sakalapharaṇavaseneva pavattāti, tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1559_0: Evaṃ appamāṇagocaratāya ekalakkhaṇāsu cāpi etāsu purimā tisso tikacatukkajjhānikāva
atk-abh01a0:1559_1: honti. Kasmā? Somanassāvippayogato. Kasmā panāsaṃ somanassena avippayogoti? Domanassasamuṭṭhitānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1559_2: byāpādādīnaṃ nissaraṇattā. Pacchimā pana avasesekajjhānikāva. Kasmā? Upekkhāvedanāsampayogato.
atk-abh01a0:1559_3: Na hi sattesu majjhattākārappavattā brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1562: 263. Idāni rāgacaritasattānaṃ ekantahitaṃ nānārammaṇesu ekekajjhānavaseneva pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_0: Tattha uddhumātakasaññāsahagatantiādīsu, bhastā viya vāyunā, uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā
atk-abh01a0:1563_1: yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ. Uddhumātameva uddhumātakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_2: Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti uddhumātakaṃ. Tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1563_3: adhivacanaṃ. Vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnanīlavaṇṇaṃ. Vinīlameva vinīlakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā
atk-abh01a0:1563_4: vā kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa, pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh01a0:1563_5: setavaṇṇassa, yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa, nīlaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1563_6: adhivacanaṃ. Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu vissandamānaṃ pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ. Vipubbameva vipubbakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_7: Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ. Tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_8: Vicchiddaṃ vuccati dvidhā chindanena apadhāritaṃ, vicchiddameva vicchiddakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā
atk-abh01a0:1563_9: vā kucchitaṃ vicchiddanti vicchiddakaṃ. Vemajjhe chinnassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_10: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitaṃ. Vikkhāyitameva
atk-abh01a0:1563_11: vikkhāyitakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vikkhāyitanti vikkhāyitakaṃ. Tathārūpassa
atk-abh01a0:1563_12: chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vividhā khittaṃ vikkhittaṃ. Vikkhittameva vikkhittakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_13: Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vikkhittanti vikkhittakaṃ. ‘Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1563_14: aññena sīsa’nti evaṃ tato tato khittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Hatañca taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1563_15: purimanayeneva vikkhittakañcāti hatavikkhittakaṃ. Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena
atk-abh01a0:1563_16: hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittakassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Lohitaṃ kirati,
atk-abh01a0:1563_17: vikkhipati, ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ. Paggharitalohitamakkhitassa chavasarīrassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1563_18: adhivacanaṃ. Puḷavā vuccanti kimayo. Puḷave vikiratīti puḷavakaṃ. Kimiparipuṇṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1563_19: chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Aṭṭhiyeva aṭṭhikaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ aṭṭhīti
atk-abh01a0:1563_20: aṭṭhikaṃ. Aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāyapi ekaṭṭhikassapi etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni
atk-abh01a0:1563_21: nissāya uppannanimittānampi nimittesu paṭiladdhajjhānānampi etāneva nāmāni.
atk-abh01a0:1564_0: Tattha uddhumātakanimitte appanāvasena uppannā saññā uddhumātakasaññā. Tāya uddhumātakasaññāya
atk-abh01a0:1564_2: eseva nayo. Yaṃ panettha bhāvanāvidhānaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, taṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge
atk-abh01a0:1564_3: vuttameva. Avasesā pāḷivaṇṇanā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi idha, catutthajjhānavasena
atk-abh01a0:1564_4: upekkhābrahmavihāre viya, paṭhamajjhānavasena ekekasmiṃ pañcavīsati ekakā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1564_5: Asubhārammaṇassa ca avaḍḍhanīyattā, paritte uddhumātakaṭṭhāne uppannanimittārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1564_6: parittārammaṇaṃ, mahante appamāṇārammaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayoti.
atk-abh01a0:1569: Evaṃ pāḷinayeneva, tāva sabbāni tāni jānitvā;
atk-abh01a0:1571_0: Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya nilloluppacāro
atk-abh01a0:1571_1: hoti. Evaṃ santepi yvāyaṃ asubhabhedo vutto, so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1572_0: Chavasarīrañhi paṭikūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā, vinīlakādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1572_1: vā aññatarasabhāvappattaṃ. Iti yādisaṃ yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikūlaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1572_2: vinīlakapaṭikūlanti evaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena dasadhā
atk-abh01a0:1573_1: sappāyaṃ. Vinīlakaṃ chavirāgavipattippakāsanato sarīravaṇṇarāgino sappāyaṃ. Vipubbakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1573_3: sappāyaṃ. Vicchiddakaṃ antosusirabhāvappakāsanato sarīre ghanabhāvarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1573_8: sappāyaṃ. Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino
atk-abh01a0:1573_9: sappāyaṃ. Aṭṭhikaṃ sarīraṭṭhīnaṃ paṭikūlabhāvappakāsanato dantasampattirāgino sappāyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1573_10: Evaṃ rāgacaritavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1574_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya
atk-abh01a0:1574_1: nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati, vinā arittena na sakkā ṭhapetuṃ, evameva dubbalattā
atk-abh01a0:1574_2: ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, vinā vitakkena na sakkā
atk-abh01a0:1574_3: ṭhapetuṃ, tasmā paṭhamajjhānamevettha hoti, na dutiyādīni. Paṭikūlepi cetasmiṃ ārammaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1574_4: ‘addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī’ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvitāya
atk-abh01a0:1574_5: ceva nīvaraṇasantāpappahānena ca pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati, ‘bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1574_6: ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya, ussannabyādhidukkhassa rogino
atk-abh01a0:1575_0: Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti. Dasavidhassapi hi etassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1575_1: eva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīreyeva dantaṭṭhikadassāvino
atk-abh01a0:1575_2: pana cetiyapabbatavāsino mahātissattherassa viya, hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ ullokentassa
atk-abh01a0:1575_3: saṅgharakkhitattherupaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca, jīvamānakasarīrepi upaṭṭhāti. Yatheva
atk-abh01a0:1575_4: hi matasarīraṃ evaṃ jīvamānakampi asubhameva. Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena
atk-abh01a0:1577_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā aṭṭhikasaññāpariyosānāvesā rūpāvacarappanā, udāhu
atk-abh01a0:1577_1: aññāpi atthīti? Atthi; ānāpānajjhānañhi kāyagatāsatibhāvanā ca idha na kathitā. Kiñcāpi
atk-abh01a0:1577_2: na kathitā vāyokasiṇe pana gahite ānāpānajjhānaṃ gahitameva; vaṇṇakasiṇesu ca gahitesu
atk-abh01a0:1577_3: kesādīsu catukkapañcakajjhānavasena uppannā kāyagatāsati, dasasu asubhesu gahitesu
atk-abh01a0:1577_5: ca pavattā kāyagatāsati gahitāvāti. Sabbāpi rūpāvacarappanā idha kathitāva hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1581_0: 265. Idāni arūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1581_1: arūpūpapattiyāti arūpabhavo arūpaṃ, arūpe upapatti arūpūpapatti, tassā arūpūpapattiyā.
atk-abh01a0:1581_2: Maggaṃ bhāvetīti upāyaṃ hetuṃ kāraṇaṃ uppādeti vaḍḍheti. Sabbasoti sabbākārena. Sabbāsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1581_3: vā anavasesānanti attho. Rūpasaññānanti saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānānañceva
atk-abh01a0:1581_4: tadārammaṇānañca. Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati ‘rūpī rūpāni passatī’tiādīsu.
atk-abh01a0:1581_5: Tassa ārammaṇampi “bahiddhā rūpāni passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsu ; tasmā idha
atk-abh01a0:1581_6: rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1581_7: Rūpaṃ saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpamassa nāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa
atk-abh01a0:1582_0: Samatikkamāti virāgā nirodhā ca. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Etāsaṃ kusalavipākakiriyavasena
atk-abh01a0:1582_1: pañcadasannaṃ jhānasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ, etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1582_2: ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ, sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca
atk-abh01a0:1582_3: virāgahetu ceva nirodhahetu ca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. Na hi sakkā
atk-abh01a0:1583_0: Tattha yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hoti, samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu
atk-abh01a0:1583_1: ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti, tasmā ārammaṇasamatikkamaṃ avatvā “tattha katamā
atk-abh01a0:1583_2: rūpasaññā? Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa
atk-abh01a0:1583_3: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti rūpasaññāyo. Imā rūpasaññāyo atikkanto
atk-abh01a0:1583_4: hoti, vītikkanto, samatikkanto, tena vuccati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti
atk-abh01a0:1583_5: evaṃ vibhaṅge saññānaṃyeva samatikkamo vutto. Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā
atk-abh01a0:1583_6: etā samāpattiyo, na ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe paṭhamajjhānādīni viya, tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi
atk-abh01a0:1584_0: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena
atk-abh01a0:1584_1: samuppannā saññā paṭighasaññā. Rūpasaññādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha
atk-abh01a0:1584_2: katamā paṭighasaññā? Rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā,
atk-abh01a0:1584_3: imā vuccanti paṭighasaññāyo”ti. Tāsaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1584_4: pañcannanti sabbaso dasannampi paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā appavattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1585_0: Kāmañcetā paṭhamajjhānādīni samāpannassāpi na santi – na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:1585_1: cittaṃ pavattati – evaṃ santepi, aññattha pahīnānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne
atk-abh01a0:1585_2: viya, sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ tatiyamagge viya ca, imasmiṃ jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa
atk-abh01a0:1585_3: jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1585_4: samāpannassa na santi, atha kho na pahīnattā na santi. Na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā
atk-abh01a0:1585_5: saṃvattati, rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ pavatti. Ayaṃ pana bhāvanā rūpavirāgāya saṃvattati.
atk-abh01a0:1585_6: Tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Na kevalañca vattuṃ, ekaṃseneva evaṃ dhāretumpi
atk-abh01a0:1585_7: vaṭṭati. Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa “saddo kaṇṭako”ti
atk-abh01a0:1585_8: vutto bhagavatā. Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā
atk-abh01a0:1585_9: ca vuttā. Āḷāro ca kāḷāmo āruppasamāpanno pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya
atk-abh01a0:1585_10: atikkantāni neva addasa, na pana saddaṃ assosīti.
atk-abh01a0:1586_0: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ nānattānaṃ vā saññānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1586_1: Yasmā hi etā “tattha katamā nānattasaññā? Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa
atk-abh01a0:1586_2: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā
atk-abh01a0:1586_3: vuttā idha adhippetā; asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā saññā rūpasaddādibhede
atk-abh01a0:1586_4: nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti; yasmā cetā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā, dvādasa
atk-abh01a0:1586_5: akusalasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā, dve akusalavipākasaññā, ekādasa
atk-abh01a0:1586_6: kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1586_7: asadisā, tasmā nānattasaññāti vuttā. Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā anāvajjanā
atk-abh01a0:1586_8: asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇā. Yasmā tā nāvajjati, na manasikaroti, na paccavekkhati,
atk-abh01a0:1587_0: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1587_1: pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle, tasmā tāsaṃ ‘samatikkamā
atk-abh01a0:1587_2: atthaṅgamā’ti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto. Nānattasaññāsu pana yasmā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā,
atk-abh01a0:1587_3: nava kiriyāsaññā, dasa akusalasaññāti imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte
atk-abh01a0:1587_4: bhave vijjanti, tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikārāti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāpi hi imaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1587_5: upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati. Tā pana manasikaronto
atk-abh01a0:1587_6: asamāpanno hotīti. Saṅkhepato cettha ‘rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā’ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1587_7: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā’ti iminā
atk-abh01a0:1587_8: sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānañca pahānaṃ amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1588_0: Iti bhagavā ‘pannarasannaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamena, dasannaṃ paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamena,
atk-abh01a0:1588_1: catucattālīsāya nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārenā’ti tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā
atk-abh01a0:1588_2: vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Kiṃ kāraṇāti ce sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthañceva palobhanatthañca. Sace
atk-abh01a0:1588_3: hi keci apaṇḍitā vadeyyuṃ ‘satthā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethāti vadati,
atk-abh01a0:1588_4: ko nu kho etāya nibbattitāya attho? Ko ānisaṃso’ti te evaṃ vattuṃ mā labhantūti imehi
atk-abh01a0:1588_5: ākārehi samāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Tañhi nesaṃ sutvā evaṃ bhavissati – ‘evaṃsantā
atk-abh01a0:1588_6: kira ayaṃ samāpatti, evaṃpaṇītā, nibbattessāma na’nti. Athassa nibbattanatthāya ussāhaṃ karissantīti.
atk-abh01a0:1589_0: Palobhanatthañcāpi nesaṃ etissā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, visakaṇṭakavāṇijo viya. Visakaṇṭakavāṇijo
atk-abh01a0:1589_1: nāma guḷavāṇijo vuccati. So kira guḷaphāṇitakhaṇḍasakkarādīni sakaṭenādāya paccantagāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1589_2: gantvā ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhatha visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā
atk-abh01a0:1589_3: ‘visaṃ nāma kakkhaḷaṃ, yo naṃ khādati so marati, kaṇṭakopi vijjhitvā māreti. Ubhopete
atk-abh01a0:1589_4: kakkhaḷā, ko ettha ānisaṃso’ti gehadvārāni thakesuṃ, dārake ca palāpesuṃ. Taṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:1589_5: vāṇijo ‘avohārakusalā ime gāmikā, handa ne upāyena gaṇhāpemī’ti ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhatha
atk-abh01a0:1589_6: atisāduṃ gaṇhatha, guḷaṃ phāṇitaṃ sakkaraṃ samagghaṃ labbhati, kūṭamāsakakūṭakahāpaṇādīhipi
atk-abh01a0:1589_7: labbhatī’ti ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā niggantvā bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā gahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1590_0: Tattha vāṇijassa ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosanaṃ viya bhagavato ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1590_1: nibbattethā’ti vacanaṃ. ‘Ubhopete kakkhaḷā, ko ettha ānisaṃso’ti? Gāmikānaṃ cintanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1590_2: viya ‘bhagavā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ nibbattethāti āha, ko ettha ānisaṃso? Nāssa guṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1590_3: jānāmā’ti sotūnaṃ cintanaṃ. Athassa vāṇijassa ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhathā’tiādivacanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1590_4: viya bhagavato rūpasaññāsamatikkamanādikaṃ ānisaṃsappakāsanaṃ. Idañhi sutvā te bahumpi
atk-abh01a0:1590_5: mūlaṃ datvā, gāmikā viya guḷaṃ, iminā ānisaṃsena palobhitacittā mahantampi ussāhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1590_6: katvā imaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattessantīti ussāhajananatthaṃ palobhanatthañca kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:1591_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha nāssa antoti anantaṃ. Ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsānantaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1591_1: Ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ. Taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-abh01a0:1591_2: jhānassa, devānaṃ devāyatanamivāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Iti ākāsānañcaṃ ca taṃ āyatanañcātipi
atk-abh01a0:1592_0: Yathā pana aññattha ‘ananto ākāso’ti vuttaṃ, evamidha anantanti vā parittanti vā
atk-abh01a0:1592_1: na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Anante hi gahite parittaṃ na gayhati, paritte gahite anantaṃ na
atk-abh01a0:1592_2: gayhati. Evaṃ sante ārammaṇacatukkaṃ na pūrati, desanā soḷasakkhattukā na hoti. Sammāsambuddhassa
atk-abh01a0:1592_3: ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne desanaṃ soḷasakkhattukaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo, tasmā anantanti vā parittanti
atk-abh01a0:1592_4: vā avatvā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagata’nti āha. Evañhi sati ubhayampi gahitameva
atk-abh01a0:1592_5: hoti. Ārammaṇacatukkaṃ pūrati, desanā soḷasakkhattukā sampajjati. Avaseso pāḷiattho
atk-abh01a0:1592_7: cettha dukkhā paṭipadā, pariyādinnanikantikassa appanāparivāsadandhatāya dandhābhiññā
atk-abh01a0:1592_8: hoti. Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca veditabbā. Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse
atk-abh01a0:1592_9: pana pavattaṃ jhānaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti
atk-abh01a0:1592_10: veditabbaṃ. Upekkhābrahmavihāre viya ca idhāpi catutthajjhānavasena pañcavīsati ekakā
atk-abh01a0:1592_11: honti. Yathā cettha evaṃ ito paresupi. Visesamattameva pana tesu vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1594_0: 266. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti, ettha tāva pubbe vuttanayena ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassa
atk-abh01a0:1594_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Vuttanayeneva ārammaṇampi. Evametaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1594_2: jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1594_3: yasmā idaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihātabbaṃ, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1595_0: Viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagatanti, ettha pana anantanti manasikātabbavasena nāssa
atk-abh01a0:1595_1: antoti anantaṃ. Anantameva ānañcaṃ. Viññāṇaṃ ānañcaṃ viññāṇānañcanti avatvā viññāṇañcanti
atk-abh01a0:1595_2: vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha rūḷhīsaddo. Tadeva viññāṇañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imāya saññāya
atk-abh01a0:1595_3: āyatananti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Tasmiṃ viññāṇañcāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti
atk-abh01a0:1595_5: Idha ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā nikantipariyādānadukkhatāya dukkhā paṭipadā, pariyādinnanikantikassa
atk-abh01a0:1595_6: appanāparivāsadandhatāya dandhābhiññā. Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca.
atk-abh01a0:1597_0: 267. Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva viññāṇañca āyatanamassa
atk-abh01a0:1597_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Vuttanayeneva ca ārammaṇampi. Evametaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1597_2: jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1597_3: yasmā idaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihātabbaṃ, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1598_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ; antamaso bhaṅgamattampi
atk-abh01a0:1598_1: assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ. Ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇāpagamassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1598_2: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imissā saññāya āyatananti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1598_3: Tasmiṃ ākiñcaññāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1598_4: Ākāse pavattitaviññāṇāpagamārammaṇassa jhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā
atk-abh01a0:1598_5: nikantipariyādānadukkhatāya dukkhā paṭipadā, pariyādinnanikantikassa appanā parivāsadandhatāya
atk-abh01a0:1598_6: dandhābhiññā. Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca. Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse
atk-abh01a0:1600_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva ākiñcaññaṃ āyatanamassa
atk-abh01a0:1600_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Vuttanayeneva ārammaṇampi. Evametaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1600_2: jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇe ca samatikkamitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1600_3: yasmā idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihātabbaṃ, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1601_0: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti
atk-abh01a0:1601_1: vuccati, yathā paṭipannassa sā saññā hoti, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ vibhaṅge “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti
atk-abh01a0:1601_3: bhāveti, tena vuccati nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘santato manasikarotī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1601_4: ‘santā vatāyaṃ samāpatti, yatra hi nāma natthibhāvampi ārammaṇaṃ karitvā ṭhassatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1601_5: evaṃ santārammaṇatāya naṃ ‘santā’ti manasikaroti. Santato ce manasikaroti, kathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1601_6: samatikkamo hotīti? Anāvajjitukāmatāya. So hi kiñcāpi naṃ santato manasikaroti, atha
atk-abh01a0:1601_7: khvassa ‘ahametaṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi paccavekkhissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1601_8: esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro na hoti. Kasmā? Ākiñcaññāyatanato nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa
atk-abh01a0:1602_0: Yathā hi rājā mahaccarājānubhāvena hatthikkhandhagato nagaravīthiyaṃ vicaranto dantakārādayo
atk-abh01a0:1602_1: sippike ekaṃ vatthaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā ekena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā dantacuṇṇādīhi samokiṇṇagatte
atk-abh01a0:1602_2: anekāni dantavikatiādīni karonte disvā ‘aho vata re chekā ācariyā, īdisānipi nāma
atk-abh01a0:1602_3: sippāni karissantī’ti, evaṃ tesaṃ chekatāya tussati, na cassa evaṃ hoti – ‘aho vatāhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1602_4: rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya’nti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Rajjasiriyā mahānisaṃsatāya.
atk-abh01a0:1602_5: So sippike samatikkamitvāva gacchati. Evamevesa kiñcāpi taṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-abh01a0:1602_6: atha khvassa ‘ahametaṃ samāpattiṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi
atk-abh01a0:1602_7: paccavekkhissāmī’ti neva esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro hoti. So taṃ santato manasi
atk-abh01a0:1602_8: karonto taṃ paramasukhumaṃ appanāppattaṃ saññaṃ pāpuṇāti, yāya ‘nevasaññīnāsaññī
atk-abh01a0:1603_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ evaṃ adhigatāya saññāya vasena nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati, taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1603_2: vā, upapannassa vā, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1603_3: Tesu idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:1604_0: Vacanattho panettha – oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato, sukhumāya ca bhāvato, nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-abh01a0:1604_1: jhānassa saññā, nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññaṃ. Nevasaññānāsaññañca taṃ manāyatanadhammāyatanapariyāpannattā
atk-abh01a0:1604_2: āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Atha vā yāyamettha saññā, sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1604_3: kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā nāsaññāti
atk-abh01a0:1604_4: nevasaññānāsaññā. Nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sesadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti
atk-abh01a0:1605_0: Na kevalañcettha saññāva edisī, atha kho vedanāpi nevavedanā nāvedanā, cittampi nevacittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1605_1: nācittaṃ, phassopi nevaphasso nāphassoti. Esa nayo sesasampayuttadhammesu. Saññāsīsena
atk-abh01a0:1605_2: panāyaṃ desanā katāti veditabbā. Pattamakkhanatelappabhutīhi ca upamāhi esamattho
atk-abh01a0:1605_3: vibhāvetabbo – sāmaṇero kira telena pattaṃ makkhetvā ṭhapesi. Taṃ yāgupānakāle thero
atk-abh01a0:1605_4: ‘pattamāharā’ti āha. So ‘patte telamatthi, bhante’ti āha. Tato ‘āhara, sāmaṇera,
atk-abh01a0:1605_5: telaṃ nāḷiṃ pūressāmī’ti vutte ‘natthi, bhante, tela’nti āha. Tattha yathā antovutthattā
atk-abh01a0:1605_6: yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti hoti, nāḷipūraṇādīnaṃ abhāvavasena natthīti
atk-abh01a0:1605_7: hoti, evaṃ sāpi saññā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1606_0: Kimpanettha saññākiccanti? Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya ca visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā
atk-abh01a0:1606_1: nibbidājananaṃ. Dahanakiccamiva hi sukhodake tejodhātu, sañjānanakiccampesā paṭuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1606_2: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi
atk-abh01a0:1606_3: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Aññesu hi khandhesu akatābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe
atk-abh01a0:1606_4: sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Apica āyasmā sāriputto, pakativipassako
atk-abh01a0:1606_5: pana mahāpañño sāriputtasadisova sakkuṇeyya. Sopi “evaṃ kirime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
atk-abh01a0:1606_6: hutvā paṭiventī”ti evaṃ kalāpasammasanavaseneva, no anupadadhammavipassanāvasena.
atk-abh01a0:1607_0: Yathā ca pattamakkhanatelūpamāya evaṃ maggudakūpamāyapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Maggapaṭipannassa
atk-abh01a0:1607_1: kira therassa purato gacchanto sāmaṇero thokamudakaṃ disvā ‘udakaṃ, bhante, upāhanā
atk-abh01a0:1607_2: omuñcathā’ti āha. Tato therena ‘sace udakamatthi, āhara nhānasāṭakaṃ, nhāyissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1607_3: vutte ‘natthi, bhante’ti āha. Tattha yathā upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti
atk-abh01a0:1607_4: hoti, nhānaṭṭhena natthīti hoti, evampi sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya neva
atk-abh01a0:1607_5: saññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā nāsaññā hoti. Na kevalañca etāheva,
atk-abh01a0:1607_6: aññāhipi anurūpāhi upamāhi esa attho vibhāvetabbo. Iti imāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane
atk-abh01a0:1607_7: pavattāya saññāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūtāya vā saññāya sahagatanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1608_0: Idha ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nikantipariyādānadukkhatāya dukkhā paṭipadā, pariyādinnanikantikassa
atk-abh01a0:1608_1: appanāparivāsadandhatāya dandhābhiññā. Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca.
atk-abh01a0:1608_3: parittārammaṇatā, vipariyāyena appamāṇārammaṇatā veditabbā. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-abh01a0:1609: Asadisarūpo nātho, āruppaṃ yaṃ catubbidhaṃ āha;
atk-abh01a0:1610: Taṃ iti ñatvā tasmiṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:1614_0: Etāsu hi rūpanimittātikkamato paṭhamā, ākāsātikkamato dutiyā, ākāse pavattitaviññāṇātikkamato
atk-abh01a0:1614_1: tatiyā, ākāse pavattitaviññāṇassa apagamātikkamato catutthāti sabbathā ‘ārammaṇātikkamato
atk-abh01a0:1614_2: catassopi bhavantimā’ arūpasamāpattiyoti veditabbā. Aṅgātikkamaṃ pana etāsaṃ na icchanti
atk-abh01a0:1614_3: paṇḍitā. Na hi rūpāvacarasamāpattīsu viya etāsu aṅgātikkamo atthi. Sabbāsupi hi etāsu
atk-abh01a0:1614_4: upekkhā cittekaggatāti dve eva jhānaṅgāni honti. Evaṃ santepi –
atk-abh01a0:1617_1: paṇītā pañca kāmaguṇā paccupaṭṭhitā assu, dutiye tato paṇītatarā, tatiye tato paṇītatamā,
atk-abh01a0:1617_2: catutthe sabbapaṇītā; tattha kiñcāpi tāni cattāripi pāsādatalāneva, natthi nesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1617_3: pāsādatalabhāvena viseso, pañcakāmaguṇasamiddhivisesena pana heṭṭhimato heṭṭhimato
atk-abh01a0:1618_1: assu, āyāmena vitthārena ca samappamāṇā; tattha kiñcāpi tā sāṭikā catassopi āyāmato
atk-abh01a0:1618_2: ca vitthārato ca samappamāṇā, natthi tāsaṃ pamāṇato viseso, sukhasamphassasukhumabhāvamahagghabhāvehi
atk-abh01a0:1618_3: pana purimāya purimāya pacchimā pacchimā paṇītatarā honti, evameva kiñcāpi catūsupi
atk-abh01a0:1618_4: etāsu upekkhā cittekaggatāti etāni dveyeva aṅgāni honti, atha kho bhāvanāvisesena
atk-abh01a0:1618_5: tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paṇītapaṇītatarabhāvena supaṇītatarā honti pacchimā pacchimā idhāti
atk-abh01a0:1619: Asucimhi maṇḍape laggo, eko taṃ nissito paro;
atk-abh01a0:1620: Añño bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
atk-abh01a0:1623_0: Tatrāyamatthayojanā – asucimhi kira dese eko maṇḍapo. Atheko puriso āgantvā taṃ asuciṃ
atk-abh01a0:1623_1: jigucchamāno taṃ maṇḍapaṃ hatthehi ālambitvā tattha laggo, laggito viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1623_2: Athāparo āgantvā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito. Athañño āgantvā cintesi – ‘yo
atk-abh01a0:1623_3: esa maṇḍape laggo, yo ca taṃ nissito, ubhopete duṭṭhitā; dhuvo ca nesaṃ maṇḍapapapāte
atk-abh01a0:1623_4: pāto, handāhaṃ bahiyeva tiṭṭhāmī’ti so tannissitaṃ anissāya bahiyeva aṭṭhāsi. Athāparo
atk-abh01a0:1623_5: āgantvā maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca suṭṭhitoti
atk-abh01a0:1624_0: Tattha asucimhi dese maṇḍapo viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asucijigucchāya
atk-abh01a0:1624_1: maṇḍapalaggo puriso viya rūpanimittajigucchāya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Maṇḍapalaggaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1624_2: purisaṃ nissito viya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1624_3: Tesaṃ dvinnampi akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā anissāya taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ, bahiṭhito viya,
atk-abh01a0:1624_4: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ akatvā tadabhāvārammaṇaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Maṇḍapalaggassa
atk-abh01a0:1624_5: tannissitassa ca akhemataṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca ‘suṭṭhito’ti mantvā taṃ nissāya
atk-abh01a0:1624_6: ṭhito viya viññāṇābhāvasaṅkhāte bahipadese ṭhitaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1627_1: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññassa ārammaṇassa abhāvā ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
atk-abh01a0:1627_2: Yathā kiṃ? ‘Diṭṭhadosampi rājānaṃ vuttihetu yathā jano’. Yathā hi asaṃyataṃ pharusakāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1627_3: kañci sabbadisampatiṃ rājānaṃ ‘pharusasamācāro aya’nti evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi aññattha
atk-abh01a0:1627_4: vuttiṃ alabhamāno jano vuttihetu nissāya vattati, evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1627_5: aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ alabhamānamidaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoteva. Evaṃ kurumānañca –
atk-abh01a0:1634_0: 269. Idāni yasmā sabbānipetāni tebhūmakakusalāni hīnādinā pabhedena vattanti, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1634_1: tesaṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha hīnanti
atk-abh01a0:1634_2: lāmakaṃ. Taṃ āyūhanavasena veditabbaṃ. Hīnuttamānaṃ majjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ. Padhānabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1634_3: nītaṃ paṇītaṃ, uttamanti attho. Tānipi āyūhanavaseneva veditabbāni. Yassa hi āyūhanakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1634_4: chando vā hīno hoti, vīriyaṃ vā, cittaṃ vā, vīmaṃsā vā, taṃ hīnaṃ nāma. Yassa te
atk-abh01a0:1634_5: dhammā majjhimā ceva paṇītā, ca taṃ majjhimañceva paṇītañca. Yaṃ pana kattukāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1634_6: chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā āyūhitaṃ, taṃ chandādhipatito
atk-abh01a0:1634_7: āgatattā chandādhipateyyaṃ nāma. Vīriyādhipateyyādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1635_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā nayā gaṇetabbā. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ vibhatto hi eko nayo, hīnanti
atk-abh01a0:1635_1: eko, majjhimanti eko, paṇītanti eko, chandādhipateyyanti eko. Ime tāva chandādhipateyye
atk-abh01a0:1635_2: pañca nayā. Evaṃ vīriyādhipateyyādīsupīti cattāro pañcakā vīsati honti. Purimo vā
atk-abh01a0:1635_3: eko suddhikanayo, hīnantiādayo tayo, chandādhipateyyantiādayo cattāro, chandādhipateyyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1635_4: hīnantiādayo dvādasāti evampi vīsati nayā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1636_0: Ime vīsati mahānayā kattha vibhattāti? Mahāpakaraṇe hīnattike vibhattā. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1636_1: ṭhāne hīnattikato majjhimarāsiṃ gahetvā hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tayo koṭṭhāsā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1636_2: Tatopi majjhimarāsiṃ ṭhapetvā hīnapaṇīte gahetvā nava nava koṭṭhāsā kātabbā. Hīnasmiṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1636_3: hi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ atthi paṇītaṃ atthi. Paṇītasmimpi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1636_4: atthi paṇītaṃ atthi. Tathā hīnahīnasmiṃ hīnaṃ, hīnahīnasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, hīnahīnasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1636_5: paṇītaṃ. Hīnamajjhimasmiṃ hīnaṃ, hīnamajjhimasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, hīnamajjhimasmiṃ paṇītaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1636_6: Hīnapaṇītasmiṃ hīnaṃ, hīnapaṇītasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, hīnapaṇītasmiṃ paṇītanti ayameko
atk-abh01a0:1636_7: navako. Paṇītahīnasmimpi hīnaṃ nāma atthi, paṇītahīnasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, paṇītahīnasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1636_8: paṇītaṃ. Tathā paṇītamajjhimasmiṃ hīnaṃ, paṇītamajjhimasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, paṇītamajjhimasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1636_9: paṇītaṃ. Paṇītapaṇītasmiṃ hīnaṃ, paṇītapaṇītasmiṃ majjhimaṃ, paṇītapaṇītasmiṃ paṇītanti.
atk-abh01a0:1636_10: Ayaṃ dutiyo navakoti dve navakā aṭṭhārasa. Imāni aṭṭhārasa kammadvārāni nāma. Imehi
atk-abh01a0:1636_11: pabhāvitattā, imesaṃ vasena, aṭṭhārasa khattiyā, aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇā, aṭṭhārasa vessā,
atk-abh01a0:1637_0: Imesu ca pana tebhūmakesu kusalesu kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tihetukampi duhetukampi hoti
atk-abh01a0:1637_2: Kāmāvacarampettha adhipatinā sahāpi uppajjati vināpi. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ adhipatisampannameva
atk-abh01a0:1637_3: hoti. Kāmāvacarakusale cettha ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipatīti dvepi adhipatayo
atk-abh01a0:1637_4: labbhanti. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaresu ārammaṇādhipati na labbhati, sahajātādhipatiyeva
atk-abh01a0:1637_5: labbhati. Tattha cittassa cittādhipateyyabhāvo sampayuttadhammānaṃ vasena vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1637_6: Dvinnaṃ pana cittānaṃ ekato abhāvena sampayuttacittassa cittādhipati nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1637_7: Tathā chandādīnaṃ chandādhipatiādayo. Keci pana ‘sace cittavato kusalaṃ hoti, mayhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1637_8: bhavissatīti evaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā aparaṃ kusalacittaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1637_9: tassa taṃ purimacittaṃ cittādhipati nāma hoti, tato āgatattā idaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1637_10: nāmā’ti evaṃ āgamanavasenāpi adhipatiṃ nāma icchanti. Ayaṃ pana nayo neva pāḷiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1637_11: na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati. Tasmā vuttanayeneva adhipatibhāvo veditabbo. Imesu ca ekūnavīsatiyā
atk-abh01a0:1637_12: mahānayesu purime suddhikanaye vuttaparimāṇāneva cittāni ca navakā ca pāṭhavārā ca
atk-abh01a0:1637_13: honti. Tasmā ñāṇasampayuttesu vuttaparimāṇato vīsatiguṇo cittanavakavārabhedo veditabbo,
atk-abh01a0:1637_14: catūsu ñāṇavippayuttesu soḷasaguṇoti, ayaṃ tebhūmakakusale pakiṇṇakakathā nāmāti.
atk-abh01a0:1640_0: 277. Evaṃ bhavattayasampattinibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbabhavasamatikkamanāya
atk-abh01a0:1640_1: lokuttarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha lokuttaranti
atk-abh01a0:1640_2: kenaṭṭhena lokuttaraṃ? Lokaṃ taratīti, lokuttaraṃ lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ; lokaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1640_3: samatikkamma abhibhuyya tiṭṭhatīti lokuttaraṃ. Jhānaṃ bhāvetīti ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1641_0: Lokato niyyāti vaṭṭato niyyātīti niyyānikaṃ. Niyyāti vā etenāti niyyānikaṃ. Taṃsamaṅgī
atk-abh01a0:1641_1: hi puggalo dukkhaṃ parijānanto niyyāti, samudayaṃ pajahanto niyyāti, nirodhaṃ sacchikaronto
atk-abh01a0:1641_2: niyyāti, maggaṃ bhāvento niyyāti. Yathā ca pana tebhūmakakusalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo
atk-abh01a0:1641_3: ācināti vaḍḍhetīti ācayagāmī nāma hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana yathā ekasmiṃ purise
atk-abh01a0:1641_4: aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ cinante aparo mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā tena citacitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1641_5: apacinanto viddhaṃsento eva gaccheyya, evameva tebhūmakakusalena citā cutipaṭisandhiyo
atk-abh01a0:1642_0: Diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyāti, ettha diṭṭhiyo eva diṭṭhigatāni, gūthagataṃ muttagatantiādīni
atk-abh01a0:1642_1: viya. Dvāsaṭṭhiyā vā diṭṭhīnaṃ antogadhattā diṭṭhīsu gatānītipi diṭṭhigatāni. Diṭṭhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1642_2: vā gataṃ etesantipi diṭṭhigatāni. Diṭṭhisadisagamanāni diṭṭhisadisappavattānīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1642_4: Tāni hi yāva paṭhamamaggabhāvanā tāva pavattisabbhāvato diṭṭhisadisagamanānīti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:1642_5: Iti diṭṭhiyo ca diṭṭhigatāni ca diṭṭhigatāni. Tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ. Pahānāyāti samucchedavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:1642_6: pajahanatthāya. Paṭhamāyāti gaṇanavasenapi paṭhamuppattivasenapi paṭhamāya. Bhūmiyāti
atk-abh01a0:1642_7: “anantarahitāya bhūmiyā”tiādīsu tāva ayaṃ mahāpathavī bhūmīti vuccati. “Sukhabhūmiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1642_8: kāmāvacare”tiādīsu cittuppādo. Idha pana sāmaññaphalaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tañhi sampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1642_9: nissayabhāvato te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi. Yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve
atk-abh01a0:1642_10: sayampi bhavati uppajjati, na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhāvaṃ, tasmāpi bhūmīti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1642_11: tassā paṭhamāya bhūmiyā. Pattiyāti sotāpattiphalasaṅkhātassa paṭhamassa sāmaññaphalassa
atk-abh01a0:1642_12: pattatthāya paṭilābhatthāyāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Viviccāti samucchedavivekavasena
atk-abh01a0:1643_0: Idāni kiñcāpi lokiyajjhānampi na vinā paṭipadāya ijjhati, evaṃ santepi idha suddhikanayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1643_1: pahāya lokuttarajjhānaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃyeva garuṃ katvā desetukāmatāya dukkhapaṭipadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1644_0: Tattha yo āditova kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto
atk-abh01a0:1644_1: vikkhambheti tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti; yo pana vikkhambhita kileso vipassanāparivāsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1644_2: vasanto cirena maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa dandhābhiññā hoti. Iti yo koci vāro
atk-abh01a0:1645_0: Katamaṃ pana vāraṃ rocesunti? Yattha sakiṃ vikkhambhitā kilesā samudācaritvā dutiyampi
atk-abh01a0:1645_1: vikkhambhitā puna samudācaranti, tatiyaṃ vikkhambhite pana tathāvikkhambhiteva katvā
atk-abh01a0:1645_2: maggena samugghātaṃ pāpeti, imaṃ vāraṃ rocesuṃ. Imassa vārassa dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññāti
atk-abh01a0:1645_3: nāmaṃ kataṃ. Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tasmā evamettha ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā
atk-abh01a0:1645_4: veditabbā – yo hi cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti, arūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1645_5: pariggaṇhāti, ‘rūpārūpaṃ’ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1645_6: sakkoti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā nāma hoti. Pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse
atk-abh01a0:1646_0: Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā ‘nāmarūpaṃ’ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena kilamanto
atk-abh01a0:1646_1: vavatthapeti, vavatthāpite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1646_2: sakkoti, tassāpi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1647_0: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā ‘paccaye’ pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto
atk-abh01a0:1647_1: pariggaṇhāti, paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1647_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1648_0: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā ‘lakkhaṇāni’ paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto
atk-abh01a0:1648_1: paṭivijjhati, paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1648_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1649_0: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1649_1: ‘vipassanānikantiṃ’ pariyādiyamāno dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariyādiyati, nikantiñca
atk-abh01a0:1649_2: pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti, evampi dukkhā paṭipadā
atk-abh01a0:1649_3: dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Imaṃ vāraṃ rocesuṃ. Imassa vārassa etaṃ nāmaṃ kataṃ. Imināva
atk-abh01a0:1650_0: Phasso hotītiādīsu anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvoti
atk-abh01a0:1650_1: cattāri padāni adhikāni. Niddesavāre ca vitakkādiniddesesu ‘maggaṅga’ntiādīni padāni
atk-abh01a0:1650_2: adhikāni. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva. Bhūmantaravasena pana lokuttaratāva idha viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1651_0: Tattha anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti ‘anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1651_1: catusaccadhammameva vā jānissāmī’ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbābhogena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1651_2: Lakkhaṇādīni panassa heṭṭhā paññindriye vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1652_0: Sundarā pasatthā vā vācā sammāvācā. Vacīduccaritasamugghāṭikāya micchāvācāviratiyā
atk-abh01a0:1652_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā viramaṇarasā micchāvācappahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:1652_2: Sundaro pasattho vā kammanto sammākammanto. Micchākammantasamucchedikāya pāṇātipātādiviratiyā
atk-abh01a0:1652_3: etaṃ nāmaṃ. So samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo viramaṇaraso micchākammantappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1652_4: Sundaro pasattho vā ājīvo sammāājīvo. Micchājīvaviratiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. So vodānalakkhaṇo
atk-abh01a0:1653_0: Apica heṭṭhā viratittaye vuttavasenapettha lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1653_1: dhammānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ maggapañcakaṃ idha maggaṭṭhakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yevāpanakesu
atk-abh01a0:1653_2: ca imesaṃ abhāvo. Tathā karuṇāmuditānaṃ. Ime hi tayo dhammā idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatattāva
atk-abh01a0:1653_3: yevāpanakesu na gahitā. Karuṇāmuditā pana sattārammaṇā, ime dhammā nibbānārammaṇāti
atk-abh01a0:1653_4: tāpettha na gahitā. Ayaṃ tāva uddesavāre visesattho.
atk-abh01a0:1654_0: 283. Niddesavāre pana maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1654_1: maggakoṭṭhāsoti attho. Yathā pana araññe pariyāpannaṃ araññapariyāpannaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1654_2: evaṃ magge pariyāpannanti maggapariyāpannaṃ. Maggasannissitanti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1655_0: 285. Pītisambojjhaṅgoti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgoti pītisambojjhaṅgo. Tattha bodhiyā
atk-abh01a0:1655_1: bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1655_4: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati. Bujjhatīti kilesasantānaniddāya
atk-abh01a0:1655_5: uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikaroti. Tassā
atk-abh01a0:1655_6: dhammasāmaggīsaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo, jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādīni viya. Yopesa
atk-abh01a0:1655_7: yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1655_8: tassa bodhissa aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo; senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-abh01a0:1656_0: Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-abh01a0:1656_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-abh01a0:1656_2: iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo. Pasattho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgoti
atk-abh01a0:1656_3: sambojjhaṅgo. Evaṃ pīti eva sambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgoti. Cittekaggatāniddesādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:1657_0: 296. Tesaṃ dhammānanti ye tasmiṃ samaye paṭivedhaṃ gacchanti catusaccadhammā, tesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1657_1: dhammānaṃ. Anaññātānanti kiñcāpi paṭhamamaggena te dhammā ñātā nāma honti, yathā
atk-abh01a0:1657_2: pana pakatiyā anāgatapubbaṃ vihāraṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhitopi puggalo pakatiyā
atk-abh01a0:1657_3: anāgatabhāvaṃ upādāya ‘anāgatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatomhī’ti vadati, yathā ca pakatiyā
atk-abh01a0:1657_4: apiḷandhapubbaṃ mālaṃ piḷandhitvā, anivatthapubbaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā, abhuttapubbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1657_5: bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā, pakatiyā abhuttabhāvaṃ upādāya abhuttapubbaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttomhīti
atk-abh01a0:1657_6: vadati, evamidhāpi yasmā pakatiyā iminā puggalena ime dhammā na ñātapubbā tasmā anaññātānanti
atk-abh01a0:1657_7: vuttaṃ. Adiṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Tattha adiṭṭhānanti ito pubbe paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1657_8: Appattānanti adhigamanavasena appattānaṃ. Aviditānanti ñāṇena apākaṭakatānaṃ. Asacchikatānanti
atk-abh01a0:1657_9: apaccakkhakatānaṃ. Sacchikiriyāyāti paccakkhakaraṇatthaṃ. Yathā ca iminā padena,
atk-abh01a0:1657_10: evaṃ sesehipi saddhiṃ anaññātānaṃ ñāṇāya, adiṭṭhānaṃ dassanāya, appattānaṃ pattiyā,
atk-abh01a0:1658_0: 299. Catūhi vacīduccaritehītiādīsu vacīti vacīviññatti veditabbā. Tiṇṇaṃ dosānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1658_1: yena kenaci duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni. Vacīto pavattāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni,
atk-abh01a0:1658_2: vaciyā vā nipphāditāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni. Tehi vacīduccaritehi. Ārakā ramatīti
atk-abh01a0:1658_3: ārati. Vinā tehi ramatīti virati. Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi vinā ramatīti
atk-abh01a0:1658_4: paṭivirati. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Sabbamidaṃ oramaṇabhāvassevādhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1658_5: Veraṃ maṇati, vināsetīti veramaṇī. Idampi oramaṇasseva vevacanaṃ. Yāya pana cetanāya
atk-abh01a0:1658_6: musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma, ayaṃ lokuttaramaggavirati. Uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1658_7: kātuṃ na deti, kiriyāpathaṃ pacchindatīti akiriyā. Tathā taṃ karaṇaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:1658_8: karaṇapathaṃ pacchindatīti akaraṇaṃ. Yāya ca cetanāya catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1658_9: bhāsamāno ajjhāpajjati nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjituṃ na detīti anajjhāpatti.
atk-abh01a0:1659_0: Velāanatikkamoti ettha “tāya velāyā”tiādīsu tāva kālo velāti āgato. “Uruvelāyaṃ viharatī”ti
atk-abh01a0:1659_1: ettha rāsi. “Ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatī”ti ettha sīmā. Idhāpi sīmāva. Anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1659_2: hi cattāri vacīsucaritāni velāti adhippetāni. Iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacīduccaritāni
atk-abh01a0:1659_3: bhāsamāno velaṃ atikkamati nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ velaṃ atikkamituṃ na detīti
atk-abh01a0:1659_4: velāanatikkamoti vuttā. Velāyatīti vā velā, calayati viddhaṃsetīti attho. Kiṃ velāyati?
atk-abh01a0:1659_5: Catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ. Iti velāyanato ‘velā’. Purisassa pana hitasukhaṃ anatikkamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1660_0: Setuṃ hanatīti setughāto; catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ padaghāto paccayaghātoti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1660_1: Paccayo hi idha setūti adhippeto. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – rāgādiko catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1660_2: paccayo vaṭṭasmiṃ puggalaṃ sinoti bandhatīti setu. Setussa ghāto setughāto. Vacīduccaritapaccayasamugghāṭikāya
atk-abh01a0:1660_3: viratiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayaṃ pana sammāvācāsaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
atk-abh01a0:1660_4: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena musāvādā viramati, aññena pesuññādīhi. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1660_5: pana ekacittasmiṃyeva labbhati. Catubbidhāya hi vacīduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1660_6: kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1661_0: 300. Kāyaduccaritehīti kāyato pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇātipātādīhi duccaritehi.
atk-abh01a0:1661_1: Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayampi sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
atk-abh01a0:1661_2: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena pāṇātipātā viramati, aññena adinnādānamicchācārehi.
atk-abh01a0:1661_3: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacittasmiṃyeva labbhati. Tividhāya hi kāyaduccaritacetanāya
atk-abh01a0:1661_4: padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1662_0: 301. Sammāājīvaniddese akiriyātiādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvaṃ ājīvamāno kiriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1662_1: karoti nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na detīti akiriyāti. Iminā nayena
atk-abh01a0:1662_2: yojanā veditabbā. Ājīvo ca nāmesa pāṭiyekko natthi, vācākammantesu gahitesu gahitova
atk-abh01a0:1662_3: hoti, tappakkhikattā. Dhuvapaṭisevanavasena panāyaṃ tato nīharitvā dassitoti. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1662_4: sante sammāājīvo sakiccako na hoti, aṭṭha maggaṅgāni na paripūrenti, tasmā sammāājīvo
atk-abh01a0:1662_5: sakiccako kātabbo, aṭṭha maggaṅgāni paripūretabbānīti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – ājīvo nāma
atk-abh01a0:1662_6: bhijjamāno kāyavacīdvāresuyeva bhijjati. Manodvāre ājīvabhedo nāma natthi. Pūrayamānopi
atk-abh01a0:1662_7: tasmiṃyeva dvāradvaye pūrati. Manodvāre ājīvapūraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Kāyadvāre pana
atk-abh01a0:1662_8: vītikkamo ājīvahetukopi atthi naājīvahetukopi. Tathā vacīdvāre.
atk-abh01a0:1663_0: Tattha yaṃ rājarājamahāmattā khiḍḍāpasutā sūrabhāvaṃ dassentā migavadhaṃ vā panthaduhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1663_1: vā paradāravītikkamaṃ vā karonti, idaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Tato viratipi ‘sammākammanto’
atk-abh01a0:1663_2: nāma. Yaṃ pana naājīvahetukaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ bhāsanti, idaṃ akusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1664_0: Yaṃ pana ājīvahetu nesādamacchabandhādayo pāṇaṃ hananti, adinnaṃ ādiyanti, micchācāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1664_1: caranti, ayaṃ micchājīvo nāma. Tato virati ‘sammāājīvo’ nāma. Yampi lañjaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:1664_2: musā bhaṇanti, pesuññapharusasamphappalāpe pavattenti, ayampi micchājīvo nāma. Tato
atk-abh01a0:1665_0: Mahāsīvatthero panāha – ‘kāyavacīdvāresupi vītikkamo ājīvahetuko vā hotu no vā ājīvahetuko,
atk-abh01a0:1665_1: akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammantveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Tato viratipi sammākammanto
atk-abh01a0:1665_2: sammāvācātveva vuccatī’ti. ‘Ājīvo kuhi’nti vutte pana ‘tīṇi kuhanavatthūni nissāya
atk-abh01a0:1665_3: cattāro paccaye uppādetvā tesaṃ paribhogo’ti āha. Ayaṃ pana koṭippatto micchājīvo.
atk-abh01a0:1666_0: Ayampi sammāājīvo pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati, aññeneva hi cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā
atk-abh01a0:1666_1: viramati, aññena vacīdvāravītikkamā. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacittasmiṃyeva labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1666_2: Kāyavacīdvāresu hi sattakammapathavasena uppannāya micchājīvasaṅkhātāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-abh01a0:1666_3: padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjatīti. Ayaṃ niddesavāre viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1667_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ indriyesu anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, maggaṅgesu ca sammāvācādīni,
atk-abh01a0:1667_1: tesaṃ vasena saṅgahavāre “navindriyāni, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti vuttaṃ. Suññatavāro pākatikoyevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1668_0: 343. Ito paraṃ suddhikasuññatā suññatapaṭipadā suddhikaappaṇihitā appaṇihitapaṭipadāti
atk-abh01a0:1668_1: ayaṃ desanābhedo hoti. Tattha suññatanti lokuttaramaggassa nāmaṃ. So hi āgamanato
atk-abh01a0:1668_2: saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu anattato
atk-abh01a0:1668_3: abhinivisitvā anattato saṅkhāre passati. Yasmā pana anattato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1668_4: nāma na hoti, aniccatopi dukkhatopi daṭṭhumeva vaṭṭati, tasmā ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1668_5: tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa
atk-abh01a0:1668_6: tebhūmakepi saṅkhāre suññatova passati. Ayaṃ vipassanā suññatā nāma hoti. Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1668_7: ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘suññata’nti nāmaṃ deti. Evaṃ maggo ‘āgamanato’ suññatanāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1668_8: labhati. Yasmā pana so rāgādīhi suñño tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’ suññatanāmaṃ labhati. Nibbānampi
atk-abh01a0:1668_9: rāgādīhi suññattā suññatanti vuccati. Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo ‘ārammaṇato’
atk-abh01a0:1669_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati. Pariyāyadesanā
atk-abh01a0:1669_1: hesā. Abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāyadesanā. Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā
atk-abh01a0:1669_2: nāmaṃ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati. Āgamanameva hi dhuraṃ. Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti –
atk-abh01a0:1669_3: vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamananti. Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṃ dhuraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1669_4: phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṃ dhuraṃ. Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1670_0: 350. Appaṇihitanti, etthāpi appaṇihitanti maggasseva nāmaṃ. Idampi nāmaṃ maggo tīheva
atk-abh01a0:1670_1: kāraṇehi labhati. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu āditova dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhatova
atk-abh01a0:1670_2: saṅkhāre passati. Yasmā pana dukkhato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1670_3: aniccatopi anattatopi daṭṭhumeva vaṭṭati, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1670_4: anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu
atk-abh01a0:1670_5: paṇidhiṃ sosetvā pariyādiyitvā vissajjeti. Ayaṃ vipassanā appaṇihitā nāma hoti. Sā
atk-abh01a0:1670_6: āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṃ deti. Evaṃ maggo ‘āgamanato’
atk-abh01a0:1670_7: appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati. Yasmā pana tattha rāgadosamohapaṇidhayo natthi, tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’
atk-abh01a0:1670_8: appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati. Nibbānampi tesaṃ paṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1670_9: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1671_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati. Pariyāyadesanā
atk-abh01a0:1671_1: hesā. Abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāyadesanā. Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā
atk-abh01a0:1671_2: nāmaṃ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati. Āgamanameva hi dhuraṃ. Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti –
atk-abh01a0:1671_3: vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamananti. Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṃ dhuraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1671_4: phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṃ dhuraṃ. Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1672_0: Nanu ca suññato animitto appaṇihitoti tīṇi maggassa nāmāni? Yathāha – “tayome, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:1672_1: vimokkhā – suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho”ti. Tesu idha
atk-abh01a0:1672_2: dve magge gahetvā animitto kasmā na gahitoti? Āgamanābhāvato. Animittavipassanā hi
atk-abh01a0:1672_3: sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. Sammāsambuddho
atk-abh01a0:1675_0: Animittavipassanaṃ kathesi. Vipassanā hi niccanimittaṃ dhuvanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1675_1: attanimittañca ugghāṭeti. Tasmā animittāti kathitā. Sā ca kiñcāpi taṃ nimittaṃ ugghāṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:1675_2: sayaṃ pana nimittadhammesu caratīti sanimittāva hoti. Tasmā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1675_3: ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1676_0: Aparo nayo – abhidhammo nāma paramatthadesanā. Animittamaggassa ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva
atk-abh01a0:1676_1: hoti. Kathaṃ? Aniccānupassanāya hi vasena animittavimokkho kathito. Tena ca vimokkhena
atk-abh01a0:1676_2: saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Taṃ ariyamagge ekaṅgampi na hoti, amaggaṅgattā attano
atk-abh01a0:1676_3: maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. Itaresu pana dvīsu anattānupassanāya
atk-abh01a0:1676_4: tāva vasena suññatavimokkho, dukkhānupassanāya vasena appaṇihitavimokkho kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1676_5: Tesu suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, appaṇihitavimokkhena samādhindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1676_6: Tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti. Maggārammaṇattikepi
atk-abh01a0:1676_7: hi maggādhipatidhammavibhajane chandacittānaṃ adhipatikāle tesaṃ dhammānaṃ amaggaṅgattāva
atk-abh01a0:1676_8: maggādhipatibhāvo na vutto. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbanti. Ayamettha aṭṭhakathāmuttako
atk-abh01a0:1677_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi animittavipassanā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1677_1: dātuṃ na sakkotīti animittamaggo na gahito. Keci pana ‘animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1677_2: alabhantopi suttantapariyāyena saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī’ti āhaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1677_3: Te idaṃ vatvā paṭikkhittā – animittamagge saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhante
atk-abh01a0:1677_4: suññataappaṇihitamaggāpi saguṇatoyeva ārammaṇatoyeva ca idha nāmaṃ labheyyuṃ. Na
atk-abh01a0:1677_5: pana labhanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Ayañhi maggo nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati – sarasato
atk-abh01a0:1677_6: ca paccanīkato ca; sabhāvato ca paṭipakkhato cāti attho. Tattha suññataappaṇihitamaggā
atk-abh01a0:1677_7: sarasatopi paccanīkatopi nāmaṃ labhanti. Suññataappaṇihitamaggā hi rāgādīhi suññā,
atk-abh01a0:1677_8: rāgapaṇidhiādīhi ca appaṇihitāti evaṃ ‘sarasato’ nāmaṃ labhanti. Suññato ca attābhinivesassa
atk-abh01a0:1677_9: paṭipakkho, appaṇihito paṇidhissāti evaṃ ‘paccanīkato’ nāmaṃ labhanti. Animittamaggo
atk-abh01a0:1677_10: pana rāgādinimittānaṃ niccanimittādīnañca abhāvena sarasatova nāmaṃ labhati, no paccanīkato.
atk-abh01a0:1677_11: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho. Aniccānupassanā panassa
atk-abh01a0:1677_12: anulomabhāve ṭhitāti. Sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo nāma natthīti.
atk-abh01a0:1678_0: Suttantikapariyāyena panesa evaṃ āharitvā dīpito – yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1678_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni ekāvajjanena viya āpāthamāgacchanti, tiṇṇañca ekato āpāthagamanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1678_2: nāma natthi. Kammaṭṭhānassa pana vibhūtabhāvadīpanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ādito hi yattha
atk-abh01a0:1678_3: katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti
atk-abh01a0:1678_4: tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti. Kathaṃ? Aniccādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1678_5: hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ekalakkhaṇadassanamatteneva
atk-abh01a0:1678_6: hi maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā aniccato abhiniviṭṭho bhikkhu na kevalaṃ aniccatova
atk-abh01a0:1678_7: vuṭṭhāti, dukkhatopi anattatopi vuṭṭhātiyeva. Dukkhato anattato abhiniviṭṭhepi eseva
atk-abh01a0:1678_8: nayo. Iti ādito yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1678_9: yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa
atk-abh01a0:1678_10: nāmaṃ deti. Tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto nāma hoti, dukkhato vuṭṭhahantassa
atk-abh01a0:1678_11: appaṇihito, anattato vuṭṭhahantassa suññatoti. Evaṃ suttantapariyāyena āharitvā dīpito.
atk-abh01a0:1679_0: Vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā kimārammaṇāti? Lakkhaṇārammaṇāti. Lakkhaṇaṃ nāma paññattigatikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1679_1: na vattabbadhammabhūtaṃ. Yo pana aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti,
atk-abh01a0:1679_2: tassa pañcakkhandhā kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṃ viya honti. Saṅkhārārammaṇameva ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārato
atk-abh01a0:1679_3: vuṭṭhāti. Yathā hi eko bhikkhu pattaṃ kiṇitukāmo pattavāṇijena pattaṃ ābhataṃ disvā
