atk-abh01a0:1679_4: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho gaṇhissāmīti cintetvā vīmaṃsamāno tīṇi chiddāni passeyya, so na chiddesu
atk-abh01a0:1679_5: nirālayo hoti, patte pana nirālayo hoti; evameva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu
atk-abh01a0:1679_6: nirālayo hoti. Saṅkhārārammaṇeneva ñāṇena saṅkhārato vuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ. Dussopamāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1680_0: Iti bhagavā lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhājento suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkanayaṃ pañcakanayanti
atk-abh01a0:1680_1: dvepi naye āhari. Tathā suddhikasuññatāya suññatapaṭipadāya suddhikaappaṇihitāya
atk-abh01a0:1680_2: appaṇihitapaṭipadāyāti. Kasmā evaṃ āharīti? Puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena
atk-abh01a0:1680_3: ca. Tadubhayampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetīti
atk-abh01a0:1680_4: ettha suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkapañcakavasena dve nayā, tathā sesesūti sabbesupi
atk-abh01a0:1685_0: Lokuttaramaggo hi ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti, ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a0:1685_1: bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a0:1685_2: ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti. Rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1685_3: Arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti, arūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, ekappahāreneva
atk-abh01a0:1686_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti so panesa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikopi hoti sattaṅgikopi. Bojjhaṅgāpi
atk-abh01a0:1686_1: satta vā honti cha vā. Jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikaṃ vā hoti caturaṅgikaṃ vā; tivaṅgikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1686_2: vā duvaṅgikaṃ vā. Evaṃ sattaaṭṭhādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ pariṇāmo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1687: ‘Nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatī’ti nimittanti yato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti; ‘paṭipadāpatī’ti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calanācalanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1688_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātītiādīsu tāva idhekacco āditova ajjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1688_1: pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā te aniccādito passati, yasmā pana na
atk-abh01a0:1688_2: suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, bahiddhāpi daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:1688_3: parassa khandhepi anupādinnasaṅkhārepi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti passati. So kālena
atk-abh01a0:1688_4: ajjhattaṃ sammasati kālena bahiddhāti. Tassevaṃ sammasato ajjhattaṃ sammasanakāle
atk-abh01a0:1688_5: vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati. Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti
atk-abh01a0:1688_6: nāma. Sace panassa bahiddhā sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati, evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1688_7: ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Eseva nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
atk-abh01a0:1689_0: Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchinditvā
atk-abh01a0:1689_1: aniccādito passati, yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti arūpampi
atk-abh01a0:1689_2: daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā taṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ saññaṃ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca
atk-abh01a0:1689_3: idaṃ arūpanti paricchinditvā aniccādito passati. So kālena rūpaṃ sammasati kālena
atk-abh01a0:1689_4: arūpaṃ. Tassevaṃ sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a0:1689_5: Evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā
atk-abh01a0:1689_6: maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati, evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo
atk-abh01a0:1689_7: arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a0:1690_0: “Yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva
atk-abh01a0:1690_1: vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāmāti. Ayaṃ tikkhavipassakassa
atk-abh01a0:1691_0: Yathā hi chātajjhattassa purisassa majjhe gūthapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā nānaggarasabhojanapuṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1691_1: pātiṃ upaneyyuṃ, so byañjanaṃ hatthena viyūhanto taṃ gūthapiṇḍaṃ disvā ‘kimida’nti
atk-abh01a0:1691_2: pucchitvā gūthapiṇḍoti vutte ‘dhi dhi, apanethā’ti bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1692_0: Bhojanapātidassanasmiñhi tassa attamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno bālaputhujjanakāle
atk-abh01a0:1692_1: pañcakkhandhe ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti gahitakālo. Gūthapiṇḍassa diṭṭhakālo viya tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1692_2: sallakkhitakālo. Bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayakālo viya tikkhavipassakassa mahāpaññassa
atk-abh01a0:1692_3: bhikkhuno “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti pañcahi khandhehi
atk-abh01a0:1693_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti ettha ayaṃ vuttappabhedo aṅgapariṇāmo yathā hoti tathā
atk-abh01a0:1693_2: niyameti. Keci pana therā ‘bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1693_3: vadanti. Keci ‘vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī’ti vadanti. Keci ‘puggalajjhāsayo
atk-abh01a0:1693_4: niyametī’ti vadanti. Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva
atk-abh01a0:1694_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino
atk-abh01a0:1694_1: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre
atk-abh01a0:1694_2: sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha
atk-abh01a0:1694_3: maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti. Tesañhi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi
atk-abh01a0:1694_4: upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ pattā somanassasahagatāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1695_0: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva
atk-abh01a0:1695_1: jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta maggaṅgāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:1695_2: catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni. Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena
atk-abh01a0:1695_3: ca hoti. Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1696_0: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni
atk-abh01a0:1696_1: bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva. Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1696_2: naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti, vuṭṭhānagāminī
atk-abh01a0:1696_3: upekkhāsahagatāva. Arūpajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1696_4: pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ye keci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese
atk-abh01a0:1696_5: vuṭṭhitā samāpatti attanā sadisabhāvaṃ karoti, bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
atk-abh01a0:1697_0: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā
atk-abh01a0:1697_1: maggo nibbattito hoti taṃtaṃsamāpattisadisova hoti, sammasitasamāpattisadisoti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1697_2: Sace pana kāmāvacaradhamme sammasati paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Tatrāpi vipassanāniyamo
atk-abh01a0:1698_0: Tatiyattheravāde ‘aho vatāhaṃ sattaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyyaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti
atk-abh01a0:1698_1: attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā
atk-abh01a0:1698_2: maggo nibbattito taṃtaṃjhānasadisova hoti. Pādakajjhānaṃ pana sammasitajjhānaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:1698_3: vinā, ajjhāsayamatteneva taṃ na ijjhati. Svāyamattho nandakovādasuttena dīpetabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1699_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā
atk-abh01a0:1699_1: vimati vā ‘ūno nu kho cando puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho puṇṇo candotveva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1699_2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā
atk-abh01a0:1699_3: ca. Tāsaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ bhikkhunisatānaṃ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā
atk-abh01a0:1700_0: Tāsu hi yassā bhikkhuniyā sotāpattiphalassa upanissayo, sā sotāpattiphaleneva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā
atk-abh01a0:1700_1: ahosi…pe… yassā arahattassa upanissayo sā arahatteneva. Evameva attano ajjhāsayānurūpena
atk-abh01a0:1700_2: yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito
atk-abh01a0:1700_3: taṃtaṃjhānasadisova so hoti. Pādakajjhānaṃ pana sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā, ajjhāsayamatteneva
atk-abh01a0:1700_4: taṃ na ijjhatīti. Etthāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1701_1: āhaṃsu – ‘bhante, yattha tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tattha taṃ niyametu; yasmiṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1701_2: pādakajjhānaṃ natthi, tasmiṃ arūpabhave kiṃ niyametī’ti? ‘Āvuso, tatthapi pādakajjhānameva
atk-abh01a0:1701_3: niyameti. Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni
atk-abh01a0:1701_4: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto, paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā
atk-abh01a0:1701_5: vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā upari tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbatteti, tassa tāni paṭhamajjhānikāneva
atk-abh01a0:1701_6: honti. Dutiyajjhānikādīsupi eseva nayo. Arūpe tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca
atk-abh01a0:1701_7: kho lokuttaraṃ na lokiyaṃ. Evaṃ tatthāpi pādakajjhānameva niyameti āvuso’ti. ‘Sukathito, bhante, pañho’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1702_0: ‘Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamenti; yaṃ yaṃ hi pañcakkhandhaṃ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a0:1702_1: vuṭṭhāti taṃtaṃsadisova maggo hotī’ti vādiṃ moravāpivāsimahādattattherampi antevāsikā
atk-abh01a0:1702_2: āhaṃsu ‘bhante, tumhākaṃ vāde doso paññāyati – rūpaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitabhikkhuno
atk-abh01a0:1702_3: hi rūpasadisena abyākatena maggena bhavitabbaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nayato pariggahetvā
atk-abh01a0:1702_5: āvuso, evaṃ hoti. Lokuttaramaggo hi appanaṃ appatto nāma natthi, tasmā rūpaṃ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a0:1702_6: vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhaṅgiko somanassasahagatamaggo hoti, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ sammasitvā
atk-abh01a0:1702_7: vuṭṭhitassapi na sabbākārena tādiso hoti, sattaṅgiko pana upekkhāsahagatamaggo hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1703_1: kathayiṃsu. So āha – ‘yassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tassa puggalajjhāsayo niyametu,
atk-abh01a0:1703_2: yassa taṃ natthi tassa katarajjhāsayo niyamessati niddhanassa vuḍḍhigavesanakālo viya hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1704_0: Taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherassa puna kathayiṃsu. So ‘pādakajjhānavato
atk-abh01a0:1704_1: idaṃ kathitaṃ āvuso’ti āha. Yathā pana pādakajjhānavato, sammasitajjhānavatopi tatheva
atk-abh01a0:1704_2: veditabbaṃ. Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi paṭhamādīni sammasato uppannamaggo paṭhamattheravādena
atk-abh01a0:1704_3: pañcamajjhāniko. Dutiyavādena paṭhamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1704_4: Tatiyavādena panettha ‘yaṃ icchati tajjhāniko hotī’ti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1704_5: ajjhāsayo ca sātthako hotīti. Evaṃ tayopi therā paṇḍitā byattā buddhisampannāva.
atk-abh01a0:1704_6: Tena tesaṃ vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu. Idha pana atthameva uddharitvā tayopete
atk-abh01a0:1705_0: Idāni ‘nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatī’ti ettha evaṃ aṅgapariṇāmavato maggassa uppādakāle gotrabhu
atk-abh01a0:1705_1: kuto vuṭṭhāti? Maggo kutoti? Gotrabhu tāva nimittato vuṭṭhāti, pavattaṃ chettuṃ na
atk-abh01a0:1705_2: sakkoti, ekatovuṭṭhāno hesa. Maggo nimittato vuṭṭhāti, pavattampi chindati ubhatovuṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:1705_3: hesa. Tesaṃ ayaṃ uppattinayo – yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ anulomaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1705_4: neva ekaṃ hoti, na pañcamaṃ. Ekañhi āsevanaṃ na labhati, pañcamaṃ bhavaṅgassa āsannattā
atk-abh01a0:1705_5: pavedhati. Tadā hi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā neva ekaṃ hoti na pañcamaṃ. Mahāpaññassa
atk-abh01a0:1705_6: pana dve anulomāni honti, tatiyaṃ gotrabhu, catutthaṃ maggacittaṃ, tīṇi phalāni,
atk-abh01a0:1705_7: tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ. Majjhimapaññassa tīṇi anulomāni honti, catutthaṃ gotrabhu,
atk-abh01a0:1705_8: pañcamaṃ maggacittaṃ, dve phalāni, tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ. Mandapaññassa cattāri anulomāni,
atk-abh01a0:1705_9: honti pañcamaṃ gotrabhu, chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ, sattamaṃ phalaṃ, tato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1705_10: Tatra mahāpaññamandapaññānaṃ vasena akathetvā majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1706_0: Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā
atk-abh01a0:1706_1: manodvārāvajjanaṃ hutvā vipassanāgocare khandhe ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:1706_2: Tadanantaraṃ teneva āvajjanena gahitakkhandhe gahetvā uppajjati paṭhamaṃ javanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_3: anulomañāṇaṃ. Taṃ tesu khandhesu aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā pavattitvā oḷārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_4: oḷārikaṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni
atk-abh01a0:1706_5: katvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṃ uppajjati dutiyānulomaṃ. Tesu purimaṃ anāsevanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1706_6: Dutiyassa purimaṃ āsevanaṃ hoti. Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā
atk-abh01a0:1706_8: vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṃ uppajjati
atk-abh01a0:1706_9: tatiyānulomaṃ. Tassa dutiyaṃ āsevanaṃ hoti. Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_10: hutvā tasmiṃyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā tadavasesaṃ aṇusahagataṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_11: vinodetvā niravasesaṃ katvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1706_12: Evaṃ tīhi anulomehi saccapaṭicchādakatame vinodite tadanantaraṃ uppajjati gotrabhuññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1707_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira cakkhumā puriso nakkhattayogaṃ jānissāmīti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1707_1: candaṃ passituṃ uddhaṃ ullokesi. Tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
atk-abh01a0:1707_2: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṃsesi. Aparo majjhime. Aparo sukhume.
atk-abh01a0:1707_3: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1708_1: vātā viya tīṇi anulomacittāni. Cakkhumā puriso viya gotrabhuññāṇaṃ. Cando viya nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1708_2: Ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakattayaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa
atk-abh01a0:1708_3: saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ. Vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1708_4: viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuññāṇassa suvisuddhanibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1709_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti, na candaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1709_1: daṭṭhuṃ, evaṃ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakatameyeva vinodetuṃ sakkonti, na nibbānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1709_2: ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ. Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṃsetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1709_3: evaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti na kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1709_4: Evaṃ anulomaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ hoti, gotrabhu nibbānārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1710_0: Yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahitārammaṇaṃ gaṇheyya puna anulomaṃ taṃ anubandheyyāti
atk-abh01a0:1710_1: maggavuṭṭhānameva na bhaveyya. Gotrabhuññāṇaṃ pana anulomassa ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā
atk-abh01a0:1710_2: taṃ apacchatopavattikaṃ katvā sayaṃ anāvajjanampi samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1710_3: nibbattāhīti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati. Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1710_4: avīcisantativasena taṃ ñāṇaṃ anubandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1711_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira issāso dhanusatamatthake phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena
atk-abh01a0:1711_1: mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi. Añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvañchitvā
atk-abh01a0:1711_2: yadā issāsassa phalakasataṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṃ deti, issāso
atk-abh01a0:1711_3: daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasataṃ nibbijjhati. Tattha daṇḍakasaññā
atk-abh01a0:1711_4: viya gotrabhuññāṇaṃ. Issāso viya maggañāṇaṃ. Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1711_5: phalakasatanibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuññāṇena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
atk-abh01a0:1711_6: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbaapadālitapubbānaṃ lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanapadālanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1711_7: Bhūmiladdhavaṭṭasetusamugghātakaraṇantipi etadeva. Maggassa hi ekameva kiccaṃ anusayappajahanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1711_8: Iti so anusaye pajahanto nimittā vuṭṭhāti nāma, pavattaṃ chindati nāma. ‘Nimitta’nti
atk-abh01a0:1711_10: Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – upādinnakaṃ anupādinnakanti. Tesu maggassa anupādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā
atk-abh01a0:1712_0: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhigatasampayuttāni vicikicchāsahagatanti pañca cittāni
atk-abh01a0:1712_1: pahīyanti. Tāni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Taṃ anupādinnakarūpakkhandho. Tāni cittāni viññāṇakkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1712_2: Taṃsampayuttā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā tayo arūpakkhandhā. Tattha sace sotāpannassa
atk-abh01a0:1712_3: sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa tāni pañca cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1712_4: pāpuṇeyyuṃ. Sotāpattimaggo pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānenappattiṃ vārayamāno setusamugghātaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1713_0: Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni dve domanassasahagatānīti oḷārikakāmarāgabyāpādavasena
atk-abh01a0:1713_1: cha cittāni pahīyanti. Anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatakāmarāgabyāpādavasena tāni eva cha
atk-abh01a0:1713_2: cittāni pahīyanti. Arahattamaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni uddhaccasahagatañcāti
atk-abh01a0:1713_3: pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti. Tattha sace tesaṃ ariyānaṃ te maggā abhāvitā assu,
atk-abh01a0:1713_4: tāni cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ. Te pana tesaṃ maggā pariyuṭṭhānappattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1713_5: vārayamānā setusamugghātaṃ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṃ kurumānā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhahanti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1714_0: Upādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā upādinnakato vuṭṭhātītipi vadiṃsu. Sace
atk-abh01a0:1714_1: hi sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge
atk-abh01a0:1714_2: saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṃ atthitāya.
atk-abh01a0:1714_3: Tīṇi saṃyojanāni diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayoti ime pana pañca kilese sotāpattimaggo
atk-abh01a0:1714_4: uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge
atk-abh01a0:1714_5: saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati? Evaṃ sotāpattimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1715_0: Sace sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā dve bhave pañcasu
atk-abh01a0:1715_1: bhavesu upādinnakapavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṃ atthitāya.
atk-abh01a0:1715_2: Oḷārikāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana
atk-abh01a0:1715_3: cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto sakadāgāmissa dve
atk-abh01a0:1715_4: bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati? Evaṃ sakadāgāmimaggo
atk-abh01a0:1715_5: upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1716_0: Sace anāgāmissa anāgāmimaggo abhāvito abhavissa, ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhavaṃ dutiyabhave
atk-abh01a0:1716_1: upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṃ atthitāya. Aṇusahagatāni
atk-abh01a0:1716_2: kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni aṇusahagato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro
atk-abh01a0:1716_3: kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti. Idāni kuto anāgāmissa ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-abh01a0:1716_4: dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati? Evaṃ anāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1717_0: Sace arahato arahattamaggo abhāvito abhavissa, rūpārūpabhavesu upādinnakappavattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1717_1: pavatteyya. Kasmā? Tassa pavattiyā hetūnaṃ atthitāya. Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1717_2: avijjā mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti ime pana aṭṭha kilese so maggo uppajjamānova
atk-abh01a0:1717_3: samugghāteti. Idāni kuto khīṇāsavassa punabbhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a0:1717_4: Evaṃ arahattamaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1718: Sotāpattimaggo cettha apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti, sakadāgāmimaggo sugatikāmabhavekadesato, anāgāmimaggo kāmabhavato, arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:1719_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ ayaṃ pāḷi – “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1719_1: nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ, nāmañca rūpañca
atk-abh01a0:1719_2: etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1720_0: ‘Sakadāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu
atk-abh01a0:1720_1: bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1721_0: ‘Anāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā kāmadhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1721_1: dvīsu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1722_1: vā ye uppajjeyyuṃ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti
atk-abh01a0:1722_2: paṭippassambhanti. Arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1722_3: nirodhena paññā ca sati ca nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1722_4: gacchanti paṭippassambhantī”ti. Ayaṃ tāva nimitte vinicchayo.
atk-abh01a0:1723_0: ‘Paṭipadāpatī’ti – ettha pana paṭipadā calati na calatīti? Calati. Tathāgatassa hi
atk-abh01a0:1723_1: sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā ahesuṃ. Mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-abh01a0:1723_2: paṭhamamaggo sukhapaṭipado khippābhiñño, upari tayo maggā dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
atk-abh01a0:1723_3: Kasmā? Niddābhibhūtattā. Sammāsambuddho kira sattāhaṃ daharakumārakaṃ viya theraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1723_4: parihari. Theropi ekadivasaṃ niddāyamāno nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “pacalāyasi
atk-abh01a0:1723_5: no tvaṃ, moggallāna, pacalāyasi no tvaṃ moggallānā”ti. Evarūpassapi mahābhiññappattassa
atk-abh01a0:1723_6: sāvakassa paṭipadā calati, sesānaṃ kiṃ na calissati? Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi
atk-abh01a0:1723_7: maggā dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā honti, ekaccassa dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā, ekaccassa
atk-abh01a0:1723_8: sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā, ekaccassa sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Ekaccassa paṭhamamaggo
atk-abh01a0:1723_9: dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño hoti, dutiyamaggo dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño, tatiyamaggo
atk-abh01a0:1724_0: Yathā ca paṭipadā evaṃ adhipatipi calati eva. Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā
atk-abh01a0:1724_1: chandādhipateyyā honti, ekaccassa vīriyādhipateyyā, ekaccassa cittādhipateyyā, ekaccassa
atk-abh01a0:1724_2: vīmaṃsādhipateyyā. Ekaccassa pana paṭhamamaggo chandādhipateyyo hoti, dutiyo vīriyādhipateyyo,
atk-abh01a0:1727_0: 357. Idāni yasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ bhāvento na kevalaṃ upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena jhānaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1727_1: bhāveti, niyyānaṭṭhena pana maggampi bhāveti, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānampi, padahanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1727_2: sammappadhānampi, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādampi, adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyampi, akampiyaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1727_3: balampi, bujjhanaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgampi, tathaṭṭhena saccampi, avikkhepaṭṭhena samathampi,
atk-abh01a0:1727_4: suññataṭṭhena dhammampi, rāsaṭṭhena khandhampi, āyatanaṭṭhena āyatanampi, suññasabhāvanissattaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1727_5: dhātumpi, paccayaṭṭhena āhārampi, phusanaṭṭhena phassampi, vedayitaṭṭhena vedanampi,
atk-abh01a0:1727_6: sañjānanaṭṭhena saññampi, cetayitaṭṭhena cetanampi, vijānanaṭṭhena cittampi bhāveti,
atk-abh01a0:1727_7: tasmā etesaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā padānaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1727_8: Evaṃ ‘idampi bhāveti, idampi bhāvetī’ti puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena ca
atk-abh01a0:1727_9: vīsati nayā desitā honti. Dhammaṃ sotuṃ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1727_10: lokuttaraṃ ‘jhāna’nti kathite bujjhanti, tesaṃ sappāyavasena jhānanti kathitaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1727_11: ye vijānanaṭṭhena ‘citta’nti vutte bujjhanti, tesaṃ sappāyavasena cittanti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1728_1: chaasādhāraṇañāṇayogena ca desanaṃ yadicchakaṃ niyametvā dasseti. Icchanto upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1728_2: lokuttaraṃ jhānanti dasseti, icchanto niyyānaṭṭhena…pe… vijānanaṭṭhena lokuttaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1728_3: cittanti. Ayaṃ ‘desanāvilāso’ nāma. Tattha yatheva lokuttaraṃ jhānanti vuttaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1728_4: dasa nayā vibhattā, evaṃ maggādīsupi teyeva veditabbā. Iti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dasa
atk-abh01a0:1728_5: dasa katvā dve nayasatāni vibhattāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1729_0: 358. Idāni adhipatibhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1729_1: chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1729_2: nāma. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Iti purimasmiṃ suddhike dvenayasatāni chandādhipateyyādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:1729_3: dve dveti nayasahassena bhājetvā paṭhamamaggaṃ dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1732_0: 361. Idāni dutiyamaggādīnaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1732_1: Tattha kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāyāti etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvatthāya. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1732_2: dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo – adhiccuppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca.
atk-abh01a0:1732_3: Sakadāgāmissa hi, vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva, kilesā abhiṇhaṃ nuppajjanti, kadāci kadāci
atk-abh01a0:1732_4: uppajjanti; uppajjantāpi viraḷākārā hutvā uppajjanti, viraḷavāpitakhette aṅkurā viya.
atk-abh01a0:1732_5: Uppajjamānāpi, ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva, maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1732_6: karontā nuppajjanti. Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā uppajjanti. Tanukākārā
atk-abh01a0:1732_7: hutvā uppajjanti, abbhapaṭalaṃ viya makkhikāpattaṃ viya ca.
atk-abh01a0:1733_0: Tattha keci therā vadanti – ‘sakadāgāmissa kilesā kiñcāpi cirena uppajjanti, bahalāva
atk-abh01a0:1733_1: pana hutvā uppajjanti, tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī’ti. Etaṃ pana appamāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1733_2: Puttadhītaro hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi honti. Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā
atk-abh01a0:1733_3: natthi kilesānaṃ bahalatāti. Dvīhi eva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo
atk-abh01a0:1734: Dutiyāyāti gaṇanavasenāpi dutiyuppattivasenāpi dutiyāya. Bhūmiyā pattiyāti sāmaññaphalassa paṭilābhatthāya. Tatiyacatutthesupi eseva nayo. Visesamattaṃyeva pana vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:1735_0: Aññindriyanti ājānanakaṃ indriyaṃ. Paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1735_1: tena maggena ñātānaṃ catusaccadhammānaṃ jānanakaṃ indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Niddesavārepissa
atk-abh01a0:1735_2: imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavārepi imināva saddhiṃ navindriyāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1738: 362. Tatiye anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanubhūtānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a0:1739_1: uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya. Tattha rūparāgoti rūpabhave chandarāgo.
atk-abh01a0:1739_2: Arūparāgoti arūpabhave chandarāgo. Mānoti arahattamaggavajjhako māno eva. Tathā uddhaccāvijjā.
atk-abh01a0:1739_3: Imesupi dvīsu maggesu navamaṃ aññindriyameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1741_0: Sabbamaggesu padapaṭipāṭiyā samasaṭṭhipadāni, catūhi apaṇṇakaṅgehi saddhiṃ catusaṭṭhi
atk-abh01a0:1741_1: honti. Asambhinnato pana tettiṃsa. Koṭṭhāsavārasuññatavārā pākatikā eva. Yathā ca
atk-abh01a0:1741_2: pana paṭhamamagge evaṃ dutiyādīsupi nayasahassamevāti cattāro magge catūhi nayasahassehi
atk-abh01a0:1742_0: Saccavibhaṅge pana saṭṭhi nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1742_1: Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge vīsati nayasahassāni lokuttarāni, sammappadhānavibhaṅge vīsati,
atk-abh01a0:1742_2: iddhipādavibhaṅge dvattiṃsa, bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge dvattiṃsa, maggaṅgavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati
atk-abh01a0:1742_3: nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1743_0: Idha pana catūsu maggesu cattāriyeva nayasahassāni. Tesu paṭhamajjhānike paṭhamamagge
atk-abh01a0:1743_1: aṭṭhaṅgāni bhājitāni; tathā dutiyādīsu. Tattha paṭhamamagge sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1743_3: veditabbā. Evaṃ sante ‘paṭhamamaggeneva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahīnattā uparimaggattayena
atk-abh01a0:1743_4: pahātabbā diṭṭhi nāma natthi. Tattha sammādiṭṭhīti nāmaṃ kathaṃ hotī’ti? ‘Yathā visaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1743_5: atthi vā, hotu mā vā, agado agado tveva vuccati, evaṃ micchādiṭṭhi atthi vā, hotu
atk-abh01a0:1743_6: mā vā, ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhi eva nāma’.
atk-abh01a0:1744_0: ‘Yadi evaṃ nāmamattamevetaṃ hoti, uparimaggattaye pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccābhāvo āpajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1744_1: maggaṅgāni na paripūrenti, tasmā sammādiṭṭhi sakiccakā kātabbā maggaṅgāni pūretabbānī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1744_2: Sakiccakā cettha sammādiṭṭhi yathālābhaniyamena dīpetabbā. Uparimaggattayavajjho
atk-abh01a0:1744_3: hi eko māno atthi, so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Sā taṃ mānaṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1744_4: Sotāpattimaggasmiñhi sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Sotāpannassa pana sakadāgāmimaggavajjho
atk-abh01a0:1744_5: māno atthi, so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati sā taṃ mānaṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi. Tasseva
atk-abh01a0:1744_6: sattaakusalacittasahajāto saṅkappo atthi. Teheva cittehi vācaṅgacopanaṃ atthi, kāyaṅgacopanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1744_7: atthi, paccayaparibhogo atthi, sahajātavāyāmo atthi, asatibhāvo atthi, sahajātacittekaggatā
atk-abh01a0:1744_8: atthi. Ete micchāsaṅkappādayo nāma sakadāgāmimagge sammāsaṅkappādayo. Tesaṃ pahānena
atk-abh01a0:1744_9: sammāsaṅkappādayoti veditabbā. Evaṃ sakadāgāmimagge aṭṭhaṅgāni sakiccakāni katvā
atk-abh01a0:1744_10: āgatāni. Sakadāgāmissa anāgāmimaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Tasseva
atk-abh01a0:1744_11: sattahi cittehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṃ pahānena anāgāmimagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1744_12: sakiccakatā veditabbā. Anāgāmissa arahattamaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1744_13: tiṭṭhati. Yāni panassa pañca akusalacittāni, tehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṃ pahānena
atk-abh01a0:1745_0: Imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhamamaggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni. ‘Uparimaggattayaṃ diṭṭhakameva
atk-abh01a0:1745_1: passati, adiṭṭhakaṃ passatī’ti diṭṭhakameva passatīti ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
atk-abh01a0:1745_2: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha ‘adiṭṭhaṃ passatī’ti. So vattabbo – ‘paṭhamamagge katamaṃ indriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1745_4: Vuttepi ‘aññindriya’nti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘adiṭṭhasaccadassane sati uparimaggesupi
atk-abh01a0:1745_5: anaññātaññassāmītindriyameva bhājehi. Evaṃ te pañho samessatī’ti. ‘Kilese pana aññe
atk-abh01a0:1745_6: añño pajahati; pahīne eva pajahatī’ti? ‘Aññe añño pajahatī’ti. ‘Yadi aññe añño, appahīne
atk-abh01a0:1745_7: kilese pajahati. Saccānipi adiṭṭhāneva passatī’ti evaṃvādī puggalo pucchitabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1745_8: ‘saccāni nāma katī’ti? Jānanto ‘cattārī’ti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘tava vāde soḷasa
atk-abh01a0:1745_9: saccāni āpajjanti. Tvaṃ buddhehipi adiṭṭhaṃ passasi. Bahusaccako nāma tvaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1745_10: mā gaṇha. Saccadassanaṃ nāma apubbaṃ natthi, kilese pana appahīne pajahatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1746_0: Tattha saccadassanassa apubbābhāve peḷopamaṃ nāma gahitaṃ – ekassa kira cattāro ratanapeḷā
atk-abh01a0:1746_1: sāragabbhe ṭhapitā. So rattibhāge peḷāsu uppannakicco dvāraṃ vivaritvā, dīpaṃ jāletvā,
atk-abh01a0:1746_2: dīpena vihate andhakāre, peḷāsu pākaṭabhāvaṃ gatāsu, tāsu kiccaṃ katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā
atk-abh01a0:1746_3: gato. Puna andhakāraṃ avatthari. Dutiyavārepi tatiyavārepi tatheva akāsi. Catutthavāre
atk-abh01a0:1746_4: dvāre vivaṭe andhakāre peḷā na paññāyantīti vīmaṃsantasseva sūriyo uggañchi, sūriyobhāsena
atk-abh01a0:1746_5: vihate andhakāre peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-abh01a0:1747_0: Tattha cattāro peḷā viya cattāri saccāni. Tāsu kicce uppanne dvāravivaraṇakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:1747_2: Dīpo bhāso viya sotāpattimaggobhāso. Vihate andhakāre tassa purisassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1747_3: viya maggañāṇassa saccānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo. Maggañāṇassa pākaṭāni pana maggasamaṅgissa
atk-abh01a0:1747_4: puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti. Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa
atk-abh01a0:1747_5: attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya uparimaggattayavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1748_0: Dutiyavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Dīpobhāso
atk-abh01a0:1748_1: viya sakadāgāmimaggobhāso. Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa attanā
atk-abh01a0:1748_2: pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya uparimaggadvayavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1749_0: Tatiyavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Dīpobhāso
atk-abh01a0:1749_1: viya anāgāmimaggobhāso. Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa attanā
atk-abh01a0:1749_2: pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya upariarahattamaggavajjhasaccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1750_0: Catutthavāre dvāravivaraṇakālo viya arahattamaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo. Sūriyuggamanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1750_1: viya arahattamagguppādo. Andhakāravidhamanaṃ viya arahattamaggassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1750_2: Vihate andhakāre tassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1750_3: pākaṭabhāvo. Ñāṇassa pākaṭāni pana puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti. Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1750_4: gatakālo viya arahattamaggassa sabbakilesakhepanaṃ. Sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya ālokasseva
atk-abh01a0:1750_5: pavattikālo viya arahattamaggassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya puna saccapaṭicchādakatamābhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1751_0: Diṭṭhakameva hi passati. ‘Kilese pana aññe añño pajahatī’ti ettha khāropamaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:1751_1: gahitaṃ. Eko puriso kiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ rajakassa adāsi. Rajako ūsakhāraṃ chārikakhāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1751_2: gomayakhāranti tayo khāre datvā khārehi khāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1751_3: malaṃ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti dutiyampi tatheva khāre datvā, udake vikkhāletvā,
atk-abh01a0:1751_4: tato nātisaṇhataraṃ malaṃ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti tatiyampi te khāre
atk-abh01a0:1751_5: datvā udake vikkhāletvā tato saṇhataraṃ malaṃ pavāhesi. Tato na tāva parisuddhanti
atk-abh01a0:1751_6: catutthampi te khāre datvā, udake vikkhāletvā aṃsuabbhantaragatampi nissesaṃ malaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1751_7: pavāhetvā sāmikassa adāsi. So gandhakaraṇḍake pakkhipitvā icchiticchitakāle paridahati.
atk-abh01a0:1752_0: Tattha kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya kilesānugataṃ cittaṃ. Tividhakhāradānakālo viya tīsu
atk-abh01a0:1752_1: anupassanāsu kammassa pavattanakālo. Udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikamalappavāhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1752_2: viya sotāpattimaggena pañcakilesakhepanaṃ. Dutiyampi tesaṃ khārānaṃ anuppadānaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:1752_3: ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1752_5: Tato ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1752_6: idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ. Tato saṇhataramalappavāhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1752_7: viya anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatasaṃyojanadvayakhepanaṃ. ‘Na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti
atk-abh01a0:1752_8: puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu
atk-abh01a0:1752_9: kammappavattanaṃ. Tato vikkhālanena aṃsuabbhantaragate male pavāhetvā parisuddhassa
atk-abh01a0:1752_10: rajatapaṭṭasadisassa gandhakaraṇḍake nikkhittassa vatthassa icchiticchitakkhaṇe paridahanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1752_11: viya arahattamaggena aṭṭhannaṃ kilesānaṃ khepitattā parisuddhassa khīṇāsavacittassa
atk-abh01a0:1752_12: icchiticchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattivihārena vītināmanaṃ. Idaṃ ‘aññe añño kilese pajahatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1753_0: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, vatthaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ malaggahitaṃ, tamenaṃ sāmikā rajakassa anupadajjeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1753_1: Tamenaṃ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti. Kiñcāpi
atk-abh01a0:1753_2: taṃ hoti vatthaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ, atha khvassa hotiyeva ‘aṇusahagato ūsagandho
atk-abh01a0:1753_3: vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato’. Tamenaṃ rajako sāmikānaṃ deti. Tamenaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1753_4: sāmikā gandhaparibhāvite karaṇḍake nikkhipanti. Yopissa hoti aṇusahagato ūsagandho
atk-abh01a0:1753_5: vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṃ gacchati. Evameva kho,
atk-abh01a0:1753_6: āvuso, kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti, atha
atk-abh01a0:1753_7: khvassa hotiyeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno, ‘asmī’ti chando,
atk-abh01a0:1753_8: ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato, so aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī
atk-abh01a0:1753_9: viharati – ‘iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo; iti vedanā iti
atk-abh01a0:1753_10: saññā iti saṅkhārā iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1753_11: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu
atk-abh01a0:1753_12: upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno, ‘asmī’ti chando, ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato,
atk-abh01a0:1754_0: Tattha sotāpattimaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_1: Sakadāgāmimaggena dve domanassasahagatacittāni tanukāni bhavanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a0:1754_2: uppajjanakapāpadhammehi. Anāgāmimaggena tāniyeva pahīyanti saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_3: Arahattamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_4: Imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya khīṇāsavassa cittaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a0:1755_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – eko kira mahārājā paccante ārakkhaṃ datvā mahānagare issariyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1755_1: anubhavanto vasati. Athassa paccanto kuppi. Tasmiṃ samaye dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā anekehi
atk-abh01a0:1755_2: purisasahassehi saddhiṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpanti. Paccantavāsino mahāmattā ‘paccanto kupito’ti
atk-abh01a0:1755_3: rañño pahiṇiṃsu. Rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhatha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmī’ti sāsanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1755_4: pahiṇi. Te paṭhamasampahāreneva anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ pañca corajeṭṭhake
atk-abh01a0:1755_5: ghātayiṃsu. Sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu. Amaccā
atk-abh01a0:1756_0: Rājā ‘tumhākaṃ kattabbayuttaṃ ahaṃ jānissāmi, tepi gaṇhathā’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te
atk-abh01a0:1756_1: dutiyasampahārena dve corajeṭṭhake pahariṃsu, parivārepi tesaṃ dubbale akaṃsu. Te
atk-abh01a0:1756_2: sabbepi palāyitvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu. Tampi pavattiṃ amaccā rañño pesayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1757: Puna rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te tatiyasampahārena saddhiṃ sahāyapurisehi dve corajeṭṭhake ghātayitvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño pesayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1758_0: Puna rājā ‘avasese vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te catutthasampahārena saparivāre
atk-abh01a0:1758_1: pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu. Dvādasannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh01a0:1758_2: koci coro nāma natthi. Khemā janapadā ure putte naccentā maññe viharanti. Rājā vijitasaṅgāmehi
atk-abh01a0:1759_0: Tattha mahanto rājā viya dhammarājā. Paccantavāsino amaccā viya yogāvacarā kulaputtā.
atk-abh01a0:1759_1: Dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā viya dvādasa akusalacittāni. Tesaṃ sahāyā anekasahassapurisā
atk-abh01a0:1759_2: viya cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammā. Rañño paccanto kupitoti pahitakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:1759_3: ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu ‘bhante, kileso me uppanno’ti satthu ārocanakālo. ‘Vissaṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1759_4: gaṇhantū’ti dhanadānaṃ viya ‘kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū’ti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhānācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1759_5: Saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya sotāpattimaggena sampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1760_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya sammāsambuddhassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ. ‘Sesake ca
atk-abh01a0:1760_1: gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1760_2: Dutiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ dubbalīkaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggena
atk-abh01a0:1761_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya satthu paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti
atk-abh01a0:1761_1: puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato anāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ. Tatiyasampahārena
atk-abh01a0:1761_2: saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1762_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya tathāgatassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti
atk-abh01a0:1762_1: puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato arahattamaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ. Catutthasampahārena
atk-abh01a0:1762_2: saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya janapadassa khemakālo
atk-abh01a0:1762_3: viya arahattamaggena sasampayuttesu pañcasu akusalacittesu pahīnesu dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1762_4: pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya puna cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakassa akusaladhammassa abhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1762_5: Rañño vijitasaṅgāmassa amaccagaṇaparivutassa varapāsāde mahāsampattianubhavanaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:1767_0: 365. Idāni akusaladhammapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1767_1: Tattha dhammavavatthānādivārappabhedo ca heṭṭhā āgatānaṃ padānaṃ atthavinicchayo
atk-abh01a0:1767_2: ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha tattha pana visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1767_3: Tattha samayavavatthāne tāva yasmā, kusalassa viya, akusalassa bhūmibhedo natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1767_4: tasmā ekantaṃ kāmāvacarampi samānaṃ etaṃ ‘kāmāvacara’nti na vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigatasampayuttanti
atk-abh01a0:1767_5: ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṃ ‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’ntiādīni viya. Gantabbābhāvato
atk-abh01a0:1767_6: vā diṭṭhiyā gatamattamevetantipi diṭṭhigataṃ. Tena sampayuttaṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1768_0: Tattha asaddhammasavanaṃ, akalyāṇamittatā, ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīni ayoniso manasikāroti
atk-abh01a0:1768_1: evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1768_2: Ye hi ete diṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttā asaddhammā tesaṃ bahumānapubbaṅgamena atikkantamajjhattena
atk-abh01a0:1768_3: upaparikkhārahitena savanena, ye ca diṭṭhivipannā akalyāṇamittā taṃsampavaṅkatāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh01a0:1768_4: akalyāṇamittatāya, buddhādīnaṃ ariyānañceva sappurisānañca adassanakāmatāya catusatipaṭṭhānādibhede
atk-abh01a0:1768_6: ariyadhamme ceva sappurisadhamme ca saṃvarabhedasaṅkhātena avinayena teheva kāraṇehi
atk-abh01a0:1768_7: paribhāvitena ayoniso manasikārena kotūhalamaṅgalādipasutatāya ca etaṃ uppajjatīti
atk-abh01a0:1768_8: veditabbaṃ. Asaṅkhārabhāvo panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1769: Dhammuddesavāre phassoti akusalacittasahajāto phasso. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti akusalamattameva etesaṃ purimehi viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1770_0: Cittassekaggatā hotīti pāṇātipātādīsupi avikkhittabhāvena cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1770_1: Manussā hi cittaṃ samādahitvā avikkhittā hutvā avirajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇasarīresu
atk-abh01a0:1770_2: nipātenti, susamāhitā paresaṃ santakaṃ haranti, ekarasena cittena micchācāraṃ āpajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1771_0: Micchādiṭṭhīti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi, virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1771_1: Anatthāvahattā paṇḍitehi jigucchitā diṭṭhītipi micchādiṭṭhi. Micchāsaṅkappādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:1771_2: eseva nayo. Apica micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva
atk-abh01a0:1771_3: vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a0:1771_4: ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādipadaṭṭhānā; paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā. Micchāsaṅkappādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1771_5: ‘micchā’ti padamattameva viseso. Sesaṃ kusalādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1772_0: Ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalanti ettha balattho niddesavāre āvi bhavissati. Itaresu
atk-abh01a0:1772_1: pana – na hiriyatīti ahiriko. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Na ottappaṃ anottappaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1772_2: Tesu ahirikaṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Anottappaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1772_3: teheva asārajjanalakkhaṇaṃ anuttāsanalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Ahirikameva balaṃ ahirikabalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1772_4: Anottappameva balaṃ anottappabalaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Vitthāro pana heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1773_0: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Muyhanti tena,
atk-abh01a0:1773_1: sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. Tesu lobho ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo
atk-abh01a0:1773_2: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṃsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:1773_3: telañjanarāgo viya, saṃyojaniyadhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. So taṇhānadībhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1773_4: vaḍḍhamāno, sīghasotā nadī viya mahāsamuddaṃ, apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1774_0: Moho cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso
atk-abh01a0:1775_0: Abhijjhāyanti tāya, sayaṃ vā abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanamattameva vā esāti abhijjhā.
atk-abh01a0:1775_1: Sā parasampattīnaṃ sakakaraṇaicchālakkhaṇā, tenākārena esanabhāvarasā, parasampatti-abhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a0:1775_2: parasampattīsu abhiratipadaṭṭhānā. Parasampattiabhimukhā eva hi sā upaṭṭhahati. Tāsu
atk-abh01a0:1775_3: ca abhiratiyā sati pavattati, parasampattīsu cetaso hatthappasāroviyāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1776: Samatho hotītiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepasamanato samatho. Akusalappavattiyaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti paggāho. Na vikkhipatīti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a0:1777_0: Imasmiṃ citte saddhā, sati, paññā, cha yugaḷakānīti ime dhammā na gahitā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1777_1: Assaddhiyacitte pasādo nāma natthi. Tasmā tāva saddhā na gahitā. Kiṃ pana diṭṭhigatikā
atk-abh01a0:1777_2: attano attano satthārānaṃ na saddahantīti? Saddahanti. Sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1777_3: vacanasampaṭicchanamattamevetaṃ. Atthato anupaparikkhā vā hoti, diṭṭhi vā. Asatiyacitte
atk-abh01a0:1777_4: pana sati natthīti na gahitā. Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikā attanā katakammaṃ na sarantīti? Saranti.
atk-abh01a0:1777_5: Sā pana sati nāma na hoti. Kevalaṃ tenākārena akusalacittappavatti. Tasmā sati na
atk-abh01a0:1777_6: gahitā. Atha kasmā “micchāsatī”ti suttante vuttā? Sā pana akusalakkhandhānaṃ sativirahitattā
atk-abh01a0:1777_7: satipaṭipakkhattā ca micchāmaggamicchattānaṃ pūraṇatthaṃ tattha pariyāyena desanā
atk-abh01a0:1777_8: katā. Nippariyāyena panesā natthi. Tasmā na gahitā. Andhabālacitte pana paññā natthīti
atk-abh01a0:1777_9: na gahitā. Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vañcanāpaññā natthīti? Atthi. Na panesā paññā, māyā
atk-abh01a0:1777_10: nāmesā hoti. Sā atthato taṇhāva. Idaṃ pana cittaṃ sadarathaṃ garukaṃ bhāriyaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1777_11: thaddhaṃ akammaññaṃ gilānaṃ vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ. Tasmā passaddhādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1778_0: Ettāvatā padapaṭipāṭiyā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhāni dvattiṃsa padāni dassetvā idāni
atk-abh01a0:1778_1: yevāpanakadhamme dassetuṃ ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbesupi akusalacittesu
atk-abh01a0:1778_2: chando adhimokkho manasikāro māno issā macchariyaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ kukkuccanti
atk-abh01a0:1778_3: ime daseva yevāpanakā honti dhammā, suttāgatā, suttapadesu dissareti vuttā. Imasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1778_4: pana citte chando adhimokkho manasikāro uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇakaṅgasaṅkhātā cattārova yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1779_0: Tattha chandādayo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi te kusalā, ime akusalā.
atk-abh01a0:1779_1: Itaraṃ pana uddhatassa bhāvo ‘uddhaccaṃ’. Taṃ cetaso avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1780_0: Iti phassādīni dvattiṃsa, yevāpanakavasena vuttāni cattārīti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre
atk-abh01a0:1780_1: chattiṃsa dhammapadāni bhavanti. Cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni dvattiṃsameva.
atk-abh01a0:1780_2: Aggahitaggahaṇena panettha phassapañcakaṃ, vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1780_3: jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobho mohoti soḷasa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1781_0: Tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikā nava savibhattikā honti. Katame satta? Phasso
atk-abh01a0:1781_1: saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ mohoti ime satta avibhattikā. Vedanā cittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1781_2: vitakko cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime nava savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1782_0: Tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu, eko catūsu, eko chasu. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1782_1: Cittaṃ vitakko micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1782_2: Tesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, indriyāni patvā manindriyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1782_3: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsaṅkappoti.
atk-abh01a0:1782_4: Micchādiṭṭhi maggaṅgesupi kammapathesupi micchādiṭṭhiyeva. Ahirikaṃ balāni patvā
atk-abh01a0:1782_5: ahirikabalaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, lokanāsakadukaṃ patvā ahirikanti. Anottappepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1782_6: Lobho mūlaṃ patvā lobho hotīti vutto. Kammapathaṃ patvā abhijjhāti. Ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1783: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā sukhanti, indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti. Evaṃ ekova dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1784_0: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāvāyāmo
atk-abh01a0:1784_1: hotīti, balāni patvā vīriyabalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā paggāho hotīti. Evaṃ ayaṃ eko
atk-abh01a0:1785_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto, indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti,
atk-abh01a0:1785_1: maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsamādhīti, balāni patvā samādhibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā
atk-abh01a0:1785_2: dutiyaduke ekakavaseneva samathoti, tatiye avikkhepoti. Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1786_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggaṅgavasena
atk-abh01a0:1786_1: balavasena mūlavasena kammapathavasena lokanāsakavasena piṭṭhidukavasenāti nava rāsayo
atk-abh01a0:1786_2: honti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamakusalacittaniddese vuttamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1789_0: 375. Niddesavāre cittassekaggatāniddese tāva saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti. Idaṃ dvayaṃ ṭhitivevacanameva.
atk-abh01a0:1789_1: Yaṃ pana kusalaniddese ‘ārammaṇaṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhitī’ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1789_2: taṃ idha na labbhati. Akusalasmiñhi dubbalā cittassekaggatāti heṭṭhā dīpitameva.
atk-abh01a0:1790_0: 384. Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāroti evarūpopi
atk-abh01a0:1790_1: attho idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhamme pana na visāharatīti avisāhāro. Na vikkhipatīti
atk-abh01a0:1790_2: avikkhepo. Akusalacittekaggatāvasena avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvo avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-abh01a0:1790_3: Sahajātadhammesu na kampatīti samādhibalaṃ. Ayāthāvasamādhānato micchāsamādhīti evamidha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1791: 385. Vīriyindriyaniddese yo heṭṭhā ‘nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāyā’tiādi nayo vutto, so idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhammesu akampanaṭṭheneva vīriyabalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1792_0: 386. Micchādiṭṭhiniddese ayāthāvadassanaṭṭhena micchādiṭṭhi. Diṭṭhīsu gataṃ idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1792_1: dassanaṃ, dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiantogatattāti diṭṭhigataṃ. Heṭṭhāpissa attho vuttoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:1792_4: viya. Sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vilomanaṭṭhena ca diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ. Micchādassanañhi
atk-abh01a0:1792_5: uppajjamānaṃ sammādassanaṃ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca. Kadāci sassatassa kadāci
atk-abh01a0:1792_6: ucchedassa gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṃ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ. Diṭṭhigatiko
atk-abh01a0:1792_7: hi ekasmiṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, kadāci sassataṃ anupatati kadāci ucchedaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva
atk-abh01a0:1793_0: Susumārādayo viya purisaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti gāho. Patiṭṭhahanato patiṭṭhāho.
atk-abh01a0:1793_1: Ayañhi balavappavattibhāvena patiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhāti. Niccādivasena abhinivisatīti
atk-abh01a0:1793_2: abhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā niccādivasena parato āmasatīti parāmāso. Anatthāvahattā
atk-abh01a0:1793_3: kucchito maggo, kucchitānaṃ vā apāyānaṃ maggoti kummaggo. Ayāthāvapathato micchāpatho.
atk-abh01a0:1793_4: Yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayaṃ asukagāmassa nāma pathoti gahitopi taṃ gāmaṃ na sampāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1793_5: evaṃ diṭṭhigatikena sugatipathoti gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṃ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato,
atk-abh01a0:1793_6: micchāpatho. Micchāsabhāvato micchattaṃ. Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti
atk-abh01a0:1793_7: titthaṃ. Titthañca taṃ anatthānañca āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ. Titthiyānaṃ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1793_8: nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ca āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ. Vipariyesabhūto gāho, vipariyesato
atk-abh01a0:1793_9: vā gāhoti vipariyesaggāho; vipallattha gāhoti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1794: 387-388. Ahirikānottappaniddesesu hirottappaniddesavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Sahajātadhammesu pana akampanaṭṭheneva ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1795_0: 389. Lobhamohaniddesesu lubbhatīti lobho. Lubbhanāti lubbhanākāro. Lobhasampayuttacittaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1795_1: puggalo vā lubbhito; lubbhitassa bhāvo lubbhitattaṃ. Sārajjatīti sārāgo. Sārajjanākāro
atk-abh01a0:1795_2: sārajjanā. Sārajjitassa bhāvo sārajjitattaṃ. Abhijjhāyanaṭṭhena abhijjhā. Puna ‘lobha’-vacane
atk-abh01a0:1795_3: kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca akusalānaṃ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1796_0: 390. Ñāṇadassanapaṭipakkhato aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ. Abhimukho hutvā dhammena na sameti,
atk-abh01a0:1796_1: na samāgacchatīti anabhisamayo. Anurūpato dhamme bujjhatīti anubodho. Tappaṭipakkhatāya
atk-abh01a0:1796_2: ananubodho. Aniccādīhi saddhiṃ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho. Asantaṃ asamañca
atk-abh01a0:1796_3: bujjhatītipi asambodho. Catusaccadhammaṃ nappaṭivijjhatīti appaṭivedho. Rūpādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1796_4: ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṃgāhanā. Tameva dhammaṃ na pariyogāhatīti
atk-abh01a0:1796_5: apariyogāhanā. Na samaṃ pekkhatīti asamapekkhaṇā. Dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1797_0: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvaggahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṃ etassa
atk-abh01a0:1797_1: paccakkhaṃ natthi, sayaṃ vā kassaci kammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1797_2: Yaṃ etasmiṃ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṃ mejjhaṃ bhaveyya, suci, vodānaṃ, taṃ duṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1797_3: mejjhaṃ imināti dummejjhaṃ. Bālānaṃ bhāvoti bālyaṃ. Muyhatīti moho. Balavataro moho
atk-abh01a0:1797_4: pamoho. Samantato muyhatīti sammoho. Vijjāya paṭipakkhabhāvato na vijjāti avijjā.
atk-abh01a0:1797_5: Oghayogattho vuttoyeva. Thāmagataṭṭhena anusetīti anusayo. Cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti, abhibhavatīti
atk-abh01a0:1797_6: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Hitaggahaṇābhāvena hitābhimukhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti, aññadatthu laṅgatiyevāti
atk-abh01a0:1797_7: laṅgī; khañjatīti attho. Durugghāṭanaṭṭhena vā laṅgī. Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā
atk-abh01a0:1797_8: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti, evamayampi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Saṅgahavārasuññatavārāpi
atk-abh01a0:1799_0: 399. Dutiyacitte sasaṅkhārenāti padaṃ visesaṃ. Tampi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Idaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:1799_1: cittaṃ kiñcāpi chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:1799_2: nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati, tathāpi sasaṅkhārikattā sappayogena saupāyena uppajjanato
atk-abh01a0:1799_3: – yadā kulaputto micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikaṃ pattheti. Te ca ‘aññadiṭṭhikā
atk-abh01a0:1799_4: tumhe’ti kumārikaṃ na denti. Athaññe ñātakā ‘yaṃ tumhe karotha tamevāyaṃ karissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1799_5: dāpenti. So tehi saddhiṃ titthiye upasaṅkamati. Āditova vematiko hoti. Gacchante
atk-abh01a0:1799_6: gacchante kāle etesaṃ kiriyā manāpāti laddhiṃ roceti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti – evarūpe kāle
atk-abh01a0:1800_0: Yevāpanakesu panettha thinamiddhaṃ adhikaṃ. Tattha thinanatā ‘thinaṃ’. Middhanatā
atk-abh01a0:1800_1: ‘middhaṃ’; anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighāto cāti attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1800_2: Tattha thinaṃ anussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ, saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Middhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1802_0: 400. Tatiyaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:1802_2: vā uppajjati. Idha mānena saddhiṃ pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti. Tattha maññatīti ‘māno’.
atk-abh01a0:1804_0: 402. Catutthaṃ vuttappakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷaṃ khipanti, pādapaṃsuṃ okiranti,
atk-abh01a0:1804_1: tadā tassa pariharaṇatthaṃ saussāhena antarantarā olokentānaṃ rājanāṭakesu nikkhantesu
atk-abh01a0:1804_2: ussāraṇāya vattamānāya tena tena chiddena olokentānañcāti evamādīsu ṭhānesu uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1804_3: Idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā honti. Ubhayatthāpi micchādiṭṭhi
atk-abh01a0:1804_4: parihāyati. Taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vasena dhammagaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a0:1806_0: 403. Pañcamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto
atk-abh01a0:1806_1: satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati. Somanassaṭṭhāne panettha upekkhāvedanā
atk-abh01a0:1806_2: hoti, pītipadaṃ parihāyati. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamacittasadisameva.
atk-abh01a0:1808_0: 409-412. Chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānipi vedanaṃ parivattetvā pītipadañca hāpetvā dutiyatatiyacatutthesu
atk-abh01a0:1808_1: vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Imesu aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātādhipati ārammaṇādhipatīti
atk-abh01a0:1810_0: 413. Navamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭighaṃ uppādayato uppajjati. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1810_1: samayavavatthānavāre tāva duṭṭhu mano, hīnavedanattā vā kucchitaṃ manoti dummano;
atk-abh01a0:1810_2: dummanassa bhāvo domanassaṃ. Tena sahagatanti domanassasahagataṃ. Asampiyāyanabhāvena
atk-abh01a0:1810_3: ārammaṇasmiṃ paṭihaññatīti paṭighaṃ. Tena sampayuttanti paṭighasampayuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1811_0: Dhammuddese tīsupi ṭhānesu domanassavedanāva āgatā. Tattha vedanāpadaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:1811_1: Tathā dukkhadomanassapadāni lakkhaṇādito pana aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1811_2: yathātathā vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekanteneva hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1812_0: Mūlakammapathesu yathā purimacittesu lobho hoti, abhijjhā hotīti āgataṃ, evaṃ doso
atk-abh01a0:1812_1: hoti, byāpādo hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva
atk-abh01a0:1812_2: vā tanti doso so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsiviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya,
atk-abh01a0:1812_3: attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto,
atk-abh01a0:1813_0: Byāpajjati tena cittaṃ, pūtibhāvaṃ upagacchati, byāpādayati vā vinayācārarūpasampattihitasukhādīnīti
atk-abh01a0:1813_1: byāpādo. Atthato panesa dosoyeva. Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena
atk-abh01a0:1814_1: pana aññatarena saddhiṃ pañca pañca hutvāpi uppajjanti. Evamepi tayo dhammā aniyatayevāpanakā
atk-abh01a0:1814_2: nāma. Tesu issatīti ‘issā’. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā,
atk-abh01a0:1814_3: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā. Saṃyojananti daṭṭhabbā. Maccherabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:1814_4: ‘macchariyaṃ’. Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1814_6: vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ. Cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1814_7: Tassa bhāvo ‘kukkuccaṃ’. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1814_8: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva uddesavāre viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1816_0: 418. Dosaniddese dussatīti doso. Dussanāti dussanākāro. Dussitattanti dussitabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1816_1: Pakatibhāvavijahanaṭṭhena byāpajjanaṃ byāpatti. Byāpajjanāti byāpajjanākāro. Virujjhatīti
atk-abh01a0:1816_3: vā idaṃ vuttaṃ. Caṇḍiko vuccati caṇḍo, thaddhapuggalo; tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ. Na
atk-abh01a0:1816_4: etena suropitaṃ vacanaṃ hoti, duruttaṃ aparipuṇṇameva hotīti asuropo. Kuddhakāle
atk-abh01a0:1816_5: hi paripuṇṇavacanaṃ nāma natthi. Sacepi kassaci hoti taṃ appamāṇaṃ. Apare pana assujananaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1816_6: assuropanato assuropoti vadanti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ, somanassassāpi assujananato. Heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:1816_7: vuttaattamanatāpaṭipakkhato na attamanatāti anattamanatā. Sā pana yasmā cittasseva,
atk-abh01a0:1816_8: na sattassa, tasmā cittassāti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha saṅgahasuññatavāresu ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a0:1818: 421. Dasamaṃ sasaṅkhārattā parehi ussāhitassa vā, paresaṃ vā aparādhaṃ sāritassa, sayameva vā paresaṃ aparādhaṃ anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1819_0: Idhāpi padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa, aggahitaggahaṇena ca cuddaseva padāni honti. Yevāpanakesu
atk-abh01a0:1819_1: pana thinamiddhampi labbhati. Tasmā ettha vinā issāmacchariyakukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni
atk-abh01a0:1819_2: thinamiddhanti ime cha issādīnaṃ uppattikāle tesu aññatarena saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā
atk-abh01a0:1819_3: ekakkhaṇe uppajjanti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ sabbavāresu navamasadisameva. Imesu pana dvīsu
atk-abh01a0:1819_4: domanassacittesu sahajātādhipatiyeva labbhati, na ārammaṇādhipati. Na hi kuddho kiñci garuṃ karotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1821_0: 422. Ekādasamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa kaṅkhāpavattikāle uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1821_1: Tassa samayavavatthāne vicikicchāsampayuttanti padaṃ apubbaṃ. Tassattho – vicikicchāya
atk-abh01a0:1821_2: sampayuttanti vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ. Dhammuddese ‘vicikicchā hotī’ti padameva viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1821_3: Tattha vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā. Sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti
atk-abh01a0:1821_4: vicikicchā. Sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā anekaṃsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:1822: Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā tevīsati padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsivinicchayo veditabbo. Manasikāro uddhaccanti dveyeva yevāpanakā.
atk-abh01a0:1823_0: 424. Niddesavārassa cittassekaggatāniddese yasmā idaṃ dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattakamevettha
atk-abh01a0:1823_1: hoti, tasmā ‘saṇṭhitī’tiādīni avatvā cittassa ‘ṭhitī’ti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ. Teneva
atk-abh01a0:1824_0: 425. Vicikicchāniddese kaṅkhanavasena kaṅkhā. Kaṅkhāya āyanāti kaṅkhāyanā. Purimakaṅkhā
atk-abh01a0:1824_1: hi uttarakaṅkhaṃ āneti nāma. Ākāravasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. Kaṅkhāsamaṅgicittaṃ kaṅkhāya
atk-abh01a0:1824_2: āyitattā kaṅkhāyitaṃ nāma. Tassa bhāvo kaṅkhāyitattaṃ. Vimatīti namati. Vicikicchā
atk-abh01a0:1824_3: vuttatthā eva. Kampanaṭṭhena dvidhā eḷayatīti dveḷhakaṃ. Paṭipattinivāraṇena dvidhāpatho
atk-abh01a0:1824_4: viyāti dvedhāpatho. ‘Niccaṃ nu kho idaṃ, aniccaṃ nu kho’tiādipavattiyā ekasmiṃ ākāre
atk-abh01a0:1824_5: saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya samantato setīti saṃsayo. Ekaṃsaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthatāya na
atk-abh01a0:1824_6: ekaṃsaggāhoti anekaṃsaggāho. Nicchetuṃ asakkontī ārammaṇato osakkatīti āsappanā.
atk-abh01a0:1824_7: Ogāhituṃ asakkontī parisamantato sappatīti parisappanā. Pariyogāhituṃ asamatthatāya
atk-abh01a0:1824_8: apariyogāhanā. Nicchayavasena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ asamatthatāya thambhitattaṃ; cittassa
atk-abh01a0:1824_9: thaddhabhāvoti attho. Vicikicchā hi uppajjitvā cittaṃ thaddhaṃ karoti. Yasmā panesā
atk-abh01a0:1824_10: uppajjamānā ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manaṃ vilikhantī viya, tasmā manovilekhoti vuttā. Sesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1826_1: Idañhi cittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattaṃ hutvā uddhataṃ hoti. Idha
atk-abh01a0:1826_3: padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsividhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1827_0: 429. Niddesavārassa uddhaccaniddese cittassāti na sattassa, na posassa. Uddhaccanti
atk-abh01a0:1827_1: uddhatākāro. Na vūpasamoti avūpasamo. Ceto vikkhipatīti cetasovikkhepo. Bhantattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1827_2: cittassāti cittassa bhantabhāvo, bhantayānabhantagoṇādīni viya. Iminā ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:1827_3: vipphandanaṃ kathitaṃ. Uddhaccañhi ekārammaṇe vipphandati, vicikicchā nānārammaṇe.
atk-abh01a0:1828_0: Idāni imasmiṃ cittadvaye pakiṇṇakavinicchayo hoti. ‘Ārammaṇe pavaṭṭanakacittāni nāma
atk-abh01a0:1828_1: katī’ti? Hi vutte ‘imāneva dve’ti vattabbaṃ. Tattha vicikicchāsahagataṃ ekantena
atk-abh01a0:1828_2: pavaṭṭati, uddhaccasahagataṃ pana laddhādhimokkhattā laddhapatiṭṭhaṃ pavaṭṭati. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:1828_3: hi vaṭṭacaturassesu dvīsu maṇīsu pabbhāraṭṭhāne pavaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhesu vaṭṭamaṇi
atk-abh01a0:1828_4: ekanteneva pavaṭṭati, caturasso patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhāya pavaṭṭati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1828_5: veditabbaṃ. Sabbesupi hīnādibhedo na uddhaṭo, sabbesaṃ ekantahīnattā. Sahajātādhipati
atk-abh01a0:1828_6: labbhamānopi na uddhaṭo, heṭṭhā dassitanayattā. Ñāṇābhāvato panettha vīmaṃsādhipati
atk-abh01a0:1828_7: nāma natthi. Pacchimadvaye sesopi natthi eva. Kasmā? Kañci dhammaṃ dhuraṃ katvā anuppajjanato,
atk-abh01a0:1829_0: Imehi pana dvādasahipi akusalacittehi kamme āyūhite, ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1829_1: sesāni ekādaseva paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhanti. Vicikicchāsahagate aladdhādhimokkhe dubbalepi
atk-abh01a0:1829_2: paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhamāne uddhaccasahagataṃ laddhādhimokkhaṃ balavaṃ kasmā nākaḍḍhatīti?
atk-abh01a0:1829_4: āgaccheyya, tasmā, ṭhapetvā taṃ, sesāni ekādasa ākaḍḍhanti. Tesu hi yena kenaci kamme
atk-abh01a0:1829_5: āyūhite tāya cetanāya catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti. Akusalavipākesu ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuupekkhāsahagatāya
atk-abh01a0:1829_6: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti. Itarassāpi ettheva paṭisandhidānaṃ bhaveyya. Yasmā panetaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1833_0: 431. Idāni abyākatapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1833_1: Tattha catubbidhaṃ abyākataṃ – vipākaṃ kiriyaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānanti. Tesu vipākābyākataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1833_2: Vipākābyākatepi kusalavipākaṃ. Tasmimpi parittavipākaṃ. Tasmimpi ahetukaṃ. Tasmimpi
atk-abh01a0:1833_3: pañcaviññāṇaṃ. Tasmimpi dvārapaṭipāṭiyā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Tassāpi, ṭhapetvā dvārārammaṇādisādhāraṇapaccayaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1833_4: asādhāraṇakammapaccayavaseneva uppattiṃ dīpetuṃ kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa
atk-abh01a0:1833_5: katattātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha katattāti katakāraṇā. Upacitattāti ācitattā, vaḍḍhitakāraṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1833_6: Cakkhuviññāṇanti kāraṇabhūtassa cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ, cakkhuto vā pavattaṃ, cakkhusmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1833_7: vā nissitaṃ viññāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Parato sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1835_0: Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā dasa padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena satta. Tesu pañca avibhattikāni,
atk-abh01a0:1835_1: dve savibhattikāni. Tesu cittaṃ phassapañcakavasena ceva indriyavasena ca dvīsu ṭhānesu
atk-abh01a0:1835_2: vibhattiṃ gacchati, vedanā phassapañcakajhānaṅgaindriyavasena tīsuyeva. Rāsayopi
atk-abh01a0:1835_3: imeva tayo honti. Yevāpanako eko manasikāro eva.
atk-abh01a0:1836: 436. Niddesavāre cakkhuviññāṇaṃ paṇḍaranti vatthuto vuttaṃ. Kusalañhi attano parisuddhatāya paṇḍaraṃ nāma, akusalaṃ bhavaṅganissandena, vipākaṃ vatthupaṇḍarattā.
atk-abh01a0:1837_0: 439. Cittassekaggatāniddese cittassa ṭhitīti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ. Idampi hi dubbalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1837_2: na sakkoti. Saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni. Kasmā? Vitakkapacchimakañhi
atk-abh01a0:1837_3: jhānaṃ nāma, hetupacchimako maggo nāma. Pakatiyā avitakkacitte jhānaṅgaṃ na labbhati,
atk-abh01a0:1837_4: ahetukacitte ca maggaṅgāni. Tasmā idha ubhayampi na uddhaṭaṃ. Saṅkhārakkhandhopettha
atk-abh01a0:1837_5: caturaṅgikoyeva bhājito. Suññatavāro pākatikoyeva. Sotaviññāṇādiniddesāpi imināva nayena veditabbā.

atk-abh01a0:1840_0: 455. Manodhātuniddese sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena manoyeva dhātu manodhātu. Sā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ

atk-abh01a0:1842_4: thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāvaṃ anubandhitvā yathāsotameva gacchati, evameva chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe

atk-abh01a0:1842_7: pavattitvā bhavaṅgameva otarati. Gavakkhandhe nadiṃ tarantepi evameva upamā vitthāretabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1842_8: Evamesā yaṃ javanena gahitārammaṇaṃ tasseva gahitattā tadārammaṇaṃ nāma hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1843_0: Dutiyā pana pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati. Kathaṃ? Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccaeḷajaccummattakaubhatobyañjanakanapuṃsakānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1843_1: paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati. Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya yāvatāyukaṃ

atk-abh01a0:1843_3: chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā, maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1846_0: 498. Idāni aṭṭhamahāvipākacittāni dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1846_1: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ nayamattaṃ dassetvā sabbavārā saṃkhittā. Tesaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva

atk-abh01a0:1846_5: ca. Yāpi tā yevāpanakesu karuṇāmuditā vuttā, tā sattārammaṇattā vipākesu na santi.
atk-abh01a0:1846_6: Ekantaparittārammaṇāni hi kāmāvacaravipākāni. Na kevalañca karuṇāmuditā, viratiyopettha
atk-abh01a0:1846_7: na santi. ‘Pañca sikkhāpadāni kusalānevā’ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1847_0: Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānañcettha kusalato ceva paccayabhedato ca veditabbaṃ. Asaṅkhārikassa
atk-abh01a0:1847_1: hi kusalassa asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṃ, sasaṅkhārikassa sasaṅkhārikaṃ. Balavapaccayehi
atk-abh01a0:1847_2: ca uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ, itarehi itaraṃ. Hīnādibhedepi imāni hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi
atk-abh01a0:1847_3: chandādīhi anipphāditattā hīnamajjhimapaṇītāni nāma na honti. Hīnassa pana kusalassa
atk-abh01a0:1847_4: vipākaṃ hīnaṃ, majjhimassa majjhimaṃ, paṇītassa paṇītaṃ. Adhipatino pettha na santi.
atk-abh01a0:1847_5: Kasmā? Chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā anuppādetabbato. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhasu kusalesu vuttasadisameva.
atk-abh01a0:1848_0: Idāni imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākacittānaṃ vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Etāni hi catūsu
atk-abh01a0:1848_1: ṭhānesu vipaccanti – paṭisandhiyaṃ, bhavaṅge, cutiyaṃ, tadārammaṇeti. Kathaṃ? Manussesu
atk-abh01a0:1848_2: tāva kāmāvacaradevesu ca puññavantānaṃ duhetukatihetukānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle

atk-abh01a0:1849_1: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. Taṃ pana mettāpubbabhāgacittassa vipākaṃ hoti. Tena dinnāya
atk-abh01a0:1849_2: paṭisandhiyā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ āyu. Kālavasena pana pariṇamati. Mahāsīvatthero panāha

atk-abh01a0:1849_6: eta’nti paṭikkhipitvā ‘sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hitūpacāro balavā hoti, tasmā mettāpubbabhāgakāmāvacarakusalavipākasomanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikacittena

atk-abh01a0:1851_1: kusalacetanāya soḷasa vipākacittāni uppajjanti. Ettheva dvādasakamaggopi ahetukaṭṭhakampīti.

atk-abh01a0:1852_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāketapañhaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu. Sākete kira upāsakā sālāyaṃ nisīditvā ‘kiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1852_1: nu kho ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite ekā paṭisandhi hoti udāhu nānā’ti? Pañhaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:1852_2: samuṭṭhāpetvā nicchetuṃ asakkontā ābhidhammikatthere upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu. Therā
atk-abh01a0:1852_3: ‘yathā ekasmā ambabījā ekova aṅkuro nikkhamati, evaṃ ekāva paṭisandhi hotī’ti saññāpesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1852_4: Athekadivasaṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho nānācetanāhi kamme āyūhite paṭisandhiyo nānā honti udāhu
atk-abh01a0:1852_5: ekā’ti? Pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā nicchetuṃ asakkontā there pucchiṃsu. Therā ‘yathā bahūsu
atk-abh01a0:1852_6: ambabījesu ropitesu bahū aṅkurā nikkhamanti, evaṃ bahukāva paṭisandhiyo hontī’ti saññāpesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1853_0: Aparampi imasmiṃ ṭhāne ussadakittanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ. Imesañhi sattānaṃ lobhopi ussanno
atk-abh01a0:1853_1: hoti, dosopi mohopi; alobhopi adosopi amohopi. Taṃ nesaṃ ussannabhāvaṃ ko niyāmetīti?
atk-abh01a0:1853_2: Pubbahetu niyāmeti. Kammāyūhanakkhaṇeyeva nānattaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? “Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1853_3: lobho balavā hoti alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto dosamohā mandā, tassa mando alobho
atk-abh01a0:1853_4: lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti, adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-abh01a0:1853_5: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti, sukhasīlo akkodhano,
atk-abh01a0:1854_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti alobhādosā mandā, amoho balavā
atk-abh01a0:1854_1: moho mando, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca, paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo
atk-abh01a0:1855: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca, sukhasīlako pana hoti akkodhano.
atk-abh01a0:1856: ‘Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti alobhādayo mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
atk-abh01a0:1857: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva appakileso hoti, dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo, duṭṭho pana hoti dandhapañño cāti.
atk-abh01a0:1858: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti, sukhasīlako ca, dandho pana hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1859: ‘Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca, duṭṭho ca pana hoti kodhano.
atk-abh01a0:1860: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā, so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1861_0: Aparampi imasmiṃ ṭhāne hetukittanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ. Tihetukakammañhi tihetukampi duhetukampi
atk-abh01a0:1861_1: ahetukampi vipākaṃ deti. Duhetukakammaṃ tihetukavipākaṃ na deti, itaraṃ deti. Tihetukakammena
atk-abh01a0:1861_2: paṭisandhi tihetukāpi hoti, duhetukāpi; ahetukā na hoti. Duhetukena duhetukāpi hoti
atk-abh01a0:1861_3: ahetukāpi; tihetukā na hoti. Asaṅkhārikaṃ kusalaṃ asaṅkhārikampi sasaṅkhārikampi
atk-abh01a0:1861_4: vipākaṃ deti. Sasaṅkhārikaṃ sasaṅkhārikampi asaṅkhārikampi vipākaṃ deti. Ārammaṇena
atk-abh01a0:1862_0: Idāni tassa tassa therassa vāde soḷasamaggādayo veditabbā. Paṭhamakāmāvacarakusalasadisena
atk-abh01a0:1862_1: hi paṭhamamahāvipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa gabbhāvāsato nikkhamitvā saṃvarāsaṃvare
atk-abh01a0:1862_3: kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge anāvaṭṭiteyeva atikkamanaārammaṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Kasmā
atk-abh01a0:1862_4: evaṃ hoti? Ārammaṇadubbalatāya. Ayaṃ tāva eko moghavāro.
atk-abh01a0:1863_0: Sace pana bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite, voṭṭhabbanaṃ apāpetvāva
atk-abh01a0:1863_1: antarā, cakkhuviññāṇe vā sampaṭicchane vā santīraṇe vā ṭhatvā nivattissatīti netaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1863_2: ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Voṭṭhabbanavasena pana ṭhatvā ekaṃ vā dve vā cittāni pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:1863_3: Tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgaṃ otarati idampi ārammaṇadubbalatāya
atk-abh01a0:1863_4: eva hoti. Ayaṃ pana vāro ‘diṭṭhaṃ viya me, sutaṃ viya me’tiādīni vadanakāle labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1864_0: Aparassa kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite vīthicittāni uppajjanti, javanaṃ javati.

atk-abh01a0:1864_2: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi nadiyā āvaraṇaṃ bandhitvā mahāmātikābhimukhe udake kate
atk-abh01a0:1864_3: udakaṃ gantvā ubhosu tīresu kedāre pūretvā atirekaṃ kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā

atk-abh01a0:1864_5: viya bhavaṅgavīthippavattanakālo. Āvaraṇabandhanakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa
atk-abh01a0:1864_6: āvaṭṭanakālo. Mahāmātikāya udakappavattanakālo viya vīthicittappavatti. Ubhosu tīresu
atk-abh01a0:1864_7: kedārapūraṇaṃ viya javanaṃ. Kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā puna udakassa nadīotaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1864_8: viya javanaṃ javitvā tadārammaṇe anuppanneyeva puna bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1864_9: otaraṇacittānampi gaṇanapatho natthi. Idañcāpi ārammaṇadubbalatāya eva hoti. Ayaṃ tatiyo moghavāro.

atk-abh01a0:1865_1: uppajjanti. Javanaṭṭhāne pana paṭhamakāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ javanaṃ hutvā chasattavāre
