atk-abh01a0:1865_4: ca, yaṃ javanena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa gahitattā ‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:1865_5: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ santīraṇaṃ tadārammaṇanti cattāri vipākacittāni gaṇanūpagāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1866_0: Yadā pana dutiyakusalacittaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā taṃsadisaṃ dutiyavipākacittameva
atk-abh01a0:1866_1: tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti. Idañca dve nāmāni labhati. Paṭisandhicittena asadisattā
atk-abh01a0:1866_2: ‘āgantukabhavaṅga’nti ca purimanayeneva ‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca. Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni
atk-abh01a0:1867_0: Yadā pana tatiyakusalacittaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā taṃsadisaṃ tatiyavipākacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1867_1: hutvā patiṭṭhāti. Idampi vuttanayeneva ‘āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca dve
atk-abh01a0:1867_2: nāmāni labhati. Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti.
atk-abh01a0:1868_0: Yadā pana catutthakusalacittaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā taṃsadisaṃ catutthavipākacittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1868_2: ca dve nāmāni labhati. Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_0: Yadā pana tasmiṃ dvāre ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ’ āpāthamāgacchati, tatrāpi vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1869_1: tayo moghavārā labbhanti. Yasmā pana ārammaṇena vedanā parivattati tasmā tattha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1869_4: ca dve nāmāni labhanti. ‘Piṭṭhibhavaṅgānī’tipi vuccanti eva. Iti imāni pañca purimehi
atk-abh01a0:1869_5: sattahi saddhiṃ dvādasa honti. Evaṃ cakkhudvāre dvādasa, sotadvārādīsu dvādasa dvādasāti,
atk-abh01a0:1869_6: samasaṭṭhi honti. Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samasaṭṭhi vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_7: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre dvādasa, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni cattārīti soḷasa honti.
atk-abh01a0:1870_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ambopamaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu – eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhamūle sasīsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1870_1: pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati. Athekaṃ ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ
atk-abh01a0:1870_2: puñchamānaṃ viya ‘tha’nti bhūmiyaṃ pati. So tassa saddena pabujjhitvā ummīletvā olokesi.
atk-abh01a0:1870_3: Tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā paribhuñji.
atk-abh01a0:1871_0: Tattha, tassa purisassa ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo. Ambapakkassa
atk-abh01a0:1871_1: vaṇṭato muccitvā kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānassa patanakālo viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_2: Tena saddena pabuddhakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Ummīletvā
atk-abh01a0:1871_3: olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccasādhanakālo. Hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo
atk-abh01a0:1871_4: viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo. Gahetvā madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1871_5: ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo. Upasiṅghitakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1871_6: vavatthāpitakālo. Paribhuttakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitakālo. Ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1871_7: upamā kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanameva kiccaṃ. Tena pasāde ghaṭṭite kiriyamanodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1871_10: kiccaṃ. Ekantena pana ārammaṇarasaṃ javanameva anubhavatīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1872_0: Ettha ca ‘tvaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ nāma hohi, tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ dassanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1872_1: sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ santīraṇaṃ nāma, tvaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ javanaṃ nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1872_2: hohī’ti koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1873_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne pañcavidhaṃ niyāmaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu – bījaniyāmaṃ utuniyāmaṃ kammaniyāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1873_1: dhammaniyāmaṃ cittaniyāmanti. Tattha kulatthagacchassa uttaraggabhāvo, dakkhiṇavalliyā
atk-abh01a0:1873_3: rukkhābhimukhagamanameva, nāḷikerassa matthake chiddasabbhāvoti tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1873_4: taṃtaṃsadisaphaladānaṃ bījaniyāmo nāma. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1873_5: ekappahāreneva pupphaphalapallavaggahaṇaṃ utuniyāmo nāma. Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukaduhetukāhetukavipākaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1873_6: deti. Duhetukakammaṃ duhetukāhetukavipākaṃ deti, tihetukaṃ na detīti, evaṃ tassa
atk-abh01a0:1874_0: Aparopi kammasarikkhakavipākavaseneva kammaniyāmo hoti. Tassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1874_1: kathenti – sammāsambuddhakāle sāvatthiyā dvāragāmo jhāyi. Tato pajjalitaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1874_2: uṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuñci. So viravanto bhūmiyaṃ patitvā
atk-abh01a0:1874_3: kālamakāsi. Mahāsamuddepi ekā nāvā niccalā aṭṭhāsi. Heṭṭhā kenaci niruddhabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1874_4: apassantā kāḷakaṇṇisalākaṃ vicāresuṃ. Sā nāvikasseva upāsikāya hatthe pati. Tato
atk-abh01a0:1874_5: ekissā kāraṇā mā sabbe nassantu, udake naṃ khipāmāti āhaṃsu. Nāviko ‘na sakkhissāmi
atk-abh01a0:1874_6: etaṃ udake uppilavamānaṃ passitu’nti vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhāpetvā khipāpesi.
atk-abh01a0:1874_7: Taṅkhaṇaññeva nāvā khittasaro viya pakkhandi. Eko bhikkhu leṇe vasati. Mahantaṃ pabbatakūṭaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1874_8: patitvā dvāraṃ pidahi. Taṃ sattame divase sayameva apagataṃ. Sammāsambuddhassa jetavane
atk-abh01a0:1874_9: nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa imāni tīṇi vatthūni ekappahāreneva ārocesuṃ. Satthā
atk-abh01a0:1874_10: ‘na etaṃ aññehi kataṃ, tehi katakammameva ta’nti atītaṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
atk-abh01a0:1875_0: Kāko purimattabhāve manusso hutvā ekaṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ dametuṃ asakkonto gīvāya palālaveṇiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1875_1: bandhitvā aggiṃ adāsi. Goṇo teneva mato. Idāni taṃ kammaṃ etassa ākāsena gacchatopi
atk-abh01a0:1875_2: na muccituṃ adāsi. Sāpi itthī purimattabhāve ekā itthīyeva. Eko kukkuro tāya paricito
atk-abh01a0:1875_3: hutvā araññaṃ gacchantiyā saddhiṃ gacchati, saddhimevāgacchati. Manussā ‘nikkhanto
atk-abh01a0:1875_4: idāni amhākaṃ sunakhaluddako’ti uppaṇḍenti. Sā tena aṭṭīyamānā kukkuraṃ nivāretuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1875_5: asakkontī vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā udake khipi. Taṃ kammaṃ tassā samuddamajjhe
atk-abh01a0:1875_6: muccituṃ nādāsi. Sopi bhikkhu purimattabhāve gopālako hutvā bilaṃ paviṭṭhāya godhāya
atk-abh01a0:1875_7: sākhābhaṅgamuṭṭhiyā dvāraṃ thakesi. Tato sattame divase sayaṃ āgantvā vivari. Godhā
atk-abh01a0:1875_8: kampamānā nikkhami. Karuṇāya taṃ na māresi. Taṃ kammaṃ tassa pabbatantaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-abh01a0:1875_9: nisinnassa muccituṃ nādāsīti. Imāni tīṇi vatthūni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-abh01a0:1880: Ayampi kammaniyāmoyeva nāma. Aññānipi evarūpāni vatthūni kathetabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1881_0: Bodhisattānaṃ pana paṭisandhiggahaṇe, mātukucchito nikkhamane, abhisambodhiyaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-abh01a0:1881_1: dhammacakkappavattane, āyusaṅkhārassa ossajjane, parinibbāne ca dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanaṃ dhammaniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1882_0: Ārammaṇena pana pasāde ghaṭṭite ‘tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi…pe… tvaṃ javanaṃ nāma hohī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1882_1: koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi, attano attano pana dhammatāya eva ārammaṇena pasādassa
atk-abh01a0:1882_2: ghaṭṭitakālato paṭṭhāya kiriyamanodhātucittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1882_3: dassanakiccaṃ sādheti, vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādheti, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:1882_4: santīraṇakiccaṃ sādheti, kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādheti, javanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1882_5: ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmo nāma. Ayaṃ idha adhippeto.
atk-abh01a0:1883_1: kamme āyūhite taṃsadisavipākacittehi ādinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo. Upekkhāsahagatadvaye
atk-abh01a0:1883_2: pana paṭhamaṃ ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena’ pavattiṃ dassetvā pacchā ‘iṭṭhārammaṇavasena’ dassetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1884: Evampi ekekasmiṃ dvāre dvādasa dvādasa hutvā samasaṭṭhi honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena soḷasa vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1885_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne pañcaucchunāḷiyantopamaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu. Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā
atk-abh01a0:1885_1: gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-abh01a0:1885_2: ucchusāmikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘yantavāhā maya’nti ārocesuṃ. So ‘ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1885_3: ucchusālaṃ te gahetvā agamāsi. Te tattha nāḷiyantaṃ sajjetvā ‘mayaṃ ekādasa janā,
atk-abh01a0:1885_4: aparampi ekaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, vetanena gaṇhathā’ti āhaṃsu. Ucchusāmiko ‘ahameva
atk-abh01a0:1885_5: sahāyo bhavissāmī’ti ucchūnaṃ sālaṃ pūrāpetvā tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi. Te attano attano
atk-abh01a0:1885_6: kiccāni katvā, phāṇitapācakena ucchurase pakke, guḷabandhakena baddhe, ucchusāmikena
atk-abh01a0:1885_7: tulayitvā bhāgesu dinnesu, attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya ucchusālaṃ sāmikassa paṭicchāpetvā,
atk-abh01a0:1885_8: eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu kammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1886_0: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā. Pañca ucchuvāṭā viya pañca ārammaṇāni.
atk-abh01a0:1886_1: Ekādasa vicaraṇakayantavāhā viya ekādasa vipākacittāni. Pañca ucchusālāsāmino viya
atk-abh01a0:1886_2: pañcaviññāṇāni. Paṭhamakasālāyaṃ sāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekatova hutvā
atk-abh01a0:1886_3: katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1886_4: ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo. Sālāsāmikassa sālāya
atk-abh01a0:1886_5: sampaṭicchanakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ. Dutiya tatiya catuttha
atk-abh01a0:1886_6: pañcamasālāya dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1886_7: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1886_8: Sālāsāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchanakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1886_9: veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā tihetukakammena paṭisandhi tihetukā hotīti vāro kathito. Yā
atk-abh01a0:1886_10: pana tena duhetukapaṭisandhi hoti, sā paṭicchannāva hutvā gatā.
atk-abh01a0:1887_0: Idāni duhetukakammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathetabbo. Duhetukena hi somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikacittena
atk-abh01a0:1887_1: kamme āyūhite taṃsadiseneva duhetukavipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:1887_5: avasāne tādisāneva dve tadārammaṇāni uppajjanti. Idha ekekasmiṃ dvāre aṭṭha aṭṭha
atk-abh01a0:1887_6: katvā samacattālīsa cittāni. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre aṭṭha, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni
atk-abh01a0:1887_7: cattārīti dvādasa honti. Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite dvādasa vipākacittāni
atk-abh01a0:1887_9: gahitapaṭisandhikepi eseva nayo. Yantavāhopamāya panettha satta yantavāhā. Tehi tattha
atk-abh01a0:1887_10: yante nāma sajjite sālāsāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttanayānusārena yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1887_11: Ettāvatā duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1888_0: Idāni ahetukapaṭisandhikathā hoti – catunnañhi duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarena
atk-abh01a0:1888_2: paṭisandhi kammasadisāti na vattabbā. Kammañhi duhetukaṃ paṭisandhi ahetukā. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:1888_4: moghavārā veditabbā. Catunnaṃ pana duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarajavanassa pariyosāne
atk-abh01a0:1888_6: dve nāmāni labhati. Evamettha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1888_7: tadārammaṇampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti tesu ekaṃ gahetvā gaṇanūpagāni tīṇeva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1889_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana santīraṇampi tadārammaṇampi somanassasahagatameva. Tesu ekaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1889_1: gahetvā purimāni tīṇi cattāri honti. Evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu cattāri cattāri katvā ekāya
atk-abh01a0:1889_2: cetanāya kamme āyūhite vīsati vipākacittāni uppajjantīti veditabbāni. Aggahitaggahaṇena
atk-abh01a0:1889_3: pana cakkhudvāre cattāri sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha honti. Idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1890_0: Catūsu pana apāyesu pavatte labbhati. Yadā hi mahāmoggallānatthero niraye padumaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1890_1: māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno nerayikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi, tadā tesaṃ theraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1890_2: passantānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Saddaṃ suṇantānaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1890_3: candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā gatassa cīvaragandhaghāyanakāle ghānaviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1890_4: nirayaggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ devaṃ vassāpetvā pānīyadānakāle jivhāviññāṇaṃ, mandamandavātasamuṭṭhāpanakāle
atk-abh01a0:1890_5: kāyaviññāṇanti evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca, ekaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ, dve santīraṇānīti
atk-abh01a0:1890_6: ahetukaṭṭhakaṃ labbhati. Nāgasupaṇṇavemānikapetānampi akusalena paṭisandhi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1890_7: Pavatte kusalaṃ vipaccati. Tathā cakkavattino maṅgalahatthiassādīnaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva ‘iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇesu’
atk-abh01a0:1891_2: javitesu kusalavipākaṃ upekkhāsahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yaṃ pana ‘javanena
atk-abh01a0:1891_3: tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba’nti vuttaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Domanassasahagatajavanānantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1891_4: tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ kiṃ uppajjatīti? Akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātucittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1892_0: Idaṃ pana javanaṃ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetīti? Āvajjanañceva voṭṭhabbanañca.
atk-abh01a0:1892_1: Āvajjanena hi yoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena yoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ akusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1892_2: bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Āvajjanena ayoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena ayoniso vavatthāpite
atk-abh01a0:1892_3: javanaṃ kusalaṃ bhavissatītipi aṭṭhānametaṃ. Ubhayena pana yoniso āvaṭṭite vavatthāpite
atk-abh01a0:1892_4: ca javanaṃ kusalaṃ hoti, ayoniso akusalanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1893_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana kaṅkhato uddhatassa ca tadārammaṇaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Iṭṭhārammaṇasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1893_1: kaṅkhatu vā mā vā, uddhato vā hotu mā vā, kusalavipākāhetukasomanassacittameva tadārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1893_4: javane javite pañca tadārammaṇāni gavesitabbānīti. Upekkhāsahagatasmiṃ javane javite
atk-abh01a0:1894_0: Atha yadā somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānaṃ nibbattetvā pamādena parihīnajjhānassa
atk-abh01a0:1894_1: ‘paṇītadhammo me naṭṭho’ti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāravasena domanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1894_2: tadā kiṃ uppajjati? ‘Somanassānantarañhi domanassaṃ domanassānantarañca somanassaṃ’
atk-abh01a0:1894_3: paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ. Mahaggatadhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇampi tattheva
atk-abh01a0:1894_4: paṭisiddhanti? Kusalavipākā vā akusalavipākā vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:1894_5: uppajjati, kimassā āvajjananti? ‘Bhavaṅgāvajjanānaṃ viya natthassā āvajjanakicca’nti.
atk-abh01a0:1894_6: ‘Etāni tāva attano ninnattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācārattā ca uppajjantu, ayaṃ kathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1894_9: evaṃ asantepi āvajjane, ninnaciṇṇasamudācārabhāvena uppajjati. Vinā hi āvajjanena
atk-abh01a0:1894_10: cittaṃ uppajjati, ārammaṇena pana vinā nuppajjatī’ti. ‘Atha kimassārammaṇa’nti? ‘Rūpādīsu
atk-abh01a0:1894_11: parittadhammesu aññataraṃ. Etesu hi yadeva tasmiṃ samaye āpāthamāgataṃ hoti, taṃ
atk-abh01a0:1895: Idāni sabbesampi etesaṃ cittānaṃ pākaṭabhāvatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo vutto –
atk-abh01a0:1896: Suttaṃ dovāriko ca, gāmillo ambo koliyakena ca;
atk-abh01a0:1897: Jaccandho pīṭhasappī ca, visayaggāho ca upanissayamatthasoti.
atk-abh01a0:1898_0: Tattha ‘sutta’nti, eko panthamakkaṭako pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ pasāretvā jālaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:1898_1: majjhe nipajjati. Paṭhamadisāya pasāritasutte pāṇakena vā paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya
atk-abh01a0:1898_2: vā pahaṭe nipannaṭṭhānato calitvā nikkhamitvā suttānusārena gantvā tassa yūsaṃ pivitvā
atk-abh01a0:1898_3: punaāgantvā tattheva nipajjati. Dutiyadisādīsu pahaṭakālepi evameva karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1899_0: Tattha pañcasu disāsu pasāritasuttaṃ viya pañcapasādā. Majjhe nipannamakkaṭako viya
atk-abh01a0:1899_1: cittaṃ. Pāṇakādīhi suttaghaṭṭanakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo. Majjhe
atk-abh01a0:1899_2: nipannamakkaṭakassa calanaṃ viya pasādaghaṭṭanakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1899_3: bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Suttānusārena gamanakālo viya vīthicittappavatti. Sīse
atk-abh01a0:1899_4: vijjhitvā yūsapivanaṃ viya javanassa ārammaṇe javitakālo. Punaāgantvā majjhe nipajjanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1900_0: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇena pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādavatthukacittato hadayarūpavatthukacittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1900_1: paṭhamataraṃ uppajjatīti dīpeti. Ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchatītipi.
atk-abh01a0:1901_0: ‘Dovāriko’ti, eko rājā sayanagato niddāyati. Tassa paricārako pāde parimajjanto nisīdi.
atk-abh01a0:1901_1: Badhiradovāriko dvāre ṭhito. Tayo paṭihārā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā. Atheko paccantavāsī
atk-abh01a0:1901_2: manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Badhiradovāriko saddaṃ na suṇāti.
atk-abh01a0:1901_3: Pādaparimajjako saññaṃ adāsi. Tāya saññāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā passi. Paṭhamapaṭihāro
atk-abh01a0:1901_4: paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā dutiyassa adāsi, dutiyo tatiyassa, tatiyo rañño. Rājā paribhuñji.
atk-abh01a0:1902_0: Tattha so rājā viya javanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pādaparimajjako viya āvajjanaṃ. Badhiradovāriko
atk-abh01a0:1902_1: viya cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni tīṇi vīthicittāni. Paccantavāsino
atk-abh01a0:1902_2: paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ. Pādaparimajjakena
atk-abh01a0:1902_3: saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Tena dinnasaññāya
atk-abh01a0:1902_4: badhiradovārikassa dvāravivaraṇakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_5: Paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_6: Paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_7: Dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_8: Tatiyena rañño dinnakālo viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyāditakālo. Rañño paribhogakālo
atk-abh01a0:1903_0: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭamattanameva kiccaṃ, kiriyamanodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1903_2: kiccāni. Ekantena pana javanameva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhotīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1904_0: ‘Gāmillo’ti, sambahulā gāmadārakā antaravīthiyaṃ paṃsukīḷaṃ kīḷanti. Tatthekassa
atk-abh01a0:1904_1: hatthe kahāpaṇo paṭihaññi. So ‘mayhaṃ hatthe paṭihataṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta’nti āha. Atheko
atk-abh01a0:1904_2: ‘paṇḍaraṃ eta’nti āha. Aparo saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gaṇhi. Añño ‘puthulaṃ caturassaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1904_3: eta’nti āha. Aparo ‘kahāpaṇo eso’ti āha. Atha naṃ āharitvā mātu adāsi. Sā kamme upanesi.
atk-abh01a0:1905_0: Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ nisinnakālo viya bhavaṅgacittappavatti
atk-abh01a0:1905_1: daṭṭhabbā. Kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_2: ‘Kiṃ nu kho eta’nti vuttakālo viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa
atk-abh01a0:1905_3: āvaṭṭitakālo. ‘Paṇḍaraṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_4: Saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_5: ‘Puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1905_6: santīraṇakālo. ‘Eso kahāpaṇo’ti vuttakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1905_7: vavatthāpitakālo. Mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1906_0: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Kiriyamanodhātu adisvāva bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, vipākamanodhātu
atk-abh01a0:1906_1: adisvāva sampaṭicchati, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu adisvāva santīreti, kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:1906_2: adisvāva vavatthāpeti, javanaṃ adisvāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhoti. Ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva
atk-abh01a0:1907: ‘Ambo koliyakena cā’ti, idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ambopamañca ucchusālāsāmikopamañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1908_0: ‘Jaccandho pīṭhasappī cā’ti, ubhopi kira te nagaradvāre sālāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:1908_1: pīṭhasappī āha – ‘bho andhaka, kasmā tvaṃ idha sussamāno vicarasi, asuko padeso subhikkho
atk-abh01a0:1908_2: bahvannapāno, kiṃ tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti? ‘Mayhaṃ tāva tayā
atk-abh01a0:1908_3: ācikkhitaṃ, tuyhaṃ pana tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ kiṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti? ‘Mayhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1908_4: gantuṃ pādā natthī’ti. ‘Mayhampi passituṃ cakkhūni natthī’ti. ‘Yadi evaṃ, tava pādā
atk-abh01a0:1908_5: hontu, mama cakkhūnī’ti ubhopi ‘sādhū’ti sampaṭicchitvā jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ khandhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1908_6: āropesi. So tassa khandhe nisīditvā vāmahatthenassa sīsaṃ parikkhipitvā dakkhiṇahatthena
atk-abh01a0:1908_7: ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne mūlaṃ āvaritvā ṭhitaṃ, imasmiṃ pāsāṇo, vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha,
atk-abh01a0:1908_8: dakkhiṇaṃ muñca vāmaṃ gaṇhā’ti maggaṃ niyametvā ācikkhati. Evaṃ jaccandhassa pādā
atk-abh01a0:1908_9: pīṭhasappissa cakkhūnīti ubhopi sampayogena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīviṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1909_0: Tattha jaccandho viya rūpakāyo, pīṭhasappī viya arūpakāyo. Pīṭhasappinā vinā jaccandhassa
atk-abh01a0:1909_1: disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa anibbattitakālo viya rūpassa arūpena vinā ādānagahaṇacopanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1909_2: pāpetuṃ asamatthatā. Jaccandhena vinā pīṭhasappissa disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa
atk-abh01a0:1909_3: appavattanaṃ viya pañcavokāre rūpaṃ, vinā arūpassa appavatti. Dvinnampi sampayogena
atk-abh01a0:1909_4: icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīvitakālo viya rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññayogena sabbakiccesu
atk-abh01a0:1910: ‘Visayaggāho’ cāti, cakkhu rūpavisayaṃ gaṇhāti. Sotādīni saddādivisaye.
atk-abh01a0:1911_1: āpāthagatattā rūpānaṃ, ālokasannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati
atk-abh01a0:1911_2: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha matassāpi cakkhu sambhinnaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1911_3: Jīvato niruddhampi, pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhampi, cakkhuviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1911_4: paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ ‘sambhinnaṃ’ nāma hoti. Sakkontaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma. Sotādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:1911_5: eseva nayo. Cakkhusmiṃ pana asambhinnepi bahiddhā rūpārammaṇe āpāthaṃ anāgacchante
atk-abh01a0:1911_6: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ pana āpāthaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati
atk-abh01a0:1911_7: nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ santepi kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge anāvaṭṭite nuppajjati. Āvaṭṭiteyeva
atk-abh01a0:1911_8: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppajjamānaṃ sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃyeva uppajjati. Iti ime cattāro
atk-abh01a0:1912_0: Asambhinnattā sotassa, āpāthagatattā saddānaṃ, ākāsasannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1912_1: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘ākāsasannissita’nti
atk-abh01a0:1912_2: ākāsasannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena. Na hi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1912_3: pavattati. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yathā cettha evaṃ ito paresupi. Visesamattaṃ pana vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:1913_0: Asambhinnattā ghānassa, āpāthagatattā gandhānaṃ, vāyosannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1913_1: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘vāyosannissita’nti
atk-abh01a0:1913_2: ghānabilaṃ vāyumhi pavisanteyeva uppajjati, tasmiṃ asati nuppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1914_0: Asambhinnattā jivhāya, āpāthagatattā rasānaṃ, āposannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ catūhi
atk-abh01a0:1914_1: paccayehi uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘āposannissita’nti
atk-abh01a0:1914_2: jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena. Sukkhajivhānañhi sukkhakhādanīye
atk-abh01a0:1915_0: Asambhinnattā kāyassa, āpāthagatattā phoṭṭhabbānaṃ, pathavisannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1915_1: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘pathavisannissita’nti
atk-abh01a0:1915_2: kāyapasādapaccayaṃ pathavisannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā. Kāyadvārasmiñhi
atk-abh01a0:1915_3: bahiddhāmahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
atk-abh01a0:1916_0: Asambhinnattā manassa, āpāthagatattā dhammānaṃ, vatthusannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1916_1: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘mano’ti
atk-abh01a0:1916_2: bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Taṃ niruddhampi, āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva
atk-abh01a0:1916_3: pavattamānampi, sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti. Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1916_5: hadayavatthusannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā. Ayampi pañho pañcavokārabhavaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1916_7: uppajjatīti attho. Ayaṃ tāva ‘upanissayamatthaso’ti ettha upanissayavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh01a0:1917_0: ‘Atthato’ pana cakkhu dassanatthaṃ, sotaṃ savanatthaṃ, ghānaṃ ghāyanatthaṃ, jivhā
atk-abh01a0:1917_1: sāyanatthā, kāyo phusanattho, mano vijānanattho. Tattha dassanaṃ attho assa. Tañhi
atk-abh01a0:1917_2: tena nipphādetabbanti dassanatthaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde
atk-abh01a0:1917_3: soḷasakamaggo niṭṭhito, saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena cāti.
atk-abh01a0:1918_0: Idāni moravāpīvāsīmahādattattheravāde dvādasakamaggakathā hoti. Tattha sāketapañhaussadakittanahetukittanāni
atk-abh01a0:1918_1: pākatikāneva. Ayaṃ pana thero asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikesu dosaṃ disvā ‘asaṅkhārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1918_2: asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṃ deti, no sasaṅkhārikaṃ; sasaṅkhārikampi sasaṅkhārikameva
atk-abh01a0:1918_3: no asaṅkhārika’nti āha. Javanena cesa cittaniyāmaṃ na katheti. Ārammaṇena pana vedanāniyāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1918_4: katheti. Tenassa vipākuddhāre dvādasakamaggo nāma jāto. Dasakamaggopi, ahetukaṭṭhakampi ettheva paviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1919_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – somanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikacittena hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva
atk-abh01a0:1919_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti. Tassa kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni,
atk-abh01a0:1919_3: akusalato cattāri, kiriyato pañcāti imesaṃ terasannaṃ cittānaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne
atk-abh01a0:1919_5: patiṭṭhāti. Evamassa cakkhudvāre cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, tadārammaṇāni dveti, pañca
atk-abh01a0:1920_0: Ārammaṇena pana vedanaṃ parivattetvā kusalato catunnaṃ, akusalato catunnaṃ, kiriyato
atk-abh01a0:1920_2: duhetukaasaṅkhārikavipākampi tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā uppajjati. Evamassa cakkhudvāre upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1920_3: imāni dve tadārammaṇānīti, tīṇi gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. Tāni purimehi pañcahi saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1920_4: aṭṭha. Sotadvārādīsupi aṭṭha aṭṭhāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samacattālīsa cittāni
atk-abh01a0:1920_5: uppajjanti. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre aṭṭha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti,
atk-abh01a0:1921_1: kamme āyūhitepi eseva nayo. Tattha yantopamāpi ettha pākatikā eva. Ettāvatā tihetukakammena
atk-abh01a0:1921_2: tihetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito. Tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti
atk-abh01a0:1922_1: hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre
atk-abh01a0:1922_2: iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti. Duhetukassa pana
atk-abh01a0:1922_3: javanakiriyā natthi. Tasmā kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni, akusalato cattārīti
atk-abh01a0:1922_4: imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1922_5: tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evamassa cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, idañca tadārammaṇanti, cattāri
atk-abh01a0:1922_7: catunnaṃ, akusalato catunnanti, aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva
atk-abh01a0:1922_8: upekkhāsahagataṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evamassa upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1922_9: idañca tadārammaṇanti, dve gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1922_10: cha. Sotadvārādīsupi cha chāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samatiṃsa cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1922_11: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti dasa honti. Ambopamaniyāmakathā
atk-abh01a0:1922_12: pākatikā eva. Yantopamā idha na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.

atk-abh01a0:2037_1: sappaṭighaṃ, atthi appaṭighantiādinā nayena parehi vā, atthi upādā atthi noupādātiādinā
atk-abh01a0:2037_2: nayena purimehi vā, dukehi saddhiṃ atthābhāvato kamābhāvato visesābhāvato ca yogaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2037_3: na gacchati. Sanidassanañhi ‘appaṭighaṃ’ nāma, ‘no upādā’ vā natthīti atthābhāvato
atk-abh01a0:2037_4: yogaṃ na gacchati. ‘Upādiṇṇaṃ pana anupādiṇṇañca atthi taṃ kamābhāvā yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2037_5: Sabbadukā hi pacchimapacchimeheva saddhiṃ yojitā. Ayamettha kamo. Purimehi pana saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2037_6: kamābhāvoti. ‘Sati atthe kamābhāvo akāraṇaṃ. Tasmā upādiṇṇapadādīhi saddhiṃ yojetabbo’ti
atk-abh01a0:2037_7: ce – na, visesābhāvā; upādiṇṇapadādīni hi iminā saddhiṃ yojitāni. Tattha ‘upādiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2037_8: vā sanidassanaṃ, sanidassanaṃ vā upādiṇṇa’nti vutte viseso natthīti visesābhāvāpi
atk-abh01a0:2037_9: yogaṃ na gacchati. Tasmā taṃ catutthadukaṃ anāmasitvā, tato parehi atthi rūpaṃ sappaṭighantiādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2037_10: tīhi dukehi saddhiṃ ‘yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ taṃ atthi indriyaṃ, atthi na indriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2037_11: yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ appaṭighaṃ taṃ atthi indriyaṃ, atthi na indriya’ntiādinā nayena yujjamāne
atk-abh01a0:2037_12: dve dve duke yojetvā cha catukkā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:2038_0: Yathā cāyaṃ catutthaduko yogaṃ na gacchati, tathā tena saddhiṃ ādidukopi. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2038_1: Anupādārūpassa ekantena anidassanattā. So hi yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ noupādā taṃ atthi sanidassanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2038_2: atthi anidassananti – evaṃ catutthena dukena saddhiṃ yojiyamāno yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2038_3: Tasmā taṃ atikkamitvā pañcamena saha yojito. Evaṃ yo yena saddhiṃ yogaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:2038_4: yo ca na gacchati so veditabboti. Idaṃ catutthasaṅgahe pāḷivavatthānaṃ. Ito pare
atk-abh01a0:2038_5: pana pañcavidhasaṅgahādayo satta saṅgahā asammissā eva. Evaṃ sakalāyapi mātikāya
atk-abh01a0:2040_0: 594. Idāni tassā atthaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetumevātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2040_1: Kasmā panettha ‘katamaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetū’ti pucchā na katāti? Bhedābhāvato.
atk-abh01a0:2040_2: Yathā hi dukādīsu ‘upādārūpa’mpi atthi ‘noupādārūpa’mpi, evamidha hetu na hetūtipi
atk-abh01a0:2040_3: sahetukamahetukantipi bhedo natthi, tasmā pucchaṃ akatvāva vibhattaṃ. Tattha ‘sabba’nti
atk-abh01a0:2040_4: sakalaṃ, niravasesaṃ. ‘Rūpa’nti ayamassa sītādīhi ruppanabhāvadīpano sāmaññalakkhaṇaniddeso.
atk-abh01a0:2041_0: Tattha hetuhetu paccayahetu uttamahetu sādhāraṇahetūti catubbidho hetu. Tesu ‘tayo
atk-abh01a0:2041_1: kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū’ti ayaṃ ‘hetuhetu’ nāma. “Cattāro
atk-abh01a0:2041_2: kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetu, cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti
atk-abh01a0:2041_3: ayaṃ ‘paccayahetu’ nāma. “Kusalākusalaṃ attano vipākaṭṭhāne, uttamaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2041_5: nāma. Yathāha – ‘atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2041_6: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’ti, “eseva hetu esa paccayo saṅkhārānaṃ yadidaṃ avijjā”ti avijjā
atk-abh01a0:2041_7: saṅkhārānaṃ sādhāraṇahetu hutvā paccayaṭṭhaṃ pharatīti ayaṃ ‘sādhāraṇahetu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2041_8: Yathā hi pathavīraso āporaso ca madhurassāpi amadhurassāpi paccayo, evaṃ avijjā kusalasaṅkhārānampi
atk-abh01a0:2041_9: akusalasaṅkhārānampi sādhāraṇapaccayo hoti. Imasmiṃ panatthe ‘hetuhetu’ adhippeto.
atk-abh01a0:2041_10: Iti ‘hetū dhammā na hetū dhammā’ti mātikāya āgataṃ hetubhāvaṃ rūpassa niyametvā paṭikkhipanto
atk-abh01a0:2041_11: ‘na hetumevā’ti āha. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu paṭikkhepaniddeso ca appaṭikkhepaniddeso
atk-abh01a0:2041_12: ca veditabbo. Vacanattho pana sabbapadānaṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2042_0: Sappaccayamevāti ettha pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ kammapaccayameva hoti, āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni
atk-abh01a0:2042_1: āhārādipaccayānevāti evaṃ rūpasseva vuttacatupaccayavasena attho veditabbo. Rūpamevāti
atk-abh01a0:2042_2: ‘rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammā’ti mātikāya vuttaṃ arūpībhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2042_3: chahi viññāṇehīti paccuppannarūpameva cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi veditabbaṃ. Niyāmo
atk-abh01a0:2042_4: pana cakkhuviññāṇādīni sandhāya gahito. Na hi tāni atītānāgataṃ vijānanti. Manoviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2042_5: pana atītampi anāgatampi vijānāti. Taṃ imasmiṃ pañcaviññāṇasote patitattā sotapatitameva
atk-abh01a0:2042_6: hutvā gataṃ. Hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena pana aniccameva. Jarāya abhibhavitabbadhammakattā
atk-abh01a0:2042_7: jarābhibhūtameva. Yasmā vā rūpakāye jarā pākaṭā hoti, tasmāpi ‘jarābhibhūtamevā’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2043_0: Evaṃ ekavidhena rūpasaṅgahoti ettha ‘vidhā’-saddo mānasaṇṭhānakoṭṭhāsesu dissati.
atk-abh01a0:2043_1: “Seyyohamasmīti vidhā, sadisohamasmīti vidhā”tiādīsu hi māno vidhā nāma. “Kathaṃvidhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2043_2: sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadantī”tiādīsu saṇṭhānaṃ. ‘Kathaṃvidha’nti
atk-abh01a0:2043_3: hi padassa kathaṃsaṇṭhānanti attho. “Ekavidhena ñāṇavatthuṃ duvidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2043_4: koṭṭhāso vidhā nāma. Idhāpi koṭṭhāsova adhippeto.
atk-abh01a0:2044_1: āgacchantu, sabbe brāhmaṇā sabbe vessā sabbe suddā āgacchantu”, “yā cāvuso visākha,
atk-abh01a0:2044_2: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo – ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti
atk-abh01a0:2044_3: ayaṃ ‘sajātisaṅgaho’ nāma. ‘Ekajātikā āgacchantū’ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe
atk-abh01a0:2044_4: jātiyā ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Sabbe kosalakā āgacchantu, sabbe māgadhakā, sabbe bhārukacchakā
atk-abh01a0:2044_5: āgacchantu”, “yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi
atk-abh01a0:2044_6: – ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘sañjātisaṅgaho’ nāma. Ekaṭṭhāne jātā
atk-abh01a0:2044_7: saṃvuddhā āgacchantūti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe sañjātiṭṭhānena nivutthokāsena
atk-abh01a0:2044_8: ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Sabbe hatthārohā āgacchantu, sabbe assārohā, sabbe rathikā āgacchantu”,
atk-abh01a0:2044_9: “yā cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo – ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti
atk-abh01a0:2044_10: ayaṃ ‘kiriyāsaṅgaho’ nāma. Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2044_11: katamakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati? Cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati. Hañci
atk-abh01a0:2044_12: cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe – cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2044_13: rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti, ayaṃ ‘gaṇanasaṅgaho’ nāma. Ayamidha adhippeto. Ekakoṭṭhāsena
atk-abh01a0:2044_14: rūpagaṇanāti ayañhettha attho. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-abh01a0:2047_0: 595. Idāni duvidhasaṅgahādīsu ‘atthi rūpaṃ upādā, atthi rūpaṃ noupādā’ti evaṃ bhedasabbhāvato
atk-abh01a0:2047_1: pucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ padabhājanaṃ dassento katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2047_2: upādiyatīti ‘upādā’; mahābhūtāni gahetvā, amuñcitvā, tāni nissāya pavattatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2048_0: 596. Evaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ saṅkhepato uddisitvā puna tadeva vitthārato niddisanto
atk-abh01a0:2048_1: katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādimāha. Tattha duvidhaṃ cakkhu – maṃsacakkhu paññācakkhu
atk-abh01a0:2048_2: ca. Etesu ‘buddhacakkhu samantacakkhu ñāṇacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhū’ti pañcavidhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2048_3: paññācakkhu. Tattha “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento
atk-abh01a0:2048_4: satte apparajakkhe…pe… duviññāpaye”ti idaṃ buddhacakkhu nāma. “Samantacakkhu vuccati
atk-abh01a0:2048_5: sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti idaṃ samantacakkhu nāma. “Cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2048_6: ñāṇacakkhu nāma. “Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2048_7: dibbacakkhu nāma. “Tasmiṃ yevāsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2049_0: Maṃsacakkhupi pasādacakkhu sasambhāracakkhūti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha yoyaṃ akkhikūpake
atk-abh01a0:2049_1: patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena, upari bhamukaṭṭhikena, ubhato akkhikūṭehi,
atk-abh01a0:2049_2: anto matthaluṅgena, bahiddhā akkhilomehi paricchinno maṃsapiṇḍo. Saṅkhepato ‘catasso
atk-abh01a0:2049_3: dhātuyo, vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, sambhavo saṇṭhānaṃ, jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādo’ti
atk-abh01a0:2049_5: cā’ti imāni dasa catusamuṭṭhānikattā cattālīsaṃ honti. Jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādoti
atk-abh01a0:2049_6: cattāri ekantakammasamuṭṭhānānevāti imesaṃ catucattālīsāya rūpānaṃ vasena catucattālīsasambhāro.
atk-abh01a0:2049_7: Yaṃ loko setaṃ cakkhuṃ puthulaṃ visaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ ‘cakkhu’nti sañjānanto na cakkhuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2049_8: sañjānāti, vatthuṃ cakkhuto sañjānāti, so maṃsapiṇḍo akkhikūpe patiṭṭhito, nhārusuttakena
atk-abh01a0:2049_9: matthaluṅge ābaddho, yattha setampi atthi, kaṇhampi lohitakampi, pathavīpi āpopi
atk-abh01a0:2049_10: tejopi vāyopi, yaṃ semhūssadattā setaṃ, pittussadattā kaṇhaṃ, ruhirussadattā lohitakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2049_11: pathavussadattā patthiṇṇaṃ hoti, āpussadattā paggharati, tejussadattā paridayhati,
atk-abh01a0:2050_0: Yo panettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, idaṃ pasādacakkhu
atk-abh01a0:2050_1: nāma. Tadetaṃ tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa
atk-abh01a0:2050_2: majjhe, abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte diṭṭhimaṇḍale, sattasu picupaṭalesu
atk-abh01a0:2050_3: āsittatelaṃ picupaṭalāni viya, sattakkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā, dhāraṇanhāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi
atk-abh01a0:2050_5: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ, utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ, āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2050_6: vaṇṇagandharasādīhi parivutaṃ, pamāṇato ūkāsiramattaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2050_7: vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Vuttampi cetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā –
atk-abh01a0:2053_0: Cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ. Yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya
atk-abh01a0:2053_1: pasādoti idhāpi upayogattheyeva sāmivacanaṃ; cattāri mahābhūtāni upādiyitvā pavattappasādoti
atk-abh01a0:2053_2: attho. Iminā pasādacakkhumeva gaṇhāti, sesacakkhuṃ paṭikkhipati. Yaṃ pana indriyagocarasutte
atk-abh01a0:2053_3: “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ upādāya pasādo pathavīdhātuyā tīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito āpodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:2053_4: ca tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā ca,” catuparivattasutte “dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya
atk-abh01a0:2053_5: pasādo pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca dvīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito tejodhātuyā ca
atk-abh01a0:2053_6: vāyodhātuyā cā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Ayañhi suttantikakathā nāma pariyāyadesanā.
atk-abh01a0:2053_7: Yo ca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo so tesu ekekassāpi dinnaṃ dvinnampi pasādoyevāti
atk-abh01a0:2053_8: iminā pariyāyena tattha desanā āgatā. Abhidhammo pana nippariyāyadesanā nāma. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:2054_0: ‘Ayaṃ me attā’ti bālajanena pariggahitattā attabhāvo vuccati sarīrampi khandhapañcakampi.
atk-abh01a0:2054_1: Tasmiṃ pariyāpanno tannissitoti attabhāvapariyāpanno cakkhuviññāṇena passituṃ na
atk-abh01a0:2054_2: sakkāti anidassano. Paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso ettha jāyatīti sappaṭigho.
atk-abh01a0:2055_0: Yenātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yena karaṇabhūtena cakkhunā ayaṃ satto idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2055_1: rūpaṃ atīte passi vā, vattamāne passati vā, anāgate passissati vā, sacassa aparibhinnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2055_2: cakkhu bhaveyya, athānena āpāthagataṃ rūpaṃ passe vā, atītaṃ vā rūpaṃ atītena cakkhunā
atk-abh01a0:2055_3: passi, paccuppannaṃ paccuppannena passati, anāgataṃ anāgatena passissati, sace taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2055_4: rūpaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passeyyāti idamettha parikappavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2055_6: suññatabhāvanissattaṭṭhena cakkhudhātupesā. Dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti cakkhundriyaṃpetaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2055_7: Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokopeso. Vaḷañjanaṭṭhena dvārāpesā. Apūraṇīyaṭṭhena samuddopeso.
atk-abh01a0:2055_8: Parisuddhaṭṭhena paṇḍaraṃpetaṃ. Phassādīnaṃ abhijāyanaṭṭhena khettaṃpetaṃ. Tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:2055_9: patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthuṃpetaṃ. Samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nettaṃpetaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2055_10: Tenevaṭṭhena nayanaṃpetaṃ. Sakkāyapariyāpannaṭṭhena orimaṃ tīraṃpetaṃ. Bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2056_0: Ettāvatā ‘passi vā’tiādīhi catūhi padehi cakkhuṃpetantiādīni cuddasa nāmāni yojetvā
atk-abh01a0:2056_1: cakkhāyatanassa cattāro vavatthāpananayā vuttāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Ettha hi yena
atk-abh01a0:2056_2: cakkhunā anidassanena sappaṭighena rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ passi vā cakkhuṃpetaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2056_3: suñño gāmopeso, idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti ayameko nayo. Evaṃ sesāpi veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2057_0: 597. Idāni yasmā vijjuniccharaṇādikālesu anoloketukāmassāpi rūpaṃ cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:2057_1: tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ dutiyo niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha yamhi cakkhumhīti yamhi
atk-abh01a0:2057_2: adhikaraṇabhūte cakkhumhi. Rūpanti paccattavacanametaṃ. Tattha paṭihaññi vāti atītattho.
atk-abh01a0:2057_3: Paṭihaññati vāti paccuppannattho. Paṭihaññissati vāti anāgatattho. Paṭihaññe vāti
atk-abh01a0:2057_4: vikappanattho. Atītañhi rūpaṃ atīte cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññi nāma. Paccuppannaṃ paccuppanne
atk-abh01a0:2057_5: paṭihaññati nāma. Anāgataṃ anāgate paṭihaññissati nāma. Sace taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhussa
atk-abh01a0:2057_6: āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya, cakkhumhi paṭihaññeyya taṃ rūpanti ayamettha parikappo. Atthato
atk-abh01a0:2057_7: pana pasādaṃ ghaṭṭayamānameva rūpaṃ paṭihaññati nāma. Idhāpi purimanayeneva cattāro
atk-abh01a0:2058_0: 598. Idāni yasmā attano icchāya oloketukāmassa rūpe cakkhuṃ upasaṃharato cakkhu rūpasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2058_1: paṭihaññati, tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ tatiyo niddesavāro āraddho. So atthato pākaṭoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2058_2: Ettha pana cakkhu ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānameva rūpamhi paṭihaññati nāma. Idhāpi
atk-abh01a0:2059_0: 599. Ito paraṃ phassapañcamakānaṃ uppattidassanavasena pañca, tesaṃyeva ārammaṇapaṭibaddhauppattidassanavasena
atk-abh01a0:2059_1: pañcāti, dasa vārā dassitā. Tattha cakkhuṃ nissāyāti cakkhuṃ nissāya, paccayaṃ katvā.
atk-abh01a0:2059_2: Rūpaṃ ārabbhāti rūpārammaṇaṃ āgamma, sandhāya, paṭicca. Iminā cakkhupasādavatthukānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2059_4: rūpassa paccayabhāvo dassito. Itaresu pañcasu vāresu rūpaṃ ārammaṇamassāti rūpārammaṇoti
atk-abh01a0:2059_5: evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva paccayabhāvo dassito. Yathā pana purimesu tīsu, evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2059_6: imesupi dasasu vāresu cattāro cattāro vavatthāpananayā veditabbā. Evaṃ katamaṃ taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2059_7: rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ cakkhuṃ ‘idaṃ ta’nti nānappakārato dassetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2059_8: purimā tayo, ime dasāti, terasa niddesavārā dassitā. Ekekasmiñcettha catunnaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2059_9: vavatthāpananayānaṃ āgatattā dvipaññāsāya nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvāva dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2060_0: 600. Ito paresu sotāyatanādiniddesesupi eseva nayo. Visesamattaṃ panettha evaṃ veditabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2060_1: – suṇātīti sotaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2060_2: padese vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ, utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ, āyunā
atk-abh01a0:2060_3: anupāliyamānaṃ, vaṇṇādīhi parivutaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2061_0: Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajappadasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakāraupakārupatthambhanānupālanaparivāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2061_1: hutvā ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:2062_0: Sāyanaṭṭhena jivhā. Sā sasambhārajivhāmajjhassa upari uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padese
atk-abh01a0:2063_0: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi, sabbattha kāyāyatanaṃ, kappāsapaṭale
atk-abh01a0:2063_2: yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Ayamettha viseso. Seso pāḷippabhedo
atk-abh01a0:2063_3: ca attho ca cakkhuniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalañhi idha cakkhupadassa ṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2063_4: sotapadādīni, rūpapadassa ṭhāne saddapadādīni, passīti ādīnaṃ ṭhāne suṇītiādipadāni
atk-abh01a0:2063_5: ca āgatāni. ‘Nettaṃpetaṃ, nayanaṃpeta’nti imassa ca padadvayassa abhāvā dvādasa dvādasa
atk-abh01a0:2064_0: Tattha siyā – yadi yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi, sabbattha kāyāyatanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2064_1: kappāsapaṭale sneho viya. ‘Evaṃ sante lakkhaṇasammissatā āpajjatī’ti. ‘Nāpajjatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2064_2: ‘Kasmā’? ‘Aññassa aññattha abhāvato’. ‘Yadi evaṃ, na sabbattha kāyāyatana’nti? ‘Neva
atk-abh01a0:2064_3: paramatthato sabbattha. Vinibbhujitvā panassa nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā, tasmā
atk-abh01a0:2064_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā hi rūparasādayo, vālikācuṇṇāni viya, vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
atk-abh01a0:2064_5: aññamaññabyāpinoti vuccanti, na ca paramatthato rūpe raso atthi. Yadi siyā rūpaggahaṇeneva
atk-abh01a0:2064_6: rasaggahaṇaṃ gaccheyya. Evaṃ kāyāyatanampi paramatthato neva sabbattha atthi, na
atk-abh01a0:2064_7: ca sabbattha natthi, vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāyāti. Evamettha na lakkhaṇasammissatā
atk-abh01a0:2065_0: Apica lakkhaṇādivavatthāpanatopetesaṃ asammissatā veditabbā – etesu hi rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2066_1: vā sotaṃ, saddesu āviñchanarasaṃ, sotaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, sotukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2067_1: vā ghānaṃ, gandhesu āviñchanarasaṃ, ghānaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ ghāyitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2068_1: vā jivhā, rasesu āviñchanarasā, jivhāviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, sāyitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:2069_1: vā kāyo, phoṭṭhabbesu āviñchanaraso, kāyaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, phusitukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:2070_0: Keci pana ‘tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo cakkhu, vāyupathavīāpādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādā
atk-abh01a0:2070_1: sotaghānajivhā, kāyo sabbesa’nti vadanti. Apare ‘tejādhikānaṃ pasādo cakkhu, vivaravāyuāpapathavādhikānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2070_2: pasādā sotaghānajivhākāyā’ti vadanti. Te vattabbā – ‘suttaṃ āharathā’ti. Addhā suttameva
atk-abh01a0:2070_3: na dakkhissanti. Keci panettha ‘tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato’ti kāraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2070_4: vadanti. Te ca vattabbā – ‘ko panevamāha – rūpādayo tejādīnaṃ guṇā’ti? Avinibbhogesu
atk-abh01a0:2070_5: hi rūpesu ‘ayaṃ imassa guṇo, ayaṃ imassa guṇo’ti na labbhā vattuṃ. Athāpi vadeyyuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2070_6: – ‘yathā tesu tesu sambhāresu tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāya pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādīni
atk-abh01a0:2070_7: kiccāni icchatha, evaṃ tejādiadhikesu sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato icchitabbametaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2070_8: rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā’ti. Te vattabbā – iccheyyāma, yadi āpādhikassa āsavassa gandhato
atk-abh01a0:2070_9: pathavīadhike kappāse gandho adhikataro siyā, tejādhikassa ca uṇhodakassa vaṇṇatopi
atk-abh01a0:2070_10: sītūdakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha. Yasmā panetaṃ ubhayampi natthi, tasmā pahāyethetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2070_11: etesaṃ nissayabhūtānaṃ visesakappanaṃ, yathā avisesepi ekakalāpe bhūtānaṃ rūparasādayo
atk-abh01a0:2070_12: aññamaññaṃ visadisā honti, evaṃ cakkhupasādādayo, avijjamānepi aññasmiṃ visesakāraṇeti gahetabbametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2071_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ yaṃ aññamaññassa asādhāraṇaṃ? Kammameva nesaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ. Tasmā kammavisesato
atk-abh01a0:2071_1: etesaṃ viseso, na bhūtavisesato. Bhūtavisese hi sati pasādova nuppajjati. Samānānañhi
atk-abh01a0:2071_2: pasādo, na visamānānanti porāṇā. Evaṃ kammevisasato visesavantesu ca etesu cakkhusotāni
atk-abh01a0:2071_3: asampattavisayaggāhakāni attano nissayaṃ anallīnanissaye eva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2071_4: Ghānajivhākāyā sampattavisayaggāhakā, nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2072_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “āpāthagatattāva ārammaṇaṃ sampattaṃ nāma. Candamaṇḍalasūriyamaṇḍalānañhi
atk-abh01a0:2072_1: dvācattālīsayojanasahassamatthake ṭhitānaṃ vaṇṇo cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. So dūre
atk-abh01a0:2072_2: ṭhatvā paññāyamānopi sampattoyeva nāma. Taṃgocarattā cakkhu sampattagocarameva nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2072_3: Dūre rukkhaṃ chindantānampi, rajakānañca vatthaṃ dhovantānaṃ dūratova kāyavikāro
atk-abh01a0:2072_4: paññāyati. Saddo pana dhātuparamparāya āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭetvā saṇikaṃ vavatthānaṃ gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2073_0: Tattha kiñcāpi āpāthagatattā ārammaṇaṃ sampattanti vuttaṃ, candamaṇḍalādivaṇṇo pana
atk-abh01a0:2073_1: cakkhuṃ asampatto dūre ṭhitova paññāyati. Saddopi sace saṇikaṃ āgaccheyya, dūre uppanno
atk-abh01a0:2073_2: cirena suyyeyya, paramparaghaṭṭanāya ca āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭento asukadisāya nāmāti
atk-abh01a0:2074_0: Ahiādisamānāni cetāni. Yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sittasammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne nābhiramati, saṅkāraṭṭhānatiṇapaṇṇagahanavammikāniyeva
atk-abh01a0:2074_1: pana pavisitvā nipannakāle abhiramati, ekaggataṃ āpajjati, evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2074_2: maṭṭhesu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu nābhiramati, oloketumpi na icchati, rūpacittapupphalatādicittesuyeva
atk-abh01a0:2074_3: pana abhiramati. Tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2075_0: Susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati, akkhīni nimmīletvāva carati. Yadā
atk-abh01a0:2075_1: pana byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti, tadā tassa cittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2075_2: ekaggaṃ hoti sukhaṃ supati, evameva sotaṃ tampe bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva
atk-abh01a0:2075_3: ajjhāsayaṃ karoti. Kaṇṇacchiddākāsoyeva tassa saddasavane paccayo hoti. Ajaṭākāsopi
atk-abh01a0:2075_4: vaṭṭatiyeva. Antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kariyamāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo
atk-abh01a0:2075_5: bahi nikkhamati, dvāravātapānacchiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparāyeva ghaṭṭento
atk-abh01a0:2075_6: gantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Atha tasmiṃ kāle ‘asuko nāma sajjhāyatī’ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.
atk-abh01a0:2076_0: Evaṃ sante sampattagocaratā hoti. ‘Kiṃ panetaṃ sampattagocara’nti? ‘Āma, sampattagocaraṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:2076_1: ‘Yadi evaṃ, dūre bherīādīsu vajjamānesu dūre saddoti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyā’ti? ‘No
atk-abh01a0:2076_2: na bhavati. Sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite dūre saddo āsanne saddo, paratīre orimatīreti
atk-abh01a0:2076_3: tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti. Dhammatā esā’ti. ‘Kiṃ etāya dhammatāya? Yato yato chiddaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2076_4: tato tato savanaṃ hoti, candimasūriyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ viyāti asampattagocaramevetaṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:2077_0: Pakkhīpi rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati. Yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma
atk-abh01a0:2077_1: ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhando hoti, tadā ekaggacittataṃ āpajjati, evameva ghānampi ākāsajjhāsayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2077_2: vātūpanissayagandhagocaraṃ. Tathā hi gāvo navavuṭṭhe deve bhūmiyaṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā
atk-abh01a0:2077_3: ākāsābhimukhā hutvā vātaṃ ākaḍḍhanti. Aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvāpi ca upasiṅghanakāle
atk-abh01a0:2077_4: vātaṃ anākaḍḍhanto neva tassa gandhaṃ jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:2078_0: Kukkuropi bahi vicaranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati leḍḍupahārādīhi upadduto hoti. Antogāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2078_1: pavisitvā uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā nipannassa pana phāsukaṃ hoti, evameva
atk-abh01a0:2078_2: jivhāpi gāmajjhāsayā āposannissitarasārammaṇā. Tathā hi tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2078_3: katvāpi pātova pattacīvaramādāya gāmo pavisitabbo hoti. Sukkhakhādanīyassa ca na
atk-abh01a0:2079_0: Siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati, āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva
atk-abh01a0:2079_1: panassa phāsukaṃ hoti, evameva kāyopi upādiṇṇakajjhāsayo pathavīnissitaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇo.
atk-abh01a0:2079_2: Tathā hi aññaṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attanova hatthatale sīsaṃ katvā nipajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2079_3: Ajjhattikabāhirā cassa pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayo hoti. Susanthatassapi hi sayanassa,
atk-abh01a0:2079_4: hatthe ṭhapitānampi vā phalānaṃ, na sakkā anisīdantena vā anippīḷentena vā thaddhamudubhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2079_5: jānitunti. Ajjhattikabāhirāpathavī etassa kāyapasādassa phoṭṭhabbajānane paccayo
atk-abh01a0:2079_6: hoti. Evaṃ lakkhaṇādivavatthānatopetesaṃ asammissatā veditabbā. Aññeyeva hi cakkhupasādassa
atk-abh01a0:2080_0: Apica nesaṃ asammissatāya ayaṃ upamāpi veditabbā – yathā hi pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dhajānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2080_1: ussāpitānaṃ kiñcāpi chāyā ekābaddhā viya hoti, tassa tassa pana aññamaññaṃ asammissāva
atk-abh01a0:2080_2: yathā ca pañcavaṇṇena kappāsena vaṭṭiṃ katvā dīpe jālite kiñcāpi jālā ekābaddhā viya
atk-abh01a0:2080_3: hoti, tassa tassa pana aṃsuno pāṭiyekkā pāṭiyekkā jālā asammissā eva, evameva kiñcāpi
atk-abh01a0:2080_4: imāni pañcāyatanāni ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaṭāni aññamaññaṃ pana asammissāneva. Na
atk-abh01a0:2080_5: kevalañca imāneva pañca, sesarūpānipi asammissāneva. Imasmiñhi sarīre heṭṭhimakāyo
atk-abh01a0:2080_6: majjhimakāyo uparimakāyoti tayo koṭṭhāsā. Tattha nābhito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhimakāyo
atk-abh01a0:2080_7: nāma. Tasmiṃ kāyadasakaṃ, bhāvadasakaṃ, āhārasamuṭṭhānāni aṭṭha, utusamuṭṭhānāni
atk-abh01a0:2080_8: aṭṭha, cittasamuṭṭhānāni aṭṭhāti catucattālīsa rūpāni. Nābhito uddhaṃ yāva galavāṭakā
atk-abh01a0:2080_9: majjhimakāyo nāma. Tattha ca kāyadasakaṃ, bhāvadasakaṃ, vatthudasakaṃ, āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni
atk-abh01a0:2080_10: tīṇi aṭṭhakānīti catupaññāsa rūpāni. Galavāṭakato uddhaṃ uparimakāyo nāma. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2080_11: cakkhudasakaṃ, sotadasakaṃ, ghānadasakaṃ, jivhādasakaṃ, kāyadasakaṃ, bhāvadasakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2081_0: Tattha cakkhupasādassa paccayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni, vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2081_1: cakkhupasādoti idaṃ ekantato avinibhuttānaṃ dasannaṃ nipphannarūpānaṃ vasena cakkhudasakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2081_2: nāma. Iminā nayena sesānipi veditabbāni. Tesu heṭṭhimakāye rūpaṃ majjhimakāyauparimakāyarūpehi
atk-abh01a0:2081_3: saddhiṃ asammissaṃ. Sesakāyadvayepi rūpaṃ itarehi saddhiṃ asammissameva. Yathā hi
atk-abh01a0:2081_4: sāyanhasamaye pabbatacchāyā ca rukkhacchāyā ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhā viya honti aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2081_5: pana asammissāva evaṃ imesupi kāyesu catucattālīsa catupaññāsa caturāsīti rūpāni
atk-abh01a0:2081_6: ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhāni viya honti, aññamaññaṃ pana asammissānevāti.
atk-abh01a0:2082_0: 616. Rūpāyatananiddese vaṇṇova vaṇṇanibhā; nibhātīti vā nibhā. Cakkhuviññāṇassa pākaṭā
atk-abh01a0:2082_1: hotīti attho. Vaṇṇova nibhā vaṇṇanibhā. Saddhiṃ nidassanena sanidassanaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:2082_2: passitabbanti attho. Saddhiṃ paṭighena sappaṭighaṃ, paṭighaṭṭananighaṃsajanakanti
atk-abh01a0:2082_3: attho. Nīlādīsu umāpupphasamānaṃ nīlaṃ, kaṇikārapupphasamānaṃ pītakaṃ, bandhujīvakapupphasamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2082_4: lohitakaṃ, osadhitārakasamānaṃ odātaṃ. Jhāmaṅgārasamānaṃ kāḷakaṃ, mandarattaṃ sinduvārakaravīramakuḷasamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2082_6: suvaṇṇaṃ vuttaṃ, parato panassa jātarūpaggahaṇena gahitattā idha sāmaṃ hari nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2082_7: Imāni satta vatthuṃ anāmasitvā sabhāveneva dassitāni.
atk-abh01a0:2083_0: Harivaṇṇanti haritasaddalavaṇṇaṃ. Ambaṅkuravaṇṇanti ambaṅkurena samānavaṇṇaṃ. Imāni
atk-abh01a0:2083_1: dve vatthuṃ āmasitvā dassitāni. Dīghādīni dvādasa vohārato dassitāni. So ca nesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2083_2: vohāro upanidhāyasiddho ceva sannivesasiddho ca. Dīghādīni hi aññamaññaṃ upanidhāyasiddhāni,
atk-abh01a0:2083_3: vaṭṭādīni sannivesavisesena. Tattha rassaṃ upanidhāya tato uccataraṃ dīghaṃ, taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2083_4: upanidhāya tato nīcataraṃ rassaṃ. Thūlaṃ upanidhāya tato khuddakataraṃ aṇuṃ, taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2083_5: upanidhāya tato mahantataraṃ thūlaṃ. Cakkasaṇṭhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2083_6: Catūhi aṃsehi yuttaṃ caturaṃsaṃ. Chaḷaṃsādīsupi eseva nayo. Ninnanti onataṃ, thalanti unnataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2084_0: Tattha yasmā dīghādīni phusitvā sakkā jānituṃ, nīlādīni panevaṃ na sakkā, tasmā na
atk-abh01a0:2084_1: nippariyāyena dīghaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ; tathā rassādīni. Taṃ taṃ nissāya pana tathā tathā
atk-abh01a0:2084_2: ṭhitaṃ dīghaṃ rassanti tena tena vohārena rūpāyatanamevettha bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2084_3: Chāyā ātapoti idaṃ aññamaññaparicchinnaṃ; tathā āloko andhakāro ca. Abbhā mahikātiādīni
atk-abh01a0:2084_4: cattāri vatthunāva dassitāni. Tattha ‘abbhā’ti valāhako. ‘Mahikā’ti himaṃ. Imehi
atk-abh01a0:2084_5: catūhi abbhādīnaṃ vaṇṇā dassitā. Candamaṇḍalassa vaṇṇanibhātiādīhi tesaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvaṇṇā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:2085_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ evaṃ viseso veditabbo – maṇimayaṃ rajatapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2085_1: ekūnapaññāsayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ candassa devaputtassa vimānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2085_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānāni tārakarūpāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2086_0: Tattha heṭṭhā cando, sūriyo upari, ubhinnamantaraṃ yojanaṃ hoti. Candassa heṭṭhimantato
atk-abh01a0:2086_1: sūriyassa uparimanto yojanasataṃ hoti. Dvīsu passesu nakkhattatārakā gacchanti. Etesu
atk-abh01a0:2086_2: pana tīsu cando dandhagamano, sūriyo sīghagamano, nakkhattatārakā sabbasīghagamanā.
atk-abh01a0:2086_3: Kālena candimasūriyānaṃ purato honti kālena pacchā.
atk-abh01a0:2087_0: Ādāsamaṇḍalanti kaṃsamayaṃ. Maṇīti ṭhapetvā veḷuriyaṃ seso jotirasādianekappabhedo.
atk-abh01a0:2087_1: Saṅkhoti sāmuddiko; muttā sāmuddikāpi, sesāpi. Veḷuriyoti veḷuvaṇṇamaṇi. Jātarūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2087_2: vuccati satthuvaṇṇo. Satthā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, suvaṇṇampi satthuvaṇṇaṃ. Rajataṃ vuccati
atk-abh01a0:2087_3: kahāpaṇo – lohamāsako dārumāsako jatumāsako, ye ‘vohāraṃ gacchantī’ti vuttaṃ taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2088: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā pāḷiāgataṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ taṭṭikapilotikakaṇṇikavaṇṇādibhedaṃ rūpaṃ gahitaṃ. Tañhi sabbaṃ yevāpanakesu paviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2089_0: Evametaṃ nīlādinā bhedena bhinnampi rūpaṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnameva. Sabbañhetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2089_1: cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvarasaṃ, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2089_2: catumahābhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā cetaṃ tathā sabbānipi upādārūpāni. Yattha pana viseso
atk-abh01a0:2089_3: atthi tattha vakkhāma. Sesamettha cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi
atk-abh01a0:2089_4: tattha cakkhupubbaṅgamo niddeso idha rūpapubbaṅgamo. Tattha ‘cakkhuṃ peta’ntiādīni
atk-abh01a0:2089_5: cuddasa nāmāni, idha ‘rūpaṃpeta’ntiādīni tīṇi. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Yathā hi catūhi
atk-abh01a0:2089_6: catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvā cakkhuṃ vavatthāpetuṃ terasa vārā vuttā, idhāpi te tatheva vuttāti.
atk-abh01a0:2090_1: mudiṅgādipaccayā saddā. Gītasaṅkhāto saddo gītasaddo. Vuttāvasesānaṃ vīṇādīnaṃ tantibaddhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2090_2: saddo vāditasaddo. Sammasaddoti kaṃsatālakaṭṭhatālasaddo. Pāṇisaddoti pāṇippahārasaddo.
atk-abh01a0:2090_5: vāyato saddo vātasaddo. Udakassa sandamānassa vā paṭihatassa vā saddo udakasaddo.
atk-abh01a0:2090_6: Manussānaṃ sallāpādisaddo manussasaddo. Taṃ ṭhapetvā seso sabbopi amanussasaddo.
atk-abh01a0:2090_7: Iminā padadvayena sabbopi saddo pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi vaṃsaphālanapilotikaphālanādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2090_8: pavatto pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasaddo yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2091_0: Evamayaṃ bherīsaddādinā bhedena bhinnopi saddo lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi
atk-abh01a0:2091_1: hesa sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:2091_2: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi catūhi catūhi nayehi
atk-abh01a0:2091_3: paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā. Tesaṃ attho sakkā vuttanayeneva jānitunti na vitthārito.
atk-abh01a0:2092_0: 624. Gandhāyatananiddese mūlagandhoti yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto gandho. Sāragandhādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:2092_1: eseva nayo. Asiddhadusiddhānaṃ ḍākādīnaṃ gandho āmakagandho. Macchasakalikāpūtimaṃsasaṃkiliṭṭhasappiādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2092_2: gandho vissagandho. Sugandhoti iṭṭhagandho. Duggandhoti aniṭṭhagandho. Iminā padadvayena
atk-abh01a0:2092_3: sabbopi gandho pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi kaṇṇakagandhapilotikagandhādayo pāḷiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2092_4: anāgatā sabbepi gandhā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2093_0: Evamayaṃ mūlagandhādinā bhedena bhinnopi gandho lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi
atk-abh01a0:2093_1: hesa ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo gandho, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:2093_2: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-abh01a0:2093_3: terasa vārā vuttā. Te atthato pākaṭāyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2094_0: 628. Rasāyatananiddese mūlarasoti yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbattaraso. Khandharasādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:2094_1: eseva nayo. Ambilanti takkambilādi. Madhuranti ekantato gosappiādi. Madhu pana kasāvayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2094_2: ciranikkhittaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti. Phāṇitaṃ khāriyuttaṃ ciranikkhittaṃ khāriyaṃ hoti. Sappi
atk-abh01a0:2094_3: pana ciranikkhittaṃ vaṇṇagandhe jahantampi rasaṃ na jahatīti tadeva ekantamadhuraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2094_4: Tittakanti nimbapaṇṇādi. Kaṭukanti siṅgiveramaricādi. Loṇikanti sāmuddikaloṇādi.
atk-abh01a0:2094_6: haritakādi. Ime sabbepi rasā vatthuvasena vuttā. Taṃtaṃvatthuto panettha rasova ambilādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2094_7: nāmehi vuttoti veditabbo. Sādūti iṭṭharaso, asādūti aniṭṭharaso. Iminā padadvayena
atk-abh01a0:2094_8: sabbopi raso pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi leḍḍurasabhittirasapilotikarasādayo pāḷiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2094_9: anāgatā sabbepi rasā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2095_0: Evamayaṃ mūlarasādinābhedena bhinnopi raso lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi hesa
atk-abh01a0:2095_1: jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo raso, jivhāviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:2095_2: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2096_0: 632. Itthindriyaniddese yanti karaṇavacanaṃ. Yena kāraṇena itthiyā itthiliṅgādīni
atk-abh01a0:2096_1: hontīti ayamettha attho. Tattha ‘liṅga’nti saṇṭhānaṃ. Itthiyā hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2096_2: saṇṭhānaṃ na purisassa viya hoti. Itthīnañhi heṭṭhimakāyo visado hoti, uparimakāyo
atk-abh01a0:2096_3: avisado. Hatthapādā khuddakā, mukhaṃ khuddakaṃ. Nimittanti sañjānanaṃ. Itthīnañhi
atk-abh01a0:2096_4: uramaṃsaṃ avisadaṃ hoti, mukhaṃ nimmassudāṭhikaṃ. Kesabandhavatthaggahaṇampi na purisānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2096_5: viya hoti. Kuttanti kiriyā. Itthiyo hi daharakāle suppakamusalakehi kīḷanti, cittadhītalikāya
atk-abh01a0:2096_6: kīḷanti, mattikavākena suttakaṃ nāma kantanti. Ākappoti gamanādiākāro. Itthiyo hi
atk-abh01a0:2096_7: gacchamānā avisadā gacchanti, tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā
atk-abh01a0:2096_8: avisadā bhuñjanti. Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati
atk-abh01a0:2097_0: Itthattaṃ itthibhāvoti ubhayampi ekatthaṃ; itthisabhāvoti attho. Ayaṃ kammajo paṭisandhisamuṭṭhito.
atk-abh01a0:2097_1: Itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitāni. Yathā hi bīje sati,
atk-abh01a0:2097_2: bījaṃ paṭicca, bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā
atk-abh01a0:2097_3: tiṭṭhati, evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti. Bījaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2097_4: viya hi itthindriyaṃ, bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2097_5: paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti. Tattha itthindriyaṃ na cakkhuviññeyyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2098: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ itthindriyanti idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ, yathā cakkhundriyādīni purisassāpi honti, na evaṃ; niyamato pana itthiyā eva indriyaṃ ‘itthindriyaṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:2099_0: 633. Purisindriyepi eseva nayo. Purisaliṅgādīni pana itthiliṅgādīnaṃ paṭipakkhato
atk-abh01a0:2099_1: veditabbāni. Purisassa hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na itthiyā viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2099_2: Purisānañhi uparimakāyo visado hoti heṭṭhimakāyo avisado, hatthapādā mahantā, mukhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2099_3: mahantaṃ, uramaṃsaṃ visadaṃ, massudāṭhikā uppajjanti. Kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2099_4: na itthīnaṃ viya hoti. Daharakāle rathanaṅgalādīhi kīḷanti, vālikapāḷiṃ katvā vāpiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2099_5: nāma khananti, gamanādīni visadāni honti. Itthimpi gamanādīni visadāni kurumānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2099_6: disvā ‘puriso viya gacchatī’tiādīni vadanti. Sesaṃ itthindriye vuttasadisameva.
atk-abh01a0:2100_0: Tattha itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ itthindriyaṃ, itthīti pakāsanarasaṃ, itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2100_3: pavatte samuṭṭhāti. Aparabhāge paṭisandhiyaṃ. Paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitampi pavatte calati parivattati.
atk-abh01a0:2102: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2103_0: Imesu pana dvīsu purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ, itthiliṅgaṃ hīnaṃ. Tasmā purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena
atk-abh01a0:2103_1: antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Itthiliṅgaṃ pana antaradhāyantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2103_2: dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyati, purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ubhayampi
atk-abh01a0:2104_0: Ubhatobyañjanakassa pana kiṃ ekaṃ indriyaṃ udāhu dveti? Ekaṃ. Tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa
atk-abh01a0:2104_2: abhāvo āpajjati. Indriyañhi byañjanakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañcassa natthī’ti? ‘Na tassa
atk-abh01a0:2104_3: indriyaṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ’. ‘Kasmā’? ‘Sadā abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā
atk-abh01a0:2104_4: itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadāva purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2104_5: paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti. Tathā itarassa itaraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2105_0: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ tiṭṭheyya.
atk-abh01a0:2105_1: Na pana tiṭṭhati. Tasmā veditabbametaṃ na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ. Kammasahāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2105_2: pana rāgacittamevettha kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā cassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
atk-abh01a0:2105_3: sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2106_0: 634. Jīvitindriyaniddese yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā arūpajīvitindriye vuttameva. Kevalañhi
atk-abh01a0:2106_1: tattha yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti vuttaṃ, idha rūpajīvitindriyattā yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2106_2: dhammānanti ayameva viseso. Lakkhaṇādīni panassa evaṃ veditabbāni – sahajātarūpānupālanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2106_3: jīvitindriyaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaṃ yeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānanti.
atk-abh01a0:2107_0: 635. Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyaviññattīti ettha tāva kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2107_1: tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ, purisehi vā tiracchānānampi kāyagahaṇānusārena gahitāya
atk-abh01a0:2107_2: etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti ‘viññatti’. Sayaṃ kāyagahaṇānusārena viññāyatītipi ‘viññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2107_3: “Kāyena saṃvaro sādhū”tiādīsu āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti ‘kāyaviññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2107_4: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā, sayañca tathā viññeyyattā kāyena viññattītipi ‘kāyaviññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2108_0: Kusalacittassa vātiādīsu aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarehi abhiññācittena cāti navahi kusalacittehi
atk-abh01a0:2108_1: kusalacittassa vā, dvādasahipi akusalacittehi akusalacittassa vā, aṭṭhahi mahākiriyehi
atk-abh01a0:2108_2: dvīhi ahetukakiriyehi abhiññāppattena ekena rūpāvacarakiriyenāti ekādasahi kiriyacittehi
atk-abh01a0:2108_3: abyākatacittassa vā. Ito aññāni hi cittāni viññattiṃ na janenti. Sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2108_4: pana ettakeheva cittehi viññatti hotīti etesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ vasena tīhi padehi ‘hetuto’ dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:2109_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘phalato’ dassetuṃ abhikkamantassa vātiādi vuttaṃ. Abhikkamādayo
atk-abh01a0:2109_1: hi viññattivasena pavattattā viññattiphalaṃ nāma. Tattha ‘abhikkamantassā’ti purato
atk-abh01a0:2109_2: kāyaṃ abhiharantassa. Paṭikkamantassāti pacchato paccāharantassa. Ālokentassāti ujukaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2109_3: pekkhantassa. Vilokentassāti ito cito ca pekkhantassa. Samiñjentassāti sandhayo saṅkocentassa.
atk-abh01a0:2110_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘sabhāvato’ dassetuṃ kāyassa thambhanāti ādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘kāyassā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2110_1: sarīrassa. Kāyaṃ thambhetvā thaddhaṃ karotīti thambhanā. Tameva upasaggena vaḍḍhetvā
atk-abh01a0:2110_2: santhambhanāti āha. Balavatarā vā thambhanā ‘santhambhanā’. Santhambhitattanti santhambhitabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2110_3: Viññāpanavasena viññatti. Viññāpanāti viññāpanākāro. Viññāpitabhāvo viññāpitattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2110_4: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā dvārakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tathā vacīviññattiyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2111_0: 636. Vacīviññattītipadassa pana niddesapadānañca attho tattha na vutto, so evaṃ veditabbo
atk-abh01a0:2111_1: – vācāya attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ, purisehi vā tiracchānānampi,
atk-abh01a0:2111_2: vacīgahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti. Sayañca vacīgahaṇānusārena
atk-abh01a0:2111_3: viññāyatītipi viññatti. “Sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”tiādīsu āgatā copanasaṅkhātā vacī eva
atk-abh01a0:2111_5: vācāya viññattītipi ‘vacīviññatti’. Vācā girātiādīsu vuccatīti ‘vācā’. Giriyatīti
atk-abh01a0:2111_6: ‘girā’. Byappathoti vākyabhedo. Vākyañca taṃ patho ca atthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ ñāpetukāmānañcātipi
atk-abh01a0:2111_7: ‘byappatho’. Udīriyatīti udīraṇaṃ. Ghussatīti ghoso. Kariyatīti kammaṃ. Ghosova kammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2111_8: ghosakammaṃ. Nānappakārehi kato ghosoti attho. Vaciyā bhedo vacībhedo. So pana ‘na
atk-abh01a0:2111_9: bhaṅgo, pabhedagatā vācā evā’ti ñāpanatthaṃ vācā vacībhedoti vuttaṃ. Imehi sabbehipi
atk-abh01a0:2111_10: padehi ‘saddavācāva’ dassitā. Idāni tāya vācāya saddhiṃ yojetvā heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2111_11: viññattiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena tīhākārehi sabhāvato taṃ dassetuṃ yā tāya vācāya viññattītiādi
atk-abh01a0:2112_0: Idāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittesu asammohatthaṃ dvattiṃsa chabbīsa ekūnavīsati soḷasa
atk-abh01a0:2112_1: pacchimānīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ – dvattiṃsa cittāni hi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-abh01a0:2112_2: iriyāpathampi upatthambhenti, duvidhampi viññattiṃ janenti. Chabbīsati viññattimeva
atk-abh01a0:2112_3: na janenti, itaradvayaṃ karonti. Ekūnavīsati rūpameva samuṭṭhāpenti, itaradvayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2112_4: na karonti. Soḷasa imesu tīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_0: Tattha dvattiṃsāti heṭṭhā vuttāneva kāmāvacarato aṭṭha kusalāni, dvādasa akusalāni,
atk-abh01a0:2113_1: kiriyato dasa cittāni, sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ abhiññācittaṃ, khīṇāsavānaṃ abhiññācittanti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_2: Chabbīsāti rūpāvacarato pañca kusalāni, pañca kiriyāni, arūpāvacarato cattāri kusalāni,
atk-abh01a0:2113_3: cattāri kiriyāni, cattāri maggacittāni, cattāri phalacittānīti. Ekūnavīsatīti kāmāvacarakusalavipākato
atk-abh01a0:2113_4: ekādasa, akusalavipākato dve, kiriyato kiriyamanodhātu, rūpāvacarato pañca vipākacittānīti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_5: Soḷasāti dve pañcaviññāṇāni, sabbasattānaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ, khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2113_6: arūpe cattāri vipākacittānīti. Imāni soḷasa rūpiriyāpathaviññattīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_7: Aññānipi bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti. Na tāneva,
atk-abh01a0:2114_0: 637. Ākāsadhātuniddese na kassati, na nikassati, kasituṃ vā chindituṃ vā bhindituṃ
atk-abh01a0:2114_1: vā na sakkāti ākāso. Ākāsova ākāsagataṃ, kheḷagatādi viya. Ākāsoti vā gatanti ‘ākāsagataṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:2114_2: Na haññatīti aghaṃ, aghaṭṭanīyanti attho. Aghameva aghagataṃ. Chiddaṭṭhena vivaro.
atk-abh01a0:2114_3: Vivarova vivaragataṃ. Asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nijjaṭākāsaṃva
atk-abh01a0:2114_4: kathitaṃ. Lakkhaṇādito pana rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇā ākāsadhātu, rūpapariyantappakāsanarasā,
atk-abh01a0:2114_6: yāya paricchinnesu rūpesu ‘idamito uddhaṃ adho tiriya’nti ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2115_0: 638. Ito pare rūpassalahutādīnaṃ niddesā cittassalahutādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2115_1: Lakkhaṇādito panettha adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā, rūpānaṃ garubhāvavinodanarasā,
atk-abh01a0:2116_0: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti. Evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo,
atk-abh01a0:2116_2: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassalahutā’. Yo suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu
atk-abh01a0:2116_4: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassa mudutā’. Yo pana sudhantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2116_6: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassa kammaññatā’ti. Evametāsaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2117_0: Etā pana tissopi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, āhārādayova karonti. Tathā hi yogino ‘ajja
atk-abh01a0:2117_1: amhehi bhojanasappāyaṃ laddhaṃ, kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadanti. ‘Ajja utusappāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2117_2: laddhaṃ, ajja amhākaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ, kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadantīti.
atk-abh01a0:2118_1: nibbatti. So rūpassa upacayoti yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ, sova
atk-abh01a0:2118_2: rūpassa upacayo nāma hoti; vaḍḍhīti attho. Yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatīti
atk-abh01a0:2118_3: yā evaṃ upacitānaṃ rūpānaṃ vaḍḍhi, tato uttaritaraṃ pavattikāle sā rūpassa santati
atk-abh01a0:2118_4: nāma hoti; pavattīti attho. Naditīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo,
atk-abh01a0:2118_5: nibbatti; paripuṇṇakālo viya upacayo, vaḍḍhi; ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati,
atk-abh01a0:2119_0: Evaṃ kiṃ kathitaṃ hotīti? Āyatanena hi ācayo kathito, ācayena āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2119_1: Ācayova kathito āyatanameva kathitaṃ. Evampi kiṃ kathitaṃ hotīti? Catusantatirūpānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2119_2: ācayo upacayo nibbatti vaḍḍhi kathitā. Atthato hi ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2119_3: Ākāranānattena pana veneyyavasena ca upacayo santatīti uddesadesanaṃ katvā yasmā
atk-abh01a0:2119_4: ettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi, tasmā niddese “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo so rūpassa upacayo,
atk-abh01a0:2119_5: yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2120_0: Yasmā ca ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ tasmā ettha ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa
atk-abh01a0:2120_1: upacayo, pubbantato rūpānaṃ ummujjāpanaraso, niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
atk-abh01a0:2120_2: vā, upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno. Pavattilakkhaṇā rūpassa santati, anuppabandharasā, anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-abh01a0:2121_0: 643. Jaratāniddese jīraṇakavasena jarā; ayamettha sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇākāro jīraṇatā.
atk-abh01a0:2121_1: Khaṇḍiccanti ādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā. Ayañhi
atk-abh01a0:2121_2: ‘jarā’ti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā; tenassāyaṃ sabhāvaniddeso. ‘Jīraṇatā’ti iminā
atk-abh01a0:2121_3: ākārato; tenassāyaṃ ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccanti iminā kālātikkame dantanakhānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvakaraṇakiccato.
atk-abh01a0:2121_4: Pāliccanti iminā kesalomānaṃ palitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2121_5: milāpetvā tace valibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā. Tenassā ime ‘khaṇḍicca’ntiādayo tayo
atk-abh01a0:2121_6: kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā
atk-abh01a0:2121_7: dassitā. Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya
atk-abh01a0:2121_8: vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva
atk-abh01a0:2121_9: jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati,
atk-abh01a0:2121_10: na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā. Na hi jarā cakkhuviññeyyā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2122_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya
atk-abh01a0:2122_1: āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā. Tenassime pacchimā dve
atk-abh01a0:2122_2: pakatiniddesāti veditabbā. Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, tasmā jarā ‘āyuno
atk-abh01a0:2122_3: saṃhānī’ti phalūpacārena vuttā. Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni, sukhumampi attano
atk-abh01a0:2122_4: visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni
atk-abh01a0:2122_5: āluḷitāni avisadāni, oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā ‘indriyānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2123_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2123_1: dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma. Arūpadhammesu
atk-abh01a0:2123_2: pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma. Puna avīci savīcīti
atk-abh01a0:2123_3: evampi duvidhā hoti. Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandimasūriyādīnaṃ viya, mandadasakādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2123_4: pāṇīnaṃ viya ca, pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ viya, antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2123_5: duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma; nirantarajarāti attho. Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu
atk-abh01a0:2123_6: antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2124: Lakkhaṇāditopi rūpaparipākalakkhaṇā rūpassa jaratā, upanayanarasā, sabhāvānapagamepi navabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā, vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya paripaccamānarūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2125_0: 644. Aniccatāniddese khayagamanavasena khayo, vayagamanavasena vayo, bhijjanavasena
atk-abh01a0:2125_1: bhedo. Atha vā, yasmā taṃ patvā rūpaṃ khīyati, veti, bhijjati ca, tasmā khīyati etasminti
atk-abh01a0:2125_2: ‘khayo’, veti etasminti ‘vayo’, bhijjati etasminti ‘bhedo’. Upasaggavasena padaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2125_3: vaḍḍhetvā bhedova paribhedo. Hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena, na niccanti aniccaṃ. Tassa bhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2125_4: aniccatā. Antaradhāyati etthāti antaradhānaṃ. Maraṇañhi patvā rūpaṃ antaradhāyati,
atk-abh01a0:2125_5: adassanaṃ gacchati. Na kevalañca rūpameva, sabbepi pañcakkhandhā. Tasmā pañcannampi
atk-abh01a0:2125_6: khandhānaṃ aniccatāya idameva lakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇādito pana paribhedalakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2125_7: rūpassa aniccatā, saṃsīdanarasā, khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā, paribhijjamānarūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2126_0: Heṭṭhā jāti gahitā jarā gahitā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne maraṇaṃ gahitaṃ. Ime tayo dhammā imesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2126_1: sattānaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccāmittasadisā. Yathā hi purisassa tayo paccāmittā otāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2126_2: gavesamānā vicareyyuṃ. Tesu eko evaṃ vadeyya – ‘etaṃ nīharitvā aṭavipavesanaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2126_3: bhāro hotū’ti. Dutiyo ‘aṭavigatakāle pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2126_4: Tatiyo ‘pathavigatakālato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsacchedanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti. Evarūpā ime
atk-abh01a0:2126_5: jāti ādayo. Nīharitvā aṭavipavesanapaccāmittasadisā hettha jāti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2126_6: nibbattāpanato. Aṭavigataṃ pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanapaccāmittasadisā jarā, nibbattakkhandhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2127_0: 645. Kabaḷīkārāhāraniddese kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharīyatīti āhāro. Kabaḷaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2127_1: katvā ajjhoharīyatīti attho. Rūpaṃ vā āharatītipi ‘āhāro’. Evaṃ vatthuvasena nāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2127_2: uddharitvā puna vatthuvasenevetaṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ odano kummāsotiādi vuttaṃ. Odanādīni
atk-abh01a0:2127_3: hi phāṇitapariyantāni dvādasa idhādhippetassa āhārassa vatthūni. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni
atk-abh01a0:2128_0: Idāni tāni mūlaphalādīni kattabbato dassetuṃ yamhi yamhi janapadetiādimāha. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2128_1: mukhena asitabbaṃ bhuñjitabbanti mukhāsiyaṃ. Dantehi vikhāditabbanti dantavikhādanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2128_2: Galena ajjhoharitabbanti galajjhoharaṇīyaṃ. Idāni taṃ kiccavasena dassetuṃ kucchivitthambhananti
atk-abh01a0:2128_3: āha. Tañhi mūlaphalādi odanakummāsādi vā ajjhohaṭaṃ kucchiṃ vitthambheti. Idamassa
atk-abh01a0:2128_4: kiccaṃ. Yāya ojāya sattā yāpentīti heṭṭhā sabbapadehi savatthukaṃ āhāraṃ dassetvā
atk-abh01a0:2129_0: Kiṃ panettha vatthussa kiccaṃ? Kiṃ ojāya? Parissayaharaṇapālanāni. Vatthuhi parissayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2129_1: harati pāletuṃ na sakkoti, ojā pāleti parissayaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti. Dvepi ekato
atk-abh01a0:2129_2: hutvā pāletumpi sakkonti parissayampi harituṃ. Ko panesa parissayo nāma? Kammajatejo.
atk-abh01a0:2129_3: Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati, kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2129_4: ‘chātomhi, āhāraṃ me dethā’ti vadāpeti. Bhuttakāle udarapaṭalaṃ muñcitvā vatthuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2130_0: Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano
atk-abh01a0:2130_1: bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā sīse ḍaṃsati. So ḍaṭṭhattā viravati. Taṃ viravaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2130_2: sutvā ‘dukkhappatto ettha atthī’ti tato tato manussā āgacchanti. So āgatāgate gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:2130_3: khāditvā bhavane modati. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Chāyārakkhaso viya hi kammajatejo,
atk-abh01a0:2130_4: devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā ṭhapitasatto viya udarapaṭalaṃ, puna āgatamanussā viya
atk-abh01a0:2130_5: odanādivatthu, otaritvā sīse ḍaṃsanaṃ viya kammajatejassa vatthuto muttassa udarapaṭalaggahaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2130_6: ḍaṭṭhassa viravanakālo viya ‘āhāraṃ dethā’ti vacanakālo, tāya saññāya āgatāgate gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:2130_7: khāditvā bhavane modanakālo viya kammajatejena udarapaṭalaṃ muñcitvā vatthusmiṃ gahite ekaggacittatā.
atk-abh01a0:2131_0: Tattha oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā mandā hoti. Sukhume balavatī. Kudrūsakabhattādīni hi
atk-abh01a0:2131_1: bhuñjitvā muhutteneva chāto hoti. Sappiādīni pivitvā ṭhitassa divasampi bhattaṃ na
atk-abh01a0:2131_2: ruccati. Ettha ca upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā. Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2131_3: upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Kumbhīlā kira pāsāṇe gilanti. Te ca nesaṃ kucchippattā
atk-abh01a0:2131_4: vilīyanti. Morā sappavicchikādipāṇe khādanti. Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2131_5: āhāro sukhumo. Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti. Tāni
atk-abh01a0:2131_6: ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti. Taracchānampi āhāramupādāya
