atk-abh01a0:2131_7: hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te hi nānārukkhasākhādayo khādanti. Hatthīnaṃ āhārato gavayagokaṇṇamigādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2131_8: āhāro sukhumo. Te kira nissārāni nānārukkhapaṇṇādīni khādanti. Tesampi āhārato gunnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2131_9: āhāro sukhumo. Te allasukkhatiṇāni khādanti. Tesampi āhārato sasānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-abh01a0:2131_10: Sasānaṃ āhārato sakuṇānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Sakuṇānaṃ āhārato paccantavāsīnaṃ āhāro
atk-abh01a0:2131_11: sukhumo. Paccantavāsīnaṃ āhārato gāmabhojakānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Gāmabhojakānaṃ āhārato
atk-abh01a0:2131_12: rājarājamahāmattānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Tesampi āhārato cakkavattino āhāro sukhumo. Cakkavattino
atk-abh01a0:2131_13: āhārato bhummadevānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Bhummadevānaṃ āhārato cātumahārājikānaṃ āhāro
atk-abh01a0:2131_14: sukhumo. Evaṃ yāva paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ āhāro vitthāretabbo. Tesaṃ panāhāro sukhumotveva niṭṭhaṃ patto.
atk-abh01a0:2132: Lakkhaṇāditopi ojālakkhaṇo kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpāharaṇaraso, upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno, kabaḷaṃ katvā āharitabbavatthupadaṭṭhānoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2133: 646. Noupādāniddese yathā upādārūpaṃ upādiyateva, na aññena upādiyati, evametaṃ na upādiyatevāti noupādā.
atk-abh01a0:2134_0: 647. Phusitabbanti phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Phusitvā jānitabbanti attho. Phoṭṭhabbañca taṃ āyatanañcāti
atk-abh01a0:2134_1: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. Āpo ca taṃ nissattasuññatasabhāvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti āpodhātu. Idāni
atk-abh01a0:2134_2: yasmā tīṇi rūpāni phusitvā jānitabbāni tasmā tāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2134_6: Purimā pana ‘āpodhātu’ paggharaṇalakkhaṇā, brūhanarasā, saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānā. Ekekā
atk-abh01a0:2135_0: Kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ. Mudukanti athaddhaṃ. Saṇhanti maṭṭhaṃ. Pharusanti kharaṃ. Sukhasamphassanti
atk-abh01a0:2135_2: Garukanti bhāriyaṃ. Lahukanti abhāriyaṃ, sallahukanti attho. Ettha ca ‘kakkhaḷaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2135_3: mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka’nti padehi pathavīdhātu eva bhājitā. “Yadāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2135_4: kāyo āyusahagato ca hoti usmāsahagato ca viññāṇasahagato ca tadā lahutaro ca hoti
atk-abh01a0:2135_5: mudutaro ca kammaññataro cā”ti suttepi lahumudubhūtaṃ pathavīdhātumeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2136_0: ‘Sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassa’nti padadvayena pana tīṇipi mahābhūtāni bhājitāni.
atk-abh01a0:2136_1: Pathavīdhātu hi sukhasamphassāpi atthi dukkhasamphassāpi. Tathā tejodhātuvāyodhātuyo.
atk-abh01a0:2136_2: Tattha sukhasamphassā pathavīdhātu mudutaluṇahatthe dahare pāde sambāhante assādetvā
atk-abh01a0:2136_3: assādetvā ‘sambāha tāta, sambāha tātā’ti vadāpanākāraṃ karoti. Sukhasamphassā tejodhātu
atk-abh01a0:2136_4: sītasamaye aṅgārakapallaṃ āharitvā gattaṃ sedente assādetvā assādetvā ‘sedehi tāta,
atk-abh01a0:2136_5: sedehi tātā’ti vadāpanākāraṃ karoti. Sukhasamphassā vāyodhātu uṇhasamaye vattasampanne
atk-abh01a0:2136_6: dahare bījanena bījante assādetvā assādetvā ‘bīja tāta, bīja tātā’ti vadāpanākāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2136_7: karoti. Thaddhahatthe pana dahare pāde sambāhante aṭṭhīnaṃ bhijjanakālo viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2136_8: Sopi ‘apehī’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Uṇhasamaye aṅgārakapalle ābhate ‘apanehi na’nti
atk-abh01a0:2136_9: vattabbaṃ hoti. Sītasamaye bījanena bījante ‘apehi, mā bījā’ti vattabbaṃ hoti. Evametāsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2137: Yaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ anidassanaṃ sappaṭighantiādinā nayena vuttā pana catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā heṭṭhā rūpāyatanādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2138_0: Kiṃ panetāni tīṇi mahābhūtāni ekappahāreneva āpāthaṃ āgacchanti udāhu noti? Āgacchanti.
atk-abh01a0:2138_1: Evaṃ āgatāni kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭenti na ghaṭṭentīti? Ghaṭṭenti. Ekappahāreneva tāni
atk-abh01a0:2138_2: ārammaṇaṃ katvā kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati nuppajjatīti? Nuppajjati. Ābhujitavasena vā
atk-abh01a0:2139_0: Tattha ābhujitavasena tāva, pattasmiñhi odanena pūretvā ābhate ekaṃ sitthaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:2139_1: thaddhaṃ vā mudukaṃ vāti vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi, pathavīdhātumeva
atk-abh01a0:2139_2: pana ābhujati. Uṇhodake hatthaṃ otāretvā vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi
atk-abh01a0:2139_3: vāyopi atthi, tejodhātumeva pana ābhujati. Uṇhasamaye vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vātena
atk-abh01a0:2139_4: sarīraṃ paharāpento ṭhito mandamande vāte paharante kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi
atk-abh01a0:2139_5: tejopi atthi, vāyodhātumeva pana ābhujati. Evaṃ ābhujitavasena ārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2140_0: Yo pana upakkhalati vā sīsena vā rukkhaṃ paharati bhuñjanto vā sakkharaṃ ḍaṃsati,
atk-abh01a0:2140_1: so kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi, ussadavasena pana pathavīdhātumeva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2140_2: karoti. Aggiṃ akkamantopi kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi vāyopi atthi, ussadavasena
atk-abh01a0:2140_3: pana tejodhātumeva ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Balavavāte kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ paharitvā badhirabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2140_4: karonte. Kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi tejopi atthi, ussadavasena pana vāyodhātumeva ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2141_0: Yaṃkiñci dhātuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontassa kāyaviññāṇampi ekappahārena nuppajjati. Sūcikalāpena
atk-abh01a0:2141_1: viddhassa ekappahārena kāyo ghaṭṭiyati. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kāyapasādo ussanno
atk-abh01a0:2141_2: hoti, tattha tattha kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Yattha yatthāpi paṭighaṭṭananighaṃso
atk-abh01a0:2141_3: balavā hoti tattha tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjati. Kukkuṭapattena vaṇe dhoviyamāne aṃsuaṃsu
atk-abh01a0:2141_4: kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Yattha yattha pana pasādo ussanno hoti, tattha tattheva kāyaviññāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2141_5: uppajjati. Evaṃ ussadavasena ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Ussadavaseneva ca kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2142_0: Kathaṃ pana cittassa ārammaṇato saṅkanti hotīti? Dvīhākārehi hoti – ajjhāsayato vā
atk-abh01a0:2142_1: visayādhimattato vā. Vihārapūjādīsu hi ‘tāni tāni cetiyāni ceva paṭimāyo ca vandissāmi,
atk-abh01a0:2142_2: potthakammacittakammāni ca olokessāmī’ti ajjhāsayena gato ekaṃ vanditvā vā passitvā
atk-abh01a0:2142_3: vā itarassa vandanatthāya vā dassanatthāya vā manaṃ katvā vanditumpi passitumpi gacchatiyeva,
atk-abh01a0:2143_0: Kelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṃ pana mahācetiyaṃ olokento ṭhitopi aparabhāge sabbatūriyesu paggahitesu
atk-abh01a0:2143_1: rūpārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā saddārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati. Manuññagandhesu pupphesu vā gandhesu
atk-abh01a0:2143_2: vā ābhatesu saddārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā gandhārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati. Evaṃ visayādhimattato saṅkamati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2144_0: 651. Āpodhātuniddese āpoti sabhāvaniddeso. Āpova āpogataṃ. Sinehavasena sineho, sinehova
atk-abh01a0:2144_1: sinehagataṃ. Bandhanattaṃ rūpassāti pathavīdhātuādikassa bhūtarūpassa bandhanabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2144_2: Ayopiṇḍiādīni hi āpodhātu ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti. Tāya ābaddhattā tāni baddhāni
atk-abh01a0:2144_3: nāma honti. Pāsāṇapabbatatālaṭṭhihatthidantagosiṅgādīsupi eseva nayo. Sabbāni hetāni
atk-abh01a0:2144_4: āpodhātu eva ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti. Āpodhātuyā ābaddhattāva baddhāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:2145_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti na hotīti hoti phusitvā hoti udāhu
atk-abh01a0:2145_1: aphusitvā? Āpodhātu vā sesā ābandhamānā phusitvā ābandhati udāhu aphusitvāti? Pathavīdhātu
atk-abh01a0:2145_2: tāva āpodhātuyā aphusitvāva patiṭṭhā hoti, tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā ca phusitvā.
atk-abh01a0:2145_3: Āpodhātu pana pathavīdhātumpi tejovāyodhātuyopi aphusitvāva ābandhati. Yadi phusitvā
atk-abh01a0:2146_0: Tejodhātuvāyodhātūnampi sesadhātūsu sakasakakiccakaraṇe eseva nayo. Tejodhātu hi
atk-abh01a0:2146_1: pathavīdhātuṃ phusitvā jhāpeti. Sā pana na uṇhā hutvā jhāyati. Yadi uṇhā hutvā jhāyeyya
atk-abh01a0:2146_2: uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya. Āpodhātuṃ pana aphusitvāva tāpeti. Sāpi tapamānā na
atk-abh01a0:2146_3: uṇhā hutvā tapati. Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya. Vāyodhātuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2146_4: pana phusitvāva tāpeti. Sāpi tapamānā na uṇhā hutvā tapati. Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya
atk-abh01a0:2146_5: uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya. Vāyodhātu pathavīdhātuṃ phusitvā vitthambheti, tathā
atk-abh01a0:2147_0: Ucchurasaṃ pacitvā phāṇitapiṇḍe kariyamāne āpodhātu thaddhā hoti na hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2147_1: Sā hi paggharaṇalakkhaṇā. Pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā. Omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2147_2: jātaṃ. Sā hi rasākārena ṭhitabhāvaṃ vijahati, lakkhaṇaṃ na vijahati. Phāṇitapiṇḍe
atk-abh01a0:2147_3: vilīyamānepi pathavīdhātu na vilīyati. Kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā hi pathavīdhātu paggharaṇalakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2147_4: āpodhātu. Omattā pana pathavī adhimattaāpagatikā hoti. Sā piṇḍākārena ṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2147_5: vijahati, lakkhaṇaṃ na vijahati. Catunnañhi mahābhūtānaṃ bhāvaññathattameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2147_6: lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ nāma natthi. Tassa abhāvo aṭṭhānaparikappasuttena dīpito. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2148: “Siyā, ānanda, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññathattaṃ, pathavīdhātuyā…pe… vāyodhātuyā; na tveva buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā aññathatta”nti.
atk-abh01a0:2149_0: Ayañhettha attho – ānanda, kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu parivattitvā paggharaṇalakkhaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2149_1: āpodhātu nāma bhaveyya, ariyasāvakassa pana aññathattaṃ nāma natthīti. Evamettha
atk-abh01a0:2150_0: 652. Ito paresu upādiṇṇarūpādiniddesesu upādiṇṇapadādīnaṃ attho mātikākathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:2150_1: veditabbo. Cakkhāyatanādīni heṭṭhā vitthāritāneva. Tattha tattha pana visesamattameva vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:2151_0: Upādiṇṇaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanādīni ekantaupādiṇṇattā vuttāni. Yasmā pana rūpāyatanādīni
atk-abh01a0:2151_1: upādiṇṇānipi atthi anupādiṇṇānipi, tasmā tāni yaṃ vā panāti saṅkhepato dassetvā puna
atk-abh01a0:2151_2: kammassa katattā rūpāyatanantiādinā nayena vitthāritāni. Iminā upāyena sabbayevāpanakesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2152_0: Kasmā pana ‘kammassa katattā’ti ca ‘na kammassa katattā’ti ca ubhinnampi niddese
atk-abh01a0:2152_1: ‘jaratā ca aniccatā ca’ na gahitā, anupādiṇṇādīnaṃyeva niddesesu gahitāti? Na kammassa
atk-abh01a0:2152_2: katattāti ettha tāva kammato aññapaccayasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. ‘Kammassa katattā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2152_3: ettha kammasamuṭṭhānameva. Imāni ca dve rūpāni neva kammato na aññasmā rūpajanakapaccayā
atk-abh01a0:2152_4: uppajjanti, tasmā na gahitāni. Sā ca nesaṃ anuppatti parato āvi bhavissati. Anupādiṇṇantiādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2152_5: pana kevalaṃ anupādiṇṇādiggahaṇena kammādisamuṭṭhānatā paṭikkhittā, naaññapaccayasamuṭṭhānatā
atk-abh01a0:2153_0: 666. Cittasamuṭṭhānaniddese kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekantacittasamuṭṭhānāni
atk-abh01a0:2153_1: bhūtāni upādāya paññāyati, tasmā vuttaṃ. Paramatthato pana tassa nissayabhūtāni bhūtāneva
atk-abh01a0:2153_2: cittasamuṭṭhānāni, taṃnissitattā. Yathā aniccassa rūpassa jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:2154: 668. Cittasahabhuniddesepi eseva nayo. Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato idameva dvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Na panetaṃ cittena saha bhūtāni viya, cetanādayo viya ca uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2155: 670. Cittānuparivattitāyapi eseva nayo. Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato eva hetaṃ dvayaṃ cittānuparivattīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2156: 674. Oḷārikanti vatthārammaṇabhūtattā saṃṅghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato thūlaṃ. Vuttavipallāsato sukhumaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2157_0: 676. Dūreti ghaṭṭanavasena aggahetabbattā dubbiññeyyabhāvena samīpe ṭhitampi dūre.
atk-abh01a0:2157_1: Itaraṃ pana ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbattā suviññeyyabhāvena dūre ṭhitampi santike.
atk-abh01a0:2157_2: Cakkhāyatanādiniddesā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbā. Idaṃ tāva duvidhena
atk-abh01a0:2159_0: 966. Catubbidhasaṅgahāvasāne diṭṭhādīnaṃ pacchimapadassa bhedābhāvena ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-abh01a0:2159_1: pucchaṃ akatvāva rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2159_2: cakkhunā oloketvā dakkhituṃ sakkāti ‘diṭṭhaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ. Saddāyatanaṃ sotena sutvā
atk-abh01a0:2159_3: jānituṃ sakkāti ‘sutaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ. Gandhāyatanādittayaṃ ghānajivhākāyehi patvā gahetabbato
atk-abh01a0:2159_4: munitvā jānitabbaṭṭhena mutaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Phusitvā viññāṇuppattikāraṇato ‘mutaṃ’
atk-abh01a0:2159_5: nāmātipi vuttaṃ. Sabbameva pana rūpaṃ manoviññāṇena jānitabbanti manasā viññātaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2161_0: 967. Pañcavidhasaṅgahaniddese kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ. Kharameva kharagataṃ, pharusanti
atk-abh01a0:2161_1: attho. Itare dvepi sabhāvaniddesā eva. Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ. Bahiddhāti bāhiraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2161_2: Upādiṇṇanti na kammasamuṭṭhānameva. Avisesena pana sarīraṭṭhakassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sarīraṭṭhakañhi
atk-abh01a0:2161_3: upādiṇṇaṃ vā hotu anupādiṇṇaṃ vā, ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbaṃ upādiṇṇameva nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2162_0: 969. Tejogatanti sabbatejesu gataṃ uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti
atk-abh01a0:2162_1: ‘tejogataṃ’. Usmāti usmākāro. Usmāgatanti usmābhāvaṃ gataṃ. Usmākārassevetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2162_2: Usumanti balavausmā. Usumameva usumabhāvaṃ gatanti usumagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2163: 970. Vāyanakavasena vāyo. Vāyova vāyobhāvaṃ gatattā vāyogataṃ. Thambhitattanti uppalanāḷatacādīnaṃ viya vātapuṇṇānaṃ thambhitabhāvo rūpassa.
atk-abh01a0:2165_0: 972-4. Chabbidhādisaṅgahānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ osānapadassa bhedābhāvato ādito paṭṭhāya apucchitvāva
atk-abh01a0:2165_1: niddeso kato. Tattha cakkhuviññāṇena jānituṃ sakkāti cakkhuviññeyyaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:2165_2: jānituṃ sakkāti manoviññeyyaṃ. Tividhāya manodhātuyā jānituṃ sakkāti manodhātuviññeyyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2165_3: sabbaṃ rūpanti ettha yasmā ekaṃ rūpampi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2165_4: tasmā ‘sabbaṃ rūpa’nti vuttaṃ. Sammāsambuddhena hi abhidhammaṃ patvā nayaṃ kātuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2165_5: yuttaṭṭhāne nayo akato nāma natthi. Idañca ekarūpassāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbassa
atk-abh01a0:2165_6: abhāvena nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, tasmā nayaṃ karonto ‘sabbaṃ rūpa’nti āha.
atk-abh01a0:2166: 974. Sukhasamphassoti sukhavedanāpaṭilābhapaccayo. Dukkhasamphassoti dukkhavedanāpaṭilābhapaccayo. Idhāpi phoṭṭhabbārammaṇassa sukhadukkhassa sabbhāvato ayaṃ nayo dinno.
atk-abh01a0:2168_0: 975. Navake pana indriyarūpassa nāma atthitāya nayo dinno. Tasseva sappaṭighaappaṭighatāya
atk-abh01a0:2168_1: dasake nayo dinno. Ekādasake aḍḍhekādasa āyatanāni vibhattāni. Tesaṃ niddesavārā
atk-abh01a0:2168_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh01a0:2170: Imesu pana rūpesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ parinipphannañca saṅkhatanti idaṃ ‘pakiṇṇakaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2171_0: Tattha ‘samodhāna’nti sabbameva hidaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānato cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… kabaḷīkāro
atk-abh01a0:2171_1: āhāro, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ āpodhātūti pañcavīsatisaṅkhyaṃ hoti. Taṃ vatthurūpena saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2171_2: chabbīsatisaṅkhyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ito aññaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi. Keci pana ‘middharūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2171_3: nāma atthī’ti vadanti. Te “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā
atk-abh01a0:2171_4: middharūpaṃ nāma natthīti paṭisedhetabbā. Apare balarūpena saddhiṃ sattavīsati, sambhavarūpena
atk-abh01a0:2171_5: saddhiṃ aṭṭhavīsati, jātirūpena saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsati, rogarūpena saddhiṃ samatiṃsati
atk-abh01a0:2171_6: rūpānīti vadanti. Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Vāyodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:2171_7: hi gahitāya balarūpaṃ gahitameva, aññaṃ balarūpaṃ nāma natthi. Āpodhātuyā sambhavarūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2171_8: upacayasantatīhi jātirūpaṃ, jaratāaniccatāhi gahitāhi rogarūpaṃ gahitameva. Aññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2171_9: rogarūpaṃ nāma natthi. Yopi kaṇṇarogādi ābādho so visamapaccayasamuṭṭhitadhātumattameva.
atk-abh01a0:2171_10: Na añño tattha rogo nāma atthīti samodhānato chabbīsatimeva rūpāni.
atk-abh01a0:2172: ‘Samuṭṭhāna’nti kati rūpāni katisamuṭṭhānāni? Dasa ekasamuṭṭhānāni, ekaṃ dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ, tīṇi tisamuṭṭhānāni, nava catusamuṭṭhānāni, dve na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2173_0: Tattha cakkhupasādo…pe… jīvitindriyanti imāni aṭṭha ekantaṃ kammatova samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2173_2: nāma. Saddo ututo ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātīti eko ‘dvisamuṭṭhāno’ nāma. Tattha aviññāṇakasaddo
atk-abh01a0:2173_3: ututo samuṭṭhāti, saviññāṇakasaddo cittato. Lahutādittayaṃ pana utucittāhārehi samuṭṭhātīti
atk-abh01a0:2173_4: tīṇi ‘tisamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma. Avasesāni nava rūpāni tehi kammena cāti catūhi samuṭṭhahantīti
atk-abh01a0:2173_5: nava ‘catusamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma. Jaratā aniccatā pana etesu ekatopi na samuṭṭhahantīti
atk-abh01a0:2173_6: dve ‘na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti’ nāma. Kasmā? Ajāyanato. Na hi etāni jāyanti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2173_7: Jātassa pākabhedattā. Uppannañhi rūpaṃ jīrati bhijjatīti avassaṃ panetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2173_8: Na hi uppannaṃ rūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā akkhayaṃ nāma dissati. Yāva pana na bhijjati tāvassa
atk-abh01a0:2173_9: paripākoti siddhametaṃ. ‘Jātassa pākabhedattā’ti yadi ca tāni jāyeyyuṃ tesampi pākabhedā
atk-abh01a0:2173_10: bhaveyyuṃ. Na ca pāko paccati, bhedo vā bhijjatīti jātassa pākabhedattā netaṃ dvayaṃ jāyati.
atk-abh01a0:2174_0: Tattha siyā – yathā ‘kammassa katattā’ti ādiniddesesu ‘rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2174_1: vacanena ‘jāti’ jāyatīti sampaṭicchitaṃ hoti, evaṃ ‘pāko’pi paccatu ‘bhedo’pi bhijjatūti.
atk-abh01a0:2174_2: “Na tattha ‘jāti jāyatī’ti sampaṭicchitaṃ. Ye pana dhammā kammādīhi nibbattanti tesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2174_3: abhinibbattibhāvato jātiyā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumato. Na pana paramatthato jāti
atk-abh01a0:2175_0: Tattha siyā – ‘yatheva jāti yesaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca
atk-abh01a0:2175_1: labhati, tathā pākabhedāpi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pākabhedā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca
atk-abh01a0:2175_2: labhantu. Evaṃ idampi dvayaṃ kammādisamuṭṭhānamevāti vattabbaṃ bhavissatī’ti. ‘Na
atk-abh01a0:2175_3: pākabhedā taṃ vohāraṃ labhanti. Kasmā? Janakapaccayānubhāvakkhaṇe abhāvato. Janakapaccayānañhi
atk-abh01a0:2175_4: uppādetabbadhammassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva ānubhāvo, na tato uttari. Tehi abhinibbattitadhammakkhaṇasmiñca
atk-abh01a0:2175_5: jāti paññāyamānā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati, tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-abh01a0:2175_6: sabbhāvato; na itaradvayaṃ, tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvatoti nevetaṃ jāyatī’ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2175_7: “Jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti āgatattā idampi
atk-abh01a0:2175_8: dvayaṃ jāyatīti ce – ‘na, pariyāyadesitattā. Tattha hi paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2176_0: ‘Yadi evaṃ, tayampetaṃ ajātattā sasavisāṇaṃ viya natthi; nibbānaṃ viya vā nicca’nti
atk-abh01a0:2176_1: ce – na, nissayapaṭibaddhavuttito; pathavīādīnañhi nissayānaṃ bhāve jātiādittayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2176_2: paññāyati, tasmā na natthi. Tesañca abhāve na paññāyati, tasmā na niccaṃ. Etampi
atk-abh01a0:2176_3: ca abhinivesaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ eva idaṃ vuttaṃ – “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2176_4: paṭiccasamuppanna”nti. Evamādīhi nayehi tāni dve rūpāni na kehici samuṭṭhahantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2177_0: Apica ‘samuṭṭhāna’nti ettha ayamaññopi attho. Tassāyaṃ mātikā – ‘kammajaṃ kammapaccayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2178_0: Tattha cakkhupasādādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saddhiṃ hadayavatthunā ‘kammajaṃ’ nāma. Kesamassu
atk-abh01a0:2178_1: hatthidantā assavālā camaravālāti evamādi ‘kammapaccayaṃ’ nāma. Cakkaratanaṃ devatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2179_0: Āhārato samuṭṭhitaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ ‘āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ’ nāma. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnampi
atk-abh01a0:2179_1: rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca. Āhārasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-abh01a0:2179_2: janako hutvā paccayo hoti, kammajassa anupālako hutvāti idaṃ āhārānupālitaṃ kammajarūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2179_3: ‘āhārapaccayaṃ’ nāma. Visabhāgāhāraṃ sevitvā ātape gacchantassa tilakakāḷakuṭṭhādīni
atk-abh01a0:2180_0: Ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ ‘utusamuṭṭhānaṃ’ nāma. Tasmiṃ utu aññaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2180_1: samuṭṭhāpeti, idaṃ ‘utupaccayaṃ’ nāma. Tasmimpi utu aññaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:2180_2: idaṃ ‘utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ’ nāma. Evaṃ tissoyeva santatiyo ghaṭṭetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2180_3: Na tato paraṃ. Imamatthaṃ anupādinnakenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Utusamuṭṭhāno nāma valāhako.
atk-abh01a0:2180_4: Utupaccayā nāma vuṭṭhidhārā. Deve pana vuṭṭhe bījāni virūhanti, pathavī gandhaṃ muñcati,
atk-abh01a0:2180_5: pabbatā nīlā khāyanti, samuddo vaḍḍhati, etaṃ utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2181_1: dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti idaṃ ‘cittapaccayaṃ’
atk-abh01a0:2181_2: nāma. Ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi dasseti, assampi dasseti, rathampi dasseti, vividhampi
atk-abh01a0:2182_0: ‘Parinipphanna’nti pannarasa rūpāni parinipphannāni nāma, dasa aparinipphannāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2182_1: ‘Yadi aparinipphannā, asaṅkhatā nāma bhaveyyuṃ’. “Tesaṃyeva pana rūpānaṃ kāyavikāro
atk-abh01a0:2182_3: nāma, lahubhāvo ‘lahutā’ nāma, mudubhāvo ‘mudutā’ nāma, kammaññabhāvo ‘kammaññatā’
atk-abh01a0:2182_4: nāma, nibbatti ‘upacayo’ nāma, pavatti ‘santati’ nāma, jīraṇākāro ‘jaratā’ nāma,
atk-abh01a0:2182_5: hutvā abhāvākāro ‘aniccatā’ nāmāti. Sabbaṃ parinipphannaṃ saṅkhatameva hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2187_0: 985. Ettāvatā kusalattiko sabbesaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ padabhājananayena vitthārito
atk-abh01a0:2187_1: hoti. Yasmā pana yvāyaṃ kusalattikassa vibhajananayo vutto, sesatikadukānampi eseva
atk-abh01a0:2187_2: vibhajananayo hoti – yathā hi ettha, evaṃ ‘katame dhammā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā?
atk-abh01a0:2187_3: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2187_4: rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino
atk-abh01a0:2187_5: dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākhandhaṃ, ime dhammā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā’tiādinā anukkamena
atk-abh01a0:2187_6: sabbatikadukesu sakkā paṇḍitehi vibhājananayaṃ sallakkhetuṃ – tasmā taṃ vitthāradesanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2187_8: katame dhammā kusalāti nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ āraddhaṃ. Cittuppādakaṇḍañhi vitthāradesanā,
atk-abh01a0:2187_9: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ saṅkhepadesanā. Idaṃ pana nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ upādāya
atk-abh01a0:2187_10: saṅkhepo, aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ upādāya vitthāroti saṅkhittavitthāradhātukaṃ hoti. Tayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2187_11: vitthāradesanaṃ nikkhipitvā desitattāpi, heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇavasenāpi, nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2188: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a0:2189: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a0:2191_0: Idañhi tīṇi kusalamūlānītiādinā nayena mūlato nikkhipitvā desitaṃ. Taṃsampayutto
atk-abh01a0:2191_1: vedanākkhandhoti khandhato. Taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammanti dvārato. Kāyadvārappavattañhi
atk-abh01a0:2191_2: kammaṃ kāyakammanti vuccati. Sukhabhūmiyaṃ, kāmāvacareti bhūmito nikkhipitvā desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2191_3: Tattha tattha atthadhammanāmaliṅgānaṃ vasena desitattā atthādīhi nikkhipitvā desitaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2192_0: Tattha kusalapadaniddese tāva tīṇīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Kusalāni ca tāni mūlāni ca,
atk-abh01a0:2192_2: kusalamūlāni. Evaṃ atthavasena dassetvā idāni nāmavasena dassetuṃ alobho adoso amohoti
atk-abh01a0:2192_3: āha. Ettāvatā yasmā mūlena muttaṃ kusalaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā catubhūmakakusalaṃ tīhi
atk-abh01a0:2192_4: mūlehi pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. Taṃsampayuttoti tehi alobhādīhi sampayutto.
atk-abh01a0:2192_5: Tattha alobhena sampayutte saṅkhārakkhandhe, adosāmohāpi alobhena sampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhagaṇanaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:2192_6: gacchanti. Sesadvayavasena sampayogepi eseva nayo. Iti catubhūmakakusalaṃ puna taṃsampayuttakacatukkhandhavasena
atk-abh01a0:2192_7: pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānanti tehi alobhādīhi samuṭṭhitaṃ. Imināpi
atk-abh01a0:2192_8: nayena tadeva catubhūmikakusalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammadvārānaṃ vasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi
atk-abh01a0:2192_9: dhammarājā. Evaṃ tāva kusalaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2193_0: 986. Akusalepi eseva nayo. Dvādasannañhi akusalacittānaṃ ekampi mūlena muttaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:2193_1: natthīti mūlena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. Taṃsampayuttacatukkhandhato ca
atk-abh01a0:2193_2: uddhaṃ akusalaṃ nāma natthīti tāneva dvādasa akusalacittāni catukkhandhavasena pariyādiyitvā
atk-abh01a0:2193_3: dassesi. Dhammarājā kāyakammādivasena pana nesaṃ pavattisabbhāvato kammadvāravasena
atk-abh01a0:2193_4: pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. Yaṃ panettha tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesātiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2193_5: tattha ekasmiṃ citte puggale vā ṭhitanti ‘ekaṭṭhaṃ’. Tattha ekasmiṃ citte ṭhitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2193_6: sahajekaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti. Ekasmiṃ puggale ṭhitaṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Tena lobhādinā
atk-abh01a0:2193_7: aññena vā tattha tattha niddiṭṭhena saha ekasmiṃ ṭhitanti tadekaṭṭhaṃ. Tattha ‘katame
atk-abh01a0:2193_8: dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni – lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca
atk-abh01a0:2193_9: kilesā’ti saṃkiliṭṭhattike; ‘katame dhammā hīnā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni – lobho doso
atk-abh01a0:2193_10: moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti hīnattike ‘katame dhammā akusalā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni
atk-abh01a0:2193_11: – lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti imasmiṃ kusalattike; ‘katame dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhā?
atk-abh01a0:2193_12: Tīṇi akusalamūlāni – lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti kilesagocchake ‘katame
atk-abh01a0:2193_13: dhammā saraṇā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni – lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesāti saraṇaduke’ti
atk-abh01a0:2194_0: Dassanenapahātabbattike pana ‘imāni tīṇi saṃyojanāni, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti, dassanenapahātabbahetukattikepi
atk-abh01a0:2194_1: ‘imāni tīṇi saṃyojanāni, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti, puna tattheva tīṇi saṃyojanāni
atk-abh01a0:2194_2: – sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso, ime dhammā dassanenapahātabbā; tadekaṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:2194_3: lobho doso moho, ime dhammā dassanenapahātabbahetū; tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā taṃsampayutto
atk-abh01a0:2194_4: vedanākhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2194_5: ime dhammā dassanenapahātabbahetukāti; sammappadhānavibhaṅge “tattha katame pāpakā
atk-abh01a0:2194_6: akusalā dhammā? Tīṇi akusalamūlāni – lobho doso moho, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti – imesu
atk-abh01a0:2195_0: 987. Abyākatapadaniddeso uttānatthoyevāti. Imasmiṃ tike tīṇi lakkhaṇāni tisso paññattiyo
atk-abh01a0:2195_1: kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanassa ārammaṇaṃ nirodhasamāpatti ca na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2196_0: 988. Vedanāttikaniddese sukhabhūmiyanti ettha yathā tambabhūmi kaṇhabhūmīti tambakaṇhabhūmiyova
atk-abh01a0:2196_1: vuccanti, evaṃ sukhampi sukhabhūmi nāma. Yathā ucchubhūmi sālibhūmīti ucchusālīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2196_2: uppajjanaṭṭhānāni vuccanti, evaṃ sukhassa uppajjanaṭṭhānaṃ cittampi sukhabhūmi nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2196_3: Taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Yasmā pana sā kāmāvacare vā hoti, rūpāvacarādīsu vā, tasmāssā
atk-abh01a0:2196_4: taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ kāmāvacaretiādi vuttaṃ. Sukhavedanaṃ ṭhapetvāti yā sā sukhabhūmiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2196_5: sukhavedanā, taṃ ṭhapetvā. Taṃsampayuttoti tāya ṭhapitāya sukhavedanāya sampayutto.
atk-abh01a0:2197_0: Imasmiṃ tike tisso vedanā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānanti idampi na labbhati. Ayañhi tiko
atk-abh01a0:2197_1: kusalattike ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca tīhi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma. Ito paresu pana
atk-abh01a0:2197_2: tikadukesu pāḷito ca atthato ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ padānukkamena mātikākathāyañceva
atk-abh01a0:2197_3: kusalādīnaṃ niddese ca vuttameva. Yaṃ pana yattha visesamattaṃ tadeva vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:2198_0: 991. Tattha vipākattike tāva kiñcāpi arūpadhammā viya rūpadhammāpi kammasamuṭṭhānā
atk-abh01a0:2198_1: atthi, anārammaṇattā pana te kammasarikkhakā na hontīti sārammaṇā arūpadhammāva kammasarikkhakattā
atk-abh01a0:2198_2: vipākāti vuttā, bījasarikkhakaṃ phalaṃ viya. Sālibījasmiñhi vapite aṅkurapattādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2198_3: nikkhantesupi sāliphalanti na vuccati. Yadā pana sālisīsaṃ pakkaṃ hoti pariṇataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2198_4: tadā bījasarikkhako sāli eva sāliphalanti vuccati. Aṅkurapattādīni pana bījajātāni
atk-abh01a0:2198_5: bījato nibbattānīti vuccanti, evameva rūpampi kammajanti vā upādiṇṇanti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2199_0: 994. Upādiṇṇattike kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa khandhā ‘amhākaṃ mātulatthero amhākaṃ cūḷapitutthero’ti
atk-abh01a0:2199_1: vadantānaṃ paresaṃ upādānassa paccayā honti, maggaphalanibbānāni pana aggahitāni
atk-abh01a0:2199_2: aparāmaṭṭhāni anupādiṇṇāneva. Tāni hi, yathā divasaṃ santatto ayoguḷo makkhikānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2199_3: abhinisīdanassa paccayo na hoti, evameva tejussadattā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena gahaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:2199_4: paccayā na honti. Tena vuttaṃ – ime dhammā anupādiṇṇaanupādāniyāti.
atk-abh01a0:2201: 1000. Vitakkattike vitakkasahajātena vicārena saddhiṃ kusalattike alabbhamānāva na labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2202_0: 1003. Pītisahagatattike pītiādayo attanā sahajātadhammānaṃ pītisahagatādibhāvaṃ datvā
atk-abh01a0:2202_1: sayaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakā jātā. Imasmiñhi tike dve domanassasahagatacittuppādā dukkhasahagataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2202_2: kāyaviññāṇaṃ upekkhāvedanā rūpaṃ nibbānanti – idampi na labbhati. Ayañhi tiko kusalattike
atk-abh01a0:2202_3: ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca pañcahi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2203_1: sati khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye; sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhīti ‘sakkāyadiṭṭhi’.
atk-abh01a0:2203_2: Sīlena sujjhituṃ sakkā, vatena sujjhituṃ sakkā, sīlavatehi sujjhituṃ sakkāti gahitasamādānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2204_0: 1007. Idhāti desāpadese nipāto. Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2204_1: “idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti. Katthaci sāsanaṃ. Yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave,
atk-abh01a0:2204_2: samaṇo idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti. Katthaci okāsaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2206: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:2207: Katthaci padapūraṇamattameva. Yathāha – “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”ti. Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2208_0: Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana ‘āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti’. Yassa hi
atk-abh01a0:2208_2: diṭṭhipaṭisedhako neva ‘āgamo’, paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā neva ‘adhigamo’
atk-abh01a0:2208_3: atthi, so ‘āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti’. Svāyaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2211_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha
atk-abh01a0:2211_1: – “puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā. Puthu avihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikāti puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a0:2211_2: Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti puthujjanā. Puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a0:2211_3: Puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontīti puthujjanā. Puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a0:2211_4: Puthu nānāsantāpehi santappantīti puthujjanā. Puthu nānāpariḷāhehi pariḍayhantīti
atk-abh01a0:2211_5: puthujjanā. Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā
atk-abh01a0:2211_6: laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā. Puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā
atk-abh01a0:2211_7: paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti. Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2211_8: nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā. Puthu vā ayaṃ – visuṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:2211_9: saṅkhyaṃ gato, visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi – janotipi puthujjano. Evametehi
atk-abh01a0:2214: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2215_0: Ariyānaṃ adassāvītiādīsu ariyāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye iriyanato,
atk-abh01a0:2215_1: sadevakena lokena ca araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:2215_2: Buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha – “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… tathāgato ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2216_0: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisāti veditabbā. Te
atk-abh01a0:2216_1: hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā. Sabbeva vā ete dvedhāpi vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2216_2: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca paccekabuddhā buddhasāvakāpi. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2221_0: ‘Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī’ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto. Kataññutādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2221_1: paccekabuddhā buddhāti. Idāni yo tesaṃ ariyānaṃ adassanasīlo, na ca dassane sādhukārī,
atk-abh01a0:2221_2: so ariyānaṃ adassāvīti veditabbo. So cakkhunā adassāvī ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho.
atk-abh01a0:2221_3: Tesu ñāṇena adassāvī idha adhippeto. Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi
atk-abh01a0:2221_4: adiṭṭhāva honti, tesaṃ cakkhūnaṃ vaṇṇamattaggahaṇato, na ariyabhāvagocarato. Soṇasiṅgālādayopi
atk-abh01a0:2221_5: cakkhunā ariye passanti, na ca te ariyānaṃ dassāvino.
atk-abh01a0:2222_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito
atk-abh01a0:2222_1: ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito
atk-abh01a0:2222_2: āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi – ‘ariyā nāma bhante kīdisā’ti? Thero āha – ‘idhekacco mahallako
atk-abh01a0:2222_3: ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā saha carantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2222_4: evaṃdujjānāvuso, ariyā’ti. Evaṃ vuttepi so neva aññāsi. Tasmā na cakkhunā dassanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2222_5: ‘dassanaṃ’, ñāṇadassanameva ‘dassanaṃ’. Yathāha – “kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena
atk-abh01a0:2222_6: diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”ti. Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi,
atk-abh01a0:2222_7: ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto, ariyādhigatañca dhammaṃ anadhigacchanto,
atk-abh01a0:2222_8: ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā, ‘ariyānaṃ adassāvī’ti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2223: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti, ettha pana
atk-abh01a0:2226_0: Ayañhi saṃvaravinayo pahānavinayoti duvidho vinayo. Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko
atk-abh01a0:2226_1: vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati. Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro
atk-abh01a0:2226_2: khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho. Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgapahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2227: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
atk-abh01a0:2232_0: Ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro nāma. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro. “Uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2232_1: kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro. Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2232_2: saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato
atk-abh01a0:2232_3: vinayoti vuccati. Evaṃ tāva ‘saṃvaravinayo’ pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2233_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato, dīpālokeneva
atk-abh01a0:2233_1: tamassa, tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ, seyyathidaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2233_4: mamā’ti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-abh01a0:2233_5: vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā, bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena
atk-abh01a0:2233_7: upekkhāñāṇena anupekkhāya, anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa,
atk-abh01a0:2234_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato, ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe
atk-abh01a0:2234_1: sevālassa, tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ ‘vikkhambhanapahānaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2234_2: “Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne diṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2234_3: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2234_4: pahānaṃ, idaṃ ‘samucchedapahānaṃ’ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ kilesānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2234_6: nibbānaṃ, etaṃ ‘nissaraṇapahānaṃ’ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2234_7: vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā ‘pahānavinayo’ti vuccati. Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa
atk-abh01a0:2234_8: tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ pahānavinayoti vuccati. Evaṃ pahānavinayopi pañcadhā
atk-abh01a0:2235_0: Evamayaṃ saṅkhepato duvidho, bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo, bhinnasaṃvarattā, pahātabbassa
atk-abh01a0:2235_1: ca appahīnattā, yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi, tasmā abhāvato tassa,
atk-abh01a0:2235_2: ayaṃ ‘avinīto’ti vuccatīti. Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido
atk-abh01a0:2235_3: sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthāpi. Ninnānākaraṇañhetaṃ atthato. Yathāha – “yeva te
atk-abh01a0:2235_4: ariyā teva te sappurisā, yeva te sappurisā teva te ariyā. Yo eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo
atk-abh01a0:2235_5: so eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo, yo eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo so eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo.
atk-abh01a0:2235_6: Yeva te ariyavinayā teva te sappurisavinayā, yeva te sappurisavinayā teva te ariyavinayā.
atk-abh01a0:2235_7: Ariyeti vā sappuriseti vā, ariyadhammeti vā sappurisadhammeti vā, ariyavinayeti vā
atk-abh01a0:2235_8: sappurisavinayeti vā, esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2236_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati – ‘yaṃ rūpaṃ so
atk-abh01a0:2236_1: ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpa’nti rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ samanupassati. “Seyyathāpi nāma
atk-abh01a0:2236_2: telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2236_3: samanupassati,” evameva idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti
atk-abh01a0:2236_4: diṭṭhipassanāya passati. Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti ‘arūpaṃ attā’ti gahetvā, chāyāvantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2236_5: rukkhaṃ viya, taṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati. Attani vā rūpanti ‘arūpameva attā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2236_6: gahetvā, pupphamhi gandhaṃ viya, attani rūpaṃ samanupassati. Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti
atk-abh01a0:2236_7: ‘arūpameva attā’ti gahetvā, karaṇḍake maṇiṃ viya, attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-abh01a0:2237_0: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ. ‘Rūpavantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2237_1: vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ; vedanaṃ attato samanupassati… saññaṃ…
atk-abh01a0:2237_2: saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu ‘arūpaṃ attā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2237_3: kathitaṃ. Vedanāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā vedanaṃ, vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2237_4: catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpārūpamissako attā’ kathito.
atk-abh01a0:2237_5: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassati vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2237_6: imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā. Avasesesu sassatadiṭṭhi. Evamettha pannarasa
atk-abh01a0:2237_7: bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti. Tā sabbāpi maggāvaraṇā, na saggāvaraṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2238_0: 1008. Satthari kaṅkhatīti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā ubhayattha vā kaṅkhati. Sarīre
atk-abh01a0:2238_1: kaṅkhamāno ‘dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2238_3: atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati. Ubhayattha kaṅkhamāno ‘asītianubyañjanabyāmappabhānurañjitāya
atk-abh01a0:2238_5: ṭhito lokatārako buddho nāma atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati. Ayañhissa attabhāve
atk-abh01a0:2238_6: guṇe vā kaṅkhanato ubhayattha kaṅkhati nāma. Vicikicchatīti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ asakkonto
atk-abh01a0:2238_7: kicchati kilamati. Nādhimuccatīti tattheva adhimokkhaṃ na labhati. Na sampasīdatīti
atk-abh01a0:2238_8: cittaṃ anāvilaṃ katvā pasīdituṃ na sakkoti, guṇesu nappasīdati.
atk-abh01a0:2239_0: Dhamme kaṅkhatītiādīsu pana ‘kilese pajahantā cattāro ariyamaggā, paṭippassaddhakilesāni
atk-abh01a0:2239_1: cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ amataṃ mahānibbānaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:2239_2: atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi ‘ayaṃ dhammo niyyāniko nu kho aniyyāniko’ti kaṅkhantopi
atk-abh01a0:2239_3: dhamme kaṅkhati nāma. ‘Cattāro maggaṭṭhakā cattāro phalaṭṭhakāti idaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2239_4: atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi, ‘ayaṃ saṅgho suppaṭipanno nu kho duppaṭipanno’ti
atk-abh01a0:2239_5: kaṅkhantopi, ‘etasmiṃ saṅgharatane dinnassa vipākaphalaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi
atk-abh01a0:2239_6: saṅghe kaṅkhati nāma. ‘Tisso pana sikkhā atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi, ‘tisso
atk-abh01a0:2239_7: sikkhā sikkhitapaccayena ānisaṃso atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi sikkhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2240_0: Pubbanto vuccati atītāni khandhadhātāyatanāni. Aparanto anāgatāni. Tattha atītesu
atk-abh01a0:2240_1: khandhādīsu ‘atītāni nu kho, na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto pubbante kaṅkhati nāma. Anāgatesu
atk-abh01a0:2240_2: ‘anāgatāni nu kho, na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto aparante kaṅkhati nāma. Ubhayattha kaṅkhanto
atk-abh01a0:2240_3: pubbantāparante kaṅkhati nāma. ‘Dvādasapadikaṃ paccayavaṭṭaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2240_4: kaṅkhanto idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati nāma. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho
atk-abh01a0:2240_6: Idappaccayā eva vā ‘idappaccayatā’; jātiādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Jātiādīsu taṃ taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2240_7: paṭicca āgamma samuppannāti ‘paṭiccasamuppannā’. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – idappaccayatāya
atk-abh01a0:2241_0: 1009. Sīlenāti gosīlādinā. Vatenāti govatādināva. Sīlabbatenāti tadubhayena. Suddhīti
atk-abh01a0:2241_1: kilesasuddhi; paramatthasuddhibhūtaṃ vā nibbānameva. Tadekaṭṭhāti idha pahānekaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2241_2: dhuraṃ. Imissā ca pāḷiyā diṭṭhikileso vicikicchākilesoti dveyeva āgatā. Lobho doso
atk-abh01a0:2241_3: moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime pana aṭṭha anāgatā. Āharitvā
atk-abh01a0:2241_4: pana dīpetabbā. Ettha hi diṭṭhivicikicchāsu pahīyamānāsu apāyagamanīyo lobho doso
atk-abh01a0:2241_5: moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti sabbepime pahānekaṭṭhā hutvā pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_6: Sahajekaṭṭhaṃ pana āharitvā dīpetabbaṃ. Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhisahagatāni
atk-abh01a0:2241_7: vicikicchāsahagatañcāti pañca cittāni pahīyanti. Tattha dvīsu asaṅkhārikadiṭṭhicittesu
atk-abh01a0:2241_8: pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena
atk-abh01a0:2241_9: pahīyanti. Sesadiṭṭhikileso ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_10: Diṭṭhigatasampayuttasasaṅkhārikacittesupi pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho thinaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2241_11: uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti. Sesadiṭṭhikileso
atk-abh01a0:2241_12: ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti. Evaṃ pahānekaṭṭhasmiṃyeva sahajekaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2242_0: Taṃsampayuttoti tehi tadekaṭṭhehi aṭṭhahi kilesehi sampayutto. Vinibbhogaṃ vā katvā
atk-abh01a0:2242_1: tena lobhena tena dosenāti evaṃ ekekena sampayuttatā dīpetabbā. Tattha lobhe gahite,
atk-abh01a0:2242_2: moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe kilesagaṇo
atk-abh01a0:2242_3: lobhasampayutto nāma. Dose gahite, moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2242_4: kilesagaṇo dosasampayutto nāma. Mohe gahite, lobho doso māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2242_5: anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mohasampayutto nāma. Māne gahite, tena sahuppanno lobho
atk-abh01a0:2242_6: moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mānasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2242_7: Iminā upāyena tena thinena tena uddhaccena tena ahirikena tena anottappena sampayutto
atk-abh01a0:2242_8: taṃsampayuttoti yojanā kātabbā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānanti tena lobhena…pe… tena anottappena
atk-abh01a0:2243_0: Ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbāti ettha dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo; tena pahātabbāti
atk-abh01a0:2243_1: attho. ‘Kasmā pana sotāpattimaggo dassanaṃ nāma jāto’ti? ‘Paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato’.
atk-abh01a0:2243_2: ‘Nanu gotrabhu paṭhamataraṃ passatī’ti? ‘No na passati; disvāpi kattabbakiccaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:2243_3: na karoti, saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato. Tasmā passatī’ti na vattabbo. Yattha katthaci
atk-abh01a0:2243_4: rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā ‘ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2244_0: 1011. Avaseso lobhoti dassanena pahīnāvaseso. Lobho dosamohesupi eseva nayo. Dassanena
atk-abh01a0:2244_1: hi apāyagamanīyāva pahīnā. Tehi pana aññe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘Tadekaṭṭhā’ti tehi
atk-abh01a0:2244_2: pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi tīhi kilesehi sampayogatopi pahānatopi ekaṭṭhā pañca kilesā. Neva
atk-abh01a0:2244_3: dassanena na bhāvanāyāti idaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ viya tehi maggehi appahātabbataṃ sandhāya
atk-abh01a0:2244_4: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave
atk-abh01a0:2244_5: ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ, nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhantī”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:2244_6: nayena kusalādīnampi pahānaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ tesaṃ maggānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2244_7: te upanissayapaccayānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnāti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2245_0: 1013. Dassanenapahātabbahetukattike ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukāti niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-abh01a0:2245_1: puna ‘tīṇi saṃyojanānī’tiādi pahātabbe dassetvā, tadekaṭṭhabhāvena hetū ceva sahetuke
atk-abh01a0:2245_2: ca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘kiñcāpi dassanena pahātabbesu hetūsu lobhasahagato moho
atk-abh01a0:2245_3: lobhena sahetuko hoti, dosasahagato moho dosena, lobhadosā ca mohenāti pahātabbahetukapadepete
atk-abh01a0:2245_4: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, vicikicchāsahagato pana moho aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2245_5: hetuyeva, na sahetukoti tassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetū’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2246_0: 1018. Dutiyapade uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā bhāvanāya
atk-abh01a0:2246_1: pahātabbahetūti vuttaṃ. So hi attanā sampayuttadhamme sahetuke katvā piṭṭhivaṭṭako
atk-abh01a0:2246_2: jāto, vicikicchāsahagato viya aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukapadaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2246_3: na bhajati. Tatiyapade avasesā akusalāti puna akusalaggahaṇaṃ vicikicchuddhaccasahagatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2246_4: mohānaṃ saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ. Te hi sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukā nāma na honti.
atk-abh01a0:2247_0: 1029. Parittārammaṇattike ārabbhāti ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Sayañhi parittā vā hontu mahaggatā
atk-abh01a0:2247_1: vā, parittadhamme ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannā parittārammaṇā, mahaggate ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:2247_2: uppannā mahaggatārammaṇā, appamāṇe ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannā appamāṇārammaṇā. Te pana
atk-abh01a0:2248_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tesu hi ekasmimpi kamme kate taṃ paṭibāhitvā aññaṃ kammaṃ attano vipākassa
atk-abh01a0:2248_2: okāsaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Sineruppamāṇepi hi suvaṇṇathūpe katvā cakkavāḷamattaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:2248_3: ratanamayapākāraṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā taṃ pūretvā nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa
atk-abh01a0:2248_4: yāvajīvaṃ cattāro paccaye dadatopi taṃ kammaṃ etesaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭibāhetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2248_5: na sakkoti eva. Yā ca micchādiṭṭhi niyatāti ahetukavādaakiriyavādanatthikavādesu
atk-abh01a0:2248_6: aññatarā. Tañhi gahetvā ṭhitaṃ puggalaṃ buddhasatampi buddhasahassampi bodhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2249: 1038. Maggārammaṇattike ariyamaggaṃ ārabbhāti lokuttaramaggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Te pana parittāpi honti mahaggatāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2250_0: 1039. Maggahetukaniddese paṭhamanayena paccayaṭṭhena hetunā maggasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2250_1: sahetukabhāvo dassito. Dutiyanayena maggabhūtena sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena hetunā sesamaggaṅgānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2250_2: sahetukabhāvo dassito. Tatiyanayena magge uppannahetūhi sammādiṭṭhiyā sahetukabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2251_0: 1040. Adhipatiṃ karitvāti ārammaṇādhipatiṃ katvā. Te ca kho parittadhammāva honti.
atk-abh01a0:2251_1: Ariyasāvakānañhi attano maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipati labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:2251_2: Cetopariyañāṇena pana ariyasāvako parassa maggaṃ paccavekkhamāno garuṃ karontopi
atk-abh01a0:2251_3: attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ viya garuṃ na karoti. ‘Yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ tathāgataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2251_4: disvā tassa maggaṃ garuṃ karoti na karotī’ti? Karoti, na pana attano maggaṃ viya.
atk-abh01a0:2251_5: Arahā na kiñci dhammaṃ garuṃ karoti ṭhapetvā maggaṃ phalaṃ nibbānanti. Etthāpi ayamevattho.
atk-abh01a0:2251_6: Vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti idaṃ sahajātādhipatiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Chandañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:2251_7: maggaṃ bhāventassa chando adhipati nāma hoti, na maggo. Sesadhammāpi chandādhipatino
atk-abh01a0:2251_8: nāma honti, na maggādhipatino. Cittepi eseva nayo. Vīmaṃsaṃ pana jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:2251_9: maggaṃ bhāventassa vīmaṃsādhipati ceva hoti maggo cāti. Sesadhammā maggādhipatino
atk-abh01a0:2252_0: 1041. Uppannattikaniddese jātāti nibbattā, paṭiladdhattabhāvā. Bhūtātiādīni tesaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:2252_1: vevacanāni. Jātā eva hi bhāvappattiyā bhūtā. Paccayasaṃyoge jātattā sañjātā. Nibbattilakkhaṇappattattā
atk-abh01a0:2252_2: nibbattā. Upasaggena pana padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhinibbattāti vuttā. Pākaṭībhūtāti pātubhūtā.
atk-abh01a0:2252_3: Pubbantato uddhaṃ pannāti uppannā. Upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā samuppannāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2252_4: Nibbattaṭṭheneva uddhaṃ ṭhitāti uṭṭhitā. Paccayasaṃyoge uṭṭhitāti samuṭṭhitā. Puna
atk-abh01a0:2252_5: uppannātivacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Uppannaṃsena saṅgahitāti
atk-abh01a0:2252_6: uppannakoṭṭhāsena gaṇanaṃ gatā. Rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti idaṃ nesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2252_7: sabhāvadassanaṃ. Dutiyapadaniddeso vuttapaṭisedhanayena veditabbo. Tatiyapadaniddeso uttānatthoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2253_0: Ayaṃ pana tiko dvinnaṃ addhānaṃ vasena pūretvā dassito. Laddhokāsassa hi kammassa
atk-abh01a0:2253_1: vipāko duvidho – khaṇappatto, ca appatto ca. Tattha ‘khaṇappatto’ uppanno nāma. ‘Appatto’
atk-abh01a0:2253_2: cittānantare vā uppajjatu, kappasatasahassātikkame vā. Dhuvapaccayaṭṭhena natthi
atk-abh01a0:2253_3: nāma na hoti, uppādino dhammā nāma jāto. Yathā hi – “tiṭṭhateva sāyaṃ, poṭṭhapāda,
atk-abh01a0:2253_4: arūpī attā saññāmayo. Atha imassa purisassa aññā ca saññā uppajjanti aññā ca saññā
atk-abh01a0:2253_5: nirujjhantī”ti. Ettha āruppe kāmāvacarasaññāpavattikāle kiñcāpi mūlabhavaṅgasaññā
atk-abh01a0:2253_6: niruddhā kāmāvacarasaññāya pana niruddhakāle avassaṃ sā uppajjissatīti arūpasaṅkhāto
atk-abh01a0:2253_7: attā natthīti saṅkhyaṃ agantvā ‘tiṭṭhateva’ nāmāti jāto. Evameva laddhokāsassa kammassa
atk-abh01a0:2253_8: vipāko duvidho…pe… dhuvapaccayaṭṭhena natthi nāma na hoti, uppādino dhammā nāma jāto.
atk-abh01a0:2254_0: Yadi pana āyūhitaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ sabbaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya, aññassa okāso na bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:2254_1: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti – dhuvavipākaṃ, adhuvavipākañca. Tattha pañca ānantariyakammāni,
atk-abh01a0:2254_2: aṭṭha samāpattiyo, cattāro ariyamaggāti etaṃ ‘dhuvavipākaṃ’ nāma. Taṃ pana khaṇappattampi
atk-abh01a0:2254_3: atthi, appattampi. Tattha ‘khaṇappattaṃ’ uppannaṃ nāma. ‘Appattaṃ’ anuppannaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2254_4: Tassa vipāko cittānantare vā uppajjatu kappasatasahassātikkame vā. Dhuvapaccayaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2254_5: anuppannaṃ nāma na hoti, uppādino dhammā nāma jātaṃ. Metteyyabodhisattassa maggo
atk-abh01a0:2254_6: anuppanno nāma, phalaṃ uppādino dhammāyeva nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2255_0: 1044. Atītattikaniddese atītāti khaṇattayaṃ atikkantā. Niruddhāti nirodhappattā.
atk-abh01a0:2255_1: Vigatāti vibhavaṃ gatā, vigacchitā vā. Vipariṇatāti pakativijahanena vipariṇāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2255_2: gatā. Nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gatāti atthaṅgatā. Abbhatthaṅgatāti upasaggena padaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2255_3: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Uppajjitvā vigatāti nibbattitvā vigacchitā. Puna atītavacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:2255_4: vuttameva. Parato anāgatādīsupi eseva nayo. Atītaṃsena saṅgahitāti atītakoṭṭhāsena
atk-abh01a0:2255_5: gaṇanaṃ gatā. Katame teti? Rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. Parato anāgatādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2256: 1047. Atītārammaṇattikaniddese atīte dhamme ārabbhātiādīsu parittamahaggatāva dhammā veditabbā. Te hi atītādīni ārabbha uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2257_0: 1050. Ajjhattattikaniddese tesaṃ tesanti padadvayena sabbasatte pariyādiyati. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2257_1: paccattanti ubhayaṃ niyakajjhattādhivacanaṃ. Niyatāti attani jātā. Pāṭipuggalikāti
atk-abh01a0:2257_2: pāṭiyekkassa pāṭiyekkassa puggalassa santakā. Upādiṇṇāti sarīraṭṭhakā. Te hi kammanibbattā
atk-abh01a0:2257_3: vā hontu mā vā, ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena pana idha upādiṇṇāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2258: 1051. Parasattānanti attānaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva. Tadubhayanti taṃ ubhayaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2259_0: 1053. Ajjhattārammaṇattikassa paṭhamapade parittamahaggatā dhammā veditabbā. Dutiye
atk-abh01a0:2259_1: appamāṇāpi. Tatiye parittamahaggatāva. Appamāṇā pana kālena bahiddhā kālena ajjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2261_0: 1062. Dukesu adosaniddese mettāyanavasena metti. Mettākāro mettāyanā. Mettāya ayitassa
atk-abh01a0:2261_1: mettāsamaṅgino cittassa bhāvo mettāyitattaṃ. Anudayatīti anuddā, rakkhatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2261_2: Anuddākāro anuddāyanā. Anuddāyitassa bhāvo anuddāyitattaṃ. Hitassa esanavasena hitesitā.
atk-abh01a0:2261_3: Anukampanavasena anukampā. Sabbehipi imehi padehi upacārappanāppattā mettāva vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2262_0: 1063. Amohaniddese dukkhe ñāṇanti dukkhasacce paññā. Dukkhasamudayetiādīsupi eseva
atk-abh01a0:2262_1: nayo. Ettha ca dukkhe ñāṇaṃ savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇāsu vattati. Tathā
atk-abh01a0:2262_2: dukkhasamudaye. Nirodhe pana savanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇāsu eva. Tathā paṭipadāya.
atk-abh01a0:2262_3: Pubbanteti atītakoṭṭhāse. Aparanteti anāgatakoṭṭhāse. Pubbantāparanteti tadubhaye.
atk-abh01a0:2262_4: Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ñāṇanti ayaṃ paccayo, idaṃ paccayuppannaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2262_5: idaṃ paṭicca idaṃ nibbattanti, evaṃ paccayesu ca paccayuppannadhammesu ca ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2263_0: 1065. Lobhaniddesepi heṭṭhā anāgatānaṃ padānaṃ ayamattho – rañjanavasena rāgo. Balavarañjanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2263_1: sārāgo. Visayesu sattānaṃ anunayanato anunayo. Anurujjhatīti anurodho, kāmetīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2263_2: Yattha katthaci bhave sattā etāya nandanti, sayaṃ vā nandatīti nandī. Nandī ca sā
atk-abh01a0:2263_3: rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo cāti nandīrāgo. Tattha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe sakiṃ uppannā taṇhā ‘nandī’.
atk-abh01a0:2263_4: Punappunaṃ uppajjamānā ‘nandīrāgo’ti vuccati. Cittassa sārāgoti yo heṭṭhā balavarañjanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2263_5: sārāgoti vutto, so na sattassa, cittasseva sārāgoti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2264_0: Icchanti etāya ārammaṇānīti icchā. Bahalakilesabhāvena mucchanti etāya pāṇinoti mucchā.
atk-abh01a0:2264_1: Gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇavasena ajjhosānaṃ. Iminā sattā gijjhanti, gedhaṃ āpajjantīti
atk-abh01a0:2264_2: gedho; bahalaṭṭhena vā gedho. “Gedhaṃ vā pavanasaṇḍa”nti hi bahalaṭṭheneva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2264_3: Anantarapadaṃ upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena vā gedhoti paligedho. Sañjanti
atk-abh01a0:2264_4: etenāti saṅgo; lagganaṭṭhena vā saṅgo. Osīdanaṭṭhena paṅko. Ākaḍḍhanavasena ejā.
atk-abh01a0:2264_5: “Ejā imaṃ purisaṃ parikaḍḍhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2264_6: Vañcanaṭṭhena māyā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ sattānaṃ jananaṭṭhena janikā. “Taṇhā janeti purisaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2264_7: cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Vaṭṭasmiṃ satte dukkhena saṃyojayamānā janetīti
atk-abh01a0:2264_8: sañjananī. Ghaṭanaṭṭhena sibbinī. Ayañhi vaṭṭasmiṃ satte cutipaṭisandhivasena sibbati
atk-abh01a0:2264_9: ghaṭeti, tunnakāro viya pilotikāya pilotikaṃ; tasmā ghaṭanaṭṭhena sibbinīti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2264_10: Anekappakāraṃ visayajālaṃ taṇhāvipphanditanivesasaṅkhātaṃ vā jālamassā atthīti jālinī.
atk-abh01a0:2265_0: Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena sīghasotā saritā viyāti saritā. Allaṭṭhena vā saritā. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2265_1: – “saritāni sinehitāni ca somanassāni bhavanti jantuno”ti. Allāni ceva siniddhāni
atk-abh01a0:2265_2: cāti ayañhettha attho. Visatāti visattikā. Visaṭāti visattikā. Visālāti visattikā.
atk-abh01a0:2265_3: Visakkatīti visattikā. Visaṃvādikāti visattikā. Visaṃharatīti visattikā. Visamūlāti
atk-abh01a0:2265_4: visattikā. Visaphalāti visattikā. Visaparibhogāti visattikā. Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā
atk-abh01a0:2265_5: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe vitthatāti visattikā. Anayabyasanapāpanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2265_6: kummānubandhasuttakaṃ viyāti suttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “suttakanti kho, bhikkhave, nandīrāgassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2265_7: adhivacana”nti. Rūpādīsu vitthataṭṭhena visaṭā. Tassa tassa paṭilābhatthāya satte
atk-abh01a0:2265_8: āyūhāpetīti āyūhinī. Ukkaṇṭhituṃ appadānato sahāyaṭṭhena dutiyā. Ayañhi sattānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2265_9: vaṭṭasmiṃ ukkaṇṭhituṃ na deti, gatagataṭṭhāne piyasahāyo viya abhiramāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2268_0: Paṇidhānakavasena paṇidhi. Bhavanettīti bhavarajju. Etāya hi sattā, rajjuyā gīvāya
atk-abh01a0:2268_1: baddhā goṇā viya, icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ niyyanti. Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vanati bhajati
atk-abh01a0:2268_2: allīyatīti vanaṃ. Vanati yācatīti vā vanaṃ. Vanathoti byañjanena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2268_3: Anatthadukkhānaṃ vā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena gahanaṭṭhena ca vanaṃ viyāti ‘vanaṃ’; balavataṇhāyetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2268_4: nāmaṃ. Gahanataraṭṭhena pana tato balavataro ‘vanatho’ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2269: “Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:2270: Chetvā vanañca vanathañca, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:2271_0: Santhavanavasena santhavo; saṃsaggoti attho. So duvidho – taṇhāsanthavo mittasanthavo
atk-abh01a0:2271_1: ca. Tesu idha taṇhāsanthavo adhippeto. Sinehavasena sineho. Ālayakaraṇavasena apekkhatīti
atk-abh01a0:2271_2: apekkhā. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “imāni te deva caturāsītinagarasahassāni kusāvatīrājadhānīpamukhāni.
atk-abh01a0:2271_3: Ettha deva chandaṃ janehi, jīvite apekkhaṃ karohī”ti. Ālayaṃ karohīti ayañhettha
atk-abh01a0:2271_4: attho. Pāṭiyekke pāṭiyekke ārammaṇe bandhatīti paṭibandhu. Ñātakaṭṭhena vā pāṭiyekko
atk-abh01a0:2271_5: bandhūtipi paṭibandhu. Niccasannissitaṭṭhena hi sattānaṃ taṇhāsamo bandhu nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2272_0: Ārammaṇānaṃ asanato āsā. Ajjhottharaṇato ceva tittiṃ anupagantvāva paribhuñjanato
atk-abh01a0:2272_1: cāti attho. Āsisanavasena āsisanā. Āsisitassa bhāvo āsisitattaṃ. Idāni tassā pavattiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2272_2: dassetuṃ rūpāsātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āsisanavasena āsāti āsāya atthaṃ gahetvā rūpe
atk-abh01a0:2272_3: āsā rūpāsāti evaṃ navapi padāni veditabbāni. Ettha ca purimāni pañca pañcakāmaguṇavasena
atk-abh01a0:2272_4: vuttāni. Parikkhāralobhavasena chaṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ visesato pabbajitānaṃ. Tato parāni tīṇi
atk-abh01a0:2272_5: atittiyavatthuvasena gahaṭṭhānaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ dhanaputtajīvitehi aññaṃ piyataraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2272_6: atthi. ‘Etaṃ mayhaṃ etaṃ mayha’nti vā ‘asukena me idaṃ dinnaṃ idaṃ dinna’nti vā evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2272_7: satte jappāpetīti jappā. Parato dve padāni upasaggena vaḍḍhitāni. Tato paraṃ aññenākārena
atk-abh01a0:2272_8: vibhajituṃ āraddhattā puna jappāti vuttaṃ. Jappanākāro jappanā. Jappitassa bhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2272_9: jappitattaṃ. Punappunaṃ visaye lumpati ākaḍḍhatīti lolupo. Lolupassa bhāvo loluppaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2273_0: Pucchañjikatāti yāya taṇhāya lābhaṭṭhānesu, pucchaṃ cālayamānā sunakhā viya, kampamānā
atk-abh01a0:2273_1: vicaranti, taṃ tassā kampanataṇhāya nāmaṃ. Sādhu manāpamanāpe visaye kāmetīti sādhukāmo.
atk-abh01a0:2273_2: Tassa bhāvo sādhukamyatā. Mātā mātucchātiādike ayuttaṭṭhāne rāgoti adhammarāgo. Yuttaṭṭhānepi
atk-abh01a0:2273_3: balavā hutvā uppannalobho visamalobho. “Rāgo visama”ntiādivacanato vā yuttaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2273_4: vā ayuttaṭṭhāne vā uppanno chandarāgo adhammaṭṭhena ‘adhammarāgo’, visamaṭṭhena ‘visamalobho’ti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2274_0: Ārammaṇānaṃ nikāmanavasena nikanti. Nikāmanākāro nikāmanā. Patthanāvasena patthanā.
atk-abh01a0:2274_1: Pihāyanavasena pihanā. Suṭṭhu patthanā sampatthanā. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu taṇhā kāmataṇhā.
atk-abh01a0:2274_2: Rūpārūpabhave taṇhā bhavataṇhā. Ucchedasaṅkhāte vibhave taṇhā vibhavataṇhā. Suddhe
atk-abh01a0:2274_3: rūpabhavasmiṃyeva taṇhā rūpataṇhā. Arūpabhave taṇhā arūpataṇhā. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato
atk-abh01a0:2274_4: rāgo diṭṭhirāgo. Nirodhe taṇhā nirodhataṇhā. Rūpe taṇhā rūpataṇhā. Sadde taṇhā saddataṇhā.
atk-abh01a0:2275_0: Kusaladhamme āvaratīti āvaraṇaṃ. Chādanavasena chādanaṃ. Satte vaṭṭasmiṃ bandhatīti
atk-abh01a0:2275_1: bandhanaṃ. Cittaṃ upagantvā kilissati saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ karotīti upakkileso. Thāmagataṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2275_2: anusetīti anusayo. Uppajjamānā cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhātīti pariyuṭṭhānaṃ; uppajjituṃ appadānena
atk-abh01a0:2275_3: kusalacāraṃ gaṇhātīti attho. “Corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsu dhuttā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsū”tiādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2275_4: hi maggaṃ gaṇhiṃsūti attho. Evamidhāpi gahaṇaṭṭhena pariyuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paliveṭhanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2275_5: latā viyāti latā. “Latā ubbhijja tiṭṭhatī”ti āgataṭṭhānepi ayaṃ taṇhā latāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2275_6: Vividhāni vatthūni icchatīti vevicchaṃ. Vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlanti dukkhamūlaṃ. Tasseva
atk-abh01a0:2275_7: dukkhassa nidānanti dukkhanidānaṃ. Taṃ dukkhaṃ ito pabhavatīti dukkhappabhavo. Bandhanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2275_8: pāso viyāti pāso. Mārassa pāso mārapāso. Duruggilanaṭṭhena baḷisaṃ viyāti baḷisaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2275_9: Mārassa baḷisaṃ mārabaḷisaṃ. Taṇhābhibhūtā mārassa visayaṃ nātikkamanti, tesaṃ upari
atk-abh01a0:2275_10: māro vasaṃ vattetīti iminā pariyāyena mārassa visayoti māravisayo. Sandanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2275_11: taṇhāva nadī taṇhānadī. Ajjhottharaṇaṭṭhena taṇhāva jālaṃ taṇhājālaṃ. Yathā sunakhā
atk-abh01a0:2275_12: gaddulabaddhā yadicchakaṃ nīyanti, evaṃ taṇhābaddhā sattāpīti daḷhabandhanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2275_13: gaddulaṃ viyāti gaddulaṃ. Taṇhāva gaddulaṃ taṇhāgaddulaṃ. Duppūraṇaṭṭhena taṇhāva
atk-abh01a0:2276_0: 1066. Dosaniddese anatthaṃ me acarīti avuḍḍhiṃ me akāsi. Iminā upāyena sabbapadesu
atk-abh01a0:2276_1: attho veditabbo. Aṭṭhāne vā pana āghātoti akāraṇe kopo – ekacco hi ‘devo ativassatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2276_2: kuppati, ‘na vassatī’ti kuppati, ‘sūriyo tappatī’ti kuppati, ‘na tappatī’ti kuppati,
atk-abh01a0:2276_3: vāte vāyantepi kuppati, avāyantepi kuppati, sammajjituṃ asakkonto bodhipaṇṇānaṃ kuppati,
atk-abh01a0:2276_4: cīvaraṃ pārupituṃ asakkonto vātassa kuppati, upakkhalitvā khāṇukassa kuppati idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2276_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ – aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto jāyatīti. Tattha heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte
atk-abh01a0:2276_6: ārabbha uppannattā kammapathabhedo hoti. Aṭṭhānāghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2276_7: na karoti. Cittaṃ āghātento uppannoti cittassa āghāto. Tato balavataro paṭighāto.
atk-abh01a0:2276_8: Paṭihaññanavasena paṭighaṃ. Paṭivirujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Kuppanavasena kopo. Pakopo
atk-abh01a0:2276_9: sampakopoti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dussanavasena doso. Padoso sampadosoti upasaggena
atk-abh01a0:2276_10: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Cittassa byāpattīti cittassa vipannatā, viparivattanākāro. Manaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2276_11: padūsayamāno uppajjatīti manopadoso. Kujjhanavasena kodho. Kujjhanākāro kujjhanā.
atk-abh01a0:2277_0: Idāni akusalaniddese vuttanayaṃ dassetuṃ doso dussanātiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā “yo evarūpo
atk-abh01a0:2277_1: cittassa āghāto…pe… kujjhitatta”nti ca idha vutto, “doso dussanā”tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:2277_2: vutto, ayaṃ vuccati dosoti. Evamettha yojanā kātabbā. Evañhi sati punaruttidoso paṭisedhito
atk-abh01a0:2277_3: hoti. Mohaniddeso amohaniddese vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Sabbākārena panesa
atk-abh01a0:2278_0: 1079. Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sahetukāti tehi hetudhammehi ye aññe hetudhammā vā
atk-abh01a0:2278_1: nahetudhammā vā te sahetukā. Ahetukapadepi eseva nayo. Ettha ca hetu hetuyeva ca
atk-abh01a0:2278_2: hoti, tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā ekato uppattiyaṃ sahetuko ca. Vicikicchuddhaccasahagato
atk-abh01a0:2278_3: pana moho hetu ahetuko. Hetusampayuttadukaniddesepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2279_0: 1091. Saṅkhatadukaniddese purimaduke vuttaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sandhāya yo eva so dhammoti
atk-abh01a0:2279_1: ekavacananiddeso kato. Purimaduke pana bahuvacanavasena pucchāya uddhaṭattā ime dhammā
atk-abh01a0:2279_2: appaccayāti pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ. Ime dhammā sanidassanātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2280_0: 1101. Kenaci viññeyyadukaniddese cakkhuviññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇena vijānitabbā. Sesapadesupi
atk-abh01a0:2280_1: eseva nayo. Ettha ca kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:2280_2: vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā. Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:2280_3: vā na vijānitabbā. ‘Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī’ti heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:2280_4: vuttattā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā’ti ayaṃ duko na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2280_5: Rūpaṃ pana cakkhuviññeyyaṃ saddo na cakkhuviññeyyoti imamatthaṃ gahetvā ‘ye te dhammā
atk-abh01a0:2280_6: cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā, ye vā pana te dhammā sotaviññeyyā na te
atk-abh01a0:2280_7: dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā’ti ayameko dukoti veditabbo. Evaṃ ekekaindriyamūlake cattāro
atk-abh01a0:2280_8: cattāro katvā vīsati dukā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_0: Kiṃ pana ‘manoviññāṇena kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā’ natthi? Tenettha dukā
atk-abh01a0:2281_1: na vuttāti? No natthi, vavatthānābhāvato pana na vuttā. Na hi, yathā cakkhuviññāṇena
atk-abh01a0:2281_2: aviññeyyā evāti vavatthānaṃ atthi, evaṃ manoviññāṇenāpīti vavatthānābhāvato ettha
atk-abh01a0:2281_3: dukā na vuttā. Manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyā ceva aviññeyyā cāti ayamattho atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2281_4: Tasmā so avuttopi yathālābhavasena veditabbo. Manoviññāṇanti hi saṅkhyaṃ gatehi kāmāvacaradhammehi
atk-abh01a0:2281_5: kāmāvacaradhammā eva tāva kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Tehiyeva rūpāvacarādidhammāpi
atk-abh01a0:2281_6: kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Rūpāvacarehipi kāmāvacarā kehici viññeyyā kehici
atk-abh01a0:2281_7: aviññeyyā. Teheva rūpāvacarādayopi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Arūpāvacarehi
atk-abh01a0:2281_8: pana kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā apariyāpannā ca neva viññeyyā. Arūpāvacarā pana kehici
atk-abh01a0:2281_9: viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Tepi ca kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyā. Apariyāpannehi
atk-abh01a0:2281_10: kāmāvacarādayo neva viññeyyā. Apariyāpannā pana nibbānena aviññeyyattā kehici viññeyyā
atk-abh01a0:2281_11: kehici aviññeyyā. Tepi ca maggaphalānaṃ aviññeyyattā kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyāti.
atk-abh01a0:2282_0: 1102. Āsavaniddese pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmāsavo nāma. Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo
atk-abh01a0:2282_1: jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahajāto rāgo bhavavasena patthanā bhavāsavo nāma. Dvāsaṭṭhi
atk-abh01a0:2282_2: diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhāsavo nāma. Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo nāma. Tattha tattha
atk-abh01a0:2282_3: āgatesu pana āsavesu asammohatthaṃ ekavidhādibhedo veditabbo. Atthato hete cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2282_4: āsavāti evaṃ ekavidhāva honti. Vinaye pana “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya
atk-abh01a0:2282_5: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti duvidhena āgatā. Suttante saḷāyatane tāva
atk-abh01a0:2282_6: “tayome, āvuso, āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti tividhena āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāye
atk-abh01a0:2282_7: “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigamanīyā, atthi
atk-abh01a0:2282_8: āsavā pettivisayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagamanīyā, atthi āsavā devalokagamanīyā”ti
atk-abh01a0:2282_9: pañcavidhena āgatā. Chakkanipāte āhuneyyasutte – “atthi āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā,
atk-abh01a0:2282_10: atthi āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā parivajjanā
atk-abh01a0:2282_11: pahātabbā, atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā”ti chabbidhena
atk-abh01a0:2282_12: āgatā. Sabbāsavapariyāye ‘dassanapahātabbehi’ saddhiṃ sattavidhena āgatā. Idha panete
atk-abh01a0:2282_13: kāmāsavādibhedato catubbidhena āgatā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāte
atk-abh01a0:2282_14: kāme āsavo ‘kāmāsavo’. Rūpārūpasaṅkhāte kammato ca upapattito ca duvidhepi bhave
atk-abh01a0:2282_15: āsavo ‘bhavāsavo’. Diṭṭhi eva āsavo ‘diṭṭhāsavo’. Avijjāva āsavo ‘avijjāsavo’.
atk-abh01a0:2283_0: 1103. Kāmesūti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. Kāmacchandoti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando,
atk-abh01a0:2283_1: na dhammacchando. Kāmanavasena rajjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo kāmarāgo. Kāmanavasena
atk-abh01a0:2283_2: nandanavasena ca kāmova nandīti kāmanandī. Evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā taṇhāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2283_3: kāmataṇhā, sinehanaṭṭhena kāmasineho, pariḍayhanaṭṭhena kāmapariḷāho, mucchanaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2283_4: kāmamucchā, gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena kāmajjhosānanti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
atk-abh01a0:2283_5: ayaṃ aṭṭhahi padehi vibhatto kāmāsavo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2284: 1104. Bhavesu bhavachandoti rūpārūpabhavesu bhavapatthanāvaseneva pavatto chando ‘bhavachando’. Sesapadānipi imināva nayena veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:2285_0: 1105. Sassato lokoti vātiādīhi dasahākārehi diṭṭhippabhedova vutto. Tattha sassato
atk-abh01a0:2285_1: lokoti ettha khandhapañcakaṃ lokoti gahetvā ‘ayaṃ loko nicco dhuvo sabbakāliko’ti
atk-abh01a0:2285_2: gaṇhantassa ‘sassata’nti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Asassatoti tameva lokaṃ ‘ucchijjati
atk-abh01a0:2285_3: vinassatī’ti gaṇhantassa ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Antavāti parittakasiṇalābhino
atk-abh01a0:2285_4: ‘suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā’ kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme
atk-abh01a0:2285_5: lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena ca ‘antavā’ti gaṇhantassa ‘antavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā
atk-abh01a0:2285_6: diṭṭhi. Sā sassatadiṭṭhipi hoti ucchedadiṭṭhipi. Vipulakasiṇalābhino pana tasmiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2285_7: kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena
atk-abh01a0:2285_8: ca ‘ananto’ti gaṇhantassa ‘anantavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Sā sassatadiṭṭhipi
atk-abh01a0:2286_0: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti bhedanadhammassa sarīrasseva ‘jīva’nti gahitattā sarīre ucchijjamāne
atk-abh01a0:2286_1: ‘jīvampi ucchijjatī’ti ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Dutiyapade sarīrato aññassa
atk-abh01a0:2286_2: jīvassa gahitattā sarīre ucchijjamānepi ‘jīvaṃ na ucchijjatī’ti sassatagahaṇākārappavattā
atk-abh01a0:2286_3: diṭṭhi. Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātiādīsu satto tathāgato nāma. So paraṃ maraṇā
atk-abh01a0:2286_4: hotīti gaṇhato paṭhamā sassatadiṭṭhi. Na hotīti gaṇhato dutiyā ucchedadiṭṭhi. Hoti
atk-abh01a0:2286_5: ca na ca hotīti gaṇhato tatiyā ekaccasassatadiṭṭhi. Neva hoti na nahotīti gaṇhato
atk-abh01a0:2286_6: catutthā amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhi. Ime dhammā āsavāti ime kāmāsavañca bhavāsavañca rāgavasena
atk-abh01a0:2286_7: ekato katvā, saṅkhepato tayo, vitthārato cattāro dhammā āsavā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2287_0: Yo pana brahmānaṃ vimānakapparukkhaābharaṇesu chandarāgo uppajjati, so kāmāsavo hoti
atk-abh01a0:2287_1: na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Pañcakāmaguṇikassa rāgassa idheva pahīnattā. Hetugocchakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2287_2: pana patvā lobho hetu nāma hoti. Ganthagocchakaṃ patvā abhijjhākāyagantho nāma. Kilesagocchakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2287_3: patvā lobho kileso nāma hoti. Diṭṭhisahajāto pana rāgo kāmāsavo hoti na hotīti? Na
atk-abh01a0:2287_4: hoti; diṭṭhirāgo nāma hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “diṭṭhirāgaratte purisapuggale dinnadānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2288_0: Ime pana āsave kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati, maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:2288_1: kāmāsavo anāgāmimaggena pahīyati, bhavāsavo arahattamaggena, diṭṭhāsavo sotāpattimaggena,
atk-abh01a0:2288_2: avijjāsavo arahattamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhāsavo pahīyati,
atk-abh01a0:2288_3: anāgāmimaggena kāmāsavo, arahattamaggena bhavāsavo avijjāsavo cāti.
atk-abh01a0:2289_0: 1121. Saṃyojanesu mānaniddese seyyohamasmīti mānoti uttamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ seyyo’ti evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2289_1: uppannamāno. Sadisohamasmīti mānoti samasamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ sadiso’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
atk-abh01a0:2289_2: Hīnohamasmīti mānoti lāmakaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ hīno’ti evaṃ uppannamāno. Evaṃ seyyamāno
atk-abh01a0:2289_3: sadisamāno hīnamānoti ime tayo mānā tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ uppajjanti. Seyyassāpi hi ‘ahaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2289_4: seyyo sadiso hīno’ti tayo mānā uppajjanti. Sadisassāpi, hīnassāpi. Tattha seyyassa
atk-abh01a0:2289_5: seyyamānova yāthāvamāno, itare dve ayāthāvamānā. Sadisassa sadisamānova…pe… hīnassa
atk-abh01a0:2289_6: hīnamānova yāthāvamāno, itare dve ayāthāvamānā. Iminā kiṃ kathitaṃ? Ekassa tayo mānā
atk-abh01a0:2289_7: uppajjantīti kathitaṃ. Khuddakavatthuke pana paṭhamakamānabhājanīye eko māno tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2290_0: Mānakaraṇavasena māno. Maññanā maññitattanti ākārabhāvaniddesā. Ussitaṭṭhena unnati.
atk-abh01a0:2290_1: Yassuppajjati taṃ puggalaṃ unnāmeti, ukkhipitvā ṭhapetīti unnamo. Samussitaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:2290_2: dhajo. Ukkhipanaṭṭhena cittaṃ sampaggaṇhātīti sampaggāho. Ketu vuccati bahūsu dhajesu
atk-abh01a0:2290_3: accuggatadhajo. Mānopi punappunaṃ uppajjamāno aparāpare upādāya accuggataṭṭhena ketu
atk-abh01a0:2290_4: viyāti ‘ketu’. Ketuṃ icchatīti ketukamyaṃ, tassa bhāvo ketukamyatā. Sā pana cittassa,
atk-abh01a0:2290_5: na attano. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘ketukamyatā cittassā’ti. Mānasampayuttañhi cittaṃ ketuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2290_6: icchati. Tassa ca bhāvo ketukamyatā; ketusaṅkhāto mānoti.
atk-abh01a0:2291_1: paresaṃ lābhādīsu ‘kiṃ iminā imesa’nti parasampattikhiyyanalakkhaṇā issā. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2291_2: lābhoti cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābho. Issukī hi puggalo parassa taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2291_3: lābhaṃ khiyyati, ‘kiṃ imassa iminā’ti na icchati. Sakkāroti tesaṃyeva paccayānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2291_4: sukatānaṃ sundarānaṃ paṭilābho. Garukāroti garukiriyā, bhāriyakaraṇaṃ. Mānananti
atk-abh01a0:2291_5: manena piyakaraṇaṃ. Vandananti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandanaṃ. Pūjanāti gandhamālādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2291_6: pūjanā. Issāyanavasena issā. Issākāro issāyanā. Issāyitabhāvo issāyitattaṃ. Usūyādīni issādivevacanāni.
atk-abh01a0:2292_0: Imissā pana issāya khiyyanalakkhaṇaṃ āgārikenāpi anāgārikenāpi dīpetabbaṃ. Āgāriko
atk-abh01a0:2292_1: hi ekacco kasivaṇijjādīsu aññatarena ājīvena attano purisakāraṃ nissāya bhaddakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2292_2: yānaṃ vā vāhanaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā labhati. Aparo tassa alābhatthiko tena lābhena na
atk-abh01a0:2292_3: tussati. ‘Kadā nu kho esa imāya sampattiyā parihāyitvā kapaṇo hutvā carissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2292_4: cintetvā ekena kāraṇena tasmiṃ tāya sampattiyā parihīne attamano hoti. Anāgārikopi
atk-abh01a0:2292_5: eko issāmanako aññaṃ attano sutapariyattiādīni nissāya uppannalābhādisampattiṃ disvā
atk-abh01a0:2292_6: ‘kadā nu kho eso imehi lābhādīhi parihāyissatī’ti cintetvā, yadā taṃ ekena kāraṇena
atk-abh01a0:2292_7: parihīnaṃ passati, tadā attamano hoti. Evaṃ parasampattikhiyyanalakkhaṇā ‘issā’ti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2293: 1127. Macchariyaniddese vatthuto macchariyadassanatthaṃ ‘pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariya’ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āvāse macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2294_0: Āvāso nāma sakalārāmopi pariveṇampi ekovarakopi rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīnipi. Tesu
atk-abh01a0:2294_1: vasantā sukhaṃ vasanti paccaye labhanti. Eko bhikkhu vattasampannasseva pesalassa
atk-abh01a0:2294_2: bhikkhuno tattha āgamanaṃ na icchati. Āgatopi ‘khippaṃ gacchatū’ti cinteti. Idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2294_3: ‘āvāsamacchariyaṃ’ nāma. Bhaṇḍanakārakādīnaṃ pana tattha vāsaṃ anicchato āvāsamacchariyaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2295_0: Kulanti upaṭṭhākakulampi ñātikulampi. Tattha aññassa upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato kulamacchariyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2295_1: hoti. Pāpapuggalassa pana upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchantopi maccharī nāma na hoti. So hi
atk-abh01a0:2295_2: tesaṃ pasādabhedāya paṭipajjati. Pasādaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthasseva pana bhikkhuno tattha
atk-abh01a0:2296_0: Lābhoti catupaccayalābhova. Taṃ aññasmiṃ sīlavanteyeva labhante ‘mā labhatū’ti cintentassa
atk-abh01a0:2296_1: lābhamacchariyaṃ hoti. Yo pana saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, aparibhogadupparibhogādivasena
atk-abh01a0:2296_2: vināseti, pūtibhāvaṃ gacchantampi aññassa na deti, taṃ disvā ‘sace imaṃ esa na labheyya,
atk-abh01a0:2296_3: añño sīlavā labheyya, paribhogaṃ gaccheyyā’ti cintentassa macchariyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2297_0: Vaṇṇo nāma sarīravaṇṇopi guṇavaṇṇopi. Tattha sarīravaṇṇe maccharipuggalo ‘paro pāsādiko
atk-abh01a0:2297_1: rūpavā’ti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo hoti. Guṇavaṇṇamaccharī sīlena dhutaṅgena paṭipadāya
atk-abh01a0:2298_0: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo ca paṭivedhadhammo ca. Tattha ariyasāvakā paṭivedhadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2298_1: na maccharāyanti, attanā paṭividdhadhamme sadevakassa lokassa paṭivedhaṃ icchanti.
atk-abh01a0:2298_2: Taṃ pana paṭivedhaṃ ‘pare jānantū’ti icchanti. Tantidhammeyeva pana dhammamacchariyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2298_3: nāma hoti. Tena samannāgato puggalo yaṃ guḷhaṃ ganthaṃ vā kathāmaggaṃ vā jānāti taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2298_4: aññaṃ na jānāpetukāmo hoti. Yo pana puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena, dhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2298_5: vā upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti, ayaṃ dhammamaccharī nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2299_0: Tattha ekacco puggalo lolo hoti, kālena samaṇo hoti, kālena brāhmaṇo, kālena nigaṇṭho.
atk-abh01a0:2299_1: Yo hi bhikkhu ‘ayaṃ puggalo paveṇiāgataṃ tantiṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ bhinditvā
atk-abh01a0:2299_2: āluḷissatī’ti na deti, ayaṃ puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2299_3: Yo pana ‘ayaṃ dhammo saṇho sukhumo, sacāyaṃ puggalo gaṇhissati aññaṃ byākaritvā attānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2299_4: āvikatvā nassissatī’ti na deti, ayaṃ dhammaṃ upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti
atk-abh01a0:2299_5: nāma. Yo pana ‘sacāyaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ gaṇhissati, amhākaṃ samayaṃ bhindituṃ samattho
atk-abh01a0:2299_6: bhavissatī’ti na deti, ayaṃ dhammamaccharī nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2300_0: Imesu pañcasu macchariyesu āvāsamacchariyena tāva yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva
atk-abh01a0:2300_1: āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā vicarati. Kulamacchariyena tasmiṃ kule aññesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2300_2: dānamānanādīni karonte disvā ‘bhinnaṃ vatidaṃ kulaṃ mamā’ti cintayato lohitampi mukhato
atk-abh01a0:2300_3: uggacchati, kucchivirecanampi hoti, antānipi khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni hutvā nikkhamanti. Lābhamacchariyena
atk-abh01a0:2300_4: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā santake lābhe maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogaṃ viya paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh01a0:2300_5: yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati. Sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇamaccharena
atk-abh01a0:2300_6: pariyattidhammamacchariyena ca attanova vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti, paresaṃ vaṇṇe ‘kiṃ vaṇṇo
atk-abh01a0:2300_7: eso’ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattidhammañca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgo ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2301_0: Apica āvāsamacchariyena lohagehe paccati. Kulamacchariyena appalābho hoti. Lābhamacchariyena
atk-abh01a0:2301_1: gūthaniraye nibbattati. Vaṇṇamacchariyena bhave bhave nibbattassa vaṇṇo nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2302_0: Maccharāyanavasena maccheraṃ. Maccharāyanākāro maccharāyanā. Maccharena ayitassa
atk-abh01a0:2302_1: maccherasamaṅgino bhāvo maccharāyitattaṃ. ‘Mayhameva hontu mā aññassā’ti sabbāpi
atk-abh01a0:2302_2: attano sampattiyo byāpetuṃ na icchatīti viviccho. Vivicchassa bhāvo vevicchaṃ, mudumacchariyassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2302_3: nāmaṃ. Kadariyo vuccati anādaro. Tassa bhāvo kadariyaṃ. Thaddhamacchariyassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2302_4: Tena hi samannāgato puggalo parampi paresaṃ dadamānaṃ nivāreti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2305_0: Yācake disvā kaṭukabhāvena cittaṃ añcati saṅkocetīti kaṭukañcuko. Tassa bhāvo kaṭukañcukatā.
atk-abh01a0:2305_1: Aparo nayo – kaṭukañcukatā vuccati kaṭacchuggāho. Samatittikapuṇṇāya hi ukkhaliyā
atk-abh01a0:2305_2: bhattaṃ gaṇhanto sabbatobhāgena saṅkuṭitena aggakaṭacchunā gaṇhāti, pūretvā gahetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2305_3: na sakkoti; evaṃ maccharipuggalassa cittaṃ saṅkucati. Tasmiṃ saṅkucite kāyopi tatheva
atk-abh01a0:2305_4: saṅkucati, paṭikuṭati, paṭinivattati, na sampasāriyatīti maccheraṃ ‘kaṭukañcukatā’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2306_0: Aggahitattaṃ cittassāti paresaṃ upakārakaraṇe dānādinā ākārena yathā na sampasāriyati,
atk-abh01a0:2306_1: evaṃ āvaritvā gahitabhāvo cittassa. Yasmā pana maccharipuggalo attano santakaṃ paresaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2306_2: adātukāmo hoti parasantakaṃ gaṇhitukāmo, tasmā ‘idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu, mā
atk-abh01a0:2306_4: vā veditabbā. Sesaṃ imasmiṃ gocchake uttānatthameva.
atk-abh01a0:2307_0: Imāni pana saṃyojanāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:2307_4: sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti, kāmarāgapaṭighā anāgāmimaggena, mānabhavarāgaavijjā arahattamaggenāti.
atk-abh01a0:2308_0: 1140. Ganthagocchake nāmakāyaṃ gantheti, cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭasmiṃ ghaṭetīti
atk-abh01a0:2308_1: kāyagantho. Sabbaññubhāsitampi paṭikkhipitvā sassato loko idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
atk-abh01a0:2308_2: iminā ākārena abhinivisatīti idaṃsaccābhiniveso. Yasmā pana abhijjhākāmarāgānaṃ viseso
atk-abh01a0:2308_3: atthi, tasmā abhijjhākāyaganthassa padabhājane “yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo”ti
atk-abh01a0:2308_4: avatvā yo rāgo sārāgotiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ‘brahmānaṃ vimānādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2308_5: chandarāgo kāmāsavo na hoti, ganthagocchakaṃ patvā abhijjhākāyagantho hotī’ti taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2308_6: suvuttanti veditabbaṃ. Parato kilesagocchakepi eseva nayo. Ṭhapetvā sīlabbataparāmāsanti
atk-abh01a0:2308_7: idaṃ yasmā sīlabbataparāmāso ‘idameva sacca’ntiādinā ākārena nābhinivisati, ‘sīlena
atk-abh01a0:2308_8: suddhī’tiādinā eva pana abhinivisati, tasmā micchādiṭṭhibhūtampi taṃ paṭikkhipanto ‘ṭhapetvā’ti āha.
