atk-abh01a0:2309_0: 1162. Nīvaraṇagocchakassa thinamiddhaniddese cittassa akallatāti cittassa gilānabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2309_1: Gilāno hi akallakoti vuccati. Vinayepi vuttaṃ – “nāhaṃ, bhante, akallako”ti. Akammaññatāti
atk-abh01a0:2309_3: iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontaṃ, rukkhe vagguli viya, khīle laggitaphāṇitavārako
atk-abh01a0:2309_4: viya ca, olīyati. Tassa taṃ ākāraṃ sandhāya olīyanāti vuttaṃ. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggavasena
atk-abh01a0:2309_5: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Līnanti avipphārikatāya paṭikuṭitaṃ. Itare dve ākārabhāvaniddesā. Thinanti
atk-abh01a0:2309_6: sappipiṇḍo viya avipphārikatāya ghanabhāvena ṭhitaṃ. Thiyanāti ākāraniddeso. Thiyitabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2310_0: 1163. Kāyassāti khandhattayasaṅkhātassa nāmakāyassa. Akallatā akammaññatāti heṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:2310_1: vuttanayameva. Megho viya ākāsaṃ kāyaṃ onayhatīti onāho. Sabbatobhāgena onāho pariyonāho.
atk-abh01a0:2310_2: Abbhantare samorundhatīti antosamorodho. Yathā hi nagare rundhitvā gahite manussā
atk-abh01a0:2310_3: bahi nikkhamituṃ na labhanti, evampi middhena samoruddhā dhammā vipphāravasena nikkhamituṃ
atk-abh01a0:2310_4: na labhanti. Tasmā antosamorodhoti vuttaṃ. Medhatīti middhaṃ; akammaññabhāvena vihiṃsatīti
atk-abh01a0:2310_5: attho. Supanti tenāti soppaṃ. Akkhidalādīnaṃ pacalabhāvaṃ karotīti pacalāyikā. Supanā
atk-abh01a0:2310_6: supitattanti ākārabhāvaniddesā. Yaṃ pana tesaṃ purato soppapadaṃ tassa punavacane
atk-abh01a0:2310_7: kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Idaṃ vuccati thinamiddhanīvaraṇanti idaṃ thinañca middhañca ekato
atk-abh01a0:2310_8: katvā āvaraṇaṭṭhena thinamiddhanīvaraṇanti vuccati. Yaṃ yebhuyyena sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2310_9: niddāya pubbabhāgaaparabhāgesu uppajjati taṃ arahattamaggena samucchijjati. Khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2310_10: pana karajakāyassa dubbalabhāvena bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ asammisse vattamāne
atk-abh01a0:2310_11: te supanti, sā nesaṃ niddā nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, aggivessana,
atk-abh01a0:2310_12: gimhānaṃ pacchime māse catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno
atk-abh01a0:2310_13: niddaṃ okkamitā”ti. Evarūpo panāyaṃ karajakāyassa dubbalabhāvo na maggavajjho, upādinnakepi
atk-abh01a0:2310_14: anupādinnakepi labbhati. Upādinnake labbhamāno yadā khīṇāsavo dīghamaggaṃ gato hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2310_15: aññataraṃ vā pana kammaṃ katvā kilanto, evarūpe kāle labbhati. Anupādinnake labbhamāno
atk-abh01a0:2310_16: paṇṇapupphesu labbhati. Ekaccānañhi rukkhānaṃ paṇṇāni sūriyātapena pasāriyanti rattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2310_17: paṭikuṭanti, padumapupphādīni sūriyātapena pupphanti, rattiṃ puna paṭikuṭanti. Idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2310_18: pana middhaṃ akusalattā khīṇāsavānaṃ na hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:2311_0: Tattha siyā – “na middhaṃ akusalaṃ. Kasmā? Rūpattā. Rūpañhi abyākataṃ. Idañca rūpaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2311_1: Tenevettha ‘kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā’ti kāyaggahaṇaṃ kata”nti. Yadi ‘kāyassā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2311_2: vuttamattenevetaṃ rūpaṃ, kāyapassaddhādayopi dhammā rūpameva bhaveyyuṃ. ‘Sukhañca
atk-abh01a0:2311_4: rūpakāyeneva siyuṃ. Tasmā na vattabbametaṃ ‘rūpaṃ middha’nti. Nāmakāyo hettha kāyo
atk-abh01a0:2311_5: nāma. Yadi nāmakāyo, atha kasmā ‘soppaṃ pacalāyikā’ti vuttaṃ? Na hi nāmakāyo supati,
atk-abh01a0:2311_6: na ca pacalāyatīti. ‘Liṅgādīni viya indriyassa, tassa phalattā. Yathā hi ‘itthiliṅgaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2311_7: itthinimittaṃ itthikuttaṃ itthākappo’ti imāni liṅgādīni itthindriyassa phalattā vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:2311_8: evaṃ imassāpi nāmakāyagelaññasaṅkhātassa middhassa phalattā soppādīni vuttāni. Middhe
atk-abh01a0:2311_9: hi sati tāni hontīti. Phalūpacārena, middhaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ ‘soppaṃ pacalāyikā
atk-abh01a0:2312_0: ‘Akkhidalādīnaṃ pacalabhāvaṃ karotīti pacalāyikā’ti vacanatthenāpi cāyamattho sādhitoyevāti
atk-abh01a0:2312_1: na rūpaṃ middhaṃ. Onāhādīhipi cassa arūpabhāvo dīpitoyeva. Na hi rūpaṃ nāmakāyassa
atk-abh01a0:2312_2: ‘onāho pariyonāho antosamorodho’ hotīti. ‘Nanu ca imināva kāraṇenetaṃ rūpaṃ? Na hi
atk-abh01a0:2312_3: arūpaṃ kassaci onāho, na pariyonāho, na antosamorodho hotī’ti. Yadi evaṃ, āvaraṇampi
atk-abh01a0:2312_4: na bhaveyya. Tasmā. Yathā kāmacchandādayo arūpadhammā āvaraṇaṭṭhena nīvaraṇā, evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2312_5: imassāpi onāhanādiatthena onāhāditā veditabbā. Apica “pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso
atk-abh01a0:2312_6: upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe”ti vacanatopetaṃ arūpaṃ. Na hi rūpaṃ cittupakkileso,
atk-abh01a0:2314: “Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā suraṃ pivanti merayaṃ, surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ upakkileso”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2315_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “cha khome, gahapatiputta, ādīnavā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānānuyoge
atk-abh01a0:2315_1: – sandiṭṭhikā dhanajāni, kalahappavaḍḍhanī, rogānaṃ āyatanaṃ, akittisañjananī, kopīnanidaṃsanī,
atk-abh01a0:2315_2: paññāya dubbalīkaraṇītveva chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ bhavatī”ti. Paccakkhatopi cetaṃ siddhameva.
atk-abh01a0:2315_3: Yathā majje udaragate, cittaṃ saṃkilissati, paññā dubbalā hoti, tasmā majjaṃ viya
atk-abh01a0:2315_4: middhampi cittasaṃkileso ceva paññāya dubbalīkaraṇañca siyāti. Na, paccayaniddesato.
atk-abh01a0:2315_5: Yadi hi majjaṃ saṃkileso bhaveyya, so “ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese”ti
atk-abh01a0:2315_6: vā, “evameva kho, bhikkhave, pañcime cittassa upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2315_7: cittaṃ na ceva mudu hoti, na ca kammaniyaṃ, na ca pabhassaraṃ, pabhaṅgu ca, na ca
atk-abh01a0:2315_8: sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya. Katame pañca? Kāmacchando, bhikkhave, cittassa
atk-abh01a0:2315_9: upakkileso”ti vā, “katame ca, bhikkhave, cittassa upakkilesā? Abhijjhā visamalobho
atk-abh01a0:2315_10: cittassa upakkileso”ti vā – evamādīsu upakkilesaniddesesu niddesaṃ āgaccheyya. Yasmā
atk-abh01a0:2315_11: pana tasmiṃ pīte upakkilesā uppajjanti ye cittasaṃkilesā ceva paññāya ca dubbalīkaraṇā
atk-abh01a0:2315_12: honti, tasmā taṃ tesaṃ paccayattā paccayaniddesato evaṃ vuttaṃ. Middhaṃ pana sayameva
atk-abh01a0:2315_13: cittassa saṃkileso ceva paññāya dubbalīkaraṇañcāti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2316_1: nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā sampayogavacanato nayidaṃ rūpaṃ. Na hi
atk-abh01a0:2316_2: rūpaṃ sampayuttasaṅkhyaṃ labhatīti. Athāpi siyā – ‘yathālābhavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:2316_4: evaṃ ekato katvā yathālābhavasena vuttaṃ. Sakkharakathalañhi tiṭṭhati yeva na carati,
atk-abh01a0:2316_5: itaradvayaṃ tiṭṭhatipi caratipi. Evamidhāpi middhaṃ nīvaraṇameva, na sampayuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2316_6: thinaṃ nīvaraṇampi sampayuttampīti sabbaṃ ekato katvā yathālābhavasena “nīvaraṇañceva
atk-abh01a0:2316_7: nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Middhaṃ pana yathā sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhateva na
atk-abh01a0:2316_8: carati, evaṃ nīvaraṇameva, na sampayuttaṃ. Tasmā rūpameva middhanti. Na, rūpabhāvāsiddhito.
atk-abh01a0:2316_9: Sakkharakathalañhi na caratīti vināpi suttena siddhaṃ. Tasmā tattha yathālābhavasenattho
atk-abh01a0:2316_10: hotu. Middhaṃ pana rūpanti asiddhametaṃ. Na sakkā tassa iminā suttena rūpabhāvo sādhetunti
atk-abh01a0:2316_11: middhassa rūpabhāvāsiddhito na idaṃ yathālābhavasena vuttanti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2317_1: thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā, tena vuccati
atk-abh01a0:2317_2: vigatathinamiddho”ti ca, “idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhā sodheti visodheti parisodheti
atk-abh01a0:2317_3: moceti vimoceti parimoceti, tena vuccati thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodheti” cāti – evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2317_4: ‘cattattā’tiādi vuttaṃ. Na ca ‘rūpaṃ’ evaṃ vuccati, tasmāpi arūpameva middhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2317_5: Na, cittajassāsambhavavacanato. Tividhañhi middhaṃ – cittajaṃ utujaṃ āhārajañca.
atk-abh01a0:2317_6: Tasmā yaṃ tattha cittajaṃ tassa vibhaṅge jhānacittehi asambhavo vutto, na arūpabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2317_7: sādhitoti rūpameva middhanti. Na, rūpabhāvāsiddhitova. Middhassa hi rūpabhāve siddhe
atk-abh01a0:2317_8: sakkā etaṃ laddhuṃ. Tattha cittajassāsambhavo vutto. So eva ca na sijjhatīti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2318_0: Kiñca bhiyyo? Pahānavacanato. Bhagavatā hi “cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo
atk-abh01a0:2318_1: paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ; katame cha? Kāmacchandaṃ, byāpādaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2318_2: uddhaccaṃ, kakkuccaṃ, vicikicchaṃ; kāmesu kho panassa ādīnavo sammapaññāya sudiṭṭho
atk-abh01a0:2318_3: hotī”ti ca, “ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya balavatiyā paññāya attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2318_4: vā ñassatī”ti ca ādīsu middhassāpi pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Na ca rūpaṃ pahātabbaṃ. Yathāha
atk-abh01a0:2318_5: – “rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo, pariññeyyo, na pahātabbo, na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo”ti
atk-abh01a0:2318_6: imassāpi pahānavacanato arūpameva middhanti. Na, rūpassāpi pahānavacanato. “Rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2318_7: bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahathā”ti. Ettha hi rūpassāpi pahānaṃ vuttameva. Tasmā
atk-abh01a0:2318_8: akāraṇametanti. Na, aññathā vuttattā. Tasmiñhi sutte “yo, bhikkhave, rūpe chandarāgavinayo
atk-abh01a0:2318_9: taṃ tattha pahāna”nti evaṃ chandarāgappahānavasena rūpassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ, na yathā
atk-abh01a0:2318_10: “cha dhamme pahāya pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā”ti evaṃ pahātabbameva vuttanti, aññathā
atk-abh01a0:2318_11: vuttattā, na rūpaṃ middhaṃ. Tasmā yānetāni “so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese”tiādīni
atk-abh01a0:2318_12: suttāni vuttāni, etehi ceva aññehi ca suttehi arūpameva middhanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi –
atk-abh01a0:2319_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhāruhā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā. Katame
atk-abh01a0:2319_1: pañca? Kāmacchando, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo…pe… thinamiddhaṃ, bhikkhave, āvaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2319_2: nīvaraṇaṃ cetaso ajjhāruhaṃ paññāya dubbalīkaraṇa”nti ca, “thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2319_3: bhikkhave, andhakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2319_4: anibbānasaṃvattanika”nti ca, “evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yasmiṃ samaye thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena
atk-abh01a0:2319_5: cetasā viharati thinamiddhaparetenā”ti ca, “ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno
atk-abh01a0:2319_6: ceva kāmacchando uppajjati…pe… anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ uppajjatī”ti ca, “kevalohāyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2319_7: bhikkhave, akusalarāsi yadidaṃ pañca nīvaraṇā”ti ca –
atk-abh01a0:2320_0: Evamādīni ca anekāni etassa arūpabhāvajotakāneva suttāni vuttāni. Yasmā cetaṃ arūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2320_1: tasmā āruppepi uppajjati. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāpakaraṇe paṭṭhāne – “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2320_2: paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati, na purejātapaccayā”ti etassa vibhaṅge “āruppe
atk-abh01a0:2320_3: kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhaṃ… uddhaccaṃ avijjānīvaraṇa”nti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2321_1: vuttāni. Evaṃsaññitāya hi kate vītikamme, niṭṭhite vatthujjhācāre, puna sañjātasatinopi
atk-abh01a0:2321_2: ‘duṭṭhu mayā kata’nti evaṃ anutappamānassa pacchānutāpavasenetaṃ uppajjati. Tena
atk-abh01a0:2321_3: taṃ mūlato dassetuṃ ‘akappiye kappiyasaññitā’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha akappiyabhojanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2321_4: kappiyasaññī hutvā paribhuñjati, akappiyamaṃsaṃ kappiyamaṃsasaññī hutvā, acchamaṃsaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2321_5: sūkaramaṃsanti, dīpimaṃsaṃ vā migamaṃsanti khādati; kāle vītivatte kālasaññāya, pavāretvā
atk-abh01a0:2321_6: appavāritasaññāya, pattasmiṃ raje patite paṭiggahitasaññāya bhuñjati – evaṃ ‘akappiye
atk-abh01a0:2321_7: kappiyasaññāya’ vītikkamaṃ karoti nāma. Sūkaramaṃsaṃ pana acchamaṃsasaññāya khādamāno,
atk-abh01a0:2321_8: kāle ca vikālasaññāya bhuñjamāno ‘kappiye akappiyasaññitāya’ vītikkamaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2321_9: Anavajjaṃ pana kiñcideva vajjasaññitāya, vajjañca anavajjasaññitāya karonto ‘anavajje
atk-abh01a0:2321_10: vajjasaññāya vajje ca anavajjasaññāya’ vītikkamaṃ karoti nāma. Yasmā panetaṃ “akataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2321_11: vata me kalyāṇaṃ, akataṃ kusalaṃ, akataṃ bhīruttāṇaṃ, kataṃ pāpaṃ, kataṃ luddaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2321_12: kataṃ kibbisa”nti evaṃ anavajje vajjasaññitāyapi kate vītikkame uppajjati, tasmāssa
atk-abh01a0:2322_0: Tattha kukkuccapadaṃ vuttatthameva. Kukkuccāyanākāro kukkuccāyanā. Kukkuccena ayitassa
atk-abh01a0:2322_1: bhāvo kukkuccāyitattaṃ. Cetaso vippaṭisāroti ettha katākatassa sāvajjānavajjassa
atk-abh01a0:2322_2: vā abhimukhagamanaṃ ‘vippaṭisāro’ nāma. Yasmā pana so kataṃ vā pāpaṃ akataṃ na karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2322_3: akataṃ vā kalyāṇaṃ kataṃ na karoti, tasmā virūpo kucchito vā paṭisāroti ‘vippaṭisāro’.
atk-abh01a0:2322_4: So pana cetaso, na sattassāti ñāpanatthaṃ ‘cetaso’ vippaṭisāroti vuttaṃ. Ayamassa
atk-abh01a0:2322_5: sabhāvaniddeso. Uppajjamānaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ āraggamiva kaṃsapattaṃ manaṃ vilikhamānameva
atk-abh01a0:2322_6: uppajjati, tasmā manovilekhoti vuttaṃ. Ayamassa kiccaniddeso. Yaṃ pana vinaye “atha
atk-abh01a0:2322_7: kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2322_8: paribhuñjitu”nti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesīti kukkuccaṃ āgataṃ, na taṃ nīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2322_9: Na hi arahato ‘duṭṭhu mayā idaṃ kata’nti evaṃ anutāpo atthi. Nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2322_10: panetaṃ ‘kappati na kappatī’ti vīmaṃsanasaṅkhātaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2323_0: 1176. “Katame dhammā nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”ti padassa niddese yasmā
atk-abh01a0:2323_1: thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ na vijahati, tasmā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇena
atk-abh01a0:2323_2: nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcāti abhinditvā vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana uddhacce satipi
atk-abh01a0:2323_3: kukkuccassa abhāvā kukkuccena vināpi uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, tasmā taṃ bhinditvā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2323_4: Yañca yena sampayogaṃ na gacchati, taṃ na yojitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2324_0: Ime pana nīvaraṇe kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:2324_2: kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena, avijjā arahattamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā sotāpattimaggena
atk-abh01a0:2325: 1182. Parāmāsagocchake te dhamme ṭhapetvāti pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2326_0: 1219. Upādānaniddese vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ kāmo ca so upādānañcātipi
atk-abh01a0:2326_1: kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ. Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2326_2: viya. Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Diṭṭhiṃ upādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2326_3: ‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’tiādīsu hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyahi. Tathā sīlabbataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2326_4: upādiyatīti sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcātipi sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni
atk-abh01a0:2326_5: hi ‘evaṃ suddhī’ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni. Tathā, vadanti etenāti ‘vādo’;
atk-abh01a0:2326_6: upādiyanti etenāti ‘upādānaṃ’. Kiṃ vadanti, upādiyanti vā? Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2326_7: attavādupādānaṃ; ‘attavādamattameva vā attā’ti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2327_0: 1220. Yo kāmesu kāmacchandoti etthāpi vatthukāmāva anavasesato kāmāti adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:2327_1: Tasmā vatthukāmesu kāmacchando idha kāmupādānanti anāgāminopi taṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Pañcakāmaguṇavatthuko
atk-abh01a0:2328_0: 1221. Diṭṭhupādānaniddese natthi dinnanti. Dinnaṃ nāma atthi, sakkā kassaci kiñci
atk-abh01a0:2328_1: dātunti jānāti; dinnassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi yiṭṭhanti. Yiṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2328_2: vuccati mahāyāgo. Taṃ yajituṃ sakkāti jānāti; yiṭṭhassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti
atk-abh01a0:2328_3: gaṇhāti. Natthi hutanti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā. Taṃ kātuṃ sakkāti jānāti; tassa
atk-abh01a0:2328_4: pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi, sukatadukkaṭānanti ettha dasa kusalakammapathā
atk-abh01a0:2328_5: sukatakammāni nāma. Dasa akusalakammapathā dukkaṭakammāni nāma. Tesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2328_6: jānāti phalaṃ vipāko pana natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2328_7: lokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi paralokoti idha loke ṭhito paralokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_8: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti mātāpitūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ jānāti, tesu katapaccayena koci
atk-abh01a0:2328_9: phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavanakaupapajjanakā sattā
atk-abh01a0:2328_10: natthīti gaṇhāti. Sammaggatā sammā paṭipannāti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2328_11: lokasmiṃ natthīti gaṇhāti. Ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
atk-abh01a0:2328_12: pavedentīti imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ attanāva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena ñatvā pavedanasamattho
atk-abh01a0:2329_0: Imāni pana upādānāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:2329_1: kāmupādānaṃ catūhi maggehi pahīyati, sesāni tīṇi sotāpattimaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh01a0:2329_2: sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhupādānādīni pahīyanti, catūhi maggehi kāmupādānanti.
atk-abh01a0:2330_0: 1235. Kilesagocchake kilesā eva kilesavatthūni. Vasanti vā ettha akhīṇāsavā sattā
atk-abh01a0:2330_1: lobhādīsu patiṭṭhitattāti ‘vatthūni’. Kilesā ca te tappatiṭṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ vatthūni
atk-abh01a0:2330_2: cāti ‘kilesavatthūni’. Yasmā cettha anantarapaccayādibhāvena uppajjamānā kilesāpi
atk-abh01a0:2330_3: vasanti eva nāma, tasmā kilesānaṃ vatthūnītipi ‘kilesavatthūni’.
atk-abh01a0:2331_0: 1236. Tattha katamo lobho? Yo rāgo sārāgoti ayaṃ pana lobho hetugocchake ganthagocchake
atk-abh01a0:2331_1: imasmiṃ kilesagocchaketi tīsu ṭhānesu atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭho. Āsavasaṃyojanaoghayoganīvaraṇaupādānagocchakesu
atk-abh01a0:2331_2: aṭṭhahi aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭho. Svāyaṃ atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi aṭṭhahi
atk-abh01a0:2331_3: aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi nippadesatova gahitoti veditabbo. Tesu hetuganthanīvaraṇaupādānakilesagocchakesu
atk-abh01a0:2331_4: catumaggavajjhā taṇhā ekeneva koṭṭhāsena ṭhitā. Āsavasaṃyojanaoghayogesu catumaggavajjhāpi
atk-abh01a0:2331_5: dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā ṭhitā. Kathaṃ? Āsavesu kāmāsavo bhavāsavoti, saṃyojanesu kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2331_6: bhavarāgasaṃyojananti, oghesu kāmogho bhavoghoti, yogesu kāmayogo bhavayogoti.
atk-abh01a0:2332_0: Imāni pana kilesavatthūni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2332_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā lobho catūhi maggehi pahīyati, doso anāgāmimaggena, mohamānā arahattamaggena,
atk-abh01a0:2332_2: diṭṭhivicikicchā sotāpattimaggena, thinādīni arahattamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā sotāpattimaggena
atk-abh01a0:2332_3: diṭṭhivicikicchā pahīyanti, anāgāmimaggena doso, arahattamaggena sesā sattāti.
atk-abh01a0:2333_0: 1287. Kāmāvacaraniddese heṭṭhatoti heṭṭhābhāgena. Avīcinirayanti vā aggijālānaṃ vā
atk-abh01a0:2333_1: sattānaṃ vā dukkhavedanāya vīci, antaraṃ, chiddaṃ ettha natthīti avīci. Sukhasaṅkhāto
atk-abh01a0:2333_2: ayo ettha natthīti nirayo. Niratiatthenapi nirassādatthenapi nirayo. Pariyantaṃ karitvāti
atk-abh01a0:2333_3: taṃ avīcisaṅkhātaṃ nirayaṃ antaṃ katvā. Uparitoti uparibhāgena. Paranimmitavasavattideveti
atk-abh01a0:2333_4: paranimmitesu kāmesu vasaṃ vattanato evaṃladdhavohāre deve. Anto karitvāti anto pakkhipitvā.
atk-abh01a0:2333_5: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye etasmiṃ okāse. Etthāvacarāti iminā yasmā etasmiṃ antare aññepi
atk-abh01a0:2333_6: caranti kadāci katthaci sambhavato, tasmā tesaṃ asaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘avacarā’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2333_7: Tena ye etasmiṃ antare ogāḷhā hutvā caranti sabbattha sadā ca sambhavato, adhobhāge
atk-abh01a0:2333_8: caranti avīcinirayassa heṭṭhā bhūtupādāyapavattibhāvena, tesaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2333_9: Te hi avagāḷhāva caranti, adhobhāgeva carantīti avacarā. Ettha pariyāpannāti iminā
atk-abh01a0:2333_10: pana yasmā ete etthāvacarā aññatthāpi avacaranti, na pana tattha pariyāpannā honti,
atk-abh01a0:2333_11: tasmā tesaṃ aññatthāpi avacarantānaṃ pariggaho kato hoti. Idāni te ettha pariyāpannadhamme
atk-abh01a0:2333_12: rāsisuññatapaccayabhāvato ceva sabhāvato ca dassento khandhātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2334_1: Sesamettha kāmāvacaraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Samāpannassa vātiādīsu paṭhamapadena
atk-abh01a0:2334_2: kusalajjhānaṃ vuttaṃ, dutiyena vipākajjhānaṃ, vuttaṃ tatiyena kiriyajjhānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2335: 1291. Arūpāvacaraniddese ākāsānañcāyatanūpageti ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ upagate. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2336_0: 1301. Saraṇadukaniddese yvāyaṃ tīsu akusalamūlesu moho, so lobhasampayutto ca lobhena
atk-abh01a0:2336_1: saraṇo, dosasampayutto ca dosena saraṇo. Vicikicchuddhaccasampayutto pana moho diṭṭhisampayuttena
atk-abh01a0:2336_2: ceva rūparāgaarūparāgasaṅkhātena ca rāgaraṇena pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato saraṇo sarajoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2338_0: 1303. Suttantikadukesu mātikākathāyaṃ atthato vivecitattā yāni ca nesaṃ niddesapadāni
atk-abh01a0:2338_1: tesampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva suviññeyyattā yebhuyyena uttānatthāni eva. Idaṃ panettha
atk-abh01a0:2338_2: visesamattaṃ – vijjūpamaduke tāva cakkhumā kira puriso meghandhakāre rattiṃ maggaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2338_3: paṭipajji. Tassa andhakāratāya maggo na paññāyi. Vijju niccharitvā andhakāraṃ viddhaṃsesi.
atk-abh01a0:2338_4: Athassa andhakāravigamā maggo pākaṭo ahosi. So dutiyampi gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Dutiyampi
atk-abh01a0:2338_5: andhakāro otthari. Maggo na paññāyi. Vijju niccharitvā taṃ viddhaṃsesi. Vigate andhakāre
atk-abh01a0:2338_6: maggo pākaṭo ahosi. Tatiyampi gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Andhakāro otthari. Maggo na paññāyi.
atk-abh01a0:2339_0: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa andhakāre maggapaṭipajjanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa sotāpattimaggatthāya
atk-abh01a0:2339_1: vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya saccacchādakatamaṃ. Vijjuyā
atk-abh01a0:2339_2: niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya sotāpattimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa
atk-abh01a0:2339_3: vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa catunnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2339_4: saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva. Dutiyagamanābhinīhāro
atk-abh01a0:2339_5: viya sakadāgāmimaggatthāya vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:2339_6: saccacchādakatamaṃ. Dutiyaṃ vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:2339_7: sakadāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre
atk-abh01a0:2339_8: maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa
atk-abh01a0:2339_9: pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva. Tatiyagamanābhinīhāro viya anāgāmimaggatthāya
atk-abh01a0:2339_10: vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya saccacchādakatamaṃ. Tatiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2339_11: vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya anāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā
atk-abh01a0:2339_12: saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa
atk-abh01a0:2339_13: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva.
atk-abh01a0:2340_0: Vajirassa pana pāsāṇo vā maṇi vā abhejjo nāma natthi. Yattha patati taṃ vinividdhameva
atk-abh01a0:2340_1: hoti. Vajiraṃ khepentaṃ asesetvā khepeti. Vajirena gatamaggo nāma puna pākatiko na
atk-abh01a0:2340_2: hoti. Evameva arahattamaggassa avajjhakileso nāma natthi. Sabbakilese vinivijjhati
atk-abh01a0:2340_3: vajiraṃ viya. Arahattamaggopi kilese khepento asesetvā khepeti. Vajirena gatamaggassa
atk-abh01a0:2340_4: puna pākatikattābhāvo viya arahattamaggena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna paccudāvattanaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-abh01a0:2341_0: 1307. Bāladukaniddese bālesu ahirikānottappāni pākaṭāni, mūlāni ca sesānaṃ bāladhammānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2341_1: Ahiriko hi anottappī ca na kiñci akusalaṃ na karoti nāmāti. Etāni dve paṭhamaṃyeva
atk-abh01a0:2341_2: visuṃ vuttāni. Sukkapakkhepi ayameva nayo. Tathā kaṇhaduke.
atk-abh01a0:2342_0: 1311. Tapanīyadukaniddese katattā ca akatattā ca tapanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kāyaduccaritādīni
atk-abh01a0:2342_1: hi katattā tapanti, kāyasucaritādīni akatattā. Tathā hi puggalo ‘kataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti
atk-abh01a0:2342_2: tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyasucarita’nti tappati. ‘Kataṃ me vacīduccarita’nti tappati…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2342_3: ‘akataṃ me manosucarita’nti tappati. Atapanīyepi eseva nayo. Kalyāṇakārī hi puggalo
atk-abh01a0:2342_4: ‘kataṃ me kāyasucarita’nti na tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti na tappati…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2343_0: 1313. Adhivacanadukaniddese yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti sabbadhammaggahaṇaṃ. Saṅkhāyatīti
atk-abh01a0:2343_1: saṅkhā, saṃkathiyatīti attho. Kinti saṃkathiyati? Ahanti mamanti paroti parassāti
atk-abh01a0:2343_2: sattoti bhāvoti posoti puggaloti naroti māṇavoti tissoti dattoti, ‘mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi
atk-abh01a0:2343_3: bimbohanaṃ’ ‘vihāro pariveṇaṃ dvāraṃ vātapāna’nti evaṃ anekehi ākārehi saṃkathiyatīti
atk-abh01a0:2343_4: ‘saṅkhā’. Samaññāyatīti samaññā. Kinti samaññāyati? ‘Ahanti…pe… vātapāna’nti samaññāyatīti
atk-abh01a0:2343_5: ‘samaññā’. Paññāpiyatīti paññatti. Vohariyatīti vohāro. Kinti vohariyati? ‘Aha’nti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2344_0: Nāmanti catubbidhaṃ nāmaṃ – sāmaññanāmaṃ guṇanāmaṃ kittimanāmaṃ opapātikanāmanti.
atk-abh01a0:2344_1: Tattha paṭhamakappikesu mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapitattā mahāsammatoti rañño nāmaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2344_2: ‘sāmaññanāmaṃ’ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “mahājanasammatoti kho, vāseṭṭha, mahāsammato
atk-abh01a0:2344_3: tveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti. Dhammakathiko paṃsukūliko vinayadharo tepiṭako
atk-abh01a0:2344_4: saddho pasannoti evarūpaṃ guṇato āgatanāmaṃ ‘guṇanāmaṃ’ nāma. Bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādīnipi
atk-abh01a0:2344_5: tathāgatassa anekāni nāmasatāni guṇanāmāneva. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2347_0: Yaṃ pana jātassa kumārakassa nāmaggahaṇadivase dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā samīpe
atk-abh01a0:2347_1: ṭhitā ñātakā kappetvā pakappetvā ‘ayaṃ asukonāmā’ti nāmaṃ karonti, idaṃ ‘kittimanāma’
atk-abh01a0:2347_2: nāma. Yā pana purimapaññatti pacchimapaññattiyaṃ patati, purimavohāro pacchimavohāre
atk-abh01a0:2347_3: patati, seyyathidaṃ – purimakappepi cando candoyeva nāma, etarahipi candova. Atīte
atk-abh01a0:2347_4: sūriyo… samuddo… pathavī… pabbato pabbatoyeva, nāma, etarahipi pabbatoyevāti idaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2347_5: ‘opapātikanāmaṃ’ nāma. Idaṃ catubbidhampi nāmaṃ ettha nāmameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2348_0: Nāmakammanti nāmakaraṇaṃ. Nāmadheyyanti nāmaṭṭhapanaṃ. Niruttīti nāmanirutti. Byañjananti
atk-abh01a0:2348_1: nāmabyañjanaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ atthaṃ byañjeti tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Abhilāpoti nāmābhilāpova.
atk-abh01a0:2348_2: Sabbeva dhammā adhivacanapathāti adhivacanassa nopathadhammo nāma natthi. Ekadhammo
atk-abh01a0:2348_3: sabbadhammesu nipatati, sabbadhammā ekadhammasmiṃ nipatanti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi nāmapaññatti
atk-abh01a0:2348_4: ekadhammo, so sabbesu catubhūmakadhammesu nipatati. Sattopi saṅkhāropi nāmato muttako nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2349_0: Aṭavīpabbatādīsu rukkhopi jānapadānaṃ bhāro. Te hi ‘ayaṃ kiṃ rukkho nāmā’ti puṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:2349_1: ‘khadiro’ ‘palāso’ti attanā jānanakanāmaṃ kathenti. Yassa nāmaṃ na jānanti tampi
atk-abh01a0:2349_2: ‘anāmako’ nāmāti vadanti. Tampi tassa nāmadheyyameva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Samudde macchakacchapādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:2349_3: eseva nayo. Itare dve dukā iminā samānatthā eva.
atk-abh01a0:2350_0: 1316. Nāmarūpaduke nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ca namanaṭṭhena ca nāmanaṭṭhena ca nāmaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2350_1: cattāro khandhā tāva nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ‘nāmaṃ’. Yathā hi mahājanasammatattā mahāsammatassa
atk-abh01a0:2350_2: mahāsammatoti nāmaṃ ahosi, yathā vā mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ tisso nāma hotu, phusso nāma
atk-abh01a0:2350_3: hotū’ti evaṃ puttassa kittimanāmaṃ karonti, yathā vā ‘dhammakathiko’ ‘vinayadharo’ti
atk-abh01a0:2350_4: guṇato nāmaṃ āgacchati, na evaṃ vedanādīnaṃ. Vedanādayo hi mahāpathavīādayo viya
atk-abh01a0:2350_5: attano nāmaṃ karontāva uppajjanti. Tesu uppannesu tesaṃ nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti. Na
atk-abh01a0:2350_6: hi vedanaṃ uppannaṃ ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti koci bhaṇati. Na ca tassā nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2350_7: atthi. Yathā pathaviyā uppannāya ‘tvaṃ pathavī nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2350_8: cakkavāḷasinerucandimasūriyanakkhattesu uppannesu ‘tvaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ nāma hohi tvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2350_9: nakkhattaṃ nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti, opapātikapaññattiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2350_10: nipatati, evaṃ vedanāya uppannāya ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2350_11: Tāya uppannāya vedanāti nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti. Opapātikapaññattiyaṃ nipatati. Saññādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:2350_12: eseva nayo. Atītepi hi vedanā vedanāyeva, saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ viññāṇameva.
atk-abh01a0:2350_13: Anāgatepi, paccuppannepi. Nibbānaṃ pana sadāpi nibbānamevāti. ‘Nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena’ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2351_0: ‘Namanaṭṭhenā’pi cettha cattāro khandhā nāmaṃ. Te hi ārammaṇābhimukhā namanti. ‘Nāmanaṭṭhena’
atk-abh01a0:2351_1: sabbampi nāmaṃ. Cattāro hi khandhā ārammaṇe aññamaññaṃ nāmenti. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇādhipatipaccayatāya
atk-abh01a0:2353_0: 1320. Bhavissati attā ca loko cāti khandhapañcakaṃ attā ca loko cāti gahetvā ‘taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2353_1: bhavissatī’ti gahaṇākārena niviṭṭhā sassatadiṭṭhi. Dutiyā ‘na bhavissatī’ti ākārena
atk-abh01a0:2354_0: 1326. Pubbantaṃ ārabbhāti atītakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā. Iminā brahmajāle āgatā
atk-abh01a0:2354_1: aṭṭhārasa pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā. Aparantaṃ ārabbhāti anāgatakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2354_2: karitvā. Iminā tattheva āgatā catucattālīsa aparantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:2355_0: 1332. Dovacassatāniddese sahadhammike vuccamāneti sahadhammikaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavatā
atk-abh01a0:2355_1: paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthuṃ dassetvā āpattiṃ āropetvā ‘idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2355_2: āpanno, iṅgha desehi vuṭṭhāhi paṭikarohī’ti vuccamāne. Dovacassāyantiādīsu evaṃ codiyamānassa
atk-abh01a0:2355_3: paṭicodanāya vā appadakkhiṇagāhitāya vā dubbacassa kammaṃ dovacassāyaṃ. Tadeva dovacassantipi
atk-abh01a0:2355_4: vuccati. Tassa bhāvo dovacassiyaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vippaṭikūlagāhitāti
atk-abh01a0:2355_5: vilomagāhitā. Vilomagahaṇasaṅkhātena vipaccanīkena sātaṃ assāti vipaccanīkasāto.
atk-abh01a0:2355_6: ‘Paṭāṇikagahaṇaṃ gahetvā ekapadeneva taṃ nissaddamakāsi’nti sukhaṃ paṭilabhantassetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2355_7: adhivacanaṃ. Tassa bhāvo vipaccanīkasātatā. Ovādaṃ anādiyanavasena anādarassa bhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2355_8: anādariyaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anādiyanākāro vā anādaratā. Garuvāsaṃ avasanavasena
atk-abh01a0:2355_9: uppanno agāravabhāvo agāravatā. Sajeṭṭhakavāsaṃ avasanavasena uppanno appaṭissavabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2355_10: appaṭissavatā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpā dovacassatā nāma vuccati. Atthato panesā
atk-abh01a0:2355_11: tenākārena pavattā cattāro khandhā, saṅkhārakkhandhoyeva vāti. Pāpamittatādīsupi
atk-abh01a0:2355_12: eseva nayo. Dovacassatā pāpamittatādayo hi visuṃ cetasikadhammā nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2356_0: 1333. Natthi etesaṃ saddhāti assaddhā; buddhādīni vatthūni na saddahantīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2356_1: Dussīlāti sīlassa dunnāmaṃ natthi, nissīlāti attho. Appassutāti sutarahitā. Pañca
atk-abh01a0:2356_2: macchariyāni etesaṃ atthīti maccharino. Duppaññāti nippaññā. Sevanakavasena sevanā.
atk-abh01a0:2356_3: Balavasevanā nisevanā. Sabbatobhāgena sevanā saṃsevanā. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2356_4: Tīhipi sevanāva kathitā. Bhajanāti upasaṅkamanā. Sambhajanāti sabbatobhāgena bhajanā.
atk-abh01a0:2356_5: Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Bhattīti daḷhabhatti. Sambhattīti sabbatobhāgena
atk-abh01a0:2356_6: bhatti. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dvīhipi daḷhabhatti eva kathitā. Taṃsampavaṅkatāti
atk-abh01a0:2356_7: tesu puggalesu kāyena ceva cittena ca sampavaṅkabhāvo; tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2358_1: pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭa’nti imā pañca āpattiyo. Sattapi āpattikkhandhāti vinayaniddesena
atk-abh01a0:2358_2: ‘pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsita’nti
atk-abh01a0:2358_3: imā satta āpattiyo. Tattha saha vatthunā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ paricchedajānanakapaññā
atk-abh01a0:2358_4: āpattikusalatā nāma. Saha kammavācāya āpattivuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanakapaññā pana
atk-abh01a0:2359_1: pana samāpattikusalatā nāma. ‘Cande vā sūriye vā nakkhatte vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate
atk-abh01a0:2359_2: vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti avirajjhitvā tasmiṃyeva samaye vuṭṭhānakapaññāya atthitāya samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2360: 1340. Aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ uggahamanasikārasavanadhāraṇaparicchedajānanakapaññā dhātukusalatā nāma. Tāsaṃyeva uggahamanasikārajānanakapaññā manasikārakusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2361_1: latā nāma. Tīsupi vā etāsu kusalatāsu uggaho manasikāro savanaṃ sammasanaṃ paṭivedho
atk-abh01a0:2361_2: paccavekkhaṇāti sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha savanauggahapaccavekkhaṇā lokiyā, paṭivedho
atk-abh01a0:2361_4: paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge āvibhavissanti. ‘Iminā pana paccayena idaṃ hotī’ti jānanakapaññā
atk-abh01a0:2362_1: Cakkhupasādo hi rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa cakkhuviññāṇassa hetu ceva paccayo
atk-abh01a0:2362_2: ca. Tathā sotapasādādayo sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ, ambabījādīni ca ambaphalādīnaṃ. Dutiyanaye
atk-abh01a0:2362_3: ye ye dhammāti visabhāgapaccayadhammānaṃ nidassanaṃ. Yesaṃ yesanti visabhāgapaccayasamuppannadhammanidassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2362_4: Na hetū na paccayāti cakkhupasādo saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa sotaviññāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:2362_5: na hetu na paccayo. Tathā sotapasādādayo avasesaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Ambādayo ca tālādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2363_0: 1346. Ajjavamaddavaniddese nīcacittatāti padamattameva viseso. Tassattho – mānābhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2363_1: nīcaṃ cittaṃ assāti nīcacitto. Nīcacittassa bhāvo nīcacittatā. Sesaṃ cittujukatācittamudutānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2364_0: 1348. Khantiniddese khamanakavasena khanti. Khamanākāro khamanatā. Adhivāsenti etāya,
atk-abh01a0:2364_1: attano upari āropetvā vāsenti, na paṭibāhanti, na paccanīkatāya tiṭṭhantīti adhivāsanatā.
atk-abh01a0:2364_2: Acaṇḍikassa bhāvo acaṇḍikkaṃ. Anasuropoti asuropo vuccati na sammāropitattā duruttavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2364_3: Tappaṭipakkhato anasuropo suruttavācāti attho. Evamettha phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2364_4: Attamanatā cittassāti somanassavasena cittassa sakamanatā, attano cittasabhāvoyeva,
atk-abh01a0:2365_0: 1349. Soraccaniddese kāyiko avītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ. Vācasiko avītikkamoti
atk-abh01a0:2365_1: catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ. Kāyikavācasikoti iminā kāyavacīdvārasamuṭṭhitaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2365_2: pariyādiyati. Idaṃ vuccati soraccanti idaṃ pāpato suṭṭhu oratattā soraccaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2365_3: Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaroti idaṃ yasmā na kevalaṃ kāyavācāheva anācāraṃ ācarati manasāpi
atk-abh01a0:2365_4: ācarati eva, tasmā mānasikasīlaṃ pariyādāya dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2366_0: 1350. Sākhalyaniddese aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ sadosatāya
atk-abh01a0:2366_1: khuṃsanavambhanādivacanehi aṇḍakā jātā. Kakkasāti pūtikā sā yathā nāma pūtirukkho
atk-abh01a0:2366_2: kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo evaṃ kakkasā hoti. Sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā viya pavisati.
atk-abh01a0:2366_3: Tena vuttaṃ ‘kakkasā’ti. Parakaṭukāti paresaṃ kaṭukā amanāpā dosajananī. Parābhisajjanīti
atk-abh01a0:2366_4: kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya cammesu vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī, gantukāmānampi gantuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2366_5: adatvā lagganakārī. Kodhasāmantāti kodhassa āsannā. Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa
atk-abh01a0:2366_6: vā upacārasamādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā. Iti sabbānevetāni sadosavācāya vevacanāni.
atk-abh01a0:2366_7: Tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāyāti idaṃ pharusavācaṃ appajahitvā ṭhitassa antarantare pavattāpi
atk-abh01a0:2366_8: saṇhavācā asaṇhavācā eva nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2367_0: Neḷāti eḷaṃ vuccati doso. Nāssā eḷanti neḷā; niddosāti attho. “Neḷaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
atk-abh01a0:2367_1: ettha vuttaneḷaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2367_2: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-abh01a0:2367_3: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati, appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-abh01a0:2367_4: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
atk-abh01a0:2367_5: esātipi porī; nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti. Pitimattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2367_6: pitāti bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-abh01a0:2367_7: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā. Yā tatthāti
atk-abh01a0:2367_8: yā tasmiṃ puggale. Saṇhavācatāti maṭṭhavācatā. Sakhilavācatāti muduvācatā. Apharusavācatāti akakkhaḷavācatā.
atk-abh01a0:2368_0: 1351. Paṭisanthāraniddese āmisapaṭisanthāroti āmisaalābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2368_1: yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ evaṃ āmisena paṭisantharaṇaṃ. Dhammapaṭisanthāroti
atk-abh01a0:2368_2: dhammassa appaṭilābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2368_3: evaṃ dhammena paṭisantharaṇaṃ. Paṭisanthārako hotīti dveyeva hi lokasannivāsassa
atk-abh01a0:2368_4: chiddāni, tesaṃ paṭisanthārako hoti. Āmisapaṭisanthārena vā dhammapaṭisanthārena
atk-abh01a0:2368_5: vāti iminā duvidhena paṭisanthārena paṭisanthārako hoti, paṭisantharati, nirantaraṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2369_0: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya kathā – paṭisanthārakena hi bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2369_1: disvāva paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, tālavaṇṭena bījitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2369_2: pādā dhovitvā makkhetabbā, sappiphāṇite sati bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ, pānīyena pucchitabbo,
atk-abh01a0:2369_3: āvāso paṭijaggitabbo. Evaṃ ekadesena āmisapaṭisanthāro kato nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2370_0: Sāyaṃ pana navakatarepi attano upaṭṭhānaṃ anāgateyeva, tassa santikaṃ gantvā nisīditvā
atk-abh01a0:2370_1: avisaye apucchitvā tassa visaye pañho pucchitabbo. ‘Tumhe katarabhāṇakā’ti apucchitvā
atk-abh01a0:2370_2: tumhākaṃ ‘ācariyupajjhāyā kataraṃ ganthaṃ vaḷañjentī’ti pucchitvā pahonakaṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2370_3: pañho pucchitabbo. Sace kathetuṃ sakkoti iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce sakkoti sayaṃ kathetvā
atk-abh01a0:2370_4: dātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekadesena dhammapaṭisanthāro kato nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2371_0: Sace attano santike vasati taṃ ādāya nibaddhaṃ piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Sace gantukāmo
atk-abh01a0:2371_1: hoti punadivase gamanasabhāgena taṃ ādāya ekasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā uyyojetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2371_2: Sace aññasmiṃ disābhāge bhikkhū nimantitā honti taṃ bhikkhuṃ icchamānaṃ ādāya gantabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2371_3: ‘Na mayhaṃ esā disā sabhāgā’ti gantuṃ anicchante sesabhikkhū pesetvā taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya
atk-abh01a0:2371_4: caritabbaṃ. Attanā laddhāmisaṃ tassa dātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ‘āmisapaṭisanthāro’ kato nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2372_0: Āmisapaṭisanthārakena pana attanā laddhaṃ kassa dātabbanti? Āgantukassa tāva dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2372_1: Sace gilāno vā avassiko vā atthi, tesampi dātabbaṃ. Ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2372_2: Bhaṇḍagāhakassa dātabbaṃ. Sārāṇīyadhammapūrakena pana satavārampi sahassavārampi
atk-abh01a0:2372_3: āgatāgatānaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ. Paṭisanthārakena pana yena yena na laddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2372_4: tassa tassa dātabbaṃ. Bahigāmaṃ nikkhamitvā jiṇṇakaṃ vā anāthaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ
atk-abh01a0:2373_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – corehi kira guttasālagāme pahate taṅkhaṇaññeva ekā nirodhato vuṭṭhitā
atk-abh01a0:2373_1: khīṇāsavattherī daharabhikkhuniyā bhaṇḍakaṃ gāhāpetvā mahājanena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-abh01a0:2373_2: ṭhitamajjhanhike nakulanagaragāmadvāraṃ patvā rukkhamūle nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī
atk-abh01a0:2373_3: mahānāgatthero nakulanagaragāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā bhattena āpucchi.
atk-abh01a0:2373_4: Sā ‘patto me natthī’ti āha. Thero ‘imināva bhuñjathā’ti saha pattena adāsi. Therī
atk-abh01a0:2373_5: bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattaṃ dhovitvā therassa datvā āha – ‘ajja tāva bhikkhācārena
atk-abh01a0:2373_6: kilamissatha, ito paṭṭhāya pana vo bhikkhācāraparittāso nāma na bhavissati, tātā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2373_7: Tato paṭṭhāya therassa ūnakahāpaṇagghanako piṇḍapāto nāma na uppannapubbo. Ayaṃ ‘āmisapaṭisanthāro’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2374_0: Imaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā bhikkhunā saṅgahapakkhe ṭhatvā tassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2374_1: kathetabbaṃ, dhammo vācetabbo, kukkuccaṃ vinodetabbaṃ, uppannaṃ kiccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2374_2: kātabbaṃ, abbhānavuṭṭhānamānattaparivāsā dātabbā. Pabbajjāraho pabbājetabbo upasampadāraho
atk-abh01a0:2374_3: upasampādetabbo. Bhikkhuniyāpi attano santike upasampadaṃ ākaṅkhamānāya kammavācaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2375_0: Imehi dvīhi paṭisanthārehi paṭisanthārako bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2375_1: thāvaraṃ karoti, sabhayaṭṭhāne attano jīvitaṃ rakkhati coranāgarañño pattaggahaṇahattheneva
atk-abh01a0:2375_2: aggaṃ gahetvā patteneva bhattaṃ ākiranto thero viya. Aladdhalābhuppādane pana ito
atk-abh01a0:2375_3: palāyitvā paratīraṃ gatena mahānāgaraññā ekassa therassa santike saṅgahaṃ labhitvā
atk-abh01a0:2375_4: puna āgantvā rajje patiṭṭhitena setambaṅgaṇe yāvajīvaṃ pavattitaṃ mahābhesajjadānavatthu
atk-abh01a0:2375_6: labhitvā cetiyapabbate corehi bhaṇḍakassa aviluttabhāve vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2376_0: 1352. Indriyesu aguttadvāratāniddese cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti
atk-abh01a0:2376_1: laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā panāhu –
atk-abh01a0:2376_2: “cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati, acittakattā; cittaṃ na passati, acakkhukattā; dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanena
atk-abh01a0:2376_3: pana pasādavatthukena cittena passati. Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjatī’tiādīsu viya
atk-abh01a0:2376_4: sasambhārakathā nāma hoti. Tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā”ti ayamevettha atthoti.
atk-abh01a0:2376_5: Nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2376_6: chandarāgavasena gaṇhāti, diṭṭhamatteyeva na saṇṭhāti. Anubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2376_8: ākāraṃ gaṇhāti. Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa
atk-abh01a0:2376_9: hetu, etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā
atk-abh01a0:2376_10: viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anubandheyyuṃ ajjhotthareyyuṃ. Tassa
atk-abh01a0:2376_11: saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya na paṭipajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2376_12: Evaṃbhūtoyeva ca na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, na cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2377_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi, na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya
atk-abh01a0:2377_1: sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati. Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthamāgacchati
atk-abh01a0:2377_2: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā
atk-abh01a0:2377_3: uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2377_5: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṃ javanaṃ javati.
atk-abh01a0:2377_6: Tatrāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā
atk-abh01a0:2377_7: atthi. Javanakkhaṇe pana dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2378_0: Evaṃ honto pana so ‘cakkhundriye asaṃvaro’ti vuccati. Kasmā? Yasmā tasmiṃ asaṃvare
atk-abh01a0:2378_1: sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi, āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni. Yathā kiṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2378_2: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
atk-abh01a0:2378_3: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārena hi pavisitvā
atk-abh01a0:2378_4: corā yadicchakaṃ kareyyuṃ. Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare
atk-abh01a0:2378_5: sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi, āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittānīti.
atk-abh01a0:2379_0: Sotena saddaṃ sutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Yā imesanti evaṃ saṃvaraṃ anāpajjantassa
atk-abh01a0:2379_1: imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ yā agutti yā agopanā yo anārakkho yo asaṃvaro, athakanaṃ, apidahananti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2380_0: 1353. Bhojane amattaññutāniddese idhekaccoti imasmiṃ sattaloke ekacco. Appaṭisaṅkhāti
atk-abh01a0:2380_1: paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya ajānitvā anupadhāretvā. Ayonisoti anupāyena. Āhāranti asitapītādiajjhoharaṇīyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2380_2: Āhāretīti paribhuñjati ajjhoharati. Davāyātiādi anupāyadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Anupāyena
atk-abh01a0:2380_3: hi āhārento davatthāya madatthāya maṇḍanatthāya vibhūsanatthāya vā āhāreti, no idamatthitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2380_4: paṭicca. Yā tattha asantuṭṭhitāti yā tasmiṃ ayoniso āhāraparibhoge asantussanā asantuṭṭhibhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2380_5: Amattaññutāti amattaññubhāvo, pamāṇasaṅkhātāya mattāya ajānanaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2380_6: apaccavekkhitaparibhogavasena pavattā bhojane amattaññutā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2381_0: 1354. Indriyesu guttadvāratāniddese cakkhunātiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Na nimittaggāhī
atk-abh01a0:2381_1: hotīti chandarāgavasena vuttappakāraṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti. Evaṃ sesapadānipi vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:2381_2: veditabbāni. Yathā ca heṭṭhā ‘javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati,
atk-abh01a0:2381_3: dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi, āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittānī’ti vuttaṃ, evamidha
atk-abh01a0:2381_4: tasmiṃ sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi, āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni.
atk-abh01a0:2381_5: Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagaradvāresu susaṃvutesu, kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti,
atk-abh01a0:2381_6: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti – nagaradvāresu pihitesu
atk-abh01a0:2381_7: corānaṃ paveso natthi – evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi,
atk-abh01a0:2381_8: āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi ‘cakkhundriye saṃvaro’ti
atk-abh01a0:2381_9: vutto. Sotena saddaṃ sutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2382: 1355. Bhojane mattaññutāniddese paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāretīti paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya jānitvā upāyena āhāraṃ paribhuñjati. Idāni taṃ upāyaṃ dassetuṃ neva davāyātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2383_0: Tattha ‘neva davāyā’ti davatthāya na āhāreti. Tattha naṭalaṅghakādayo davatthāya
atk-abh01a0:2383_1: āhārenti nāma. Yañhi bhojanaṃ bhuttassa naccagītakabyasilokasaṅkhāto davo atirekatarena
atk-abh01a0:2383_2: paṭibhāti, taṃ bhojanaṃ adhammena visamena pariyesitvā te āhārenti. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2384_0: Na madāyāti mānamadapurisamadānaṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya na āhāreti. Tattha rājarājamahāmattā
atk-abh01a0:2384_1: madatthāya āhārenti nāma. Te hi attano mānamadapurisamadānaṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya piṇḍarasabhojanādīni
atk-abh01a0:2384_2: paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjanti. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2385_0: Na maṇḍanāyāti sarīramaṇḍanatthāya na āhāreti. Tattha rūpūpajīviniyo mātugāmā antepurikādayo
atk-abh01a0:2385_1: ca sappiphāṇitaṃ nāma pivanti, te hi siniddhaṃ muduṃ mandaṃ bhojanaṃ āhārenti ‘evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2385_2: no aṅgalaṭṭhi susaṇṭhitā bhavissati, sarīre chavivaṇṇo pasanno bhavissatī’ti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2386_0: Na vibhūsanāyāti sarīre maṃsavibhūsanatthāya na āhāreti. Tattha nibbuddhamallamuṭṭhikamallādayo
atk-abh01a0:2386_1: susiniddhehi macchamaṃsādīhi sarīramaṃsaṃ pīṇenti ‘evaṃ no maṃsaṃ ussadaṃ bhavissati
atk-abh01a0:2386_2: pahārasahanatthāyā’ti. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ sarīre maṃsavibhūsanatthāya na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2387_0: Yāvadevāti āhārāharaṇe payojanassa paricchedaniyamadassanaṃ. Imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyāti
atk-abh01a0:2387_1: imassa catumahābhūtikakarajakāyassa ṭhapanatthāya āhāreti. Idamassa āhārāharaṇe payojananti
atk-abh01a0:2387_2: attho. Yāpanāyāti jīvitindriyayāpanatthāya āhāreti. Vihiṃsūparatiyāti vihiṃsā nāma
atk-abh01a0:2387_3: abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakā khuddā. Tassā uparatiyā vūpasamanatthāya āhāreti. Brahmacariyānuggahāyāti
atk-abh01a0:2387_4: brahmacariyaṃ nāma tisso sikkhā, sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ, tassa anuggaṇhanatthāya āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2388_0: Itīti upāyanidassanaṃ; iminā upāyenāti attho. Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇavedanā
atk-abh01a0:2388_1: nāma abhuttappaccayā uppajjanakavedanā. Taṃ paṭihanissāmīti āhāreti. Navañca vedanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2388_2: na uppādessāmīti navavedanā nāma atibhuttappaccayena uppajjanakavedanā. Taṃ na uppādessāmīti
atk-abh01a0:2388_3: āhāreti. Atha vā, ‘navavedanā’ nāma bhuttappaccayā nauppajjanakavedanā. Tassā anuppannāya
atk-abh01a0:2388_4: anuppajjanatthameva āhāreti. Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me bhavissati. Anavajjatā
atk-abh01a0:2388_5: cāti ettha atthi sāvajjaṃ atthi anavajjaṃ. Tattha adhammikapariyesanā adhammikapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2388_6: adhammena paribhogoti idaṃ ‘sāvajjaṃ’ nāma. Dhammena pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā
atk-abh01a0:2388_7: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṃ ‘anavajjaṃ’ nāma. Ekacco anavajjeyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2388_8: ‘laddhaṃ me’ti katvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ bhuñjati. Taṃ jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2388_9: kilamati. Sakalavihāre bhikkhū tassa sarīrapaṭijagganabhesajjapariyesanādīsu ussukkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2388_10: āpajjanti. ‘Kiṃ ida’nti vutte ‘asukassa nāma udaraṃ uddhumāta’ntiādīni vadanti. ‘Esa
atk-abh01a0:2388_11: niccakālampi evaṃpakatikoyeva, attano kucchipamāṇaṃ nāma na jānātī’ti nindanti garahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2388_12: Ayaṃ anavajjeyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti nāma. Evaṃ akatvā ‘anavajjatā ca bhavissatī’ti āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2389_0: Phāsuvihāro cāti etthāpi atthi phāsuvihāro atthi na phāsuvihāro. Tattha ‘āharahatthako
atk-abh01a0:2389_1: alaṃsāṭako tatthavaṭṭako kākamāsako bhuttavamitako’ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2389_2: bhojanaṃ na phāsuvihāro nāma. Etesu hi ‘āharahatthako’ nāma bahuṃ bhuñjitvā attano
atk-abh01a0:2389_3: dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto ‘āhara hattha’nti vadati. ‘Alaṃsāṭako’ nāma accuddhumātakucchitāya
atk-abh01a0:2389_4: uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṃ nivāsetuṃ na sakkoti. ‘Tatthavaṭṭako’ nāma uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto tattheva
atk-abh01a0:2389_5: parivaṭṭati. ‘Kākamāsako’ nāma yathā kākehi āmasituṃ sakkā hoti, evaṃ yāva mukhadvārā
atk-abh01a0:2389_6: āhāreti. ‘Bhuttavamitako’ nāma mukhena sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tattheva vamati. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2389_7: akatvā ‘phāsuvihāro ca me bhavissatī’ti āhāreti. Phāsuvihāro nāma catūhi pañcahi
atk-abh01a0:2389_8: ālopehi ūnūdaratā. Ettakañhi bhuñjitvā pānīyaṃ pivato cattāro iriyāpathā sukhena
atk-abh01a0:2392_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṅgāni samodhānetabbāni. ‘Neva davāyā’tihi ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ‘na madāyā’ti
atk-abh01a0:2392_1: ekaṃ, ‘na maṇḍanāyā’ti ekaṃ, ‘na vibhūsanāyā’ti ekaṃ, ‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā
atk-abh01a0:2392_3: vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī’ti ekaṃ, ‘yātrā ca me bhavissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2392_4: ekaṃ aṅgaṃ. Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cāti ayamettha bhojanānisaṃso. Mahāsīvatthero
atk-abh01a0:2392_5: panāha – heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma. Upari pana aṭṭhaṅgāni samodhānetabbānīti
atk-abh01a0:2392_6: – tattha ‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ‘yāpanāyā’ti ekaṃ, ‘vihiṃsūparatiyāti’
atk-abh01a0:2392_7: ekaṃ, ‘brahmacariyānuggahāyā’ti ekaṃ, ‘iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī’ti ekaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2392_8: ‘navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī’ti ekaṃ, ‘yātrā ca me bhavissatī’ti ekaṃ, ‘anavajjatā’
atk-abh01a0:2392_9: cāti ekaṃ. Phāsuvihāro pana bhojanānisaṃsoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārento
atk-abh01a0:2392_10: bhojane mattaññū nāma hoti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu
atk-abh01a0:2392_11: yuttappamāṇajānanavasena pavatto paccavekkhitaparibhogo bhojane mattaññutā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2393_0: 1356. Muṭṭhassaccaniddese asatīti sativirahitā cattāro khandhā. Ananussati appaṭissatīti
atk-abh01a0:2393_1: upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Asaraṇatāti asaraṇākāro. Adhāraṇatāti dhāretuṃ asamatthatā.
atk-abh01a0:2393_2: Tāya hi samannāgato puggalo ādhānappatto nidhānakkhamo na hoti. Udake alābukaṭāhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2393_3: viya ārammaṇe pilavatīti pilāpanatā. Saṃmusanatāti naṭṭhamuṭṭhassatitā. Tāya hi samannāgato
atk-abh01a0:2393_4: puggalo nikkhittabhatto viya kāko, nikkhittamaṃso viya ca siṅgālo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2394: 1361. Bhāvanābalaniddese kusalānaṃ dhammānanti bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ āsevanāti ādisevanā. Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā. Bahulīkammanti punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2395_2: Sīlavisuddhiniddeso kiñcāpi sīlasampadāniddesena samāno, tattha pana visuddhisampāpakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2395_3: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha visuddhippattaṃ sīlaṃ. Sati ca sampajaññañca,
atk-abh01a0:2395_4: paṭisaṅkhānabalañca bhāvanābalañca, samatho ca vipassanā ca, samathanimittañca paggahanimittañca,
atk-abh01a0:2395_5: paggāho ca avikkhepo ca, sīlasampadā ca diṭṭhisampadā cāti imehi pana chahi dukehi
atk-abh01a0:2396_0: 1373. Diṭṭhivisuddhiniddese kammassakataññāṇanti ‘idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka’nti
atk-abh01a0:2396_1: jānanapaññā. Tattha attanā vā kataṃ hotu parena vā sabbampi akusalakammaṃ no sakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2396_2: Kasmā? Atthabhañjanato anatthajananato ca. Kusalakammaṃ pana anatthabhañjanato atthajananato
atk-abh01a0:2396_3: ca ‘sakaṃ’ nāma. Tattha yathā nāma sadhano sabhogo puriso addhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-abh01a0:2396_4: antarāmagge gāmanigamādīsu nakkhatte saṅghuṭṭhe ‘ahaṃ āgantuko, kaṃ nu kho nissāya
atk-abh01a0:2396_5: nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya’nti acintetvā yathā yathā icchati tena tena nīhārena nakkhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2396_6: kīḷanto sukhena kantāraṃ atikkamati, evameva imasmiṃ kammassakataññāṇe ṭhatvā ime
atk-abh01a0:2396_7: sattā bahuṃ vaṭṭagāmikammaṃ āyūhitvā sukhena sukhaṃ anubhavantā arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2396_8: vītivattā. Saccānulomikañāṇanti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa
atk-abh01a0:2397: 1374. ‘Diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panā’tipadassa niddese yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi padehi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassakataññāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh01a0:2398_0: 1375. ‘Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna’nti padassa niddese yo cetasiko vīriyārambhotiādīhi
atk-abh01a0:2398_1: padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ paññāgatikameva; paññāya hi lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ lokuttaraṭṭhāne
atk-abh01a0:2399: 1376. Saṃvegadukaniddese jātibhayanti jātiṃ bhayato disvā ṭhitañāṇaṃ. Jarāmaraṇabhayādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2400_0: 1377. Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānantiādīhi jātiādīni bhayato disvā jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi
atk-abh01a0:2400_1: muccitukāmassa upāyapadhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Padabhājanīyassa panattho vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:2401_0: 1378. ‘Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesū’ti padaniddese bhiyyokamyatāti visesakāmatā.
atk-abh01a0:2401_1: Idhekacco hi āditova pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā uposathikaṃ vā pāṭipadikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2401_2: vā deti, so tena asantuṭṭho hutvā puna dhurabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:2401_3: āvāsaṃ kāreti, cattāropi paccaye deti. Tatrāpi asantuṭṭho hutvā saraṇāni gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2401_4: pañca sīlāni samādiyati. Tatrāpi asantuṭṭho hutvā pabbajati. Pabbajitvā ekaṃ nikāyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2401_5: dve nikāyeti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhāti, aṭṭha samāpattiyo bhāveti, vipassanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2401_6: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti. Arahattappattito paṭṭhāya mahāsantuṭṭho nāma hoti. Evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2402_0: 1379. ‘Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi’nti padassa niddese yasmā pantasenāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2402_1: dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya ukkaṇṭhamāno padhānaṃ paṭivāseti nāma, anukkaṇṭhamāno no paṭivāseti
atk-abh01a0:2402_2: nāma, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ yā kusalānaṃ dhammānantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sakkaccakiriyatāti
atk-abh01a0:2402_3: kusalānaṃ karaṇe sakkaccakāritā. Sātaccakiriyatāti satatameva karaṇaṃ. Aṭṭhitakiriyatāti
atk-abh01a0:2402_4: khaṇḍaṃ akatvā aṭṭhapetvā karaṇaṃ. Anolīnavuttitāti alīnajīvitā, alīnapavattitā vā.
atk-abh01a0:2403_1: ca khandhapaṭibaddhañca. Pubbenivāsassa anussati pubbenivāsānussati. Tāya sampayuttaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2403_2: ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ. Tayidaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2403_3: vijjhatīti vijjā. Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā te khandhe vidite pākaṭe karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2404_0: Cutūpapāte ñāṇanti cutiyañca upapāte ca ñāṇaṃ. Idampi sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2404_1: tamaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā. Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo viditā pākaṭā
atk-abh01a0:2404_2: karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti sabbakilesānaṃ khayasamaye
atk-abh01a0:2404_3: ñāṇaṃ. Tayidaṃ catusaccacchādakatamaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā. Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā cattāri
atk-abh01a0:2404_4: saccāni viditāni pākaṭāni karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2405_0: 1381. ‘Cittassa ca adhimutti nibbānañcā’ti ettha ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṭṭhena, paccanīkadhammehi
atk-abh01a0:2405_1: ca suṭṭhumuttaṭṭhena aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittassa adhimutti nāma. Itaraṃ pana ‘natthi
atk-abh01a0:2405_2: ettha taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ vānaṃ’, ‘niggataṃ vā tasmā vānā’ti nibbānaṃ. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-abh01a0:2405_3: sayaṃ vikkhambhitakilesehi vimuttattā vimuttīti vuttā, nibbānaṃ pana sabbakilesehi
atk-abh01a0:2406_0: 1382. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti cattāri maggañāṇāni. Phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti cattāri
atk-abh01a0:2406_1: phalañāṇāni. Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ pañca kilese khepentaṃ nirodhentaṃ vūpasamentaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2406_2: paṭippassambhentaṃ uppajjatīti khaye ñāṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Dutiyamaggañāṇaṃ cattāro kilese.

atk-abh01a0:2411_1: Kasmā panetaṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ nāma jātanti? Tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa atthaṃ uddharitvā
atk-abh01a0:2411_2: ṭhapitattā. Tīsupi hi piṭakesu dhammantaraṃ āgataṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍeneva paricchinditvā

atk-abh01a0:2411_4: pañhuddhāraṃ gaṇanacāraṃ asallakkhentenāpi aṭṭhakathākaṇḍatoyeva samānetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2412_0: Kuto pabhavaṃ pana etanti? Sāriputtattherappabhavaṃ. Sāriputtatthero hi ekassa attano
atk-abh01a0:2412_1: saddhivihārikassa nikkhepakaṇḍe atthuddhāraṃ sallakkhetuṃ asakkontassa aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2412_2: kathetvā adāsi. Idaṃ pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ – abhidhammo
atk-abh01a0:2412_3: nāma na sāvakavisayo, na sāvakagocaro; buddhavisayo esa, buddhagocaro. Dhammasenāpati
atk-abh01a0:2412_4: pana saddhivihārikena pucchito taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sammāsambuddhassa
atk-abh01a0:2412_5: kathesi. Sammāsambuddho tassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ kathetvā adāsi. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2412_6: Bhagavā hi ‘katame dhammā kusalā’ti pucchi. ‘Kusalā dhammā nāma katame’ti sallakkhesīti
atk-abh01a0:2412_7: attho. Athassa tuṇhībhūtassa ‘nanu yaṃ mayā katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:2412_8: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotītiādinā nayena bhūmibhedato kusalaṃ dassitaṃ, sabbampi
atk-abh01a0:2412_9: taṃ catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, ime dhammā kusalā’ti iminā nayena kaṇṇikaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ ghaṭaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2412_10: ghaṭaṃ gocchakaṃ gocchakaṃ katvā atthuddhāravasena kusalādidhamme dassento kathetvā adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:2413_1: kusalaṃ. Ime dhammā kusalāti ime sabbepi tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu vuttā phassādayo dhammā kusalā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2414_0: 1385. Akusalānaṃ pana bhūmivasena bhedābhāvato dvādasa akusalacittuppādāti āha. Tattha
atk-abh01a0:2414_1: uppajjatīti uppādo. Cittameva uppādo cittuppādo. Desanāsīsameva cetaṃ. Yathā pana
atk-abh01a0:2414_2: ‘rājā āgato’ti vutte amaccādīnampi āgamanaṃ vuttameva hoti, evaṃ ‘cittuppādā’ti vutte
atk-abh01a0:2414_3: tehi sampayuttadhammāpi vuttāva hontīti. Sabbattha cittuppādaggahaṇena sasampayuttadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2414_4: cittaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Ito paraṃ catūsu bhūmīsu vipākotiādīnaṃ sabbesampi tikadukabhājanīyapadānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2414_5: attho, vedanāttikādīsu ca sukhādīnaṃ navattabbatā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva pāḷiyatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2415_0: 1420. Tattha parittārammaṇattike tāva sabbo kāmāvacarassa vipākoti ettha dvipañcaviññāṇāni
atk-abh01a0:2415_2: ārabbha pavattantīti parittārammaṇāni. Kusalākusalavipākā pana dve manodhātuyo hadayavatthuṃ
