atk-abh01a0:2415_5: dvāresu tadārammaṇavasenāti niyamato rūpādīni cha parittārammaṇāneva ārabbha pavattatīti
atk-abh01a0:2415_7: chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇavasena niyamato rūpādīni cha parittārammaṇāneva ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:2415_8: pavattati. Paṭisandhivasena pavattamānampi parittaṃ kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2415_9: vā ārammaṇaṃ karoti, pavattiyaṃ bhavaṅgavasena, pariyosāne cutivasena pavattamānampi
atk-abh01a0:2415_10: tadeva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti parittārammaṇaṃ. Aṭṭha pana sahetukavipākacittuppādā ettha
atk-abh01a0:2415_12: ārabbha pavattanti. Kiriyamanodhātu pañcadvāre rūpādīni ārabbha pavattati. Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh01a0:2415_13: chasu dvāresu paccuppanne manodvāre atītānāgatepi paritte rūpādidhammeyeva ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:2415_14: khīṇāsavānaṃ pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā pavattatīti parittārammaṇā. Evamime pañcavīsati
atk-abh01a0:2416: 1421. Viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā attano attano heṭṭhimaṃ samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattanato mahaggatārammaṇā. Eva maggaphaladhammā nibbānārammaṇattā appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2417_0: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2417_5: Tenevākārena sattavīsati mahaggatadhamme ārabbha pavattikāle mahaggatārammaṇā. Paṇṇattidhamme
atk-abh01a0:2417_6: ārabbha pavattanakāle siyā navattabbārammaṇā. Diṭṭhivippayuttānaṃ teyeva dhamme ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:2417_9: avūpasamavasena ca pavattiyaṃ parittamahaggatanavattabbārammaṇatā veditabbā. Etesu
atk-abh01a0:2417_10: pana ekadhammopi appamāṇe ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā na appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2418_0: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2419_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ taṃ sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ ākāsakasiṇacatutthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2420_0: Tattha ‘sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ’ nāma aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catutthajjhānaṃ. Tañhi vipassanāyapi
atk-abh01a0:2420_1: pādakaṃ hoti, abhiññānampi, nirodhassāpi, vaṭṭassāpi pādakaṃ hotiyevāti sabbatthapādakanti
atk-abh01a0:2420_3: pādakāni honti, nirodhapādakāneva na honti. ‘Brahmavihāraānāpānacatutthāni’ vipassanāya
atk-abh01a0:2420_4: ceva vaṭṭassa ca pādakāni honti, abhiññānaṃ pana nirodhassa ca pādakāni na honti.
atk-abh01a0:2420_5: Tattha dasavidhampi kasiṇajjhānaṃ kasiṇapaṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā, brahmavihāracatutthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2420_6: sattapaṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā, ānāpānacatutthaṃ nimittaṃ ārabbha pavattattā parittādivasena
atk-abh01a0:2421_0: ‘Iddhividhacatutthaṃ’ parittamahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2421_1: katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, mahaggatacitte
atk-abh01a0:2421_2: samodahati, samāropeti, tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato
atk-abh01a0:2421_3: parittārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo
atk-abh01a0:2421_4: kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti, pādakajjhānacittaṃ rūpakāye samodahati, samāropeti,
atk-abh01a0:2421_5: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2422_1: parittamahaggataappamāṇārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi paresaṃ kāmāvacaracittajānanakāle
atk-abh01a0:2422_3: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ hoti. Ettha ca puthujjano sotāpannassa cittaṃ na jānāti, sotāpanno
atk-abh01a0:2422_4: vā sakadāgāmissāti evaṃ yāva arahato netabbaṃ. Arahā pana sabbesaṃ cittaṃ jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:2422_5: Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. ‘Yathākammupagañāṇacatutthaṃ’
atk-abh01a0:2423_3: Atīte attanā vā parehi vā bhāvitamaggaṃ sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2423_4: Atīte buddhā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu, phalaṃ sacchākaṃsu, nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyiṃsūti
atk-abh01a0:2423_6: Atīte ‘vipassī nāma bhagavā’ ahosi. Tassa ‘bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, bandhumā
atk-abh01a0:2423_7: nāma rājā pitā, bandhumatī nāma mātā’tiādinā nayena nāmagottapathavīnimittādianussaraṇakāle
atk-abh01a0:2424_0: ‘Anāgataṃsañāṇacatutthe’pi eseva nayo. Tampi ayaṃ anāgate ‘kāmāvacare nibbattissatī’ti
atk-abh01a0:2424_1: jānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti. ‘Rūpāvacare vā arūpāvacare vā nibbattissatī’ti jānanakāle
atk-abh01a0:2424_3: jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Anāgate “metteyyo nāma bhagavā uppajjissati, subrahmā
atk-abh01a0:2424_4: nāmassa brāhmaṇo pitā bhavissati, brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā bhavissatī”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:2425_0: Arūpāvacaracatutthaṃ pana āsavānaṃ khayacatutthañca pāḷiyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva kathessāmi.
atk-abh01a0:2425_2: purecārikā. Tassā tesu vuttanayeneva ārammaṇabhedo veditabbo. Pañcadvāre pana voṭṭhabbanavasena
atk-abh01a0:2425_4: navattabbadhammaṃ ārabbha pavattito navattabbārammaṇāni. Ettha hi rūpāvacarāni pathavīkasiṇādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2426_0: 1429. Maggārammaṇattike ādimhi vuttā aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2426_1: attanā paṭividdhamaggānaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggena pana asahajātattā
atk-abh01a0:2426_2: na maggahetukā, attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipativasena
atk-abh01a0:2426_3: maggādhipatino, aññadhammārammaṇakāle na vattabbā maggārammaṇātipi maggādhipatinotipi.
atk-abh01a0:2426_4: Cattāro ariyamaggā maggasaṅkhātassa maggasampayuttassa vā hetuno atthitāya ekantato
atk-abh01a0:2426_5: maggahetukāva. Vīriyaṃ pana vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle sahajātādhipatinā
atk-abh01a0:2426_6: siyā maggādhipatino, chandacittānaṃ aññatarajeṭṭhakakāle siyā na vattabbā maggādhipatinoti.
atk-abh01a0:2427_0: Dvādasavidhe rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni nava jhānāni neva
atk-abh01a0:2427_2: pana ariyānaṃ maggacittajānanakāle maggārammaṇāni honti, maggena pana asahajātattā
atk-abh01a0:2427_3: na maggahetukāni, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito na maggādhipatīni. Kasmā panetāni
atk-abh01a0:2427_4: na maggaṃ garuṃ karontīti? Attano mahaggatatāya. Yathā hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ
atk-abh01a0:2427_5: karoti, mātāpitaro pana na karonti. Na hi te rājānaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhahanti, na
atk-abh01a0:2427_6: añjalikammādīni karonti, daharakāle voharitanayeneva voharanti. Evametānipi attano
atk-abh01a0:2428_1: maggārammaṇā hoti, maggena asahajātattā pana na maggahetukā, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito
atk-abh01a0:2428_2: na maggādhipati. Kasmā garuṃ na karotīti? Attano ahetukatāya hīnatāya jaḷatāya. Yathā
atk-abh01a0:2428_3: hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ karoti, attano parijanā pana khujjavāmanakaceṭakādayo
atk-abh01a0:2428_4: attano aññāṇatāya paṇḍitamanussā viya nātigaruṃ karonti, evameva idampi cittaṃ attano
atk-abh01a0:2428_5: ahetukatāya hīnatāya jaḷatāya maggaṃ garuṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2429: Ñāṇavippayuttakusalādīni ñāṇābhāvena ceva lokiyadhammārammaṇatāya ca maggārammaṇādibhāvaṃ na labhanti, navattabbārammaṇāneva hontīti veditabbānīti.
atk-abh01a0:2430: 1432. Atītārammaṇattike viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā heṭṭhā atītasamāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattitā ekantena atītārammaṇāva.
atk-abh01a0:2431_0: 1433. Niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthīti niyamena pāṭiyekkaṃ cittaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ nāma
atk-abh01a0:2431_1: natthi. Nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ ekantena anāgatārammaṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇampi anāgataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2431_2: ārabbha pavattatīti? No na pavattati. Pāṭiyekkaṃ pana etaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2431_3: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānena saṅgahitattā aññehi mahaggatacittehi missakaṃ hoti. Tena
atk-abh01a0:2432_0: 1434. Dvipañcaviññāṇāni, tisso manodhātuyo ca paccuppannesu rūpādīsu pavattito paccuppannārammaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2432_1: nāma. Dasa cittuppādāti ettha aṭṭha tāva sahetukā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle
atk-abh01a0:2432_2: kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā. Bhavaṅgacutikālesupi
atk-abh01a0:2432_3: eseva nayo. Gatinimittaṃ pana ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle tato paraṃ bhavaṅgakāle
atk-abh01a0:2432_4: ca paccuppannārammaṇā. Tathā pañcadvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattiyaṃ. Manodvāre pana
atk-abh01a0:2432_5: atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattito atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2432_7: manussesu jaccandhādīnaṃ paṭisandhi hoti. Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇavasenāpi paccuppannārammaṇā
atk-abh01a0:2432_8: hotīti ayamettha viseso. ‘Somanassasahagatā’ pana pañcadvāre santīraṇavasena tadārammaṇavasena
atk-abh01a0:2432_9: ca paccuppannārammaṇā hoti. Manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena sahetukavipākā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2433_1: samānagatikā eva. Kevalañhi sā āpāyikānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattatīti
atk-abh01a0:2433_3: pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā paccuppannārammaṇā hoti. Manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha
atk-abh01a0:2434_0: Kāmāvacarakusalantiādīsu kusalato tāva cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2434_2: honti. Paṇṇattinibbānapaccavekkhaṇe navattabbārammaṇā. Ñāṇavippayuttesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2434_3: Kevalañhi tehi maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā natthi. Ayamevettha viseso.
atk-abh01a0:2435_1: assādanābhinandanaparāmāsakāle atītādiārammaṇā honti. Paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha assādentassa
atk-abh01a0:2435_2: abhinandantassa ‘satto satto’ti parāmasitvā gaṇhantassa navattabbārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2435_3: Diṭṭhivippayuttesupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi tehi parāmāsaggahaṇaṃ natthi. Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā
atk-abh01a0:2435_4: atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha domanassitānaṃ atītādiārammaṇā, paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha domanassitānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2435_5: navattabbārammaṇā. Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu eva dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2435_6: ceva uddhatabhāvena ca pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā. Kiriyato
atk-abh01a0:2435_8: upekkhāsahagatā pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ paccuppannārammaṇāva. Manodvāre
atk-abh01a0:2436_1: ālokakasiṇacatutthaṃ brahmavihāracatutthaṃ ānāpānacatutthanti imāni pañca navattabbārammaṇāneva.
atk-abh01a0:2436_3: pavattanato atītārammaṇaṃ. Mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ
atk-abh01a0:2436_4: adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti. Mahākassapatthero kira mahādhātunidhānaṃ karonto
atk-abh01a0:2436_5: anāgate aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni dve vassasatāni ime gandhā mā sussiṃsu, pupphāni mā
atk-abh01a0:2436_6: milāyiṃsu, dīpā mā nibbāyiṃsūti adhiṭṭhahi. Sabbaṃ tatheva ahosi. Assaguttatthero
atk-abh01a0:2436_7: vattaniyasenāsane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sukkhabhattaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ disvā ‘udakasoṇḍi divase
atk-abh01a0:2436_8: divase, purebhattaṃ dadhirasā hotū’ti adhiṭṭhahi. Purebhattaṃ gahitaṃ dadhirasaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2436_9: hoti pacchābhatte pākatikameva. Kāyaṃ pana cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena
atk-abh01a0:2436_10: gamanakāle, aññassa vā pāṭihāriyassa karaṇakāle, kāyaṃ ārabbha pavattattā paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2437_1: Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ atīte sattadivasabbhantare anāgate sattadivasabbhantare paresaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2437_2: cittaṃ jānantassa atītārammaṇaṃ anāgatārammaṇañca hoti. Sattadivasātikkame pana taṃ
atk-abh01a0:2437_3: jānituṃ na sakkoti. Atītānāgataṃsañāṇānañhi esa visayo. Na etassa paccuppannajānanakāle
atk-abh01a0:2438_0: Paccuppannañca nāmetaṃ tividhaṃ – khaṇapaccuppannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ addhāpaccuppannañca.
atk-abh01a0:2438_2: ‘santatipaccuppannaṃ’. Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na tāva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2438_3: pākaṭaṃ hoti; yāva pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare ekadvisantativārā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2438_4: Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti; yāva
atk-abh01a0:2438_5: taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare ekadvisantativārā veditabbā. Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2438_6: hatthavikāraṃ ghaṇḍibherīādiākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti; yāva
atk-abh01a0:2438_7: pana taṃ suṇāti, etasmimpi antare ekadvisantativārā veditabbā. Evaṃ tāva majjhimabhāṇakā.
atk-abh01a0:2438_8: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana ‘rūpasantati arūpasantatī’ti dve santatiyo vatvā, ‘udakaṃ akkamitvā
atk-abh01a0:2438_9: gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati, addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye
atk-abh01a0:2438_10: usumabhāvo na vūpasammati, ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:2438_11: na vigacchati, antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaritvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa
atk-abh01a0:2438_12: yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati, ayaṃ rūpasantati nāma; dve tayo javanavārā
atk-abh01a0:2438_13: arūpasantati nāmā’ti vatvā ‘tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2439_0: Ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte
atk-abh01a0:2439_1: “yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ. Tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2439_2: hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgapaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto
atk-abh01a0:2439_3: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratī”ti vuttaṃ. Santatipaccuppannañcettha aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-abh01a0:2440_0: Tattha keci ‘khaṇapaccuppannaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotī’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2440_1: Kiṃkāraṇā? Yasmā iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti. Idañca nesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2440_2: opammaṃ – yathā ākāse khitte pupphamuṭṭhimhi avassaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ ekassa vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati
atk-abh01a0:2440_3: vaṇṭena vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati, evaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena mahājanassa
atk-abh01a0:2440_4: citte āvajjite avassaṃ ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā
atk-abh01a0:2440_5: bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatīti. Taṃ pana vassasatampi vassasahassampi āvajjanto yena
atk-abh01a0:2440_6: cittena āvajjeti, yena ca jānāti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭṭhānābhāvato āvajjanajavanānañca
atk-abh01a0:2440_7: aniṭṭhe ṭhāne nānārammaṇabhāvappattidosato ayuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ. Santatipaccuppannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2441_1: parassa cittaṃ, taṃ sabbampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāma. Addhāpaccuppannaṃ pana javanavārena
atk-abh01a0:2441_2: dīpetabbanti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ suvuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ dīpanā – iddhimā parassa
atk-abh01a0:2441_3: cittaṃ jānitukāmo āvajjeti. Āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha
atk-abh01a0:2441_4: nirujjhati. Tato cattāri pañca javanāni yesaṃ pacchimaṃ iddhicittaṃ, sesāni kāmāvacarāni.
atk-abh01a0:2441_5: Tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ hoti. Na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni
atk-abh01a0:2441_7: ca iddhicittameva parassa cittaṃ pajānāti, na itarāni; yathā cakkhudvāre cakkhuviññāṇameva
atk-abh01a0:2441_8: rūpaṃ passati, na itarānīti. Iti idaṃ santatipaccuppannassa ceva addhāpaccuppannassa
atk-abh01a0:2441_9: ca vasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yasmā vā santatipaccuppannampi addhāpaccuppanneyeva
atk-abh01a0:2442_2: kiñcāpi pubbenivāsacetopariyañāṇānipi atītārammaṇāni honti, atha kho tesaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:2442_3: atītakkhandhā khandhapaṭibaddhañca kiñci anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tañhi atītakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu
atk-abh01a0:2442_4: dhammesu sabbaññutaññāṇasamagatikaṃ hoti. Cetopariyañāṇassa ca sattadivasabbhantarātītaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2442_5: cittameva ārammaṇaṃ. Tañhi aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti, maggasampayuttacittārammaṇattā
atk-abh01a0:2442_6: pana pariyāyato maggārammaṇanti vuttaṃ. Yathākammupagañāṇassa ca atītacetanāmattamevārammaṇanti.
atk-abh01a0:2442_7: Ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. Ayamettha aṭṭhakathānayo. Yasmā pana “kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:2442_9: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vuttaṃ, tasmā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇayathākammupagañāṇānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2442_10: ārammaṇaṃ honti. Tatrāpi yathākammupagañāṇassa kusalākusalā evāti.
atk-abh01a0:2443_2: viya sabbaññutaññāṇasamagatikaṃ hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi cetopariyañāṇampi anāgatārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2443_3: hoti, taṃ pana sattadivasabbhantare uppajjanakacittameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Idaṃ anāgate
atk-abh01a0:2443_5: atītānāgatapaccuppannesu ekadhammampi ārabbha appavattito ekantanavattabbārammaṇānevāti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:2444_0: 1435. Ajjhattattike anindriyabaddharūpañca nibbānañca bahiddhāti idaṃ yathā indriyabaddhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2444_1: parapuggalasantāne bahiddhāti vuccamānampi tassa attano santānapariyāpannattā niyakajjhattaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2444_2: hoti, evaṃ na kenaci pariyāyena ajjhattaṃ hotīti niyakajjhattapariyāyassa abhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2444_3: bahiddhāti vuttaṃ, na niyakajjhattamattassa asambhavato. Niyakajjhattamattassa pana
atk-abh01a0:2444_4: asambhavamattaṃ sandhāya ajjhattārammaṇattike bahiddhārammaṇatā vuttā. Ajjhattadhammāpagamamattatova
atk-abh01a0:2444_6: ananujānitvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ na vattabbaṃ ajjhattārammaṇantipītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2445_0: Tattha na kevalaṃ tadeva navattabbārammaṇaṃ, tassa pana āvajjanampi, upacāracittānipi,
atk-abh01a0:2445_1: tassārammaṇassa paccavekkhaṇacittānipi, tasseva assādanādivasena pavattāni akusalacittānipi
atk-abh01a0:2445_2: navattabbārammaṇānevāti. Tāni pana tasmiṃ vutte vuttāneva hontīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2445_3: Kathaṃ vuttāneva hontīti? Etañhi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, yañca tassa purecārikaṃ āvajjanaupacārādivasena
atk-abh01a0:2445_4: pavattaṃ, tena saha ekārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Taṃ sabbaṃ atītārammaṇattike ‘kāmāvacarakusalaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2445_5: akusalaṃ, kiriyato nava cittuppādā, rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna’nti evaṃ vuttānaṃ etesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2445_6: cittuppādānaṃ ‘siyā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipī’tiādinā nayena navattabbārammaṇabhāvassa
atk-abh01a0:2445_7: anuññātattā, ākiñcaññāyatanassa ca ‘ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, cattāro maggā apariyāpannā,
atk-abh01a0:2445_8: cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipī’ti evaṃ ekantena
atk-abh01a0:2445_9: navattabbārammaṇattavacanato navattabbārammaṇanti vuttaṃ. Idāni taṃ ajjhattārammaṇattike
atk-abh01a0:2445_10: ekampi vuccamānaṃ yasmā heṭṭhā tena saha ekārammaṇabhāvampi sandhāya kāmāvacarakusalādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2445_11: navattabbārammaṇatā vuttā, tasmā idhāpi tesaṃ navattabbārammaṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Ko
atk-abh01a0:2445_12: hi tena saha ekārammaṇānaṃ navattabbārammaṇabhāve antarāyoti? Evaṃ tasmiṃ vutte ‘vuttāneva
atk-abh01a0:2445_13: hontī’ti veditabbāni. Sesamettha ajjhattārammaṇattike pāḷito uttānameva.
atk-abh01a0:2446_0: Ārammaṇavibhāge pana viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti imesaṃ tāva kusalavipākakiriyavasena
atk-abh01a0:2446_1: channaṃ cittuppādānaṃ attano santānasambandhaṃ heṭṭhimasamāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattito
atk-abh01a0:2446_2: ajjhattārammaṇatā veditabbā. Ettha ca kiriyaākāsānañcāyatanaṃ kiriyaviññāṇañcāyatanasseva
atk-abh01a0:2446_3: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na itarassa. Kasmā? Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyasamaṅgino kusalassa vā
atk-abh01a0:2446_4: vipākassa vā viññāṇañcāyatanassa abhāvato. Kusalaṃ pana kusalavipākakiriyānaṃ tiṇṇampi
atk-abh01a0:2446_5: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ nibbattetvā ṭhitassa tato uddhaṃ tividhassapi
atk-abh01a0:2446_6: viññāṇañcāyatanassa uppattisambhavato. Vipākaṃ pana na kassaci ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2446_7: Vipākato vuṭṭhahitvā cittassa abhinīhārāsambhavato. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇakaraṇepi
atk-abh01a0:2446_8: eseva nayo. Rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānādīnaṃ sabbesampi niyakajjhattato bahiddhābhāvena
atk-abh01a0:2446_9: bahiddhābhūtāni pathavīkasiṇādīni ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2447_0: Sabbeva kāmāvacarā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā, rūpāvacaraṃ catutthaṃ jhānanti ettha
atk-abh01a0:2447_1: kusalato tāva cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh01a0:2447_2: ajjhattārammaṇā. Paresaṃ khandhādipaccavekkhaṇe paṇṇattinibbānapaccavekkhaṇe ca bahiddhārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2447_3: Tadubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Ñāṇavippayuttesupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi
atk-abh01a0:2447_4: tesaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṃ natthi. Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā
atk-abh01a0:2447_6: khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpakasiṇādīsu ca tatheva pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2447_7: tadubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Diṭṭhivippayuttesupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi
atk-abh01a0:2447_8: tesaṃ parāmāsagahaṇaṃ natthi. Dvepi paṭighasampayuttā attano khandhādīsu domanassitassa
atk-abh01a0:2447_9: ajjhattārammaṇā, parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpapaṇṇattīsu ca bahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2448_0: Dvipañcaviññāṇāni, tisso ca manodhātuyoti, ime terasa cittuppādā attano rūpādīni
atk-abh01a0:2448_1: ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā, parassa rūpādīsu pavattā bahiddhārammaṇā, tadubhayavasena
atk-abh01a0:2448_3: santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena attano pañca rūpādidhamme, manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:2448_4: aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā, paresaṃ dhammesu
atk-abh01a0:2448_6: eseva nayo. Kevalaṃ panetā sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi
atk-abh01a0:2449_0: Aṭṭha mahāvipākacittānipi tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ samānagatikāni. Kevalaṃ panetāni santīraṇavasena
atk-abh01a0:2449_1: na pavattanti. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivaseneva etāni sugatiyaṃyeva pavattanti. Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyā
atk-abh01a0:2449_2: pañcadvāre attano rūpādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭhākārakaraṇavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2449_3: parassa rūpādīsu pavattā bahiddhārammaṇā. Manodvāre tathāgatassa jotipālamāṇavamaghadevarājakaṇhatāpasādikālesu
atk-abh01a0:2449_4: attanā katakiriyaṃ paccavekkhantassa hasituppādavasena pavattā ajjhattārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2450_0: Mallikāya deviyā santatimahāmattassa sumanamālākārassāti evamādīnaṃ kiriyākaraṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2450_2: pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena manodvāre ca āvajjanavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattādiārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2450_3: Aṭṭha mahākiriyā kusalacittagatikā eva. Kevalañhi tā khīṇāsavānaṃ uppajjanti, kusalāni
atk-abh01a0:2451: Vuttappakāre rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni pañca jhānāni imasmiṃ tike okāsaṃ labhanti. Etāni hi kasiṇapaṇṇattinimittārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇāni.
atk-abh01a0:2452_0: ‘Iddhividhacatutthaṃ’ kāyavasena cittaṃ, cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano
atk-abh01a0:2452_1: kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, bahiddhā
atk-abh01a0:2452_2: hatthiassādidassanakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā, pavattiyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2453_2: paresaṃ cittārammaṇato bahiddhārammaṇameva. Attano cittajānane pana tena payojanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2453_4: khandhe, anidriyabaddharūpaṃ, tisso ca paṇṇattiyo anussaraṇato bahiddhārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2454_3: vā anindriyabaddhassa vā rūpassa anussaraṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2456_0: 1441. Hetugocchakaniddese tayo kusalahetūtiādinā nayena hetū dassetvā puna teyeva
atk-abh01a0:2456_1: uppattiṭṭhānato dassetuṃ catūsu bhūmīsu kusalesu uppajjantītiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena
atk-abh01a0:2457_0: 1473. Yattha dve tayo āsavā ekato uppajjantīti ettha tividhena āsavānaṃ ekato uppatti
atk-abh01a0:2457_1: veditabbā. Tattha catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu avijjāsavena, diṭṭhisampayuttesu diṭṭhāsavaavijjāsavehi
atk-abh01a0:2457_2: saddhinti kāmāsavo duvidhena ekato uppajjati. Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu
atk-abh01a0:2457_3: avijjāsavena saddhinti ekadhāva ekato uppajjati. Yathā cettha evaṃ yattha dve tīṇi
atk-abh01a0:2457_4: saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjantīti etthāpi saṃyojanānaṃ uppatti ekato dasadhā bhave.
atk-abh01a0:2457_5: Tattha kāmarāgo catudhā ekato uppajjati, paṭigho tidhā, māno ekadhā. Tathā vicikicchā
atk-abh01a0:2457_6: ceva bhavarāgo ca. Kathaṃ? Kāmarāgo tāva mānasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva, diṭṭhisaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi
atk-abh01a0:2457_7: ca, sīlabbataparāmāsaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ca, avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti
atk-abh01a0:2457_8: evaṃ catudhā ekato uppajjati. Paṭigho pana issāsaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva, macchariyasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi
atk-abh01a0:2457_9: ca, avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti evaṃ tidhā ekato uppajjati. Māno bhavarāgāvijjāsaṃyojanehi
atk-abh01a0:2457_10: saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati. Tathā vicikicchā. Sā hi avijjāsaṃyojanena saddhiṃ
atk-abh01a0:2457_11: ekadhā uppajjati. Bhavarāgepi eseva nayoti. Evamettha dve tīṇi saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2458_0: 1511. Yaṃ panetaṃ nīvaraṇagocchake yattha dve tīṇi nīvaraṇāni ekato uppajjantīti
atk-abh01a0:2458_1: vuttaṃ, tatthāpi aṭṭhadhā nīvaraṇānaṃ ekato uppatti veditabbā. Etesu hi kāmacchando
atk-abh01a0:2458_2: duvidhā ekato uppajjati, byāpādo catudhā, uddhaccaṃ ekadhā. Tathā vicikicchā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2458_4: thinamiddhauddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi saddhiṃ duvidhā ekato uppajjati. Yaṃ panetaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2458_5: dve tīṇīti vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā catunnampi ekato uppajjatīti
atk-abh01a0:2458_6: vacanaṃ yujjati eva. Byāpādo pana asaṅkhārikacitte uddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi, sasaṅkhārike
atk-abh01a0:2458_9: uppajjati. Uddhaccaṃ pana avijjānīvaraṇamattena saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2459_0: 1577. Yampidaṃ kilesagocchake yattha dve tayo kilesā ekato uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, tattha
atk-abh01a0:2459_1: ‘dve kilesā aññehi, tayo vā kilesā aññehi kilesehi saddhiṃ uppajjantī’ti evamattho
atk-abh01a0:2459_2: veditabbo. Kasmā? Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃyeva vā ekato uppattiyā asambhavato.
atk-abh01a0:2460_0: Tattha dasadhā kilesānaṃ ekato uppatti hoti. Ettha hi lobho chadhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2460_1: Paṭigho dvidhā. Tathā mohoti veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Lobho tāva asaṅkhārike diṭṭhivippayutte
atk-abh01a0:2461_0: Paṭigho pana asaṅkhārike mohauddhaccaahirikānottappehi, sasaṅkhārike mohathinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi
atk-abh01a0:2461_1: saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati. Moho pana vicikicchāsampayutte vicikicchuddhaccaahirikānottappehi,
atk-abh01a0:2461_2: uddhaccasampayutte uddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2469: Ṭhitāya tassā āraddhā, yā mayā atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh01a0:2474: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
atk-abh01a0:2478: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
atk-abh01a0:2479: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu.
atk-abh01a0:2481: Rājā rakkhatu dhammena, attanova pajaṃ pajanti.
atk-abh01a0:2482_6: therena katā ayaṃ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā.
